T02TD2625E:231a-1: a'a r+ya sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha ne te dzo r'a dza' n'a ma kalpa r'a dza s+ya t'i k'a /
T02TD2625E:231a-3: 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong pa gzi brjid kyir gyal po zhes bya ba cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel ba /
T02TD2625E:231a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:231a-5: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:231a-6: dpal lha mo skul byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:231a-7: gang gis thugs rje dpag med dang //
T02TD2625E:231a-8: shes rab dpag med stobs kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:231a-9: 'gro ba phongs pa kun skyob pa //
T02TD2625E:231a-10: bsam yas ma thu mnga' der bdag 'dud //
T02TD2625E:231a-11: 'gro ba'i ngan 'gro ma lus zad mdzad mtho ris bde stsol ba //
T02TD2625E:231a-12: gang 'dir rdo rje'i rigs 'khrungs de la'ang rab tu dang bas phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2625E:231a-13: dpal ldan rgyud chen cho ga mang po'i rin chen mdzod gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:231a-14: ngan song kun sbyong zhes bya 'di ni bdag gis 'bad pas dbye //
T02TD2625E:231a-15: rgyud chen rab zab mtsho chen 'dra ba 'di la bdag 'dra'i blos //
T02TD2625E:231a-16: gting dpag rab tu dka' zhing 'khrul ba'i dgra tshogs rab mang yang //
T02TD2625E:231a-17: rang gis dad dang dman pa'i mi rnams dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:231a-18: gzhung gi rgya mtshor bdag 'jug 'di la brtser ldan rnams kyis skyobs /
T02TD2625E:231a-19: deng sang 'gro rnams shes rab zhan cing mngon pa'i nga rgyal ldan //
T02TD2625E:231a-20: de dag rnams kyis rin chen rgyud 'di ma rungs byas par mthong //
T02TD2625E:231a-21: de phyir log par smra ba tshar gcod mkhas pa dga' skyed 'di //
T02TD2625E:231b-0: blo ldan lung dang rigs pas @231b 'jal rnams gus pas nyon //
T02TD2625E:231b-1: de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:231b-2: brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shing au du m'a ra'i me tog dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2625E:231b-3: ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las gsungs ba /
T02TD2625E:231b-4: 'jigs rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02TD2625E:231b-5: au du mw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02TD2625E:231b-6: brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2625E:231b-8: de bzhin du 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde ba'i so sor thar pa'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD2625E:231b-9: sangs rgyas zhes bya sgra 'di yang //
T02TD2625E:231b-10: 'jig rten dag na rab tu dkon //
T02TD2625E:231b-12: brgya lam na 'byung ba'i dus i bzhi ste /
T02TD2625E:231b-17: de la bdag cag gi bla ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya'i skyes mchog 'di ni thugs rje chen pos bskul ba'i smon lam gyi mthus /
T02TD2625E:231b-18: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i rtsod pa'i dus su 'dam gyi padma bzhin du 'byung ste /
T02TD2625E:231b-19: ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
T02TD2625E:231b-20: nga dang gzhan dag byas dus de //
T02TD2625E:231b-21: sh'akya seng ge rtsod pa'i dus //
T02TD2625E:231b-23: rtsod pa'i dus 'di ni lha ba'i snyigs ma la gnas pas /
T02TD2625E:231b-24: lta ba tha dad pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis glags pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:231b-25: theg pa sna tshogs pas gdul bya dag 'dul gyi /
T02TD2625E:231b-26: rdzogs ldan la sogs pa'i dus kyi sems can ltar /
T02TD2625E:231b-27: theg pa gcig gis ni 'dul bar mi nus te /
T02TD2625E:231b-30: de'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
T02TD2625E:231b-31: mdo sde dang gsang sngags kyi lam ston pa'i gzhung rab tu mang po gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:231b-32: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi ngo bo ba stan pa'i gzhung yang rab tu rgya cher gsungs mod kyi /
T02TD2625E:231b-33: de dag gis 'dul ba ma yin pa lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i ched du /
T02TD2625E:231b-34: yang 'phags ba ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'di sum cu rtsa gsum kyi gnas su dga' ba'i tshal der gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:232a-0: der gsungs pa'i rgyud 'di ni dbang po'i rim pa gsum gyis nyan pa la sogs par @232a * //
T02TD2625E:232a-2: 'di ltar sngon gyi byed bas kyang dbang po tha dad de /
T02TD2625E:232a-3: nye rgyal dang bang nas skyes lta bu mgo smos pas go ba dang 'phags pa cang shes koo ndi nya la sogs pa'i lnga sde bzang po la sogs pa don rnam par phye bas go ba dang /
T02TD2625E:232a-4: sa nu la sogs pa don rnams par spros bas go ba dag dang /
T02TD2625E:232a-5: 'phags pa lam ba stan la sogs pa tshig lhur len pa'i gang zag dag srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:232a-6: rkyen gyis kyang de tha da de /
T02TD2625E:232a-8: ma gangh'a pa zur gyis so //
T02TD2625E:232a-9: ko sa la ba yig phyed kyis //
T02TD2625E:232a-10: banytsa la pa brjod na shes //
T02TD2625E:232a-11: nub mi ma smras ni shes so //
T02TD2625E:232a-12: zhes brjod pa lta bu ste /
T02TD2625E:232a-13: de'i phyir dbang po rno ba dang 'bri nag dang /
T02TD2625E:232a-14: dbang po rtul po de dag gi dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:232a-15: rgyud 'di tshul gsum gyis bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:232a-16: mgo smos bas go ba'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:232a-17: don dang ldan pa'i mtshan rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:232a-18: don rnam par phye bas go ba'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:232a-19: rgyud kyi don rnam par dbye ba dang /
T02TD2625E:232a-20: rnam par spros pas go ba'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:232a-21: yan lag ldas gzhung bshad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:232a-23: thugs rje'i dbang gis mtshan 'dzin pa la sogs pas sbyor bar dgongs pa nyid ji lta bar yul du byas ba'o //
T02TD2625E:232a-25: mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:232a-26: chos nyid skyong med chos rnams ston pa 'di gnas te //
T02TD2625E:232a-27: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid 'di rjes su rtogs //
T02TD2625E:232a-28: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to //
T02TD2625E:232a-31: 'du shes tsam yang sbangs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:232a-32: rang gi ngo bor ba stan du med //
T02TD2625E:232a-33: ye shes rang gcig ces bya ba //
T02TD2625E:232a-34: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs shes bya //
T02TD2625E:232a-36: de bas na tshig 'di gnyis kyis ni me long lta bu'i ye shes ba stan la /
T02TD2625E:232a-37: ye shes de yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD2625E:232a-38: mdo sde'i rgyan las ji skad du //
T02TD2625E:232a-39: me long ye shes mi g-yo ste /
T02TD2625E:232a-40: ye shes gsum po de la brten //
T02TD2625E:232a-41: mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog / bya ba grub pa kho na'o //
T02TD2625E:232a-42: me long ye shes nga yi med //
T02TD2625E:232a-43: yongs su mchad rtag tu ldan //
T02TD2625E:232a-44: shes bya kun la ma rmongs la //
T02TD2625E:232a-45: rtag tu de la mngon phogs min //
T02TD2625E:232a-46: ye shes kun gyi rgyu mtshan phyir //
T02TD2625E:232b-1: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2625E:232b-2: ye shes gzugs brnyan 'byung phyir te //
T02TD2625E:232b-4: de'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis yul du mdzad la /
T02TD2625E:232b-5: kun rdzob pa'i dngos po ji ltar snang pa yang skad cig lams lus par snang zhing snang ba la mngon du phyogs pa yang med de /
T02TD2625E:232b-6: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yul bsams kyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02TD2625E:232b-7: gal te ye shes 'di de lta bu ma yin du zin na //
T02TD2625E:232b-8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la /
T02TD2625E:232b-9: ye she 'di lta bu gyu ma tsam du mi gnas ni /
T02TD2625E:232b-10: gal te bdag gcig med du zin na ni /
T02TD2625E:232b-11: de yi spyod yul zhi ba stong pa'ang med //
T02TD2625E:232b-12: rang 'byung rdul rnams shin tu bsal ba yi //
T02TD2625E:232b-13: bder gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung //
T02TD2625E:232b-14: zhes 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las gsungs pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:232b-15: bskal pa mang por de lta bur goms par byas pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:232b-16: rgyu'i byed ba'i mthu las rjes su dpag par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:232b-17: dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:232b-18: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam skye ba'i bar chad ji snyed pa ni dgra zhes bya ste /
T02TD2625E:232b-19: dgra dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:232b-20: ye shes gang gis spangs pa de ni bcom pa ste /
T02TD2625E:232b-21: 'dis ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye she ba stan la /
T02TD2625E:232b-22: ye shes de'i mtshan nyid kyang /
T02TD2625E:232b-24: bsgom pa dag pas sems can la //
T02TD2625E:232b-25: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod //
T02TD2625E:232b-26: mi gnas zhi bar zhugs pa ni //
T02TD2625E:232b-27: mnyam nyid ye shes yin par 'dod //
T02TD2625E:232b-28: dus rnams kun du [*kun tu?] byams pa dang //
T02TD2625E:232b-29: thugs rje chen po dag dang ldan //
T02TD2625E:232b-30: sems can rnams la mos pa bzhin //
T02TD2625E:232b-31: sangs rgyas sku ni nges par ston //
T02TD2625E:232b-33: yang na ye shes 'di dang ldan pa ni mchod pa bya ba yin bas na /
T02TD2625E:232b-34: aa ra had ces bya ba ni mchod par bya pa'am /
T02TD2625E:232b-35: yang na ye shes 'di dang ldan pa ni chos kyi rgyal por 'os na aa ra chad ces bya ba ni 'os pa'o //
T02TD2625E:232b-36: yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:232b-37: chos rnams kyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa la yang dag par ro //
T02TD2625E:233a-0: sam zhes bya ba ni sam purna @233a * //
T02TD2625E:233a-2: de'i phyir sam ni chos rnams kyi dngos po ji snyed pa mkhyen par ro //
T02TD2625E:233a-3: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:233a-4: rab tu rtogs pa ste skyes bu legs bar sad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:233a-5: de'i phyir yang dag bar zhes bya ba dang rdzogs bar zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di nyid 'chad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:233a-6: yang na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:233a-8: me tog padma rab tu rgyas pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:233a-9: 'dis ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:233a-10: ye shes de'i mtshan nyid ni mdo sde rgyan de nyid las /
T02TD2625E:233a-11: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2625E:233a-12: shes bya kun la rtag mi thogs //
T02TD2625E:233a-13: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyi //
T02TD2625E:233a-14: gter dang 'dra ba kho na yin //
T02TD2625E:233a-16: 'byor pa thams cad ston mdzad pa //
T02TD2625E:233a-17: the tshom thams cad gcod pa yin //
T02TD2625E:233a-18: chos chen char ni rab tu 'bebs //
T02TD2625E:233a-20: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:233a-21: ngan song ni dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams so //
T02TD2625E:233a-22: thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus par ro //
T02TD2625E:233a-23: yongs su zhes bya ba ni mthar thug par ro //
T02TD2625E:233a-24: sbyong ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:233a-25: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid dag par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:233a-27: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:233a-28: 'dis ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:233a-29: ye shes de'i mtshan nyid kyang mdo sde rgyan nyid las /
T02TD2625E:233a-30: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2625E:233a-31: khams rnams kun du sna tshogs shing //
T02TD2625E:233a-32: dpag med bsam yas sprul pa yis //
T02TD2625E:233a-33: sems can kun don sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2625E:233a-34: sangs rgyas sprul pa der rtag tu //
T02TD2625E:233a-35: mdzad pa grub pa'i bye brag dang //
T02TD2625E:233a-36: grangs dang zhing gi rnam kun du [*kun tu?] //
T02TD2625E:233a-37: bsam mi khyab par shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:233a-39: ye shes bzhi char gyi don bsdus pa yang /
T02TD2625E:233a-41: 'dzin pa'i phyir dang sems mnyam phyir //
T02TD2625E:233a-42: yang dag chos rab ston phyir dang //
T02TD2625E:233a-43: bya ba grub pa nyid kyi phyir //
T02TD2625E:233a-44: ye shes bzhi po yang dag 'byung //
T02TD2625E:233b-0: ye shes de dag bdag nyid gcig tu gyur pa ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes @233b bya ste /
T02TD2625E:233b-1: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings chung zad kyang dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:233b-2: de'i phyir chos kyi dbyings de nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog yin pas ming de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:233b-3: ye shes de dag gi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyi sku ni /
T02TD2625E:233b-4: 'dir phyir mi rtog pa'i phyir bzlog pas ba stan pa'am rtog pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2625E:233b-5: gdul bya rnams kyis de la kha dog dang dbyibs mtshan ma mang por rtogs pas so //
T02TD2625E:233b-6: de ltar yang 'phags ba de kho na nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las /
T02TD2625E:233b-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni //
T02TD2625E:233b-8: rtag tu rnam mi rtog las byung //
T02TD2625E:233b-9: mi rtog pa yi ye shes la //
T02TD2625E:233b-10: de phyir rtog ba zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:233b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:233b-12: mi rtog gang la rtog nyid du //
T02TD2625E:233b-13: brtags pas rtog las byung ba ni //
T02TD2625E:233b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' chen //
T02TD2625E:233b-15: de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:233b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:233b-17: de ltar na 'bras bu'i rgyud ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:233b-18: rgyu de'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:233b-19: rgyu de'i 'bras bu de rkyen gang gis bskyed ces phyogs snga ma la /
T02TD2625E:233b-20: rtog pa zhes bya ba la bzlas nas brjod de /
T02TD2625E:233b-21: kalpa ti kalpa ti kalpa zhes ba stan pa'i dbang gis /
T02TD2625E:233b-22: dam tshig dang dbang dang bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:233b-23: 'dir rtog pa zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod la /
T02TD2625E:233b-24: de bas na 'dir rtog ba zhes bya bas ni /
T02TD2625E:233b-25: cho ga rgyas pa nyid ba stan la /
T02TD2625E:233b-26: cho ga rgyas pa'i ngo bo dam tshig la sogs pa yan lag bzhi ni /
T02TD2625E:233b-27: 'dir sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs te /
T02TD2625E:233b-28: de bas na kalpa zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD2625E:233b-29: bi dhi bi dha ra zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2625E:233b-31: de ltar na dbang po rnon po dag la rgyu dang 'bras bu dang thabs kyi rgyud kyi mtshan tsam zhig ba stan pa byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:233b-32: da ni bsdus pa'i don rnam par dbye ba dang /
T02TD2625E:233b-33: rnam par spros te bshad pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:233b-34: de lta 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:233b-35: mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud kyi don ma lus pa ni /
T02TD2625E:233b-36: dgos pa dang bsdus pa'i don /
T02TD2625E:234a-0: brgal ba'i lan rnams kyis legs par @234a * //
T02TD2625E:234a-2: de yang 'dir ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs su sang ba rnams par shes pa ba stan /
T02TD2625E:234a-3: chos kyi ngo bo nyid brjod par byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-4: des ba stan par bya ba'i don ma lus pa ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-5: de dag rgyu 'bras kyi bdag nyid kyis gnas pa ni 'brel pa ste /
T02TD2625E:234a-6: 'brel pas don blos rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-7: ngan song la sogs pa dang bral ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:234a-8: mi gnas pa'i myang ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i bar du dgos pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-9: de lta na 'dir ni 'jug par rung ba nyid du ston to //
T02TD2625E:234a-10: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan yon tan dang ldan pas brjod par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:234a-11: dgos pa'i dgos pa dngos su brjod cing 'brel pa la sogs pa yang don gyis drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-12: da ni bsdus pa'i don ba stan par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:234a-13: de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la glegs bam mi mthun pa mthong zhing /
T02TD2625E:234a-14: gtsug lag dang rig pa'i ba stan bcos sngon byung ba gzhan la yang de ltar snang ba ni klog pa'i slob dpon la sogs pas rab tu nyams par zad do //
T02TD2625E:234a-15: de las 'dir ni glegs bam bar ma'i dbang du byas pa ste /
T02TD2625E:234a-16: de la bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-17: ji lta zhe na 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:234a-18: bzhugs te bya ba'i bar gyis ni gleng gzhi ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:234a-19: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:234a-20: gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni gleng bslang ba ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:234a-21: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan las lngas nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:234a-23: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni yongs su shes par bya ba rgyud kyi dngos po ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:234a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:234a-25: mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
T02TD2625E:234a-26: mngon par bstod pa ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-27: da ni bsdus pa'i don de dag zhi ba tu brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:234a-28: blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bla ma'i gdams ngag ston te /
T02TD2625E:234a-29: rgyud kyi rgyal po dang spyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:234a-30: de la gleng gzhi gang yin pa ni //
T02TD2625E:234b-0: sdud pa po dang @234b dus dang /
T02TD2625E:234b-6: zhus pas phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:234b-7: gleng bslang ba gang yin ba de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2625E:234b-8: lha rnams kyis yang dag par ba stan ba zhus pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:234b-9: rgyud kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de yang 'di rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i bye brag gis gnyis su ba stan cing rtsa ba'i rgyud gang yin pa der ni /
T02TD2625E:234b-10: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po cho ga rab tu rgya cher ba stan pa'i phan yon dang //
T02TD2625E:234b-11: rtog pa yang dag par gzung bar ba stan pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:234b-12: rtog pa phyi ma gang yin pa der yang sngar ji ltar ba stan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtsug tor rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2625E:234b-13: yang bcom ldan 'das tshe tshad med pa'i dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:234b-14: gang yang lha'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ba stan pa'i mthar thug pa'o ;
T02TD2625E:234b-15: / rtog pa phyi ma las byung ba'i rang bzhin phyi ma'i phyi ma der ni /
T02TD2625E:234b-16: ma lus par mdor bsdus pa'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po gnyis dang /
T02TD2625E:234b-18: phyi ma'i dum bu dag tu ma ba stan pa'i brjod par bya ba /
T02TD2625E:234b-22: zhi ba la sogs pa'i rol mo'i cha byad brdung ba rnams dang /
T02TD2625E:234b-23: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slob ma gang dag dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'am /
T02TD2625E:234b-24: yang gang dag rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyan pa don du gnyer ba de dag la legs par bslab ba dang sangs rji ltar ba stan pa'i dbang gis rtog pa khyad par can skyes pa'i dbang las byas pa shes pa'i ngo bor ba stan pas /
T02TD2625E:234b-25: lan du mchod pa'i bdag nyid ni //
T02TD2625E:234b-26: de nas brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pas bstod pa mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba bstan te /
T02TD2625E:234b-27: de ltar na ram par dbye ba'i rim pa /
T02TD2625E:234b-33: mngon par bstod pa ni de'i lus zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:234b-34: de la ston pa po la mngon par bstod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:234b-38: sems kyi khyad par gang gis bstod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:234b-39: yon tan ji lta bus bstod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:235a-1: pa'i yon tan ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:235a-2: de la yon tan ji lta bus bstod pa ni /
T02TD2625E:235a-4: mi slob pa dang slob ba'am /
T02TD2625E:235a-6: da bag dang gzhan gyi don gyi dbang gis bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2625E:235a-7: rgyas par ni ci rigs par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:235a-8: sig mangs pas 'jigs pa'i phyir 'dir ma brjod do //
T02TD2625E:235a-9: de las kha cig na re rdo rje khor bo la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dus /
T02TD2625E:235a-10: ci'i phyir drag shul spyad pa ma gsungs she na /
T02TD2625E:235a-11: thugs rje'i dbang gis so zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:235a-12: de ltar na sdar ba stan pa dza ltar drang /
T02TD2625E:235a-13: kha cig na re sdud pa pos thugs brtse bsam bsdus so zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:235a-14: de yang nyes pa snga ma bzhin na no //
T02TD2625E:235a-15: bdag gis ni de'i lan sngar ba stab zin to //
T02TD2625E:235a-16: de ltar bsdus pa'i don ba stan nas /
T02TD2625E:235a-19: brgal ba'i lan dag ni gang dang gang du bab pa de nyid rjod bar byed do //
T02TD2625E:235a-20: chos yang dag par bsdu ba la 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges pa skyes pa spyin dgos pa 'am /
T02TD2625E:235a-21: rtag tu rgyud la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:235a-22: ston pa la sogs pa yid ches pas byed pa spyin dgos pas na /
T02TD2625E:235a-24: de yang 'dir sdud pa pos bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin dam bcas pas tshad mar gyur ba dang /
T02TD2625E:235a-25: ston pa'i mngon sum gyi slob mar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2625E:235a-27: thos pa che bar ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:235a-28: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2625E:235a-29: dus phun sum tshogs pa yang /
T02TD2625E:235a-30: dus gcig na zhes bya bas ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:235a-31: ji lta zhe na dper na dpyid kyi dus rnams kyi mchog tu gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2625E:235a-32: shing la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi myu gu la sogs pa rnams skyed par phyogs shing gso ba'i dus can yid dga' bar byed pa'i dbang gis yang pa ltar /
T02TD2625E:235a-33: bde ba'i myu gu skyed par byed ba'i rgyud dpag bsam gyi shing chen po myu gu lta bu'i 'byung ba'i dus de yang dus gzhan pas mchog nyid / de de'i phyir 'gran zla med pa'i don gyis na /
T02TD2625E:235a-34: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:235a-35: dus gcig bu nas zhes zla med pa'i tshig tu spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:235b-0: snga blo la @235b sogs pa'i nges pa ci'i phyir mi smos /
T02TD2625E:235b-1: gzhan du na gnas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum mam lha yul na zhes pa tsam smos par rigs so zhes na /
T02TD2625E:235b-3: mchog tu ba stan la mi rigs phyir //
T02TD2625E:235b-4: dus ni gnas ltar nges min nam //
T02TD2625E:235b-5: gnas kyang dus dang 'dra bar mthong //
T02TD2625E:235b-6: zhes gzhan dag tu ba stan ba kho nar zad do / de bzhin du dus gcig na zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
T02TD2625E:235b-7: shin tu dkon pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis /
T02TD2625E:235b-8: chos dkon mchog 'di ni ba stan pa gzhan nas mchog tu yang dkon te /
T02TD2625E:235b-9: bcom ldan 'das mi yul du lo brgyang cu rtsa gcig 'tsho ba las ;
T02TD2625E:235b-10: 'di ni dus gcig gi tshe kho na zhig gsungs kyi /
T02TD2625E:235b-11: yang dang yang du ni ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:235b-13: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02TD2625E:235b-14: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02TD2625E:235b-15: brgya lam na ni lan 'ga' zhig /
T02TD2625E:235b-17: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02TD2625E:235b-18: de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon //
T02TD2625E:235b-20: de bas na dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:235b-21: rnyed par dka' ba ba stan la de bzhin du don chen po byed pa nyid dang /
T02TD2625E:235b-22: snang bar byed pa nyid dang /
T02TD2625E:235b-24: gnod pa 'joms pa nyid dag kyang 'dis mtshon par bya ba nyid do //
T02TD2625E:235b-25: de bas na 'di skad bsag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na zhes bya bas ni rab tu yang 'jug par bya ba nyid du ston te 'og ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:235b-26: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2625E:235b-27: bdud bcom shes ldan ye shes ldan //
T02TD2625E:235b-28: 'jigs bral srid dang zhi ba bral //
T02TD2625E:235b-30: bcom ldan 'das zhes nges pa brjod //
T02TD2625E:235b-31: ces ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:235b-32: de bzhin du tshangs ba chen po zhes bya ba yang 'di drangs te /
T02TD2625E:235b-34: cher bsil bar 'gyur bas na tshangs pa chen po'o /'di nyid gang zhe na /
T02TD2625E:235b-35: rje btsun sh'akya thub pa nyid yin te /
T02TD2625E:235b-36: ji ltar rdo rje gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba rtsom pa dang /
T02TD2625E:235b-37: dpa' bo gdan la bzhengs nas ni //
T02TD2625E:235b-38: dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang /
T02TD2625E:235b-39: sh'akya'i bdag po dgyes mdzad pa //
T02TD2625E:235b-40: thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD2625E:236a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nyid ci'i phyir ston pa por mi brjod ce na /
T02TD2625E:236a-2: 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i mi slob ba dang /
T02TD2625E:236a-3: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams te /
T02TD2625E:236a-4: mtshan nyid 'di dag las gzhan pa'i lha rnams las /
T02TD2625E:236a-5: 'di rnams mchog tu 'gyur bas na 'dir drug pa'i mang po'i tshig bsdu ba'o //
T02TD2625E:236a-6: 'di la kha cig ni bsdu ba gzhan brda sprod pa ltar 'dod de /
T02TD2625E:236a-7: sgra rnams ni don gyi mthus nus pa gcig tu med do //
T02TD2625E:236a-8: de la dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis ni gang dag de rnams su gtogs pa'i lha rnams ni gang rnams she na /
T02TD2625E:236a-9: rab tu rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sgrub pa po dang /
T02TD2625E:236a-12: rtsa ba'i rgyud du gzhag pa'i bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor te dang po'o //
T02TD2625E:236a-13: gang dag mos ba dman ba'am /
T02TD2625E:236a-15: 'byor ba chung ba la sogs pa'i slob ma la sogs pa'i tshad du ni /
T02TD2625E:236a-16: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rdo rje gtsug tor zhes bya ba gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:236a-17: gang dag rnam bar smin pa las byung ba'i 'chi ba dang /
T02TD2625E:236a-18: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba bzlog pa dag gi ched du /
T02TD2625E:236a-19: snga ma gnyis las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor tshe dpag tu med pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:236a-20: de nas yang gdul bya dman pa la mos pa rin po cher bor nas mchid bu'i nor bu len pa lta bu de dag gi ched du /
T02TD2625E:236a-21: 'jig rten pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor drug gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:236a-22: de yang dang po ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2625E:236a-23: de nas phyogs skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2625E:236a-24: de nas gza' chen po dag gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2625E:236a-25: de nas klu chen po dag gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2625E:236a-26: de nas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2625E:236a-27: de nas lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2625E:236a-28: de nas ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum ste /
T02TD2625E:236a-29: kha cig las dang rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i 'chi ba'am /
T02TD2625E:236a-30: dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar bar 'dod pa bde bzhin gshegs pa tshe mtha' yas la dad pa de dag gi phyir ni /
T02TD2625E:236b-0: tshe dpag tu med pa 'byung ba gnyis pa de bzhin @236b gshegs pas bdag po mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:236b-1: de dag ni rgyud phyi mar gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu'o //
T02TD2625E:236b-2: de nas ni rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i rtog par ma gsungs pa'i cho ga lhag ma rnams ba stan pa /
T02TD2625E:236b-3: rgyud phyi ma'i phyi mar rigs ma lus pa bsdus pa'i bdag nyid kun tu bzang po la sogs pa gtso bor byas pa bzhi pa'i mchog bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2625E:236b-4: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa khor bo'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma me rdo rje zhes bya ba gnyis gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:236b-5: de la kha cig na re dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi go rims nges par brjod dgos la /
T02TD2625E:236b-6: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi sngon du 'jig rten ba'i dkyil 'khor drug ba stan pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang brjod dgos so zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:236b-7: dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'dir rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor yin bas thog mar brjod par rigs la /
T02TD2625E:236b-8: nus pa dman pa dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor chen po nyid bsdus te ba stan pa ni rdo rje gtsug tor yin no //
T02TD2625E:236b-10: de ltar gzhag pa la gnod pa med pa nyid go rims nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni mtshan nyid yin no //
T02TD2625E:236b-11: 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon du brjod ba ci'i phyir zhes zer ba yang de dag sngags dbul ba'i bsam pa de ltar skyes pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan te /
T02TD2625E:236b-12: gzhan ci zhig dgos 'di dag 'jig rten las 'das par gzhag pa yang gnod pa ci zhig yod /
T02TD2625E:236b-13: gzhan yang 'dri ba 'di la ni mtha' med par 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:236b-14: 'dir ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa yang ci'i phyir ma ba stan /
T02TD2625E:236b-15: lha 'di dag gi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams gzhan yang yod na 'di ltar ston pa ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glags su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:236b-16: de'i phyir de ni don med pa'i rtog pa tshegs dang bcas par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:236b-17: gal te nges par byed pa'i sgrub bar byed pa nus na su zhig 'gog pas smra la rag go //
T02TD2625E:236b-18: da ni lha rnams brjod de /
T02TD2625E:237a-0: de la rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge brgyang phyogs su bltas pa'i steng du padma'i rgyal po seng ge'i dbus kyi sa las 'thon pa'i 'dab ma sna tshogs seng ge rnams khebs pa'i 'dab ma'i bar nas rdo rje rtse @237a * //
T02TD2625E:237a-1: mo lnga pa brgyang 'dab ma ltar 'thon pa'i lte bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su rje btsun thams cad rig pa /
T02TD2625E:237a-2: zhal thams cad du tha le ba /
T02TD2625E:237a-3: sku mdog dkar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'khor lo rtsibs brgyang pa'i mtshan ma 'chang ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sku brgyan pa /
T02TD2625E:237a-5: 'od zer tshad med pa lnga lang long du 'khrugs pa'i dbus na skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa dar dkar po la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bsnams pa spyan yid tsam 'dzum pa 'di lta bur bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:237a-6: shar du glang po che gnyis kyi steng du padma rdo rje dang bral ba'i steng gi zla ba la /
T02TD2625E:237a-7: rje btsun ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po sku mdog dkar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:237a-8: lhor ni rje btsun rin chen sku mdog sngon po phyag g-yas g-yon mchog spyin dang ting nge 'dzin du mdzad pa la rin po che margat cha dgu pas phyag g-yon pa mtshan pa /
T02TD2625E:237a-9: rta gnyis kyi steng du padma rdo rje dang bral ba'i zla ba la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:237a-10: bub tu ni rje btsun sh'akya thub pa gser btso ma lta bur gsal ba /
T02TD2625E:237a-11: phyag g-yas mchog spyin nam ting nge 'dzin la /
T02TD2625E:237a-12: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil na lhung bzed 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:237a-13: rma bya gnyis kyi stang gi padma rdo rje dang bral ba la bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:237a-14: byang du rje btsun me tog kun du [*kun tu?] rgyas pa rin po che martat lta bu /
T02TD2625E:237a-15: phyag g-yas pa skyabs spyin pa g-yon ba ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'i dbus na rdo rje kun du [*kun tu?] rtse 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:237a-16: nam mkha' lding gnyis kyi steng gi padma rdo rje dang bral ba la bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:237a-17: sangs rgyas bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gi cha lugs dur smrig dmar po gser gyi ngang ris can tshul du shis par bsnams pa /
T02TD2625E:237a-18: rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:237a-19: kha cig na re lnga char dge slong gi cha lugs sam /
T02TD2625E:237a-20: yang na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bya'i /
T02TD2625E:237a-21: khyim na gnas pa'i 'khor dur btu byung ba'i cha lugs su byas bag nas pa ni rab tu mi bsangs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:237b-0: spyan dang bdag nyid m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar @237b mo dang sgrol ma /
T02TD2625E:237b-1: lha'i rgyal po'i btsun mo'am bud med rin chen ltar bcas pa lo bcu drug lon pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-6: g-yos pa rnams na mig gi 'bras bu dang /
T02TD2625E:237b-9: autpala rang rang gi mdog dang 'dra ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-10: g-yon pa rnams mchog spyin pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-11: gco bo la mngon du bltas pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-12: padma sna tshogs pa'i zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'khod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:237b-14: de nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug la /
T02TD2625E:237b-15: shar nas brtsams te rdo rje sems dpa' nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi bar du /
T02TD2625E:237b-16: shar phyogs pa bzhi ni dkar pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-17: lho phyogs pa bzhi ni sdo ba /
T02TD2625E:237b-18: nub phyogs pa bzhi ni dmar ba /
T02TD2625E:237b-19: byang phyogs ba bzhi ni ljang ba /
T02TD2625E:237b-21: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang //
T02TD2625E:237b-22: rin chen ni ma rgyal mtshan mdzub //
T02TD2625E:237b-24: las dang 'jigs byed go cha ba cangs //
T02TD2625E:237b-26: g-yon pa rnams ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'am /
T02TD2625E:237b-27: yang na lag pa gnyis kas rang rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin par brtson pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-28: sna tshogs padma'i zla ba la sogs par skyil mo krung gis 'khod pa /
T02TD2625E:237b-29: 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu thu bo brgyan ltar ;
T02TD2625E:237b-30: dar la ba bcing bcas ba rab tu dpa' zhing spro spro ltar gnas so //
T02TD2625E:237b-31: de nas rtsibs mchan gyi shar lho dang /
T02TD2625E:237b-34: byang shar du sna tshogs padma'i zla ba rnams la /
T02TD2625E:237b-38: ljang gu'i mdog can lag na rdo rje tse lnga ba dang /
T02TD2625E:237b-39: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2625E:237b-41: gar gyi lag pa can sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi sems dpa'i skyil mo krung la na chod la sogs pa spyan la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:237b-42: de nas gru chad bzhi la shar lho nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:237b-43: me tog la sogs pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2625E:237b-44: lag na me tog gi gzhong bu dang /
T02TD2625E:237b-48: stan dang mdog dang na tshod la sogs pa spyan la sogs pa lta bu bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:237b-49: de nas sgo bzhir sna tshogs padma'i zla ba bzhi la shar nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:237b-50: lcags kyu ma la sogs pa mdog spyan la sogs pa dang 'dra ba /
T02TD2625E:238a-5: bgegs chen po la rnam par 'tshe zhing khang pa brtsegs ma'i sgor srung ba la mngon par brtson pa /
T02TD2625E:238a-6: lag pa g-yas rnams lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-10: g-yon pa rnams bgegs ma rungs pa la bsdigs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238a-11: kha cig na re 'di rnams kyang zhi ba'i sku can no zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:238a-14: sgo ba rnams kyang khros pa la //
T02TD2625E:238a-15: khros pa'i dbang du gyur par bris //
T02TD2625E:238a-16: zhes gsungs pa ni kun du [*kun tu?] drang bar rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:238a-17: de nas shar phyogs kyi khyams la byang shar nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:238a-18: padma sna tshogs pa'i lte ba'i zla ba la byams pa dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-21: spos kyi glang po che dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-22: ye shes tog rnams dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238a-23: 'dir bskal pa bzang po pa rnams thams cad kyang padma dang zla ba la gnas par brtag go //
T02TD2625E:238a-24: de nas sgo khyud kyi rtsar padma'i zla ba la 'phags pa gshin rje gshed sngon po g-yon brkyang bas ma he la brdzis pa /
T02TD2625E:238a-25: g-yas na be con gdengs pa /
T02TD2625E:238a-26: g-yon sdigs mdzub can spyan gsum pa rab tu khros pa stag pags dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-29: h'um gi nga ros skrag par byed pa me'i 'od 'phro ba ste /
T02TD2625E:238a-30: khro bo lhag ma rnams kyang cha lugs de dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2625E:238a-31: de nas sgo khyud cig ngos kyi rtsa nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:238a-32: padma'i 'dab mer re ba drug la dang por rang sangs rgyas 'jigs med dang snang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238a-33: de nas 'phags pa nyan thos koondi n+ya dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-35: mood gal gyi bu dang 'od srungs rnams so //
T02TD2625E:238a-36: de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni byang hub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-38: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-40: khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang ;
T02TD2625E:238a-41: rang sangs rgyas dpa' bo 'dul ba dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-47: nub phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa dang /
T02TD2625E:238a-48: ngan song thams cad spong dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-0: @238b mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-2: khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-3: rang sangs rgyas she rab mgyogs chen dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-5: 'phags pa nyan thos chu klung 'od srungs dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-9: byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-12: sgrib ba thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-13: khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-14: rang rgyal smra ba chen po dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-16: 'phags pa nyan thos ga ya 'od srungs dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-17: ba lang bdag dang ma 'gags pa dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-19: de ltar lho phyogs pa ma lus pa sngon po'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-22: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni lhung bzed lag pa gnyis kyis lte bar 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-23: rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rin po che padma dang rdo rje sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-25: khor bo lhag ma gsum ni ral gri dang /
T02TD2625E:238b-28: g-yon rnams sdigs mdzub kyis bgegs la bsdigs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-29: 'di ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha rnams so //
T02TD2625E:238b-30: de nas phyi rol gyi rim pa dang po la /
T02TD2625E:238b-31: shar du brgya byin ser po rin po che'i go rgyan can /
T02TD2625E:238b-32: sa srung dkar po la zhon pa /
T02TD2625E:238b-33: g-yas pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:238b-34: g-yon pas mchog spyin ba de la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-35: lhor tshangs pa dkar po dang pa la zhon pa gdong bzhi pa g-yas na phreng ba dang bdug spos kyi yu ba nas 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:238b-36: g-yon padma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:238b-37: shi ri dang dbyangs can ma dang sh'anta la sogs pas bskor pa'o //
T02TD2625E:238b-38: nub tu khyab 'jug nag po rin po che'i cod pan can nam mkha' lding la zhon ba /
T02TD2625E:238b-39: nub tu lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang klu chen dkar po sprul mgo bdun bdun gyi gdengs ka byas pa /
T02TD2625E:238b-40: padma dkar po'am sprul gnyis 'khril ba la 'dug pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-0: chung ma sprul mgo gsum pas @239a * //
T02TD2625E:239a-2: 'khor los sgyur ba chas pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:239a-3: yang na mtha' yas ser po rin po che 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-5: stobs kyi rgyu ston po sprin 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-6: rigs ldan dkar bo rin po che'i sdong bu 'dzin ba /
T02TD2625E:239a-7: nor rgyas kyi bu ser bo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-8: dung skyong ljang gu dung 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-10: chu lha dkar po zhags pa 'dzin pa dag dang /
T02TD2625E:239a-12: nye dga' dkar po de dag dang 'dra ba las /
T02TD2625E:239a-16: byang du ni gnong spyin rnams so //
T02TD2625E:239a-17: de nas rang rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:239a-18: de nas rim pa gsum pa la /
T02TD2625E:239a-19: shar du bab sangs dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lag pa na ku mu da thogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:239a-20: lhor phur bu mdog dkar po zla ba la gnas pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-21: dar la ser po'i stod g-yo gas bgos pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-22: g-yon pa glegs bam thogs pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-24: bub tu zla ba dkar po dang pa la zhon pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-26: drung na bud med rnga yab thogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:239a-27: byang na gza' lag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-30: shar lhor mig dmar dkar po byis pa'i gzugs can g-yas g-yon mchog spyin can no //
T02TD2625E:239a-31: lho nub tu nyi ma snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:239a-32: nub byang du spen pa nag po gos dmar po bgos pa lag nar la gri thogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:239a-33: lho nub bam byang gi stod du /
T02TD2625E:239a-34: sgra gcan dud ka dmar nag lte ba man chad sprul /
T02TD2625E:239a-35: lte ba yan chad skyes pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-37: sma ra dang aag tshom 'bar ba skra gyen du brjes pa 'jig rten gsum za bar byed pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-38: mche ba bzhi pa brang gi g-yon phyogs su thal mo sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2625E:239a-39: de nas phyogs kyi gza' re re rtsa na rang gi 'khor rgyu skar bdun bdun gnas pa ni /
T02TD2625E:239a-40: shar phyogs na smin drug dmar po bum pa'i steng ngan 'dug pa /
T02TD2625E:239a-41: snar ma ljang gu khyu mchog dkar po la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239a-42: mgo ser po ri dvags sha ba la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239a-43: lag dmar po sprul 'khyil pa la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239a-44: nab so ser po padma la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-0: rgyal ljang gu @239b sum pa la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-1: skag ljang gu pho rog chen po la zhon ba rnams so //
T02TD2625E:239b-2: lho phyogs na mchu ser bo ma he la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-3: gre dkar po padma la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-4: dbo ljang ser rin po che'i khri la 'dug pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-5: me bzhi ser bo glang po che la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-6: nag pa ljang gu rma bya la zhon pa dang ;
T02TD2625E:239b-7: sa ri dmar po srad dul gnas ba dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-8: sa ga ljang gu ru sgyes dkar po la zhon pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:239b-9: nub phyogs na gnas pa rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:239b-10: lha mtshams ser po bya rog dkar po la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-11: snron dmar po stan nang tshangs can la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-12: snubs ljang gu ras sbal la 'khod ba dang ;
T02TD2625E:239b-13: chu stod ser po la phug la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-14: chu smad ljang gu mi la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-15: byi bzhin ser po stan nang tshangs can la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-16: gro bzhin ser bo ra bal gyi skon bu la 'khod pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:239b-17: byang phyogs na gnas pa rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:239b-18: mngon gru dmar po stan nang tshangs can la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-19: mon gre ljang gu khyu mchog dkar po la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-20: khrums stod ljang gu gser gyi khril 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-21: khrums smad ser po gser gyi khri la 'khod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-22: nam gru dmar po rta la zhon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-23: tha skar ljang gu mi la zhon ba dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-24: bra nye sngon po 'khor lo'i steng na 'khod pa rnams te /
T02TD2625E:239b-25: 'dir 'di dag 'od zer kha dog lnga pas bskor ba thal mo spyar ba'am /
T02TD2625E:239b-26: ji ltar dga' ba'i lag ca 'dzin pa rnam so //
T02TD2625E:239b-27: rim pa bzhi ba las shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir sa ngang chu dang me dang rlung gi lha bdag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-28: mtshams rnam pa bzhir khyim dang ri dang lo tog gi lha dag dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-30: kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-35: grong khyed kyi lha dpag tu med pa shar lho la sogs par kha dog dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-37: lag tsa sna tshogs bar gnas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:239b-38: 'dir dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa tsam zhig smos su zad de /
T02TD2625E:239b-39: rnal 'byor pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dus dang /
T02TD2625E:239b-40: chos ba stan pa'i tshe ni 'khor dpag tu med pa 'dus par shes par byas te /
T02TD2625E:239b-42: 'phags pa rdo rje gtsug tog las //
T02TD2625E:239b-43: gsang sngags la sogs ldan pa yi //
T02TD2625E:239b-44: rig sngags khor bo mang po kun //
T02TD2625E:240a-0: @240a * // rgyal ba'i sku la mngon phyogs par //
T02TD2625E:240a-1: bsam gtan ngoms phyir rtag tu gnas //
T02TD2625E:240a-3: dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshogs yongs su rdzogs pas padma dang zla ba'am /
T02TD2625E:240a-4: nyi ma la bzhugs par bya la /
T02TD2625E:240a-5: 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes dang tshogs phyogs gcig pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:240a-6: de dag ni padma 'dab ma ya re zhig la 'khod par bya zhing tshangs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i lha de dag ni /
T02TD2625E:240a-7: tshogs ma lus par bsags par 'dod cing /
T02TD2625E:240a-8: khams gsum la chags pa dang bral ba'i phyir padma dmar po la 'khod par bya la /
T02TD2625E:240a-9: 'jig rten pa phal pa rnams ni yon tan de dag dang yang mi ldan pas rang gi stan smos pa med na /
T02TD2625E:240a-10: sa nyid la 'khod par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:240a-11: ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:240a-12: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2625E:240a-13: de sras blo can rnams kyi gdan //
T02TD2625E:240a-14: padma yid las 'byung ba'i mchog / bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyis bsngags //
T02TD2625E:240a-15: rang sangs rgyas dang dgra bcom pa //
T02TD2625E:240a-16: phyogs gcig shes rab gang grags pa //
T02TD2625E:240a-17: de dag stan du shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:240a-19: /'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang //
T02TD2625E:240a-20: tshangs sogs pa yi 'jig rten grags //
T02TD2625E:240a-21: de dag stan ni padma dmar //
T02TD2625E:240a-22: rgyal po rnams kyis bsangs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240a-23: phal pa rnams ni ci rigs par //
T02TD2625E:240a-24: sa yi bye brag dag la bsam //
T02TD2625E:240a-26: de bzhin du gang du kha dog dang dbyibs dang /
T02TD2625E:240a-27: tshad nges par ma gsungs pa der /
T02TD2625E:240a-28: rang gi yid la ji ltar dga' bar bsgom par bya'i 'di lung gsal po med do zhes yid gnyis mi bya ste /
T02TD2625E:240a-29: de lhar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de nyid las /
T02TD2625E:240a-30: gzugs ni gnyis su shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:240a-31: bud med dag ni skyes pa nyid //
T02TD2625E:240a-32: yang na kun du [*kun tu?] thams cad kyi //
T02TD2625E:240a-33: kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te //
T02TD2625E:240a-34: bsam pas ye shes las byung bas //
T02TD2625E:240a-35: de bas de rnams bsam yas te //
T02TD2625E:240a-36: ye shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2625E:240a-37: sems can don phyir tha dad gyur //
T02TD2625E:240a-38: yid kyi rgyan ni ji tsam par //
T02TD2625E:240b-0: stan dang phyag rgya @240b dag dang ni //
T02TD2625E:240b-1: lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin //
T02TD2625E:240b-2: de tsam du ni shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:240b-4: rim pa bzhi po de nyid la sangs pa de'i snying rje rab tu bskyed pa dang bcom ldan 'das khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas ngan 'gro bkug par ston pa'i bdag nyid /
T02TD2625E:240b-5: shar du sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /
T02TD2625E:240b-7: nub tu yi dgas rnams dang byang du phug ron dkar po dang /
T02TD2625E:240b-10: phag rnams la phag gis gsum po za ba ltar gnas par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-11: de ltar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ba stan nas ;
T02TD2625E:240b-12: da ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi lha rnams ston te /
T02TD2625E:240b-13: dbus su ni rje btsun dam pa sh'akya thub pa gser btso ma lta bu phyag g-yas g-yon dag mchog spyin dang /
T02TD2625E:240b-15: dge slong gi cha lugs can seng ge khri'i padma dang zla bas brgyan pa la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-16: shar gyi rtsibs la phyag na rdo rje mdog ljang gu dpa' bo g-yas dang g-yon na rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-17: lhor rgyal ba'i gtsug tor mdog sdo bsangs la /
T02TD2625E:240b-18: phyag g-yas g-yon rdo rje dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-19: nub tu 'khor los sgyur ba mdog ser bo phyag gnyis na gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyang ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-20: byang du rnam par rgyal ba mdog ser po phyag g-yas g-yon gnyis na dam pa spyin pa dang /
T02TD2625E:240b-21: padma gtsug tor gyis mtshan pa can no //
T02TD2625E:240b-22: shar lhor gzi brjid kyi phung po mdog dmar skya la phyag gnyis nyi ma rin po ches mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-23: lho nub tu rnam par 'joms pa mdog sdo bsangs phyag g-yas g-yon be con dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-24: bub byang du rnam par 'thor ba mdog dmar ba phyag g-yas g-yon na ral gri dang sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD2625E:240b-25: byang shar du gdugs dkar po can mdog dkar po /
T02TD2625E:240b-26: phyag gnyis gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2625E:240b-27: 'di dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i cha lugs bshad pa dang 'dra ba las rgyal ba'i rigs 'ba' zhig yin pas na gtsug tor gyi ming gis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:240b-28: lha lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:241a-0: phyag na rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor @241a * //
T02TD2625E:241a-1: du ni dbus su phyag na rdo rje sku mdog dkar po /
T02TD2625E:241a-2: phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar 'dzin pa dpa' bo'i cha byang can rgyan ma lus pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241a-3: phyogs bzhir rgyal po bzhi 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs can te /
T02TD2625E:241a-4: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du ji skad du bshad pa las /
T02TD2625E:241a-5: 'dir gdan padma dang zla ba 'ba' zhig la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:241a-6: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni /
T02TD2625E:241a-7: ji ltar rdo rje gtsug tor du ba stan pa'i phyag na rdo rje nyid las cung zad khro ba'i ngang tshul can nam /
T02TD2625E:241a-8: yang na h'um gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang dril bu ba cang bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:241a-9: phyogs lhag ma ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:241a-10: phyogs skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor du yang de bzhin te lhag ma ni bshad zin la /
T02TD2625E:241a-11: cung zad du ni nyi ma dang phyag gnyis mdun du shar stod dang shar smad du'o //
T02TD2625E:241a-12: gza'i dkyil 'khor du yang de bzhin te /
T02TD2625E:241a-13: lhag ma rnams bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:241a-14: klu chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du yang de bzhin te /
T02TD2625E:241a-15: lhag ma rnams ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:241a-16: 'jigs byed chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du ni /
T02TD2625E:241a-17: dbus su khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba de nyid 'phags pa de kho na 'dus pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:241a-18: autpala cher sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog / rdo rje h'um mdzad bsdus pa ni //
T02TD2625E:241a-19: khro dang bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02TD2625E:241a-20: g-yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa ste //
T02TD2625E:241a-22: g-yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni //
T02TD2625E:241a-23: dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya //
T02TD2625E:241a-24: g-yas pa'i zhabs kyis dka' zlog gi //
T02TD2625E:241a-25: nu ma'i steng du gnon pa pri //
T02TD2625E:241a-26: zhes gsungs pa gnas pa ste /
T02TD2625E:241a-27: 'di ni rab tu drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:241a-28: de'i mdun du ni 'jigs byed chen po ste khyu mchog la zhon pa nag po g-yas dang g-yon rtse gsum dang cang te'u thogs pa rab tu 'jigs su rung ba ;
T02TD2625E:241a-29: 'jigs byed ma de dang 'dra ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241a-30: lhor khyab 'jug mthing ga / g-yas dang g-yon na 'khor lo dbyug pa can nam mkha' lding la zhon pa /
T02TD2625E:241a-31: nub tu tshangs pa ngang pa la zhon pa gdong bzhi pa g-yas dang g-yon na spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng can no //
T02TD2625E:241b-0: shar du dbang po dkar @241b po sa srung gi bu la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-1: rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub g-yas dang g-yon pas 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-2: byang shar du tshogs kyi bdag po dmar ba glang po'i gdong can dgra sta dang /
T02TD2625E:241b-3: la phug g-yas dang g-yon na 'dzin pa byi ba la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-4: byang du lus ngan sngon po rta la zhon pa ne'u le dang rin po che'i dbyug to 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-5: nub byang du bhring+gi ri ti lus sha med pa /
T02TD2625E:241b-6: keng rus su gnas pa g-yas dang g-yon na phreng ba dang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-7: lho nub tu gshin rje nag po be con dang /
T02TD2625E:241b-8: sdigs mdzub g-yas dang g-yon na 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-9: 'dir khyab 'jug la sogs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi phyogs 'dra ba'am /
T02TD2625E:241b-10: yang ci dga' ba'i chung ma rnams kyi mgul nas 'khyud pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-11: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:241b-12: lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du dbus su snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:241b-13: shar du lha chen po dkar po mig gsum pa /
T02TD2625E:241b-14: g-yas dag na tri sh'u la dang khri rkang 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:241b-15: g-yon dag na thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:241b-16: zla ba phyed pa dang thod pas mgo la mtshan ba khyu mchog la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-17: lhor dbang po ljang sngon sa srung gi bu la zhon pa g-yas dang g-yon dag rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog spyin no //
T02TD2625E:241b-18: nub tu tshangs pa dmar po g-yas dag na padma dang tri sh'u la 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-19: g-yon dag na phreng ba dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa dang pa la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-20: byang du khyab 'jug sngon po g-yas dag na 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:241b-21: g-yon dag na rdo rje dang dbyug pa can nam mkha' lding la zhon pa /
T02TD2625E:241b-22: byang shar du tshogs kyi bdag po dmar skya g-yas dag na dgra sta dang la phug / g-yon dag na la du can byi ba la zhon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-23: shar lhor 'dod pa'i lha dmar po mda' dang gzhu thogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-24: nub byang du bhring+gi ri ti dkar po g-yas na tri sh'u la /
T02TD2625E:241b-25: g-yon na nor bu can no //
T02TD2625E:241b-26: lho nub tu smin drug gi bu mgo gsum pa lag gnyis mdung thogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-27: phyi rol du shar du nag po chen po mig bgrang pa thor tshugs can zla ba tshes pa dang thod pa skam pos mgo la mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:241b-28: lag pa g-yas dang g-yon dang po gnyis na nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:242a-0: 'og ma gnyis rtse gsum pas mtshan @242a * //
T02TD2625E:242a-2: seng ge'i khri la sku rten bcas te 'khod pa /
T02TD2625E:242a-3: stag lpags kyis smad dkris pa mtshan bgreng ba'am /
T02TD2625E:242a-4: yang na lag pa drug pa las g-yas g-yon tha ma seng ge dang khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-5: lhor ni stobs bzangs ljang ser sdang rmig tu lta ba dang lag pa gnyis tri sh'u la'am bshol thogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-6: nub tu dge ba'i dbang phyug ste kha dog dmar ba gsus pa cha ba nag po chen po'i mtshan ma can no //
T02TD2625E:242a-7: byang du ni stobs chen te stobs bzangs lta bu las 'khor lo thogs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-8: 'di ltar yang rang 'dra ba'i chung mas mgul nas 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-9: kha cig na re 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi lhag ma lus pa rang rang dang 'dra ba'i chung mas 'khyud pa'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:242a-10: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe mtha' yas sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yon dang g-yas gnyis ting nge 'dzin dang skyabs spyin mdzad pa /
T02TD2625E:242a-12: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chas blta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-13: shar du phyag na rdo rje sngon bzhin te ljang gu'am dkar po /
T02TD2625E:242a-14: byang du khro bo rnam pa rgyal ba mdog sdo smug g-yon pa sdigs mdzub can ;
T02TD2625E:242a-15: g-yas rdo rje kun du [*kun tu?] rtse gdengs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-16: g-yas su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po phyag g-yas g-yon dag na ral gri dang rin po che 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:242a-17: nub tu 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po phyag g-yon pas padma'i yu ba nas 'dzin cing g-yas pas thugs kar 'byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-18: lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242a-19: de nas rgyud phyi ma'i phyi mar kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni /
T02TD2625E:242a-20: dbus su phyag na rdo rje sngon bshad pa lta bu'am /
T02TD2625E:242a-21: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba sngon bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:242a-22: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar 'dzin pa mdog dkar ba bsam /
T02TD2625E:242a-23: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag na rdo rje rin po ches mtshan ba'am /
T02TD2625E:242a-24: bde ba chen po dmar ba phyag dang po na rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:242a-25: phyag 'og ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa dag gang yang rung pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242b-0: mdun du phyag na @242b rdo rje ste ljang gu la sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-1: g-yas dang nub dang byang du rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2625E:242b-2: rdo rje chos dang rdo rje las rnams sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-3: rim pa gnyis pa las sangs rgyas rnams par gzigs dang /
T02TD2625E:242b-10: sh'akya'i tog dag shar nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:242b-11: dge slong gi cha byad can spyod lam mdzes pa gser btso ma'i mdog can mnyam pa'i skyil krung la ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can no //
T02TD2625E:242b-12: rim pa gsum pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-13: rim pa bzhi pa la byams pa la sogs pa sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-14: rim pa lnga pa la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-15: rim pa drug pa la lha chen po bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:242b-16: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bcu gcig ste sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-17: rim pa bdun pa la gza' dang rgyu skar dang ;
T02TD2625E:242b-18: sa'i lha nas phag gi bar du ste sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:242b-19: rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du ni /
T02TD2625E:242b-20: dbus su khro bo mo'i nyi ma 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor bdag po lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:242b-21: 'jig rten gsum snang ni sngon po g-yas dang g-yon rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang nyi ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:242b-22: 'jig rten gsum 'dul ni ser po g-yas dang g-yon na ral gri dang sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD2625E:242b-23: 'jig rten gsum 'joms ni dmar po g-yas dang g-yon na dgra sta dang sdigs mdzub po //
T02TD2625E:242b-24: 'jig rten gsum 'ching ni lcags kyu dang lcags sgrog go //
T02TD2625E:242b-25: rdo rje bdud rtsi ni sngo ba phyag gnyis dpung par bsnol ba'o //
T02TD2625E:242b-26: dbyug pa sngon po ni sngo skya g-yas dang g-yon na be con dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa can no //
T02TD2625E:242b-27: mi g-yo ba ni smug nag g-yas g-yon rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD2625E:242b-28: rta mgrin dmar po g-yas g-yon be con dang sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD2625E:242b-29: dus kyi lcags kyu ni dkar ba g-yas g-yon lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub ste /
T02TD2625E:242b-30: 'og ma dag gis kyang g-yon ba rnams sdigs mdzub bo //
T02TD2625E:242b-31: dus kyi zhags pa sngon po g-yas na zhags pa can no //
T02TD2625E:242b-32: dus kyi 'ching ba dmar ba lcags sgrog can no //
T02TD2625E:242b-33: dus kyi chags pa ljang gu g-yas dril bu'o //
T02TD2625E:243a-1: nag po g-yas g-yon be con dang sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD2625E:243a-2: dus kyi dbyig pa ni smug nag g-yas g-yon be con dang sdigs mdzub bo //
T02TD2625E:243a-3: dus kyi gnod spyin mo ni smug nag g-yas g-yon mche ba dang skyabs spyin can no //
T02TD2625E:243a-4: dus kyi mtshan mo ni nag mo g-yon dgra sta dang sdigs mdzub can no //
T02TD2625E:243a-5: 'di rnams kyis ji lta ba 'dod pa'i ma rungs pa rnams g-yon brkyang bas brdzis pa la /
T02TD2625E:243a-6: g-yon pas sna tshogs padma'i nyi ma mnan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:243a-7: shar gyi rtsibs nas gzung ste'o //
T02TD2625E:243a-8: dus kyi srin mo la sogs pa ni lha'i snam bu'i gra bzhir shar lho nas brtsams te'o //
T02TD2625E:243a-9: yang na phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan zhing bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:243a-10: rgyu ma thogs shing dbu mtha' yas //
T02TD2625E:243a-12: dbyibs nges pa ci zhig bya ste /
T02TD2625E:243a-13: blo la ji ltar nus pa'i dbu dang phyag dang cha lugs mi bzad par bsgom zhing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:243a-14: kha cig dgod pa gzhan du byed pa ni mi rigs te /
T02TD2625E:243a-16: rtsibs bcu gnyis zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:243a-17: de bzhin du dbyibs nges pa yang bsal zin to //
T02TD2625E:243a-18: sgo skyong rnams ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:243a-19: de ltar lha'i tshogs 'di snyed kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:243a-20: lha'i mchog thams cad kyi dga' ba'i tshal yid du 'ong bzhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:243a-21: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang /
T02TD2625E:243a-23: skyes pa dang bud med dang /
T02TD2625E:243a-24: 'gro ba rigs sna tshogs su snang bas ji ltar rigs bar 'gro ba rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2625E:243a-25: ji skad n'a zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las kyang /
T02TD2625E:243a-28: res 'ga' zhi ba res 'ga' drag / res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de //
T02TD2625E:243a-29: de la sogs te mtha' yas pa //
T02TD2625E:243a-30: phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas //
T02TD2625E:243a-31: ci dga' dngos grub 'dod pa la //
T02TD2625E:243a-32: bdag gi ngo bor ston par byed //
T02TD2625E:243a-34: de'i phyir yang dag par na bcom ldan 'das nyid 'khor phun sum tshogs par yang snang ste /
T02TD2625E:243a-35: 'chad pa po da ste de ni chos so //
T02TD2625E:243b-0: rang yon tan ldan pas nyan pa'ang nga zhes @243b gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:243b-1: de ltar lha'i mchog thams cad ces bya ba'i bshad pa mchog ma brjod nas /
T02TD2625E:243b-2: da ni yang tha mal pa nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:243b-3: lha rnams nyid mchog yin la de rnams thams cad dga' ba'i tshal lam /
T02TD2625E:243b-4: yang na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na mchog ni dga' ba'i tshal na gnas pa rnams te /
T02TD2625E:243b-5: de rtag tu yid dga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:243b-6: ci de rnams la yang tha dad pa yod dam zhe na /
T02TD2625E:243b-7: los kyang ste sum cu rtsa gsum zhes bya ba nyid kyang chos bzang na gnas pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum nyid /
T02TD2625E:243b-8: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las gsungs pa ni ba stan bcos las gags pa yin /
T02TD2625E:243b-9: drag po bcu gcig la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ni /
T02TD2625E:243b-11: dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:243b-12: grong khyer chen po blta na sdug ces bya ba'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu 'das pa na /
T02TD2625E:243b-13: skyed mos tshal dga' ba zhes bya ba chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
T02TD2625E:243b-14: rgyar dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu /
T02TD2625E:243b-15: mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:243b-16: gser gyi ra pas bskor ba bla gab can /
T02TD2625E:243b-18: bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:243b-20: me tog phun sum tshogs pa /
T02TD2625E:243b-21: gser gyi bye ma bdal ba yod de /
T02TD2625E:243b-22: de bas na yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:243b-23: lha dang lha'i bu mo sna tshogs pa rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa yin no //
T02TD2625E:243b-24: de ltar na dga' ba'i tshal ni ha cang ches la /
T02TD2625E:243b-25: 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das rab tu yang rgya che ba ji ltar 'dzin nus she na /
T02TD2625E:243b-26: de ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bsnyung gi rtse tsam gyi sa phyogs kyang rab tu yangs la yid du 'ong bar 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2625E:243b-27: rgyal ba zhi bar gshegs nas ni dman zhing kho re chung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:243b-28: ji skad du 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las /
T02TD2625E:243b-29: gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:243b-30: de tshe de yi zhing rnams 'grib bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:243b-31: zhing gi rgya mtsho de yang nyon mongs ldan //
T02TD2625E:243b-32: sems can rnams kyang kun nas nyon mongs 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:243b-35: skra tsam khyon la sangs rgyas mang po ni //
T02TD2625E:244a-2: rgyal ba de rnams zhing yang de snyed de //
T02TD2625E:244a-3: de yang skal ba mi mnyam mtshan nyid bcas //
T02TD2625E:244a-4: skra tsam khyon 'dir 'gro ba lngar gtogs pa //
T02TD2625E:244a-5: dmyal ba rnams dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang //
T02TD2625E:244a-6: gshin rje'i 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyang //
T02TD2625E:244a-7: dogs pa dag dang nye bar gtser ba 'ang med //
T02TD2625E:244a-8: de ltar rgyal ba'i chos de bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2625E:244a-10: de bas na 'phags pa sdom pa gsum ba stan pa las /
T02TD2625E:244a-11: ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po de ni mtho ba zlum pa gnas 'phang dang rgyar yangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ba stan pa yang sdud pa pos legs par smras pa ste /
T02TD2625E:244a-12: ri de yang sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho ba de na de ltar bden la /
T02TD2625E:244a-13: deng sang na ni ri rab tu chung bar snang bas so //
T02TD2625E:244a-14: yang chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar ma shes shing /
T02TD2625E:244a-15: bsod nams ma byas pa la dman zhing tha gru chung la /
T02TD2625E:244a-16: de dag bsod nams byas pa dang ;
T02TD2625E:244a-17: chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes pa dag la /
T02TD2625E:244a-18: rab tu yangs shing bzang la 'byor bar snang ba ni /
T02TD2625E:244a-19: ji ltar 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas ba stan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:244a-20: tshangs pa ral pa can gyis /
T02TD2625E:244a-21: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la smras pa /
T02TD2625E:244a-22: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su ma dag go zhes ma zer cig / btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD2625E:244a-23: dper na btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas bkod pa bzhin du /
T02TD2625E:244a-24: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa yang nged kyis de 'dra bar mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:244a-25: de ltar na dga' ba'i tshal de'i me rtog la sogs pa ma lus pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs yin nam zhe na /
T02TD2625E:244a-26: lha de dag gi rang gi las las byung ba yang yod de /
T02TD2625E:244a-27: ji skad du 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:244a-28: rnam rtog dge las byung ba yi //
T02TD2625E:244a-29: las dge'i 'bras bu lha rnams te //
T02TD2625E:244a-30: rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:244a-31: mdzes pa'i lha rnams mngon par 'grub //
T02TD2625E:244a-32: gzhal med khang pa nyams dga' ba //
T02TD2625E:244b-0: de dag gzhan sus byas pa @244b min ;
T02TD2625E:244b-1: / me tog mand'a ra ba yang //
T02TD2625E:244b-2: de dag gzhan sus bskyed pa min //
T02TD2625E:244b-3: sgyu ma'i las las kun 'byung ste //
T02TD2625E:244b-4: byung ba rnams kyang bsam du med //
T02TD2625E:244b-6: de la yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni mdor ba stan pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:244b-7: rnam par rtsen pa zhes bya ba'i bar du lhag ma rnams kyis ni rgyas par ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:244b-8: de la nor bu dang gser gyi zhing zhes bya ba la nor bu ni /
T02TD2625E:244b-9: padma r'a ga la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:244b-10: gser ni gser dang sa le sbram mo //
T02TD2625E:244b-11: shing ni aa mra la sogs pa'i ljon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:244b-12: de dag kyang rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i yal ga dang /
T02TD2625E:244b-13: lcug mar bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:244b-14: yal ga ni rang gi yal ga dang yal ga phre'u yin la /
T02TD2625E:244b-15: lcug ma ni sdong po gcig las grub cing gsar bur 'thon pa /
T02TD2625E:244b-16: yan lag med pa'i ldum bu rnams so //
T02TD2625E:244b-17: de yang gser gyi shing rnams kyi yan lag ni nor bu lcug ma'i dngul /
T02TD2625E:244b-18: nor bu'i shing rnams ni yal ga ni gser /
T02TD2625E:244b-19: lcug ma ni bee d'urya zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdo sde gang dag lha'i yul gyi bde ba ston pa de dag las rgyas par drang ngo //
T02TD2625E:244b-20: shing gel pa dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:244b-21: shing gang zhig rang bzhin gyis phra zhing drung rab tu stug pa /
T02TD2625E:244b-22: me tog dang 'bras bu rab tu rgyas pas rang gi lcug ma'i rtse mo g-yur za ba /
T02TD2625E:244b-23: ched du bris pa ltar gnas pa de dag ni /
T02TD2625E:244b-24: shing gel pa ste ji ltar rgun shing rab tu smin pa dag bzhin te /
T02TD2625E:244b-25: ji skad du slob dpon zhi ba'i lha'i zhal sna nas /
T02TD2625E:244b-26: shing gang 'bras bzang yal ga 'dud pa dang //
T02TD2625E:244b-28: sman dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:244b-29: lha yul gyi shing gel pa la sogs pa de dag gi rtsa ba dang /
T02TD2625E:244b-31: lo ma la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag ni sman yin te /
T02TD2625E:244b-32: lha rnams yid rab tu dul ba'i dbang las gnas der smin pa'i rtsa la sogs pa ni dug med pa 'jam pa reg na bde ba gnod pa med pa dag yin te /
T02TD2625E:244b-33: de yang srog gcod pa gnod sems dang bcas te spangs pa'i rgyu las grub pa'o //
T02TD2625E:244b-34: me tog ka ma la dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:244b-35: sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:244b-36: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyi me tog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ongs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:245a-2: dpag bsam gyi shing gis mdzes par byas shing zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:245a-3: rang gi rtog pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'dod pa ster ba'i shing dkar po dang /
T02TD2625E:245a-6: sngon po bzhi'i phreng bas nyams dga' shing mdzes par byas so //
T02TD2625E:245a-7: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:245a-8: zla ba kham pa lta bu dang /
T02TD2625E:245a-11: gzhan yang rgyan snang ba dang mi snang ba rab tu mang pos spras pa'o //
T02TD2625E:245a-12: bya mang po sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:245a-13: ngang pa dang bzhad la sogs pa rin po che'i 'dab ma dang /
T02TD2625E:245a-14: mchu sder can ri mor bris pa ltar mdzes pa /
T02TD2625E:245a-15: lha rnams yid du dga' ba der 'de bas pa'i bzhon par gyur pa /
T02TD2625E:245a-16: yid du 'thad cing rnar snyan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas lha rnams la gdams pa smra ba /
T02TD2625E:245a-17: lha'i longs spyod la mtshungs par spyod pa /
T02TD2625E:245a-18: tshul khrims dang bral bas dud 'gro'i 'gro bar 'gyur ba /
T02TD2625E:245a-19: bde ba'i dbang po las mtho ris par bgrang ba'i bya de rnams kyis yid du dga' bar byas rnga dang cang te'u dang /
T02TD2625E:245a-22: rnga mo che la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:245a-23: kerko ni 'jig rten na di mug kha zhes grags pa'i rnga'o //
T02TD2625E:245a-24: lhag ma ni go sla ste /
T02TD2625E:245a-25: de dag kyang kha cig ni yid las byung ba /
T02TD2625E:245a-26: kha cig ni dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba /
T02TD2625E:245a-27: kha cig ni ched du byas pa dag ste /
T02TD2625E:245a-28: yid las byung ba dag ni gzugs med pa sgra tsam grag pa /
T02TD2625E:245a-29: lha rnams bag med pa las bzlog pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mang po sgrogs pa /
T02TD2625E:245a-30: phal cher brgya byin gyi yid las byung ba yin te /
T02TD2625E:245a-31: rgya cher ni 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa lha yul gyi bde ba rgyas par ston pa'i mdo sde rnams las drang ngo //
T02TD2625E:245a-32: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang lha'i bu mo mang po sna tshogs rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:245a-34: rang gi srid thub pas na brgya byin te /
T02TD2625E:245a-35: lha'i sde dpon rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa lan bdun pa 'phags pa'i khongs su gtogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:245a-36: tshangs pa zhes bya ba rang gi sa las gzhan pa bas che ba'am /
T02TD2625E:245b-0: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi gdung ba zhi bas bsil @245b bar 'gyur bas changs pa ste de dang /
T02TD2625E:245b-1: sogs pa zhes smos pa ni lha'i sde dpon tsandan dang /
T02TD2625E:245b-2: lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang /
T02TD2625E:245b-3: smin drug gzhon nu la sogs pa gang dag dbang che bar grags pa rnams dang /
T02TD2625E:245b-4: gzhan yang lha dang lha'i bu mo sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:245b-5: 'di dag ni mdzes pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:245b-6: de yang 'dod pa'i khams pa yin pas na /
T02TD2625E:245b-7: pho dang mo'i dbang po dang ldan pa /
T02TD2625E:245b-10: dbyibs sna tshogs ba de rnams bgad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:245b-13: khrus byed pa la sogs pa byis pa'i spyod pa grangs med pas mngon par rtse zhing dal bar gyur gyi bar du yongs su mi gtong bas na /
T02TD2625E:245b-14: khyad par du rtse ba ni /
T02TD2625E:245b-15: rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD2625E:245b-16: lha rnams ni bag med pa'i dbang las rtsed mo la rab tu zhugs pas /
T02TD2625E:245b-17: sngon nye gnas su gyur pa'i lha'i bu zhig gis 'phags pa mood gal gyi bu mkhan por gyur pa sor mo bsgrengs pa'i gus pa la mchog tu smras so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:245b-18: 'o na ci'i phyir rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di dag dga' ba'i tshal der gsungs she na /
T02TD2625E:245b-19: nor bu dri ma med pa la phan gdags par bzhed pas de'i 'phel bar gyur pa'i gnas der bshad par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:245b-20: de yang zhu bar gyur pa'i rkyen du gzigs nas 'dzam bu'i gling nas der gshegs pa ltar ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:245b-21: rab tu thugs rje che ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:245b-22: kha cig na re rgyud 'di mchog yin pa'i phyir gnas mchog tu gsungs so zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:245b-23: de ltar na 'di gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs par ci'i phyir mi gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:245b-24: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris ni lha'i ris gong ma gong ma'i drung na phyag dar gyi phung po dang 'dra'o zhes 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa las gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:245b-25: de bas na de ni mi rigs so //
T02TD2625E:245b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:245b-27: de dag gis lha par brten cing longs spyad pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:245b-29: yon tan gang dag rgyan ltar dam pa ni //
T02TD2625E:245b-30: gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa dag / de dag de ni bkra shis ldan bshad de //
T02TD2625E:245b-31: 'bab stegs de yin dka' thub gnas de yin //
T02TD2625E:246a-4: mig gis rtag par khyod mthong zhing //
T02TD2625E:246a-5: gang zhig khyod kyi zhal lta ba //
T02TD2625E:246a-6: 'jig rten de nyid bsod nams ldan //
T02TD2625E:246a-7: zhes nges par gnas kyang byin gyis brlabs par zur gyis ba stan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:246a-8: 'dir gzugs bor na byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba yang /
T02TD2625E:246a-9: sa phyogs de rdo rje ltar sra zhing 'jig pa'i mes kyang mi gnon la /
T02TD2625E:246a-10: de na gnas pa rnams la bdud dang bdud kyi ris pa'i yi dag sa la sogs pas mi tshugs par byas pa /
T02TD2625E:246a-11: dus rab tu ring po'i bar du yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa ste /
T02TD2625E:246a-12: de yang 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las ji skad du gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:246a-13: de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni //
T02TD2625E:246a-14: bsgrub pa'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2625E:246a-15: gang gi yul du gnas na ni //
T02TD2625E:246a-16: dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2625E:246a-17: gang du bdud bzhi btul nas ni //
T02TD2625E:246a-18: bcom ldan mngon par sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2625E:246a-19: dngos grub mang po kun gyi mchog / rmad byung go 'phang thob gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:246a-22: dngos grub zhing ni dam pa ste //
T02TD2625E:246a-23: bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyis gsungs //
T02TD2625E:246a-24: der ni bdud rnams mang pos kyang //
T02TD2625E:246a-25: gnod par bya bar mi nus te //
T02TD2625E:246a-26: de bas der ni las rnams kun //
T02TD2625E:246a-27: sgrub pa pos ni bsgrim ste brtsams //
T02TD2625E:246a-28: gang du chos rnams ba stan pa dang //
T02TD2625E:246a-29: thub pa zhi bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD2625E:246a-30: dam pa smin par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:246a-31: skye ba gang du ba stan pa yi //
T02TD2625E:246a-32: gnas de rnams su dngos grub ni //
T02TD2625E:246a-33: rnam pa gsum dag kun du [*kun tu?] ba stan //
T02TD2625E:246a-34: nges shing myur la rgya che zhing //
T02TD2625E:246a-35: bgegs med par yang der 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:246a-36: bsod nams can gyi gnas rnams gang //
T02TD2625E:246a-37: sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i slob ma //
T02TD2625E:246a-38: bskal pa chen po bzhugs bzhugs pa //
T02TD2625E:246a-39: de dag tu yang 'grub par bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:246a-41: de'i phyogs gang du yang bzhugs pa de lhag par yon tan dang ldan par gnas pas /
T02TD2625E:246a-42: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:246a-43: gal te byin gyis rlob pa po nyid kyi don ma rtogs so zhe na /
T02TD2625E:246b-0: @246b de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni ji skad du /
T02TD2625E:246b-1: gang gis sa bcu bsgrubs nas ni //
T02TD2625E:246b-2: dbang bcu legs rtogs khong du chud //
T02TD2625E:246b-3: stong pa sgyu ma 'dra ba'i chos //
T02TD2625E:246b-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen cing 'dir //
T02TD2625E:246b-5: 'jig rten kun gyi tshul mkhyen pa //
T02TD2625E:246b-6: sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin //
T02TD2625E:246b-8: / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:246b-9: brgya byin dang zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:246b-10: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni /
T02TD2625E:246b-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor mchog ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:246b-12: tshig gi don ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2625E:246b-13: brgya byin dang tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:246b-14: snga ma bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:246b-15: lha dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:246b-16: rnam rtog dge las byung ba yi //
T02TD2625E:246b-17: las dge'i 'bras bu lha rnams te //
T02TD2625E:246b-18: rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:246b-19: mdzes pa'i lha rnams mngon par grub //
T02TD2625E:246b-20: gzhal med khang pa nyams dga' ba //
T02TD2625E:246b-21: de dag gzhan sus byas pa min //
T02TD2625E:246b-22: me tog mand'a ra ba yang //
T02TD2625E:246b-23: de dag gzhan sus bskyed pa min //
T02TD2625E:246b-24: sgyu ma'i las lam kun 'byung bas //
T02TD2625E:246b-25: 'byung ba rnams kyang bsam du med //
T02TD2625E:246b-26: bzang por snang ba'i bee d'urya //
T02TD2625E:246b-27: log par sgrub pa rnams kyang brdzun //
T02TD2625E:246b-28: yang dag min las kun bskyed pas //
T02TD2625E:246b-29: lha rnams brdzun par shes pas na //
T02TD2625E:246b-30: ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:246b-31: lha yi gzugs kyis ba stan pa yin //
T02TD2625E:246b-34: gsang sngags la sogs pa'i mthus nam mkha' la 'gro bar nus pa rigs sngags kyi thabs 'dzin par 'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa ni rig 'dzin te /
T02TD2625E:246b-35: ji skad du 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:246b-36: blo can grub nas nam mkha' la //
T02TD2625E:246b-37: ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya //
T02TD2625E:246b-38: grub pa rnams dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD2625E:246b-40: pha rol gnod pa byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:246b-41: sdang ba rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs //
T02TD2625E:246b-42: rtag tu bdag gi lha nyid ni //
T02TD2625E:246b-43: yid kyis yongs su bzlas par bya //
T02TD2625E:246b-44: bdag gi grub pa'i rdzas la yang //
T02TD2625E:246b-45: rtag tu dran zhing blta bar bya //
T02TD2625E:246b-46: rig sngags rgyal po bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:246b-47: sgrub pa rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:247a-0: @247a * // rigs kyi rig sngags bzlas na ni //
T02TD2625E:247a-1: grub pa 'jigs pa kun las thar //
T02TD2625E:247a-2: phan tshun dag tu mthong na ni //
T02TD2625E:247a-3: dam tshig rigs kyi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2625E:247a-4: grub pa'i rdzas kyang ba stan pa dang //
T02TD2625E:247a-5: mkhas pa legs par smras par bya //
T02TD2625E:247a-7: thog mar mthong nas mngon par brjod //
T02TD2625E:247a-8: gang nas 'ongs zhes zer na yang //
T02TD2625E:247a-9: dri ba'i lan ni gdab par bya //
T02TD2625E:247a-10: lha yi gnas ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2625E:247a-11: shing gcig lam ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02TD2625E:247a-12: dka' thub nags dang byin can nas //
T02TD2625E:247a-13: mchod spyin gnas dang bram ze'i gnas //
T02TD2625E:247a-14: mu stegs la sogs grub pa des //
T02TD2625E:247a-16: nga rgyal gyis ni 'das gyur na //
T02TD2625E:247a-18: bag med dam tshig nyams na ni //
T02TD2625E:247a-19: rig sngags rgyal po yid kyis bzlas //
T02TD2625E:247a-20: lhung ngam ltung bar gyur kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:247a-21: de nas de ma thag tu ldang //
T02TD2625E:247a-22: nam mkha' dag la gzugs med pa'i //
T02TD2625E:247a-23: 'phrul gyi mig can lam rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:247a-24: rab tu grub pa dag gis rig / rnal 'byor can rnams 'gro ba bzhin //
T02TD2625E:247a-26: sngon chad sprul pa'i lam nas 'gro //
T02TD2625E:247a-27: bsod nams dbang gis gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:247a-29: kun du [*kun tu?] ljon shing mang por ldan //
T02TD2625E:247a-30: bya rnams du ma phan tshun rgyu //
T02TD2625E:247a-31: lha yi bud med rgyu ba yi //
T02TD2625E:247a-32: rgyan gyi sgra ni rab tu grags //
T02TD2625E:247a-33: de yi glu gar sil snyan gyi //
T02TD2625E:247a-34: mngon par dga' ba'i yon tan gsal //
T02TD2625E:247a-35: me tog bzang po'i bsrung gis khyab //
T02TD2625E:247a-36: mar me'i 'od ni rab tu gsal //
T02TD2625E:247a-37: gang dang gang du kun brtags pa //
T02TD2625E:247a-38: der ni dpag bsam ljon shing che //
T02TD2625E:247a-40: rmad du byung ba'i mtshan nyid 'byung //
T02TD2625E:247a-41: rin chen rdo leb la sogs phyir //
T02TD2625E:247a-42: rin chen bzhi las 'bab pa'i chu //
T02TD2625E:247a-43: ne'u seng dag dang ldan pa'i sa //
T02TD2625E:247a-44: thams cad du yang mngon par 'byung //
T02TD2625E:247a-45: rgyan rnams dang ni gos rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:247a-46: rtsed mo'i yo byad rnams dang ni //
T02TD2625E:247a-47: bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu sogs ldan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:247a-48: dpal gyi shing yang de las skye //
T02TD2625E:247a-49: de ltar grub par 'dod pa'i rnams //
T02TD2625E:247b-0: grub par gyur nas de @247b nas ni //
T02TD2625E:247b-1: srung ba la ni 'bad par bya //
T02TD2625E:247b-2: skyed mos tshal ni gtsang ma'am //
T02TD2625E:247b-3: ri rnams kyi ni rtse mo'am //
T02TD2625E:247b-4: rgya mtsho yi ni gling dag gam //
T02TD2625E:247b-6: rang gi 'phrul gyis sprul pa dang //
T02TD2625E:247b-7: grub pa dka' phyir sprul pa byed //
T02TD2625E:247b-8: grub gzhan dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD2625E:247b-9: sngon du grub nas gnas su 'ang rung //
T02TD2625E:247b-11: 'dir rgya cher brjod pa ni 'og nas rig 'dzin gyi tshul brjod pa la dgos pa blo la bzhag nas brjod par zad do //
T02TD2625E:247b-13: rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bo ni //
T02TD2625E:247b-14: rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po yang //
T02TD2625E:247b-16: tsi tamka dang ki ri ti //
T02TD2625E:247b-17: ma mo'i lus su lo tsa na //
T02TD2625E:247b-18: tsi tra bha na su siddh'a rtha //
T02TD2625E:247b-19: rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po ste //
T02TD2625E:247b-20: bdun po de dag rigs kyi gtso //
T02TD2625E:247b-21: sngon po grub ste mthu chen rnams //
T02TD2625E:247b-22: dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:247b-23: lho yi phyogs su tha dad dgod //
T02TD2625E:247b-24: ces bya ba gsungs pa rnams yin la /
