T02TD2625E:247b-25: de dag nyid 'khor lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa'o /
T02TD2625E:247b-26: glegs bam la la las ni /
T02TD2625E:247b-27: brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:247b-28: lha'i rig 'dzin 'khor lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang zhes 'don te //
T02TD2625E:247b-29: der ni lha'i 'khor gco [*gtso?] po smos pas bsdus la /
T02TD2625E:247b-30: 'di lha yang yin la rig 'dzin yang yin zhes gzhi mthun pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
T02TD2625E:247b-31: gnod spyin dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:247b-32: 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba'i mdo las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:247b-33: sems ni rnam par gyur pa las //
T02TD2625E:247b-34: 'jigs pa'i gzugs ni mngon grub pa //
T02TD2625E:247b-35: lus kyi bong tshod che ba yang //
T02TD2625E:247b-36: sems gcig gis ni kun du [*kun tu?] bskyed //
T02TD2625E:247b-37: sems la 'jigs pa yod min te //
T02TD2625E:247b-38: tshogs pa dag las 'jigs pa skye //
T02TD2625E:247b-39: yod pa min pa'i las rnams las //
T02TD2625E:247b-40: mi sdug rnam pa bsam yas ltos //
T02TD2625E:247b-41: mi sdug rnam pa bsam yas pa //
T02TD2625E:247b-42: shin tu stongs par shes pas na //
T02TD2625E:247b-43: ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:247b-44: gnod spyin gzugs kyis ba stan pa yin //
T02TD2625E:247b-46: srin po dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:247b-47: bdag bsrung ba las sdug bsngal 'grub //
T02TD2625E:247b-48: bdag nyid nye bar mi dmigs pas //
T02TD2625E:248a-0: gzhan bsrung ba las kun brtson @248a * //
T02TD2625E:248a-2: / de tshe bde ba rgya chen 'grub //
T02TD2625E:248a-4: lha ma yin zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248a-5: aa yis rgyas btab lha min te //
T02TD2625E:248a-6: skye ba med las yang dag 'byung //
T02TD2625E:248a-8: lha ma yin gyi ting 'dzin ba stan //
T02TD2625E:248a-10: dri za dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248a-11: chos de shin tu 'gro med kyang //
T02TD2625E:248a-12: 'gro ba'i sgrar ni brjod pas ni //
T02TD2625E:248a-14: dri za'i ting 'dzin ba stan pa yin //
T02TD2625E:248a-16: mi'am ci dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248a-17: byas min byas pa'i las kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:248a-18: mi'am ci nyid kun du [*kun tu?] bskyed //
T02TD2625E:248a-19: 'di dag skye ba med shes pas //
T02TD2625E:248a-20: mi'am ci yi ting 'dzin ba stan //
T02TD2625E:248a-22: lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba las /
T02TD2625E:248a-23: ming gang gis ni chos 'di dag /'jig rten dag tu sna tshogs gzhag / chos de 'di la yod ma yin //
T02TD2625E:248a-24: med pas thams cad kun du [*kun tu?] brtags //
T02TD2625E:248a-25: kun du [*kun tu?] brtags par kun shes na //
T02TD2625E:248a-26: ngo bo nyid kyi kun rtog med //
T02TD2625E:248a-27: ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:248a-28: lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis ba stan //
T02TD2625E:248a-31: mi bzod pa bskyed pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:248a-32: yod min sprin gyi gzugs ston cing //
T02TD2625E:248a-33: char pa'i rgyun dag rab 'bebs pa //
T02TD2625E:248a-34: de dag nang na mi gnas kyang //
T02TD2625E:248a-36: klung dang dug can yongs su 'gengs //
T02TD2625E:248a-37: sngon gyi mtha'am phyi ma'i mtha' //
T02TD2625E:248a-38: chu ni 'byung bar yod ma yin //
T02TD2625E:248a-39: de dang mtshungs pa'i sems can kun //
T02TD2625E:248a-40: rtsom pa sna tshogs bslabs pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:248a-41: las rnams sna tshogs ston byed kyang //
T02TD2625E:248a-42: las de 'byung ba yod ma yin //
T02TD2625E:248a-43: mkhas pas byis pa rmongs byed pa'i //
T02TD2625E:248a-44: rgyu 'di ma byung shes pas na //
T02TD2625E:248a-45: bde ba ma yin bden snang bas //
T02TD2625E:248a-46: klu yi ting nge 'dzin du ba stan //
T02TD2625E:248a-48: de ltar 'phags pa kun nas sgo'i le'u'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te bshad pa 'di ni 'khor mchog ston pa yin par rang rang gi longs spyod dang /
T02TD2625E:248a-50: ming gis rnam par thar pa skyed nus shing rtogs pa ston pa'i bshad pa mchog tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2625E:248a-51: sogs pa 'khor du ma dang zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02TD2625E:248b-0: sha za dang 'dre la sogs pa rab tu mang por 'dus par @248b ston pa ste /
T02TD2625E:248b-1: dkyil 'khor chen po 'chad par 'gyur ba las /
T02TD2625E:248b-2: smos pa rnams 'dir yang 'dus par 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:248b-3: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:248b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya la 'di lta ste /
T02TD2625E:248b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:248b-6: de la byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang mthun pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyis kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-7: de rtogs par bya bar sems pa ni sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2625E:248b-8: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:248b-9: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2625E:248b-10: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD2625E:248b-11: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa de //
T02TD2625E:248b-12: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-14: de nyid 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po'i don la sems pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-15: blo gros mi g-yo ba dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-16: 'di ni blo gros chos kyi dbyings las mi g-yo bas blo gros mi g-yo ba'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-17: blo gros yangs pa dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-18: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i bden pa gnyis 'di'i blo gros skad cig ma gcig gi yul du byed byed pas na blo gros rgya che ba'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-19: kun du [*kun tu?] blo gros dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-20: 'gro ba ji snyed pa de snyed du 'di'i blo gros kun du [*kun tu?] gnas pas na kun du [*kun tu?] blo gros so //
T02TD2625E:248b-21: blo gros mtha' yas pa dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-22: 'di'i blo gros mtha' yas pas 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mnyam pas blo gros mtha' yas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-23: blo gros padma dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-24: 'di'i blo gros padma ltar gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos pas na blo gros padma'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-25: blo gros chen po dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-26: 'di'i blo gros 'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas nyid skyed pas na blo gros chen po'o //
T02TD2625E:248b-27: blo gros lha rdzas dang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:248b-28: 'di'i blo gros bum pa bzang po la sogs par ston par byed pas na blo gros lha rdzas so //
T02TD2625E:248b-29: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:248b-30: blo gros sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:249a-0: 'di'i blo gros ni shes bya sna tshogs pa ltar skye bas na @249a * //
T02TD2625E:249a-2: sogs pas smos pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs pa lhag ma rnams bsdu'o //
T02TD2625E:249a-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:249a-4: drod thob pa yang can sha stag yin te /
T02TD2625E:249a-5: nges 'byed yan lag nas gzung ste //
T02TD2625E:249a-6: mthong dang goms pa'i sa dag la //
T02TD2625E:249a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas //
T02TD2625E:249a-8: de 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2625E:249a-10: de nyid mi phyed pas na dge 'dun te /
T02TD2625E:249a-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
T02TD2625E:249a-13: bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang //
T02TD2625E:249a-14: bskal pa brgyar yang mi phyed de //
T02TD2625E:249a-15: de nas dge 'dun zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:249a-17: mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:249a-18: rab tu yang mang bas so so'i skye bos grangs kyi mi rtogs pas so //
T02TD2625E:249a-19: 'o na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ci'i phyir ma smos she na /
T02TD2625E:249a-20: 'dir theg pa chen po kho na ston pas de dag snod du ma gyur pas ma 'dus so zhes kha cig zer ro //
T02TD2625E:249a-21: de lta na theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig ston pa'i rgyud gzhan las kyang mi smos par rigs na smos pa yod do //
T02TD2625E:249a-22: kha cig na re 'di ni rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad ma thag tu gsungs pas /
T02TD2625E:249a-23: sprul pa'i skus don mdzad pa'i gang yin pas /
T02TD2625E:249a-24: 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun med do zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:249a-25: de ni rang gi rtog pa'i dri ma stug pos khyab par zad do //
T02TD2625E:249a-26: 'dir gtsor theg pa chen po ba stan pa'i skabs yin pas na /
T02TD2625E:249a-27: 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ma smos kyang nyes pa med pa la dgongs nas ma smos par zad kyi /
T02TD2625E:249a-28: dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyang nges par 'dus par blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:249a-29: de la 'dir ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i 'khor dang por smos she na /
T02TD2625E:249a-30: sdud pa po thugs rje che bas 'jig rten pa rnams spro ba skyed pa'i ched du'o zhes kha cig zer te /
T02TD2625E:249a-31: de lta na gzhung gzhan du /
T02TD2625E:249a-32: sdud pa po'i thugs rje chung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:249a-33: kha cig na re rgyud 'di ni gzhan gyi don lhur len pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:249a-34: 'jig rten pa'i 'khor dang smos pa yang thugs rjes gzhan gyi don gtsor byed pa'o zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:249a-35: 'jig rten las 'das pa dang smos na /
T02TD2625E:249b-0: gzhan @249b gyi don bya ba la gnod pa ci yod de 'di ni gyi nar zad do //
T02TD2625E:249b-1: kha cig na re 'jig rten pa'i lam la brten nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam skye'o zhes go rims nges par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:249b-2: de yang cung zad mi 'thad de /
T02TD2625E:249b-3: 'dir lam gyi go rims kyi skabs la ma bab pas so //
T02TD2625E:249b-4: 'di ni dbang po la sogs pa'i lha gnyug mar gnas pa de dag dang lam brjod par glo bur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams smos na /
T02TD2625E:249b-5: lha'i bu bden par ma mthong ba rnams yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:249b-6: gnyug mar gnas pa rnams dang por smos so zhes lo rgyus kyis bshad do //
T02TD2625E:249b-7: de ltar na 'gro ba tha dad pa de dag ci'i phyir dang por bya zhe na /
T02TD2625E:249b-8: de ni 'jig rten pa'i 'khor du 'dra bas /
T02TD2625E:249b-9: lha'i rnams kyi zhar la ba stan par rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:249b-10: bsti stang du byed ces bya ba ni lus kyi las kyis so //
T02TD2625E:249b-11: bla mar byed ces bya ba ni yid la gcags par lta ba'o //
T02TD2625E:249b-12: mchod cing zhes bya ba ni rnyed pa'i ngo bo me tog la sogs pas so //
T02TD2625E:249b-13: brjod ces bya ba ni ngag gi las kyi bstod pa don dang mthun par byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:249b-14: rab tu mchod cing zhes bya ba ni bka' bzhin du byed pa ste 'di ni mchod pa'i mchog yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:249b-15: spel te zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i dge ba rnams byang chub thob pa'i rgyur yongs su bsngos pa ste /
T02TD2625E:249b-16: 'di'i ni mi zad cing 'phel ba'i mchog yin te /
T02TD2625E:249b-17: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo las /
T02TD2625E:249b-18: rgya mtsho chen por 'pho ba'i chu ni bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur te zhes gsungs pas so //
T02TD2625E:249b-19: 'khor mang po'i dbus na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:249b-20: sngar 'das ma thag pa rnams kyi dkyil na'o //
T02TD2625E:249b-21: tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:249b-22: padma'i gdan la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:249b-23: 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba na bzhugs kyang de'i nyes pas mi gos par ston pa'i phyir padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:249b-24: rten gyis brten pa ba stan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:249b-25: de yang ji ltar dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:249b-26: ji ltar padma rab dmar yang //
T02TD2625E:249b-27: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02TD2625E:250a-2: 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so //
T02TD2625E:250a-4: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa dang tshangs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:250a-5: lha'i bzhugs pa las ni 'dir tshangs pa'i bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:250a-6: thugs rje chen pos ngan song gi rgyud sbyong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:250a-7: spyod lam dang nang du yang dag 'jog dang /
T02TD2625E:250a-8: chos 'chad pa'i bzhugs pa las ni /
T02TD2625E:250a-10: 'dir de gtsor gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:250a-12: yang dag pa bsdus pa'i dus las /
T02TD2625E:250a-13: de sngon yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:250a-14: gleng gzhi rgya cher bshad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:250a-15: de ltar nges pa bskyed pa'i gleng gzhi brjod pas /
T02TD2625E:250a-16: yid ches par 'gyur ba'i rjes las rgyud kyi don ji ltar nye bar phye snyam pa'i rtog pa zlog par byed pa /
T02TD2625E:250a-17: gleng bslang ba ba stan pa /
T02TD2625E:250a-18: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2625E:250a-19: ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol bar byed ces bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer sdud pa mang po'i phreng ba nyid kyis dpral ba'i mdzod spu nas phyung nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:250a-20: 'dir ting nge 'dzin dang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i gzugs mngon du mdzad pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:250a-21: gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ngo bo mngon sum du mdzad pa yin te /
T02TD2625E:250a-22: 'od zer gyi 'phro ba dang 'du ba ni 'dra bar ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa la sogs pa yin no //
T02TD2625E:250a-23: de bas na rnal 'byor pa bdag gis kyang dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur pas spyin sreg dang po bya la /
T02TD2625E:250a-24: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i skur gnas te /
T02TD2625E:250a-25: spyin sreg gnyis pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyi'i don te /
T02TD2625E:250a-26: yan lag gi don ni ngan song zhes bya ba ni sngar brjod pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:250a-27: de dag gi rgyud ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu ma zad kyi bar mi chad par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni tshig gi mtshams sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2625E:250a-29: ting nge 'dzin la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:250b-0: thugs rtse gcig @250b par gnas pa la'o //
T02TD2625E:250b-1: gdul ba zhi ba dag gi ched du /
T02TD2625E:250b-2: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2625E:250b-3: gang dag ma rung ba 'dul ba de dag gi don ni rdo rje khro bo nyid kyis ni mdzad par rigs pas na /
T02TD2625E:250b-4: ngan song gi rgyud las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smros te sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:250b-5: rnam par grol bar byed pa ste /
T02TD2625E:250b-6: sangs rgyas su'am yang na sna tshogs par grol bar byed pa ni rnam par grol bar byed de /
T02TD2625E:250b-7: re zhig rigs nges pa 'phags pa rnga po che'i mdo las gdul ba'i rim pas gsungs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni sngar ba stan pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:250b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ste /
T02TD2625E:250b-9: tshig gi don ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:250b-10: ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin te /
T02TD2625E:250b-11: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes 'dir yang spyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:250b-12: 'od zer sdud pa mang po'i phreng ba zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:250b-13: ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba'i 'od zer yin la /
T02TD2625E:250b-14: bems po las byung ba'i snang ba ni 'od do //
T02TD2625E:250b-15: yang na lus las byung ba'i snang ba ni 'od yin la /
T02TD2625E:250b-16: sems las byung ba'i snang ba ni 'od zer yin te /
T02TD2625E:250b-17: de bas na 'dir 'od ces bya ba smos so //
T02TD2625E:250b-18: ngan song rnams mtho ris la sogs par sdud pas na /
T02TD2625E:250b-20: 'chad par gyur pa las dga' ba'i tshal thams cad kun du [*kun tu?] snang bar byas te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pas so //
T02TD2625E:250b-21: phreng ba zhes bya ba ni phreng ba ltar mdzes pa'am /
T02TD2625E:250b-22: 'od zer de dag phreng bar sbrengs shing bar chad med pa'o //
T02TD2625E:250b-23: nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyi'o //
T02TD2625E:250b-24: mdzod spu nas zhes bya ba ni smin mtshams nas dud dang kha ba ltar dkar ba'i spu sngon bla ma'i skye bo rnams gnas ji lta bar bkod pa las grub pa'i mtshan yod de /
T02TD2625E:250b-25: de nyid 'od zer las byung ba mi zad pa'i mdzod yin no //
T02TD2625E:250b-26: gdul bya rnams phyir mi ldog par 'god par mdzad pa'i 'od zer ni gnas 'di nas 'byin te //
T02TD2625E:250b-27: byung nas zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'thon pa ste /
T02TD2625E:250b-28: 'dir slar bsdu ba'i gnas kyang de nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:251a-1: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:251a-2: byang chub spyod pa nyid la gzhag / ces bya ba'i bar du ni 'od zer gyi las ba stan ba ste /
T02TD2625E:251a-3: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rmi lam ltar yud cig grol ba la /
T02TD2625E:251a-4: yun rings su grol bar 'du shes ba'am /
T02TD2625E:251a-5: skal ba dang ldan pa dag gtan grol ba'o //
T02TD2625E:251a-6: tshig gi don ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2625E:251a-7: de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:251a-8: ji skad du chos mngon pa las /
T02TD2625E:251a-9: gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang //
T02TD2625E:251a-10: ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang //
T02TD2625E:251a-11: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
T02TD2625E:251a-12: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
T02TD2625E:251a-13: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa //
T02TD2625E:251a-14: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams zhes bya //
T02TD2625E:251a-15: de stong la ni stong gsum mo //
T02TD2625E:251a-18: skye bo blo chung dag gi ngor rje btsun sh'akya thub pa'i zhing ni de tsam zhig tu zad do zhes ba stan pas zhing rgya chen ma smos so //
T02TD2625E:251a-19: kun du [*kun tu?] snang bar byas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:251a-20: gang na mun nag smag gis khyab pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang mi rgyu ba'i khor yug gi bar de dag mun pa'i g-yung drung ste /
T02TD2625E:251a-21: ji skad du 'jig rten gdags pa las /
T02TD2625E:251a-22: rgya mtsho 'di yi pha rol na //
T02TD2625E:251a-23: gang gis rgya mtsho bskor ba yi //
T02TD2625E:251a-24: khor yug dpag tshad sum brgya dang //
T02TD2625E:251a-25: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do //
T02TD2625E:251a-26: de ni khor yug rir bshad de //
T02TD2625E:251a-27: 'jig rten bar mtshams tshun chad du //
T02TD2625E:251a-28: nyi zla de bzhin skar ma dang //
T02TD2625E:251a-29: rgyu skar tshogs ni rgya chen kun //
T02TD2625E:251a-31: / bar mtshams phan chad mun bar 'dug / ces gsungs pas so //
T02TD2625E:251a-32: de yang snang bar byas pas sems can de dag 'di skad du /
T02TD2625E:251a-33: kye ma 'dir sems can gzhan skyes so zhes smra bar 'gyur bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:251a-34: ci mun pa gsal ba tsam las mi 'da' byas sam snyam pa las ;
T02TD2625E:251a-35: kun du [*kun tu?] snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pas bcings pa las rnam par bkrol te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:251a-36: nyon mongs pa nyid bcings pa ste lhag ma ni go bar sla'o //
T02TD2625E:251a-37: ci'i de tsam du zad snyam pa las /
T02TD2625E:251b-0: bde ba so sor thob nas zhes @251b gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:251b-1: so sor thob nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:251b-2: rang rang gi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:251b-3: de dag las gang dag lhar skyes ba de dag ni sngon gyi gnas dang lhar skye ba'i rgyu dran nas /
T02TD2625E:251b-4: sangs rgyas la byas ba shes par bya ba'i phyir mchod pa byed du lhags pas na ;
T02TD2625E:251b-5: dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:251b-6: nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de zhes bya ba la dga' ba'i tshal de'i gzhi nor bu gser dri ma med pa'i bye ma bdal ba yin pas de la 'khod nas so //
T02TD2625E:251b-7: gser ni nor bu ma yin gyi /
T02TD2625E:251b-8: rin po che yin no zhe na /
T02TD2625E:251b-9: yid dga' bar byed pa'i phyir nor bu zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:251b-10: gser yang yid dga' bar byed pa'am nor bu'i rgyur gnas pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:251b-11: yang na nor bu dri ma med pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:251b-12: lha'i bu 'das nas zhag bdun lon pa gang yin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:251b-13: steng du zhes bya ba ni de lha'i gnas su skyes pa'i sngon du de dag gi gnas su skyes nas der 'khod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:251b-14: de bas na bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i ched du der bzhugs kyang /
T02TD2625E:251b-15: de nyid kyi las kyi 'bras bu nges par myong bar bya ba cung zad tsam pa de dus ma rdzogs par ston pas /
T02TD2625E:251b-16: 'gro ba rnams las la 'dzem par ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:251b-17: rgyal po ma skyes dgra stong pa nyid chen por rtogs kyang mtshams med pa'i las kyi dbang gis dar gyi pho long brdabs pa tsam zhig mnar med par gnas par gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:251b-18: de bas na bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang bcas pa ni re zhig lha'i bu de 'dren pa'i rkyen tsam du zad de /
T02TD2625E:251b-19: 'gro ba rnams ni las bdag gir bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:251b-20: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:251b-21: gzhan du 'gro ba ma lus pa thugs rje'i dbang gis ji ltar mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la mi 'god /
T02TD2625E:251b-22: de ltar na 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2625E:251b-23: ma byas pa dang phrad pa'i ni med la byas pa ni chud mi za'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02TD2625E:251b-24: rkyen nyid kyang bya bar mi nus so zhe na /
T02TD2625E:251b-25: 'di'i don ni 'og nas brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:251b-26: 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni ched du brjod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:252a-0: rab tu ngo mtshar che bas na spro ba'i @252a * //
T02TD2625E:252a-2: ae ma sangs rgyas zhes lan gsum bos ba'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-3: mdzad pa legs zhes bshad pa ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-4: gang phyir ngan song thams cad sbyangs //
T02TD2625E:252a-6: byang chub spyod pa nyid la gzhag ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-8: lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis //
T02TD2625E:252a-10: bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar che'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-11: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2625E:252a-15: zhes bya ba'i bar yang go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-16: lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsags pa'o zhes bya ba ni bskal pa grangs med gsum du /
T02TD2625E:252a-20: lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-21: yon tan rin po che tshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-22: dbul po rnams nor dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2625E:252a-23: gcer bu rnams gos thob pa dang /
T02TD2625E:252a-24: bkres pa dang skom pa rnams zas dang skom thob pa dang /
T02TD2625E:252a-25: nad pa rnams nad sos pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa gsum gyi 'bras bu 'byung ba rgyun mi chad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-26: lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-27: tshad med pa'i thabs mkhas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni thabs dang /
T02TD2625E:252a-30: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bsags pa'o //
T02TD2625E:252a-31: lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod pa tshad med pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-32: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:252a-34: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du bslabs pas so //
T02TD2625E:252a-35: lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-36: 'dul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:252a-37: tha na rigs chad pa rnams kyang mtho ris su dgod par spyod pas so //
T02TD2625E:252a-38: lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni /
T02TD2625E:252b-0: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam @252b pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:252b-1: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes mnga' bas so //
T02TD2625E:252b-2: lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:252b-3: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin la /
T02TD2625E:252b-4: sangs rgyas rnams nyi tshe dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' bas so //
T02TD2625E:252b-5: lha yi dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:252b-6: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:252b-7: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang yul ma yin gyi /
T02TD2625E:252b-8: sangs rgyas rnams kho na'i yul du gyur pa'i smon lam lhun gyis grub ste /
T02TD2625E:252b-9: ji skad du dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba las /
T02TD2625E:252b-10: smon lam grub pas 'gag pa med pa'i chos mchog can //
T02TD2625E:252b-12: de bzhin du 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:252b-13: sngon chad smon lam mdzad pas gzugs kyi skur yang snang //
T02TD2625E:252b-15: lha'i dbang po de lta bas na /
T02TD2625E:252b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:252b-17: ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:252b-18: mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin par shes par bya ba ste zhes bya ba ni dbang po'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2625E:252b-19: skye ba tha dad pa la dga' ba dang /
T02TD2625E:252b-20: gzugs tha dad pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin du sbyor ba ste /
T02TD2625E:252b-21: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:252b-22: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la /
T02TD2625E:252b-23: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje 'khor 'dus pa de nyid na 'dug pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2625E:252b-24: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de sems can rnams 'phye sta /
T02TD2625E:252b-25: tshul sna tshogs dang bsam pa sna tshogs dang thabs sna tshogs dag gis ston cing /
T02TD2625E:252b-26: kha cig la ni nyan thos dag gi theg pa'i tshul /
T02TD2625E:252b-27: kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshul /
T02TD2625E:253a-2: kha cig la ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i tshul /
T02TD2625E:253a-3: kha cig la ni lhar skye bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:253a-4: kha cig la ni mir skye bar bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:253a-5: kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po dang /
T02TD2625E:253a-11: mi'am cir skye bar bya ba'i bar du chos ston la /
T02TD2625E:253a-12: de la sems can la las sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba dag gis ni /
T02TD2625E:253a-13: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su mthong /
T02TD2625E:253a-14: la las ni nyan thos kyi gzugs su mthong /
T02TD2625E:253a-15: la las ni rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su /
T02TD2625E:253a-16: la las ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su /
T02TD2625E:253a-17: la las ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su /
T02TD2625E:253a-18: la las ni tshangs pa'i gzugs su /
T02TD2625E:253a-19: la las ni sred med kyi bu'i gzugs su /
T02TD2625E:253a-20: la las ni rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su /
T02TD2625E:253a-21: la las ni lto 'phye chen po dang /
T02TD2625E:253a-22: mi dang mi ma yin par du mthong ste /
T02TD2625E:253a-23: rang rang gi tshig brjod pa'i tshul dag dang spyod lam sna tshogs su mthong la /
T02TD2625E:253a-24: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol pa'i ror ro gcig pas lags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:253a-25: 'di la the tshom dang som nyid dang yid gnyis ma byed cig ces bya ba ni tshad ma rnams gsum gyi yul la'am /
T02TD2625E:253a-26: thos pa la sogs pa'i shes rab gsum gyi dus sam /
T02TD2625E:253a-27: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa gsum gyi bdag nyid la the tshom la sogs pa spangs shig ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:253a-28: yang na 'dir the tshom ni ba stan pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:253a-29: som nyi dang yid gnyis ni rnam grangs kyi bshad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:253a-30: ci'i phyir the tshom la sogs pa mi bya snyam pa la /
T02TD2625E:253a-31: gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2625E:253a-32: de'i rgyu mtshan yang rnam pa du ma sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:253a-33: de ltar gleng bslang ba bshad nas ;
T02TD2625E:253a-34: da ni gleng bslar mgo drangs pa'i yongs su shes par bya ba rgyud kyi dngos po bshad de /
T02TD2625E:253a-35: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba'i bar du smos te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:253b-0: nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs can rnams pa lnga'i dbang ngam @253b yang na las dang po dang /
T02TD2625E:253b-1: ye shes cung zad babs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:253b-2: ye shes la dbang thob pa dang /
T02TD2625E:253b-3: ye shes yang dag par dbang thob pa rnams gong nas gong du sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par zhes bya ba'i phyir ram /
T02TD2625E:253b-6: mi rnams dang lha rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:253b-7: sems can thams cad la phan pa nyid du bgyi ba dang zhes pa nas /
T02TD2625E:253b-8: bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs pa bskyed du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du smos te /
T02TD2625E:253b-9: de ltar las spobs pa bskyed pa ni /
T02TD2625E:253b-10: shes rab kyi 'bras bu so sor smra ba la thogs pa med par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:253b-11: bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris 'di nyid na zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:253b-12: kha bub tu 'gyel zhes bya ba'i bar la dus las 'das nas dgung bdun lags na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:253b-13: 'dzam bu'i gling kho na'i zhag bdun te /
T02TD2625E:253b-14: tha snyad rnams ni gling 'dis rnam par gzhag pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:253b-15: 'di nyid nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun du [*kun tu?] spyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtsor byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:253b-16: gang dag lha'i zhag bdun dang /
T02TD2625E:253b-17: mi'i lo khyud 'khor bdun du smra ba dang /
T02TD2625E:253b-18: mi'i zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur smra ba rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:253b-19: rang gi rtog pa ngan pa'i dri ma ngan pa kho nas dri ma can du byas par zad de lhag ma ni go bar sla'o //
T02TD2625E:253b-20: gnas skabs 'dir ni rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD2625E:253b-21: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams kyis /
T02TD2625E:253b-22: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:253b-23: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi lta ste lha'i 'khor 'di nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa spyar te tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:253b-24: 'o na ci'i phyir rgyal po de mtshams med pa byas bzhin du /
T02TD2625E:253b-25: shi ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skyes /
T02TD2625E:253b-26: de lta na ni nges par skye gnas myong bar ma gyur to zhe na /
T02TD2625E:253b-27: 'di ni 'gyod cing rab tu bshags pa'i mthu dang rigs la gnas pa'i mthu yin te /
T02TD2625E:253b-28: las ma rungs pa byas pa yang 'gyod cing bshags pas dag cing byang bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:253b-29: ji skad du gsungs pa yang /
T02TD2625E:254a-0: shin tu mi bzad pa yi las rnams byas pa dag / bdag la rnam @254a * //
T02TD2625E:254a-2: rab tu bshags dang sdoms pa byas pas na //
T02TD2625E:254a-3: de dag rtsa nas 'don par ngas bshad do //
T02TD2625E:254a-5: thob pa'i rigs las gzhan pa /
T02TD2625E:254a-6: lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu yod pa yang /
T02TD2625E:254a-7: sdig pa'i 'bras bu rab tu stobs chung ste /
T02TD2625E:254a-8: ji skad du mdo sde rgyan las /
T02TD2625E:254a-9: ring mo zhig nas ngan song du //
T02TD2625E:254a-10: 'gro zhing myur du thar pa dang //
T02TD2625E:254a-11: de na'ang sdug bsngal chung du myong //
T02TD2625E:254a-12: skyo bcas sems can yongs smin byed //
T02TD2625E:254a-14: de bas na rgyal po lus med bde ste /
T02TD2625E:254a-15: mtshams med pa byas su zin kyang /
T02TD2625E:254a-16: las de lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur gyi /
T02TD2625E:254a-17: skyes ma thag tu ma yin la /
T02TD2625E:254a-18: lan grangs gzhan la yang mi'i gzhag bdun kho nas rnams par smin pa dang bral bar 'gyur te dga' ldan du skyes par gyur to //
T02TD2625E:254a-19: kha cig na re zhag bdun yang srid pa bar ma do'i gnas skabs yin no zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:254a-20: 'di la ni lung dang sgrub par byed pa ci yang med do //
T02TD2625E:254a-21: srid pa bar ma dor ni ring du gnas pa dus ma yin pa shi ba kho na'i dbang du byas pas /
T02TD2625E:254a-22: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2625E:254a-23: theg pa chen po'i mdo las rab tu gsal bar gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:254a-24: lha'i bu de ni dus ma yin par shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ga las shes /
T02TD2625E:254a-25: de'i phyir 'di lung nges pa dang /
T02TD2625E:254a-26: bla ma'i man ngag med pa rang gi yid kyi spyod pa'i shes pa kho na smras par zad /
T02TD2625E:254a-27: de bas na sems can dmyal bar mi'i zhag bdun skyes ;
T02TD2625E:254a-28: ji ltar lung ba stan pa'i lo 'bum dang /
T02TD2625E:254a-30: drug stong gi lhag ma ni gsang sngags kyi mthus bcom par zad do //
T02TD2625E:254a-32: gsang sngags yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab /
T02TD2625E:254a-33: ces lha'i bu de nyid kyi smras pa /
T02TD2625E:254a-34: gal te de med kyang sngar brjod pa'i mthu nyid kyis yun cung zad cig tu sdug bsngal bar zad de /
T02TD2625E:254a-35: sems can dmyal ba'i tshe tshad mthar phyin pa ni shin tu ring ste /
T02TD2625E:254a-36: chos mngon par ji skad du bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:254a-37: des na de nas sangs rgyas nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:254b-0: bla na ma mchis @254b pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:254b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba nas phan pa dang bde ba thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa ni /
T02TD2625E:254b-2: gang sngags rnams ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:254b-3: de la de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:254b-4: sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i bar du ni /
T02TD2625E:254b-5: 'khor dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2625E:254b-6: rig sngags 'chang gis kyang slob ma rnams sngags 'di sta gon la gnas pa'i dus su //
T02TD2625E:254b-7: thun mong gi dam tshig mnos ma thag tu /
T02TD2625E:254b-8: dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:254b-9: snyoms par zhugs nas kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdag po'i sngags ston te /
T02TD2625E:254b-10: gdon mi za bar 'joms pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes ni de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD2625E:254b-11: de byin gyis brlabs pa ni des gzhan yang gsang sngags de'i snod du byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:254b-12: ngan song gi rgyud kyis bcings pa ni /
T02TD2625E:254b-13: las dang nyon mongs pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa ste de chad pa ni spangs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:254b-14: ngan 'gro ni de dag gi lus yin la /
T02TD2625E:254b-15: de dag thams cad sbyangs pa ni bor bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD2625E:254b-16: de'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi ste zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2625E:254b-17: de nas bral ba thob pa ni skye bo mang po bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:254b-18: lha dang mi'i lus thob pa'o //
T02TD2625E:254b-19: de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni snying po nyid gsang ba ste /
T02TD2625E:254b-20: gsang sngags nyid ming gzhan gyis ba stan pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:254b-21: de yang mantri gupta bha sha ne zhes 'dud pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:254b-22: snying po la sogs pa'i don yang 'og nas 'chad par byed do //
T02TD2625E:254b-24: snying po dang nye pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:254b-25: 'dir snying po ni lha ste snying por bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:254b-26: de dang nye bar byed pa'i snying po ni de thob par byed pa ste /
T02TD2625E:254b-27: aom trata ces bya ba ste lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:254b-28: rtsa ba'i rig pa'o zhes bya bal /
T02TD2625E:254b-29: 'di nyid rgyud kyi bdag po'i sngags yin pas /
T02TD2625E:254b-30: 'di bzlas pas lha thams cad kyi sngags bzlas par gyur pas na rtsa ba'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-1: ma dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i tshe /
T02TD2625E:255a-2: 'di nyid dang po dang bcas pa la 'bum 'bum dang lhag ma rnams la khri khri bzla'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-3: yang na 'di gnyis la 'bum bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-4: aom sarba bitsharba aa bar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:255a-6: ro byin gyis brlab pa dag bya'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-7: de la kha cig na re sngags dang po ni dkyil 'khor mthu skyed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-8: gnyis pa lngas ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-9: gsum pa ni dkyil 'khor gdon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:255a-10: bzhi pa bcus ni dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya dgod pa'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:255a-11: aom sha aom bha zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni mngon par byang chub ba'i rim brjod par byed pa ste /
T02TD2625E:255a-12: de yang dang po ni stong pa nyid ston par byed pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:255a-13: gnyis pa ni zla ba'i cha la sogs pa lhag ma rnams 'dren par bye pa ste /
T02TD2625E:255a-14: de yang rgyud 'dir dam tshig sems dpa' gnyis te /
T02TD2625E:255a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems dpa' rnams te /
T02TD2625E:255a-16: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig sems dba' bya bar 'dod na de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2625E:255a-17: dang por snod du gyur pa'i sngags pa mkhas pas mal nas langs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags pa'am cung zad bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:255a-18: de nas ji ltar rigs par lus kyis bya ba byas la gtor ma byin te /
T02TD2625E:255a-19: mchod pa'i yan lag bkod nas stan 'jam zhing bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD2625E:255a-20: bdag gi lus skad cig gis rdo rje khro bo mdog sngon po rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa can 'jigs su rung bar bsams te /
T02TD2625E:255a-21: aom a'a:bighn'am ta krita h'um phat ces bya bas chu'am thal ba'am yungs kar la bzlas te gtor bas /
T02TD2625E:255a-22: bdag dang gnas dang rdzas rnams bsrung bar byas te /
T02TD2625E:255a-23: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2625E:255a-24: yang na bgegs kyi dgras kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:255a-25: nges par yungs kar la sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:255a-26: dang po kun du [*kun tu?] gsal bar bya //
T02TD2625E:255a-28: sgrub pa pos ni dang po ru //
T02TD2625E:255a-29: khro bo'i rgyal pos bskrad par bya //
T02TD2625E:255a-30: zhes gsungs pas 'dir bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:255b-0: bsrung ba'i las thams cad @255b de nyid kyis bya'o //
T02TD2625E:255b-1: kha cig na re 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:255b-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig / lan cig cam yang brjod gyur na //
T02TD2625E:255b-3: 'di ni bsrung ba rtag chen po //
T02TD2625E:255b-4: skad cig dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes //
T02TD2625E:255b-5: bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs //
T02TD2625E:255b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud 'dir bsrung bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:255b-7: kha cig na re lag ba gnyis thal mo khong ston du spyar la /
T02TD2625E:255b-8: mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis nang du bkug la bcug ste /
T02TD2625E:255b-9: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung cung zad bkug / gung mo dang srin lag phyung la bsgreng ngo //
T02TD2625E:255b-10: phyag rgya 'di dang gsang sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab cing /
T02TD2625E:255b-13: bi ku ru ri bi ku la sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:255b-14: de nas phyag rgya de nyid la gnas bzhin du nam:sa manta bu ddh'a nam /
T02TD2625E:255b-15: sarba tre aa nu ga dhe bandha ya s'i s'i nan /
T02TD2625E:255b-16: ma h'a sa m'a ya ni ra dza te smra [*smar?] ni aa pra te ha te /
T02TD2625E:255b-23: pra ba ra dharma la ba d'a /
T02TD2625E:255b-24: bi dza ye bha ga ba te /
T02TD2625E:255b-25: bi ku ri bi ku li /
T02TD2625E:255b-26: le'u bu ri sv'a h'a zhes lan bcu brjod pas mtshams bcad pa'am /
T02TD2625E:255b-27: rab tu rgya che ba'i mtshams la sogs pa'i cho ga spyar ro zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:255b-28: rgyud 'di las de lta bu'i bsrung ba ni ma gsungs kyi /
T02TD2625E:255b-29: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis //
T02TD2625E:255b-30: bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:255b-32: bsrung ba dang po nyid bya bar shis la /
T02TD2625E:255b-33: gzhan yang gnod pa ni med do //
T02TD2625E:255b-35: nam:sa manta badzra n'am ha ha ha bi sma ye /
T02TD2625E:255b-37: bi sha ya sam bha ba /
T02TD2625E:255b-38: tree lo kya bi dza la h'um dza sv'a h'a zhes bya ba spyar bar sngags so //
T02TD2625E:255b-39: de nas sva bh'a wa bi shuddha sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho nya ham zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2625E:255b-40: de ltar mos par byas la /
T02TD2625E:255b-41: lag pa gnyis mdun du rtse sprad de bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:255b-42: gnyis ka'i mthil du yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD2625E:255b-43: g-yas dang g-yon du h'um dang aa sngon po dang dkar po dag bsams te /
T02TD2625E:255b-44: gnyis ka dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gis gang bar byas la /
T02TD2625E:256a-0: mthe bong la sogs par aom h'um hr'i: t'am a'a: zhes bya ba'i mdog ji lta bar bkod la yi ge @256a * //
T02TD2625E:256a-1: de dag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mos shing /
T02TD2625E:256a-2: mthe bong la sogs par yin par mos la /
T02TD2625E:256a-3: lag pa g-yas g-yon skye ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yin par mos pas /
T02TD2625E:256a-4: chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'jug / chos kun tha dad rjes su 'jug chos kun rjes su zhugs pa ste //
T02TD2625E:256a-7: sor mo rnams rtse bsnol te /
T02TD2625E:256a-8: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharm'a zhes brjod cing bsdams la /
T02TD2625E:256a-9: yang phye ste zla ba'i yig 'bru gnyis rdo rjer gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:256a-10: aom tishtha badzra zhes brjod pas ;
T02TD2625E:256a-11: lag pa la thim par byas te ci bder bya'o //
T02TD2625E:256a-12: de nas yang mgrin par yi ge hr'i: dmar po las byung ba'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyang pa'i lce'i 'dab ma la h'um las rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2625E:256a-13: badzra dzi hva zhes brjod pas thim par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:256a-14: de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa la phyag bzhi bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:256a-15: yon chab dang bcas pa'i mchod pa lnga 'og nas 'byung ba lta bus mchod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256a-17: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2625E:256a-21: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byas la /
T02TD2625E:256a-22: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las bshad pa'i byams pa la sogs pa cung zad bsgoms pas bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te /
T02TD2625E:256a-23: de nas ye shes dbab pa'i dbang gis ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par byas te /
T02TD2625E:256a-24: aom aa we sha ya aa zhes badzr'a nytsa li aom badzra bandha bandha aom badzra bandha trat /
T02TD2625E:256a-25: 'dir chos rnams ni bden pa gnyis phan tshun brten pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256a-26: de yang don dam pa gtsor gyur pas /
T02TD2625E:256a-28: de shes na kun rdzob dral cing mi dmigs par byas pa ste /
T02TD2625E:256a-29: de nyid rab tu brten par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:256a-30: aom a'a be sha ya a'a: zhes bya bas lhag par skye ba med pa las kun du [*kun tu?] gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:256a-31: de nas slar de las langs te /
T02TD2625E:256a-32: rnam par smin pa'i lus su gnas pas /
T02TD2625E:256a-33: aom sha zhes bya bas ba stan pa'i stong pa nyid la sogs pas mngon par byang chub pa bsgoms te /
T02TD2625E:256b-0: @256b de yang bdag nyid de ltar tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs pas de'i rnam par smin pa'i gnas 'og min nyid du skyes shing /
T02TD2625E:256b-1: sa bcu pa la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-2: dbang bskur ba thob par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:256b-3: 'og min nas dga' ldan du babs par bsams te /
T02TD2625E:256b-4: de nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du babs la /
T02TD2625E:256b-5: gzhon nu'i spyod pa rdzogs par byas nas mngon par byung ste /
T02TD2625E:256b-6: dka' ba spyod pa'i lus des mi lcogs pa med pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-8: bsam gtan khyad par can dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-9: bsam gtan gnyis pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du /
T02TD2625E:256b-10: rim gyis snyoms par zhugs la /
T02TD2625E:256b-12: slar thod rgal du 'jug pa dang babs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:256b-13: de nas yang mi lcogs pa med pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du rim gyis zhugs te /
T02TD2625E:256b-14: de nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i che 'bri nag dgu las /
T02TD2625E:256b-15: chen po'i chen po la gnas pa las /
T02TD2625E:256b-16: yid kyi lus kyis slar 'og min du song ste /
T02TD2625E:256b-17: der yang mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa las /
T02TD2625E:256b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung dbyin pas /
T02TD2625E:256b-19: sems so sor rtog pas na /
T02TD2625E:256b-20: zla ba'i cha dang rdo rje dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-21: sku rdzogs pa rnams bsgoms te /
T02TD2625E:256b-22: 'dir zla ba'i cha dang po ni tshes gcig pa dang nya gang yang rung ba'o //
T02TD2625E:256b-23: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-24: byang chub chen por mos pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-25: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-26: de dag gcig tu mos pa dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-27: aom sa ma ya ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-28: sa ma ya ho yang sa yo& ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:256b-29: cho ga lhag ma gnyis kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:256b-30: de nas badzra ratna brjod cing dbang bskur la /
T02TD2625E:256b-31: phyag rgyas te gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod do //
T02TD2625E:256b-32: de ltar don 'di snyed cig sha dang bas mtshon pas na /
T02TD2625E:256b-34: bla ma'i kha nas rtogs par bya'i /
T02TD2625E:256b-36: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis dam tshig sems dpa'i bya ba bshad de /
T02TD2625E:256b-37: de yang ye shes dbab pa'i rim pa ni /
T02TD2625E:257a-0: chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las rjes la thob pa'i ngo bo'i snying @257a * //
T02TD2625E:257a-1: rjes mtshams spyar nas zla ba'i ngo bor byas te /
T02TD2625E:257a-2: gsal bar byas la de'i dbus su bris pa ltar gnas pa'i rang gi snying po bsams la /
T02TD2625E:257a-3: aom sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:257a-4: aom badzra satva a'a: zhes pas phab la /
T02TD2625E:257a-5: rang gi lha'i mtshan mar gyur pa dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-6: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i nga rgyal byas te /
T02TD2625E:257a-7: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:257a-8: rang gi sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur par bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:257a-9: aom ma h'a sa ma ya stv'am ham zhes bya bas me lce mang po 'khrugs pa'i sbyor ba las /
T02TD2625E:257a-10: rang gi lha'i skur gyur par brtag cing /
T02TD2625E:257a-11: aom ma h'a sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-12: aom sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-13: rgyab tu zla ba grub par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:257a-14: de nas aom su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-16: aom sa ma ya stva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-17: de na aom badzra mushti zhes brjod la /
T02TD2625E:257a-18: aom stva badzri ni sta nam zhes pa dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-19: gnas pa grub par byas la /
T02TD2625E:257a-20: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um /
T02TD2625E:257a-21: badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes brjod de /
T02TD2625E:257a-22: aom badzra dh'a tu zhes pa dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-23: aom badzra badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2625E:257a-24: aom ratna badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2625E:257a-25: aom dharma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'a /
T02TD2625E:257a-26: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02TD2625E:257a-32: dpa' bo'i nga rgyal bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-33: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de /
T02TD2625E:257a-34: de ltar na ba stan pa ni rgyud 'di nyid las //
T02TD2625E:257a-35: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par /
T02TD2625E:257a-36: sems kyis bsam pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:257a-37: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD2625E:257a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston to //
T02TD2625E:257a-39: de ltar na dam tshig sems dpa' gnyis las gang yang rung ba cig tu bdag nyid bsams te ngang por aom thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag go zhes brjod de /
T02TD2625E:257a-40: de'i don gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mos pas bdag nam mkha' la gnas te /
T02TD2625E:257a-41: bdag gi sems kyi dbang tsam las /
T02TD2625E:257a-42: dang po rlung dang chu dang dbang chen nag po dang /
T02TD2625E:257a-45: ser po yi ge yam dang bam dang lam dag las byung bar bsams te /
T02TD2625E:257b-0: de'i dbus su kam gi yi ge ser po @257b las byung ba'i rus sbal gyi rgyab nas yi ge sa ser po las byung ba'i padma ser po tshad med pa'i lte bar yi ge sum dkar po las ri rab chen po rin po che sna bzhi /
T02TD2625E:257b-1: rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa /
T02TD2625E:257b-2: rtse mo brgyang pa lhun stug cing gzi mdangs bzang por bsams la /
T02TD2625E:257b-3: de'i steng du dga' ba'i tshal nyid du mos par byas la /
T02TD2625E:257b-4: 'chad par byed pa las gsungs pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po sngar lha rnams bshad pa'i skabs su ba stan pa'i gdan dang gnas nges par bsams te /
T02TD2625E:257b-5: de'i shar phyogs kyis go la brten par bdag nyid gnas la /
T02TD2625E:257b-6: lha rnams ma lus pa'i rang rang gi sku grub par bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:257b-7: de nas mchod pa'i skabs nas bshad pa ltar /
T02TD2625E:257b-8: dgug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2625E:257b-9: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nye 'khor du byon pa legs par brtags pa dang bcas pa ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2625E:257b-10: snying gar las kyi rdo rje bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:257b-11: ljags la yi ge hr'i: nyid bsgom pa rdo rje dang bcas pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:257b-12: rgyud 'di las ji skad gsungs pa'i rtsa ba'i lha'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:257b-13: kha cig ne re de dag nyid las so zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:257b-14: rim pa yang phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig dang chos dang las dag go //
T02TD2625E:257b-15: de bas na rgyud 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di tsam du zad la /
T02TD2625E:257b-16: 'di tsam kho nar rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan las kyang gsungs pa snang bas 'di la mi 'thad par mi brtag go //
T02TD2625E:257b-17: phyi rol dang shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:257b-18: mchod pas tshim par bya ba'i nges par rang gi lha'i cho ga ma lus par spyad pa med do //
T02TD2625E:257b-19: de nas mchod pa'i tshul ni 'chad par byed pa las gsal lo //
T02TD2625E:257b-20: mchod pa byas nas thams cad bdag gi rjes su spyad pas /
T02TD2625E:257b-21: gsang sgrib pa rnams rim gyis spangs nas so //
T02TD2625E:257b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:257b-23: bram ze dang rgyal rigs te /
T02TD2625E:257b-24: rigs gzhan du ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrung bas so //
T02TD2625E:257b-25: lha'i rigs sam zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:257b-26: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs la sogs pas so //
T02TD2625E:258a-0: gzhan gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gang du skye bar @258a * //
T02TD2625E:258a-3: mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa //
T02TD2625E:258a-4: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing //
T02TD2625E:258a-5: skye dang skye bar bde gshegs kyi /
T02TD2625E:258a-9: yang na gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus //
T02TD2625E:258a-10: gnas ni gang du bsams pa dag / de dang der ni de yi tshe //
T02TD2625E:258a-11: skye bar 'gyur bar dogs pa med //
T02TD2625E:258a-13: de dag gis ni de ltar na rigs kyi bu dngos grub gnyis ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:258a-15: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:258a-17: zhes bya ba'i bar du yang go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:258a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
T02TD2625E:258a-19: bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:258a-20: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
T02TD2625E:258a-21: de na dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02TD2625E:258a-22: zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste /
T02TD2625E:258a-23: 'dir sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:258a-24: dus gsum du bzhugs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2625E:258a-25: byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02TD2625E:258a-26: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2625E:258a-27: kun du [*kun tu?] rtog pa thams cad spangs ;
T02TD2625E:258a-29: de nyid sems te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pas so //
T02TD2625E:258a-30: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pas na bla na med pa'o //
T02TD2625E:258a-31: de thabs gang gis rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gang yin pa /
T02TD2625E:258a-32: rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:258a-33: de ni ming don dang ldan pa //
T02TD2625E:258a-34: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba brjod do //
T02TD2625E:258a-35: ming gi don nyid ci zhe na /
T02TD2625E:258a-36: snying por gsungs zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:258a-37: mar gyi dam pa ni mar gyi snying po bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:258a-38: 'di phye ste brjod na ni dkyil ni rnam par mi rtog pas snying por ba stan la /
T02TD2625E:258a-39: 'khor ni rdzogs par skad kyi dbyings las 'don te /
T02TD2625E:258a-40: de bas na rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:258b-0: 'khor ni rdzogs pa'o zhes gsungs pa legs par drangs @258b pa yin no //
T02TD2625E:258b-1: de bas na dkyil 'khor ni gang don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo gang la sems rgyu ba yang med na yi ge rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2625E:258b-2: lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin sprul ba dang /
T02TD2625E:258b-3: gzugs brnyan dag ni brtags nas dkyil 'khor nyid du rnam par gzhag go //
T02TD2625E:258b-4: don 'di nyid dkyil 'khor yin par ni /
T02TD2625E:258b-5: zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las kyang //
T02TD2625E:258b-6: yan lag thams cad bsgom las 'das //
T02TD2625E:258b-7: rtog dang mi rtog kun spangs la //
T02TD2625E:258b-11: 'o na 'di lta bu'i nang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir ba stan pa ci la dgongs she na /
T02TD2625E:258b-12: 'di ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor la mi ltos par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:258b-13: slob dpon dang slob ma dmigs pa can phyi'i dkyil 'khor la stong pa de dag kyang /
T02TD2625E:258b-14: dang po nas byang chub sems yid la byed cing sa spyang ba la sogs pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi las bya bar dgongs pas na 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:258b-15: ci 'o na nang gi dkyil 'khor 'di rtogs na /
T02TD2625E:258b-16: phyi'i dkyil 'khor la mi ltos pa yin nam zhe na /
T02TD2625E:258b-17: mi ltos pa yin te stong pa nyid la goms pa dag la phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba dag gis ci zhig bya ste /
T02TD2625E:258b-18: rdul tshon la sogs pa'i bya ba ni dmigs pa can dag gi ngo bor gyur pa ste /
T02TD2625E:258b-19: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:258b-20: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te /
T02TD2625E:258b-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2625E:258b-22: sangs rgyas mtshan ma mi mnga' ste //
T02TD2625E:258b-23: chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD2625E:258b-24: mtshan med 'dus ma byas pa ni //
T02TD2625E:258b-25: mtshungs pa med pa'i chos ston na //
T02TD2625E:258b-26: dpa' bo chen po ci slad du //
T02TD2625E:258b-27: mtshan mar bcas pa'i cho ga 'di //
T02TD2625E:258b-28: gsang sngags spyad la ston par mdzad //
T02TD2625E:258b-29: 'di ni chos nyid tshul ma lags //
T02TD2625E:258b-30: de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2625E:258b-31: rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis //
T02TD2625E:258b-32: de tshe phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD2625E:258b-33: chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di nyid gsungs //
T02TD2625E:259a-0: @259a * // chos ni rtog dang bral ba ste //
T02TD2625E:259a-1: kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yin //
T02TD2625E:259a-2: de la sems dang sems byung gi //
T02TD2625E:259a-3: rtog pa rab tu spang pa yin //
T02TD2625E:259a-4: nga yis chos sngon sangs rgyas pa //
T02TD2625E:259a-5: de ni mkha' las byung ba ste //
T02TD2625E:259a-6: legs par rtogs pa'i spyod yul ba //
T02TD2625E:259a-7: byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so //
T02TD2625E:259a-8: yul dus mtshan ma la sogs pa //
T02TD2625E:259a-9: mun gyis bsgribs pa rnams 'dod do //
T02TD2625E:259a-10: de dag gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:259a-11: cho ga 'di yang brjod pa dag / yul med dus kyang med pa ste //
T02TD2625E:259a-12: bya ba med cing byed pa'ang med //
T02TD2625E:259a-13: chos rnams kun la yod med de //
T02TD2625E:259a-14: chos rnams nyi tshe 'ba' zhig go //
T02TD2625E:259a-16: sems can dag gi blo zhan cing //
T02TD2625E:259a-17: bya ba tsam gyis rmongs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:259a-18: dngos po'i don la chags pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:259a-20: 'di lta'i tshul ni mi shes pas //
T02TD2625E:259a-21: yul dang dus dang bya ba las ;
T02TD2625E:259a-22: / dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma yis //
T02TD2625E:259a-24: sems dpa' chen po de dag phyir //
T02TD2625E:259a-25: cho ga 'di ni brjod pa yin //
T02TD2625E:259a-27: stong pa nyid la gnas pa la dngos grub rnams 'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung bar yang de nyid las gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:259a-28: gsang ba'i bdag po nam byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa gyur pa de'i tshe //
T02TD2625E:259a-29: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags rnams mngon du phyogs shing gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02TD2625E:259a-30: de bzhin du sa sbyong ba la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi las ma lus pa yang //
T02TD2625E:259a-31: byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pas bya ste /
T02TD2625E:259a-33: sa ni dang por shes byas te //
T02TD2625E:259a-34: sems kyi sar ni gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2625E:259a-35: spyang ba sngar ni ba stan pa ste //
T02TD2625E:259a-36: de yis de ni yongs su spyang //
T02TD2625E:259a-37: nam zhig nyes dang bral ba yi //
T02TD2625E:259a-39: de tshe de ni dag pa ste //
T02TD2625E:259a-40: nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD2625E:259a-41: mngon par byang chub mthong bas na //
T02TD2625E:259a-42: de lta bas ni ba stan shes bya //
T02TD2625E:259a-43: de las gzhan du sa sbyong ba //
T02TD2625E:259a-44: de ni dag par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:259a-45: sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su //
T02TD2625E:259b-0: gang zhig sa sbyong byed @259b pa ni //
T02TD2625E:259b-1: byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pas //
T02TD2625E:259b-2: gsang ba'i bdag po de mi dag / de bas rtog pa rnams spangs nas //
T02TD2625E:259b-3: sa kun rnam par spyang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:259b-4: nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni //
T02TD2625E:259b-5: cho ga rgyas par gang ba stan pa //
T02TD2625E:259b-6: de dag thog mar ba stan pa ni //
T02TD2625E:259b-7: rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te //
T02TD2625E:259b-8: rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:259b-9: ji srid ma spangs bar du ni //
T02TD2625E:259b-11: kun mkhyen zhes kyang mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:259b-12: slob ma rnams ni nan tan du //
T02TD2625E:259b-13: byang chub sems kyis spyang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:259b-15: yang de nyid las gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems kyi yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te /
T02TD2625E:259b-17: gzhan du byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub kyang bslus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:259b-18: dam tshig las 'das pa nges par ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:259b-19: de bas na nang gi dkyil 'khor spros pa med pa 'di /
T02TD2625E:259b-20: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dang por nan tan du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:259b-21: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:259b-22: kun dga' la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sa mdor ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:259b-23: rgyas par ni ji skad du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:259b-24: de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya //
T02TD2625E:259b-25: gang tshul mthong na dge ba yi //
T02TD2625E:259b-26: sa dang mi dge bsgrags pa yi //
T02TD2625E:259b-27: sa yi cha yi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2625E:259b-28: mthon dman dang ni tsher mas gang //
T02TD2625E:259b-29: thod pa yis ni 'thabs pa dang //
T02TD2625E:259b-30: gdab pa dong dang nag por gnas //
T02TD2625E:259b-31: sprul dang grog tshang thal ba'i steng //
T02TD2625E:259b-32: gseg ma rdul dang sgra dang ni //
T02TD2625E:259b-35: / las kun la ni rnam par spangs //
T02TD2625E:259b-36: cha mnyam shin tu gtsang zhing 'jam //
T02TD2625E:259b-37: gting zug skyon ni rnams spangs pa'i //
T02TD2625E:259b-38: byang shar du ni shar nyid kyi //
T02TD2625E:259b-39: sa ni kun la bsngags pa yin //
T02TD2625E:259b-40: dang por pus nub tsam brkos la //
T02TD2625E:259b-41: sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:260a-2: de ni grub par 'gyur bar ba stan //
T02TD2625E:260a-3: 'di las bzlog na sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2625E:260a-4: las ni brtsam par mi bya ste //
T02TD2625E:260a-5: brtsams na sdug bsngal thob 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2625E:260a-6: dbal du yang ni mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:260a-7: skye bo bzang po mang ba dag / dkyil 'khor sa ni gang yin par //
T02TD2625E:260a-8: de bsngags dngos grub byed pa ste //
T02TD2625E:260a-9: chu med pa ni mkhas pas smad //
T02TD2625E:260a-10: chu dang ljon shing sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-11: lo ma me tog 'bras bu dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-12: 'o ma can gyi shing yong pa //
T02TD2625E:260a-13: de ni dkyil 'khor sa ru bsngags //
T02TD2625E:260a-14: yon tan kun dang ldan pa'i sa //
T02TD2625E:260a-15: bzang po shing dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-16: chu dang nye ba'i sa la ni //
T02TD2625E:260a-18: zhi bar byed pa'i las kyi sa //
T02TD2625E:260a-19: kha dog dkar por yongs su brtag / dmar dang ser la rgyas pa'i don //
T02TD2625E:260a-20: nag po la ni mngon spyod do //
T02TD2625E:260a-22: chu bo che dang nye ba'ang rung //
T02TD2625E:260a-23: ne'u sing dang ni nyams dga' bar //
T02TD2625E:260a-24: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:260a-25: ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam //
T02TD2625E:260a-26: skye bo med dang khang stong dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-27: gang yang mngon par mi 'dod pa'i //
T02TD2625E:260a-28: phyogs de rnams su mngon spyod de //
T02TD2625E:260a-29: ri rtse ba med pa lang gi //
T02TD2625E:260a-30: lhas dang mchod rten gdung bcas khyim //
T02TD2625E:260a-31: 'di lta bu la sogs phyogs su //
T02TD2625E:260a-32: rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:260a-33: mchod rten che dang nyams dga' dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-34: rnam par dben pa'i khang pa dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-35: ri rtse rnams su rgya chen po //
T02TD2625E:260a-36: grub par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2625E:260a-37: ri dang gling ma mkhar dang ni //
T02TD2625E:260a-38: ma thos dang ni phug thag tu //
T02TD2625E:260a-39: dpal gyi sgo ni 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2625E:260a-41: chu skyes rgyas pa'i nags tshal ni //
T02TD2625E:260a-42: ngang pa'i tshogs kyis sgra sgrogs skad phyung bar //
T02TD2625E:260a-45: ma mo'i gnas dang lha rten nam //
T02TD2625E:260a-46: lha yi khang ba'ang rung bar ni //
T02TD2625E:260a-47: rdo rje lcags kyus gzung dbab dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-48: gzhom pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:260a-49: lam chen bzhi mdo mchod rten dang //
T02TD2625E:260a-50: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga ru //
T02TD2625E:260a-51: khro bo'i rgyal po bgegs kyi ni //
T02TD2625E:260b-0: @260b dkyil 'khor sgrub pa po yis bri //
T02TD2625E:260b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:260b-2: gtsug lag can dang mdzes pa ni //
T02TD2625E:260b-3: mkhas pa yis ni khyad par du //
T02TD2625E:260b-4: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:260b-5: rab gnas la sogs thams cad kyi //
T02TD2625E:260b-6: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi tshul nyid la ;
T02TD2625E:260b-7: / padma'i chal dang nye ba ru //
T02TD2625E:260b-8: mkhas pas khyad par bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:260b-9: gsal ba la sogs thams cad ni //
T02TD2625E:260b-10: mkhas pas ri yi rtse mo ru //
T02TD2625E:260b-11: dkyil 'khor rnams la khyad par du //
T02TD2625E:260b-12: thig gi cho gnyid kyis bri //
T02TD2625E:260b-13: khyed la gnas ni rnam nges pa'i //
T02TD2625E:260b-14: khyad par rgyas par ston pa ste ;
T02TD2625E:260b-15: / thams cad du ni sa rnam gsum //
T02TD2625E:260b-16: nan tan gyis ni yongs su brtag / ces pa dang /
T02TD2625E:260b-17: bla gab med dang dogs par ni //
T02TD2625E:260b-18: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2625E:260b-19: slob dpon gyis ni gzhan mi bri //
T02TD2625E:260b-22: phug tu yang ni bsgrub pa yin //
T02TD2625E:260b-23: sa phyogs dogs par mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:260b-24: khang rul gang du zlo can gyis //
T02TD2625E:260b-25: bsgrub pa brtsam par mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:260b-27: 'dir yang gnas chen po pa ni phyag na rdo rje mngon par dbang bskur pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:260b-28: tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:260b-29: ji bzhin zhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2625E:260b-30: gnas de byin gyis brlabs brtsam pa //
T02TD2625E:260b-32: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga 'di //
T02TD2625E:260b-33: ji lter rigs pa'i cho ga ste //
T02TD2625E:260b-34: gal te gtsug lag khang la sogs pa sngar longs spyod pa zhig yin na /
T02TD2625E:260b-35: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bzlas pa'i sbos chus gtong ba tsam gyis sbyangs la /
T02TD2625E:260b-36: sngar longs ma spyad pa zhig na ni spyang ba'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:260b-38: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2625E:260b-39: zhes bya ba la brten te /
T02TD2625E:260b-40: bsnyen pa dang sa'i rim pa rgyas par ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:260b-41: dang por slob dpon yon tan dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2625E:260b-42: slob mas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:260b-43: lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa na /
T02TD2625E:260b-44: slob dpon gyis ci khyod yo byad rnams tshogs sam ci ste ma yin zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:260b-45: gal te ma tshogs so zhes zer na /
T02TD2625E:261a-0: re zhig de la yo byad tshogs su @261a * //
T02TD2625E:261a-2: gal te ma lus par rnyed do zhes zer na /
T02TD2625E:261a-3: bag yod pa'i bsgo ba dang bsrung bar bya'o ste /
T02TD2625E:261a-4: kha cig ni tshogs la kha cig ni ma yin no zhes zer na ma tshogs pa btsal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:261a-5: bag yod par bsgo ste bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:261a-6: de la bsrung ba'i cho ga ni /
T02TD2625E:261a-7: slob ma'i lte bar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma la h'um 'od zer drag po dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:261a-8: de'i snying gar yang yi ge kam nag po las byung ba'i sdig ba sha za lta bu /
T02TD2625E:261a-9: mi sdug pa skra kham pa grol ba mche ba can /
T02TD2625E:261a-10: mi'u thung gcer bur bsams te /
T02TD2625E:261a-11: de nas lte pa'i h'um las drag po'i 'od zer byung bas sdig pa'i ngo bo de gzir nas sna'i rtsa mo nas 'thon te /
T02TD2625E:261a-12: slob ma'i mdun du bltas la /
T02TD2625E:261a-13: de nas lte ba'i nyi ma h'um dang bcas pa snying gar song zhing /
T02TD2625E:261a-14: h'um rdo rje gnod spyin nag po 'jigs su rung ba /
T02TD2625E:261a-15: lag pa g-yas dang g-yon na /
T02TD2625E:261a-16: mche ba dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin par bskyed la /
T02TD2625E:261a-17: slob ma'i snying gnas mdun du 'thon par bsams te /
T02TD2625E:261a-18: de nas slob dpon gyis aom badzra yaksha krodha p'a pam n+ye sa kh'a da kh'a da h'um phat ces bskul bas khro bo des sdig pa de ma lus par zos te /
T02TD2625E:261a-19: slar slob ma'i snying gar thim par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:261a-20: de nas stong pa nyid las slob ma kun du [*kun tu?] bzang por gyur pa'i snying gar zla ba la yig kham las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2625E:261a-22: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyang kyis gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:261a-23: ji srid dkyil 'khor chen po dbang ma bskur gyi bar du sdig pa'i las dang srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i las ma byed cig ces bsgo la /
T02TD2625E:261a-24: gnas gcig nyid du slob dpon gyi sngar ba stan pa'i tshul nyid kyis lhag pa'i lha'i sngags 'bum mam /
T02TD2625E:261a-26: dkyil 'khor so so'i sngags khri khri bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:261a-27: gal te lhas ngang ba thob na ni de nyid kyi tshe na'o //
T02TD2625E:261a-28: de ltar bsnyen pa bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:261a-29: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las /
T02TD2625E:261a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du //
T02TD2625E:261a-31: bya ba rnams ni des pas nyon //
T02TD2625E:261a-32: so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2625E:261a-33: tshul shes pas ni ci rigs par //
T02TD2625E:261b-0: rang @261b gi ting 'dzin la gnas te //
T02TD2625E:261b-1: rig sngags rgyal po stobs po che //
T02TD2625E:261b-2: yan lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba //
T02TD2625E:261b-3: go rims bzhin du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02TD2625E:261b-5: 'dir yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i tshig ni mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:261b-6: de bzhin du 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:261b-7: sngags pa rnams ni mthu shes nas //
T02TD2625E:261b-8: bsnyen pa las ni dngos grub btsal //
T02TD2625E:261b-10: 'di ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2625E:261b-11: de nas bdag gir bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:261b-12: gang du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byed par 'dod pa'i sa de'i bdag po /
T02TD2625E:261b-13: rgyal po la sogs pas ngang bar bya'i gzhan du ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:261b-14: ji skad du dkyil 'khor gyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:261b-15: sa yi bdag pos ngang na ni //
T02TD2625E:261b-16: slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2625E:261b-18: de nas sa'i bdag po mngon sum zhes bya ba las ngang ba thob nas /
T02TD2625E:261b-19: gang du dkyil 'khor bya bar 'dod pa der song ste /
T02TD2625E:261b-20: de na gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa la gtor ma bzang po byin la /
T02TD2625E:261b-21: sa 'di bdag la bslang shig ces bslang ste /
T02TD2625E:261b-22: chos bsgrags pa 'phags ba sa'i mdo las brjod pa /
T02TD2625E:261b-23: lto 'phye la ni mi gnod par //
T02TD2625E:261b-24: dgun zla 'bri nag po la sogs nas //
T02TD2625E:261b-25: brtsams te zla ba gsum gsum du //
T02TD2625E:261b-26: lto 'phye lho dang nub dang byang //
T02TD2625E:261b-27: shar du de yi mgo bo ste //
T02TD2625E:261b-28: g-yon pa'i zur gyis nyal ba yin //
T02TD2625E:261b-29: 'di ltos shes par byas la brko //
T02TD2625E:261b-30: mgo bo rgyab phyogs nas brkos pa'i //
T02TD2625E:261b-31: skyon no rgyas pa las shes bya //
T02TD2625E:261b-32: zhes gsungs pa'i rim pas dong khru gang tsam la dbus nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:261b-33: rgyal mtho gang zhig brkos te /
T02TD2625E:261b-35: slob dpon gom pa brgya myur bar phyir song ste /
T02TD2625E:261b-36: myur du log ba nas chu de dma' bar ma gyur na sa'i bdag po des byin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:261b-37: yang na der gtor ma spyin pa dang /
T02TD2625E:261b-40: rmi lam gyi mtshan ma thob par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:261b-41: de dag gis ma byin par ni der dkyil 'khor mi bya ste /
T02TD2625E:262a-0: ma byin par len pa'i nyes pa dang bar chad spang pa'i @262a * //
T02TD2625E:262a-2: 'di ni sa bdag gir bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:262a-3: de nas lha ma yin ma rungs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:262a-4: lha'i bu'i bdud dang log 'dren la sogs pa ched du sa'i bgegs byed pa de dag gzhom pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:262a-5: der mngon spyod kyi spyin sreg gi cho gas mi rus kyi phye ma khrag dang /
T02TD2625E:262a-6: dug dang bcas par bsreg ste mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma bkod la /
T02TD2625E:262a-7: slob dpon gyis rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer ram /
T02TD2625E:262a-8: 'chad par byed pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis sa'i lha mo mdog ser mo rab tu mdzes pa /
T02TD2625E:262a-9: lo bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod can ;
T02TD2625E:262a-10: lag pa gnyis na gser gyi bum pa 'dzin pa bkug la /
T02TD2625E:262a-11: yon chab dang bcas pa'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02TD2625E:262a-12: gtor ma aom pri thi w'i de w'i che ge mo pra t'itstsha sv'a h'a zhes pas phul te /
T02TD2625E:262a-13: skyob pa sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsol ba btab la ;
T02TD2625E:262a-14: de nas mkha' la bteg ste /
T02TD2625E:262a-15: dngos grub kyi bye brag las /
T02TD2625E:262a-19: sta zur dang pus mo nub tsam du dong ste de dang 'tsham pa'i rgyur brkos te /
T02TD2625E:262a-21: rdo la sogs pa bsal te /
T02TD2625E:262a-22: dri zhim po'i chu rdo rje khro bo'i sngags kyis btab pa gtor te /
T02TD2625E:262a-23: gtor ma byin la zhi ba'i spyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2625E:262a-24: dong gi gting du rin po che lnga dang 'bru lnga dang /
T02TD2625E:262a-25: sman lnga ras dkar pos so sor phur te /
T02TD2625E:262a-26: bum pa sar pa'i nang du bcug ste bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:262a-27: dong de sa de nyid kyis dgang ste /
T02TD2625E:262a-28: gal te mtho bar gyur na rab tu 'grub par ston cing /
T02TD2625E:262a-29: thad kar khengs kyang brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:262a-30: kha ma khengs na brtsam par mi bya ste /
T02TD2625E:262a-31: sngar lung gis kyang ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:262a-32: mkhas pas rin chen la sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:262a-33: sa gzhi snying po ldan par bya //
T02TD2625E:262a-34: thang bu la yang ci rigs par //
T02TD2625E:262a-35: sa rdzas gzhag pa'i 'og tu ste //
T02TD2625E:262a-36: cho ga de ni phyi rol du'o //
T02TD2625E:262a-39: 'bras so ba dang mon sran gre'u /
T02TD2625E:262a-40: nas dang gro dang til dang lnga //
T02TD2625E:262a-41: 'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2625E:262a-42: las rnams kun la 'di dag gsungs //
T02TD2625E:262a-43: sidha bya kri kri ka ni //
T02TD2625E:262a-44: ha sa de ba ha sa ste //
T02TD2625E:262b-0: sman @262b rnams kun zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2625E:262b-1: lnga po 'di rnams shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:262b-2: byi ru dang ni sa le sbram //
T02TD2625E:262b-3: dung dang mu tig nor bu ste //
T02TD2625E:262b-4: rin chen kun zhes bya ba la //
T02TD2625E:262b-5: lnga po 'di dag shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:262b-7: de nas rdul tshon ji tsam du dgye bar 'dod pa'i nyis 'gyur du /
T02TD2625E:262b-8: sa gzhi de rab tu 'thas par bcags pas /
T02TD2625E:262b-9: lag mthil ltar ma nyam par byas te /
T02TD2625E:262b-10: de nas ba'i rnam lnga dri zhim po'i chus byug par bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:262b-12: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa gzhi ni //
T02TD2625E:262b-13: byi dor legs byas legs par byugs //
T02TD2625E:262b-14: khro bo chen po'i bzlas pa yi //
T02TD2625E:262b-15: spos chus bsang gtor byas pa la //
T02TD2625E:262b-17: sa'i bye brag kha cig la ni de ltar bya ba mi spyar te /
T02TD2625E:262b-19: sa gzhi gang na 'thas pa dang //
T02TD2625E:262b-20: khang thog dang ni rdo leb dang //
T02TD2625E:262b-22: mtsho rnams kyi ni 'gram dag tu //
T02TD2625E:262b-23: sa gzhi spyang zhing brtag pa dag / nan tan du ni bya mi dgos //
T02TD2625E:262b-24: der ni zug rdu dbyung mi dgos //
T02TD2625E:262b-25: 'thas pas bcag kyang der mi dgos //
T02TD2625E:262b-26: mthon dman la sogs skyon rnams kyang //
T02TD2625E:262b-27: der ni dogs pa bskyed mi dgos //
T02TD2625E:262b-28: rang bzhin gnas pa'i sa gzhi la //
T02TD2625E:262b-29: byi dor legs par byas nas su //
T02TD2625E:262b-30: lag pas bya bas nas gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2625E:262b-31: de yi spyad pa de yin no //
T02TD2625E:262b-32: zug rdu'i nyes pa thams cad ni //
T02TD2625E:262b-33: gal te dbyung bar mi nus na //
T02TD2625E:262b-34: de ni gsang sngags nyid kyis su //
T02TD2625E:262b-35: spyang ba legs par byas par 'gyur /
T02TD2625E:262b-36: bsad pa yi ni las rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:262b-37: gdon rnams tshar gcod la sogs dang //
T02TD2625E:262b-38: drag shul spyod pa dag la yang //
T02TD2625E:262b-39: sa ni rab tu spyang mi dgos //
T02TD2625E:262b-40: khro bo k'i li k'i la yis //
T02TD2625E:262b-41: bsang gtor byas na sbyangs bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:262b-44: khang pa'am dri gtsang khang du ni //
T02TD2625E:262b-45: bsang gtor byas pas dag par bshad //
T02TD2625E:262b-46: de bas der ni sa mi brko //
T02TD2625E:262b-48: de nas sa'i lha mo bstims la /
T02TD2625E:262b-49: sa'i dbus su padma dang zla ba dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng gi h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje phra mo spros pas /
T02TD2625E:262b-50: sa phyogs de rdo rjer gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:262b-51: sna tshogs rdo rje nas rim gyis sa la bstims la /
T02TD2625E:263a-0: aom me di n'i badzra'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes @263a * //
T02TD2625E:263a-3: de nas slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus der stan 'jam zhing bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD2625E:263a-4: gtor ma byin la bdag nyid gzengs bstod par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:263a-5: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2625E:263a-6: bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas ;
T02TD2625E:263a-7: / lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02TD2625E:263a-8: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02TD2625E:263a-9: byang chub sems dang sems gcig par //
T02TD2625E:263a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2625E:263a-11: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD2625E:263a-12: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2625E:263a-13: bdag gi mchod spyin bla na med //
T02TD2625E:263a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2625E:263a-15: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2625E:263a-17: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02TD2625E:263a-18: spos snod lag tu thogs te /
T02TD2625E:263a-19: sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab pa ni //
T02TD2625E:263a-20: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2625E:263a-21: thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2625E:263a-22: sras bcas lnga ni gdugs 'das nas //
T02TD2625E:263a-23: sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD2625E:263a-24: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02TD2625E:263a-27: aa tsa le bi ma le /
T02TD2625E:263a-28: pra kri te pa ri shuddha sv'a h'a zhes pas so //
T02TD2625E:263a-29: de nas de rnams kyi spyan sngar /
T02TD2625E:263a-31: cho ga ma lus par byas la /
T02TD2625E:263a-32: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhir dmigs pa'i slob ma'am /
T02TD2625E:263a-33: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhir dmigs pa'i slob mas /
T02TD2625E:263a-34: phyogs bzhi nas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud thams cad kyi rtsa ba lta bu /
T02TD2625E:263a-35: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis /
T02TD2625E:263a-36: shar nas brtsams te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:263a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD2625E:263a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD2625E:263a-39: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /
T02TD2625E:263a-40: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2625E:263a-41: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD2625E:263a-42: mtshan min thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T02TD2625E:263a-43: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2625E:263a-44: zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung //
T02TD2625E:263b-0: ye shes spyod @263b pa rnam spyod ba //
T02TD2625E:263b-1: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2625E:263b-2: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD2625E:263b-3: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
T02TD2625E:263b-4: kun bzang thugs mchog kha los sgyur //
T02TD2625E:263b-5: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD2625E:263b-7: yang na tshigs su bcad pa dang po nyid bzlas shing brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:263b-8: yang na rgyud 'di nyid las ji ltar gsungs pa nyid lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2625E:263b-9: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2625E:263b-10: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2625E:263b-11: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2625E:263b-12: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02TD2625E:263b-13: 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga ni //
T02TD2625E:263b-14: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas bya //
T02TD2625E:263b-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed pa'i //
T02TD2625E:263b-16: rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug / dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba //
T02TD2625E:263b-17: rgyal 'di sangs rgyas sgrub byed yin //
T02TD2625E:263b-18: dngos grub kun gyi cho ga la //
T02TD2625E:263b-19: rdo rje dril bu rab tu bskul //
T02TD2625E:263b-20: cho ga lhag ma ma tshang yang //
T02TD2625E:263b-22: zhes bya ba spyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:263b-23: de nas bdag nyid gzengs bstod de /
T02TD2625E:263b-24: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2625E:263b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2625E:263b-26: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2625E:263b-27: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02TD2625E:263b-28: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste //
T02TD2625E:263b-29: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2625E:263b-31: h'um badzro da tishtha zhes brjod pas ji ltar bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg ste /
T02TD2625E:263b-32: stan las langs nas bdag nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar gyur pa'i mig gnyis su ma dang ta las mig g-yas g-yon nyi zla ser por byas te /
T02TD2625E:263b-34: rkang mthil gnyis su h'um las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje me'i 'od 'phro ba bsams te /
T02TD2625E:263b-35: rkang pa gang dang gang du bor ba de dang der rdo rje kun du [*kun tu?] rtse mo 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsams te stang stabs bya'o //
T02TD2625E:263b-36: de ni ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:263b-37: dang po kho nas yongs su gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:264a-1: nyid kyi stang stabs la 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:264a-2: lag pa g-yas pas bsgrims te /
T02TD2625E:264a-4: lag pa g-yon pas dril bu gsil nas /
T02TD2625E:264a-5: rdo rje'i dkyil 'gros kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi 'gying bag gis yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:264a-6: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2625E:264a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi 'gying bag gis bskor nas kyang /
T02TD2625E:264a-9: sdang ba'i lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02TD2625E:264a-10: gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:264a-11: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas ;
T02TD2625E:264a-12: slob ma che ge mo zhig gi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:264a-13: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:264a-14: sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mtshan 'di zhes bya ba 'di yis /
