T02TD2625E:264a-27: mi'am ci dang rigs sngags 'chang grub pa rgan po'am rgan mo'am /
T02TD2625E:264a-28: g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni /
T02TD2625E:264a-29: phyag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyis ye shes kyi rdo rje chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar bas mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes lan gsum brjod nas /
T02TD2625E:264a-30: stang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:264a-31: g-yas brkyang ba dang g-yon bskum pa dang /
T02TD2625E:264a-35: rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang /
T02TD2625E:264a-38: rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-0: rdo rje'i stang stabs @264b dang rdo rje gar dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-1: rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-4: sgo bzhi byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-6: bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi stang stabs dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-27: thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-30: mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-35: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-46: rgyal po'i phur bus gnas lngar bcing ba dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-48: dra ba dang ra bas mtshams bcad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:264b-49: phyogs bcing bde lta bus sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan la dbab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bya ste /
T02TD2625E:264b-50: 'di ni sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2625E:264b-52: // / de nas mtshan mo nang gi sa spyang bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:264b-53: aom p+h'u kham zhes brjod pas sa gzhi nam mkhar byas te /
T02TD2625E:264b-54: h'um lam h'um zhes brjod pas gser gyi rang bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2625E:264b-55: de'i dbus su padma nas badzra bandha h'um zhes ci nus bzlas pa'i bar du bya ste /
T02TD2625E:264b-56: de nas yang sa gzhi dri dang ba'i lci bas byugs la /
T02TD2625E:265a-0: phyogs mtshams brgyang du mar me brgyang dang bdug spos du ba 'thul ba @265a * //
T02TD2625E:265a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi sa la lag pa reg bzhin du /
T02TD2625E:265a-3: bdag gi bdag po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyang dang yi ge brgya pa lan brgya bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:265a-4: de nas de'i nub mo ni slob dpon rmi lam blta zhing /
T02TD2625E:265a-5: sta gon la gnas pa'i nub mo slob ma rmi lam blta'o //
T02TD2625E:265a-6: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las /
T02TD2625E:265a-7: de nas sngags pas langs nas su //
T02TD2625E:265a-8: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:265a-9: nub kyi phyogs su gnas nas su //
T02TD2625E:265a-10: nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas //
T02TD2625E:265a-11: byang chub sems ni dran byed cing //
T02TD2625E:265a-12: de nyid du ni nyal bar bya //
T02TD2625E:265a-13: de nas sngags pas rmi lam blta //
T02TD2625E:265a-14: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen nam //
T02TD2625E:265a-15: yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2625E:265a-16: sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:265a-17: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams la //
T02TD2625E:265a-19: bdag nyid la ni 'di skad du //
T02TD2625E:265a-20: sems can chen po bu khyod legs //
T02TD2625E:265a-21: dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces //
T02TD2625E:265a-22: spro ba skyed pa mthong yang rung //
T02TD2625E:265a-23: gal te mtshan ma ngan pa zhig mthong na //
T02TD2625E:265a-24: byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa la sogs pa bsrung ngo //
T02TD2625E:265a-25: slob ma rmi lam lta ba 'og nas 'chad do //
T02TD2625E:265a-26: 'di ni nang gi sa spyang ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2625E:265a-28: // / byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni //
T02TD2625E:265a-30: rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD2625E:265a-31: zhes bya ba'i bar ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:265a-32: them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang //
T02TD2625E:265a-34: sgo'i nye 'khor ri mo'i phyi rol cha chung gcig la tshon nag po ma yin pa'i ri mo bzhi bris te /
T02TD2625E:265a-35: kha cig na re mda' yab kyi phyi rol cha chung gcig la'o zhes zer na /
T02TD2625E:265a-36: gzhan dag ni bsgom pa'i dbang du bya'o /
T02TD2625E:265a-37: 'di bri ba ma yin no zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:265a-38: seng ge ban glang rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2625E:265a-39: zhes bya ba ni rta babs kyi cha dang po'i phyi rol gyi cha chung gnyis la mchod rten yin la /
T02TD2625E:265a-40: de'i 'og tu cha 'bri nag po gnyis la g-yas g-yon du /
T02TD2625E:265a-41: seng ge dang glang po cha chung re res mchod rten dang ma 'brel bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:265a-42: kha cig na re rta babs kyi sar nges par bzhon pa las 'bab pa yang /
T02TD2625E:265b-0: @265b rje btsun mchod rten gyi dbang las so zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:265b-2: sgo thams cad la de med kyang rta babs yod na nges par 'bab par rigs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:265b-3: 'jig rten nye bar spyod pa las yin la /
T02TD2625E:265b-4: blo dang ldan pa gus shing nga rgyal spangs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:265b-5: de gnyis ka med kyang de bas ches ring ba nas babs te /
T02TD2625E:265b-6: 'dir ni ma lus par myur du 'bab pas na /
T02TD2625E:265b-7: tva ra na ti ru ri ya tsa lanti zhes grags so //
T02TD2625E:265b-8: dar dang lnga ldi do shal phreng //
T02TD2625E:265b-10: dar dkar po srid du khru nyi shu rtsa lnga zheng du khru gang ba 'phyangs pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:265b-11: lnga ldi ni de nyid kha dog sna tshogs par rab tu gcus shing rtsibs la btags pas gzhal yas khang gi 'gul ba 'khor ba'o //
T02TD2625E:265b-12: do shal gyi phreng ba ni mu tig gi do shal dbus na rin po che yod pa dang med pa'am dbus dang mtha' na yod pa spel du 'phyang ba ste /
T02TD2625E:265b-13: do shal gyi do shal phyed pa yang mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:265b-14: de yang de dag gi bar na dar dang lnga ldi dang /
T02TD2625E:265b-15: dril bu dang ni rnga yab brgyan //
T02TD2625E:265b-17: de la dril bu ni sngar smos pa'i dar gyi rtse mo la btags pa'o //
T02TD2625E:265b-18: rnga ma ni rnga yab dkar po gser gyi yu ba can no //
T02TD2625E:265b-19: rdo rje rin chen padma dang //
T02TD2625E:265b-20: rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan //
T02TD2625E:265b-22: phyogs bzhi'i dbus kyi do shal bzhi'i dbus su /
T02TD2625E:265b-23: phyag rgya re re ste rang rang gi rigs phyogs der brten par ston pa'o //
T02TD2625E:265b-24: kha cig na re de dag nang du'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:265b-25: srad bu brgyang dang ldan pa dang //
T02TD2625E:265b-26: zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang dbus dang grva rnams kyi cha la 'dres par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:265b-27: phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2625E:265b-29: 'gram zhes bya ba 'phyar pa'i ngo bo ni /
T02TD2625E:265b-31: sgo khyud nang ma ni gang du khyams kyi mtha' thug pa'o //
T02TD2625E:265b-32: dgu yi char ni dgos pa la //
T02TD2625E:265b-33: sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya //
T02TD2625E:265b-35: 'khor lo rtsibs tshun chad la cha chen po dgur byas pa las sgo phyi'i sgo khyud dang bcas pa la ni cha chen po gsum ste /
T02TD2625E:265b-36: cha chung bcu gnyis btang ngo //
T02TD2625E:265b-37: de yang phye na sgo la ni cha chen phyed dang gnyis yin la /
T02TD2625E:266a-0: phyi'i sgo khyud la ni cha chen @266a * //
T02TD2625E:266a-2: logs re la cha chung gsum gsum yin te /
T02TD2625E:266a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di ni thig gi bya ba lugs gzhan kho na yin pas /
T02TD2625E:266a-4: gang du yang gzhan du drang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:266a-5: rdo rje srad bus thig gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:266a-6: zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi thig ma btab par sa'i thig 'ba' zhig 'de bas pa srid pa dang /
T02TD2625E:266a-7: sa la thig ma btab par dkyil 'khor 'dri ba srid pas de bzlog pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:266a-8: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i srad bus nam mkha'i thig gdab par ston cing /
T02TD2625E:266a-9: srad bu phal bas sa la thig gdab par yang ston la /
T02TD2625E:266a-10: de dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bag yod par byas te /
T02TD2625E:266a-11: de ltar yang dkyil 'khor spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:266a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang sngags kun //
T02TD2625E:266a-13: snang bar rjes su dran byed cing //
T02TD2625E:266a-14: gos dkar bgos shing ma yengs par //
T02TD2625E:266a-16: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:266a-17: thog ma nyid du bsang gtor bya //
T02TD2625E:266a-18: tshon sna lnga yi srad bu la //
T02TD2625E:266a-19: de dag nyid kyis brgyar bzlas te //
T02TD2625E:266a-20: sar pa shin tu gtsang ba dang //
T02TD2625E:266a-21: mdzes shing shin tu ran pa dang //
T02TD2625E:266a-22: dri zhim reg na bde ba dang //
T02TD2625E:266a-23: legs par bkal dang sra ba dang //
T02TD2625E:266a-24: sbom phra la sogs bkal nyes dang //
T02TD2625E:266a-25: 'dzur mdud med par gyur ba yi //
T02TD2625E:266a-26: thig skud me tog spos mchod pas //
T02TD2625E:266a-27: shes rab can gyis thig gdab po //
T02TD2625E:266a-28: bzang po'i rtags ni brtags nas su //
T02TD2625E:266a-29: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po ;
T02TD2625E:266a-30: / dkar po dmar po de bzhin ser //
T02TD2625E:266a-31: sngon po dang ni gnag dang lnga //
T02TD2625E:266a-32: tshon sna lnga yi srad bu bzhin //
T02TD2625E:266a-33: phye ma'i tshon rtsi de bzhin bya //
T02TD2625E:266a-34: dkon mchog gsum la mchod byas shing //
T02TD2625E:266a-35: lha rnams la yang phyag byas nas //
T02TD2625E:266a-36: mkhas pas srad bu bre bar bya //
T02TD2625E:266a-37: nang par nyi ma shar ba'i tshe //
T02TD2625E:266a-38: blo yis phyogs cha legs brtags la //
T02TD2625E:266a-39: dang por shar nas brtsams te gzung //
T02TD2625E:266a-40: slob dpon byang du kha bltas te //
T02TD2625E:266a-41: srad bu 'dzin pa de la blta //
T02TD2625E:266a-42: de nas phyogs bskor byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:266a-43: bdag nyid kyis ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-0: de yi 'og tu byang phyogs @266b su ;
T02TD2625E:266b-1: / mkhas bas srad bu bre bar bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-2: dang po bdag nyid me phyogs su //
T02TD2625E:266b-3: 'dug nas phyogs gnyis brtag par bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-4: de yi 'og tu rlung phyogs nas //
T02TD2625E:266b-5: phyogs gnyis su ni sred bu bre //
T02TD2625E:266b-6: bden bral dbang ldan grva gnyis nas //
T02TD2625E:266b-7: srad bu 'dzin pa blta bar bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-8: grva bzhi lham pa bsnyams nas su //
T02TD2625E:266b-9: rgya gram du ni srad bu bre //
T02TD2625E:266b-10: rgya gram thams cad bsnyams par bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-11: de ltar srad bu gtan la dbab //
T02TD2625E:266b-12: de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du /
T02TD2625E:266b-13: phur bu gcig kyang gdab par bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-14: grva bzhir phur bu bzhi gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:266b-16: mchod spyin shing gi phur bu dag / thur du rtse ba stan mngon bsngags pa //
T02TD2625E:266b-17: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga la //
T02TD2625E:266b-18: phyogs cha bzhin du gdab par bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-19: ltas ngan byung na dngos mi grub //
T02TD2625E:266b-20: srad bu chad na bla ma 'chi //
T02TD2625E:266b-23: de bas thams cad nan tan bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-24: mkhas pas legs par thig gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:266b-26: de ltar spyir gyur par lung gis brjod nas /
T02TD2625E:266b-27: da ni rang gi gzhung gis ye shes rim gyi thig ji ltar gdab ce na /
T02TD2625E:266b-29: gdul bya'i dbang las dkyil 'khor dag / khru gang sogs gsungs ji skad du //
T02TD2625E:266b-30: rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs mthar //
T02TD2625E:266b-31: tshang nges pa ni med par ba stan //
T02TD2625E:266b-32: de dag tu yang slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2625E:266b-33: ye shes thig bral bri mi bya //
T02TD2625E:266b-34: de phyir ye shes thig gdab rim //
T02TD2625E:266b-35: mkhas pas dga' skyed byed par bshad //
T02TD2625E:266b-36: de la ye shes kyi thig 'de bas par 'dod pa'i bla mas dang por ras bal dang bal la sogs pa gtsang ma blangs te /
T02TD2625E:266b-37: grong gi chos kyis sma ma bab pa'i bu mos 'khal du gzhug pa'am /
T02TD2625E:266b-39: srid du dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur la /
T02TD2625E:266b-40: sboms su sgo'i nyi shu cha yod par ro //
T02TD2625E:266b-41: de yang lnga sgril lam nyi shu rtsa lnga sgril lam /
T02TD2625E:266b-42: dkyil 'khor de nyid lha mo ji snyed yod pa de snyed du bsgril ba'o //
T02TD2625E:266b-43: de nas so sor dri zhim po'i phye ma dang /
T02TD2625E:267a-0: yungs kar gyi phye ma dang ldan @267a * //
T02TD2625E:267a-5: nag po rnams bsgos pa'i dru bur byas la /
T02TD2625E:267a-6: bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:267a-7: de nas snga ma'i mdog gi rim pas dru bu de dag rtag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:267a-10: don yod par grub pa dang /
T02TD2625E:267a-11: mi bskyod pa rnams bsgrub ste /
T02TD2625E:267a-12: de yang dang por aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas /
T02TD2625E:267a-13: de dag stong pa nyid du byas la /
T02TD2625E:267a-14: de nas snga ma'i gnas su padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes pa lnga /
T02TD2625E:267a-18: ljang gu dang nag po rnams kyi mdog can rnams bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:267a-19: de nas de las 'od zer spro ba dang /
T02TD2625E:267a-20: bsdu ba'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lngar rim bzhin du bskyed de /
T02TD2625E:267a-21: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas snang bar byas pa'am /
T02TD2625E:267a-22: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs kar yang bhr'um la sogs pa'i sa bon lnga bltas te /
T02TD2625E:267a-23: de dag yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi mdog dang mthun ba'i ye shes kyi srad bu gnas par bsams te /
T02TD2625E:267a-24: de'i 'og tu de dag la ye shes kyi srad bu sngags 'dis bslang bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:267a-25: aom badzra aa satva badzra s'u tram me pra yatstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra na ya h'um zhes pa dang /
T02TD2625E:267a-26: de bzhin du ming gi gzhi brje ba'i sngags lngas bslang zhing /
T02TD2625E:267a-27: de ltar bslang ma thag tu rang gi phyag la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga srad bu lngar gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:267a-28: de nas rang gi mig gnyis su dza las byung ba'i nyi ma zla ba g-yas dang g-yon du bkod de /
T02TD2625E:267a-29: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig gi lta stangs las byung ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyus /
T02TD2625E:267a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas gnas pa'i ye shes kyi srad bu rnams bkug ste /
T02TD2625E:267a-31: phyag rgya la gnas pa'i srad bu la sogs so sor bstim mo //
T02TD2625E:267a-32: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi slob ma cig gis srad bu lnga'i sna nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:267b-0: slob dpon @267b gyis kyang sna lnga nas bzung la bsnyams te /
T02TD2625E:267b-1: 'ju ra bu dang mdud pa med par byas la /
T02TD2625E:267b-2: aom chos kun tha dad rjes su 'jug / chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'jug / chos kun rjes su zhugs pa ste //
T02TD2625E:267b-4: h'um zhes brjod de bsgrim mo //
T02TD2625E:267b-5: bsgrims nas dri zhim po'i chus sbangs te /
T02TD2625E:267b-6: yi ge gsum nang bsres la /
T02TD2625E:267b-7: gser la sogs pa snod du bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:267b-8: me tog dang dri la sogs pas mchod la lag pas bkab ste /
T02TD2625E:267b-9: aom a'a: bighn'am ta krit h'um phat ces pas mang du bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:267b-10: de nas srad bu de rdo rje la dkris la /
T02TD2625E:267b-11: slob dpon bdag nyid kyis lte ba'i thad kar bzung la /
T02TD2625E:267b-12: slob ma de nyid kyis lhan cig gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:267b-13: 'de bas na aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD2625E:267b-14: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i dus lags so zhes brjod cing gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:267b-15: des kyang sangs rgyas thams cad bskul te byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir byon par bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:267b-16: de la bdag cag gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni /
T02TD2625E:267b-17: ye shes kyi thig la tshangs thig gcig tsam mam /
T02TD2625E:267b-18: tshangs thig dang zur thig tsam gyis chog par gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:267b-19: gzhan dag ni phyogs thig dang rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yang bzhed do //
T02TD2625E:267b-20: de dag gi lugs las ni /
T02TD2625E:267b-23: btang ba la sogs pa yang bya'o //
T02TD2625E:267b-24: sa'i thig ni gzhung rgyas par gzhan du rtogs par sla bas bdag gis 'dir mi bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:267b-25: ye shes kyi thig de ni aom a'a: h'um mu: bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:267b-26: re zhig rgyud 'di nyid kyi dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:267b-27: sa'i thig ji lta ba zhig yin pa cung zad dpyad de /
T02TD2625E:267b-29: dkyil 'khor de'i tshad ji tsam ba la phyogs re re la yang cha chung brgyang cu rtsa brgyang par bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:267b-30: de la rim pa gsum par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:267b-32: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02TD2625E:267b-33: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo rtsibs tshun chad kyi thig gdab pa'o //
T02TD2625E:267b-36: bslab pa gsum ston par byed pa'i lte ba dang /
T02TD2625E:268a-2: de nyid gsal bar ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:268a-3: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2625E:268a-4: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
T02TD2625E:268a-6: lte ba dang rtsibs rten dang /
T02TD2625E:268a-7: rtsibs ni rim pa gsum mo //
T02TD2625E:268a-8: de dang ldan par bya ba ni bslab pa gsum mtshon pa yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:268a-9: rtsibs ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i lte ba la 'byar ba rtse mo zhum pa'o //
T02TD2625E:268a-10: nyis 'gyur nyid du bya ba ni lte ba'i phyed kyi phyed la cha chung drug yod pa bas /
T02TD2625E:268a-11: nyis 'gyur te phyed kyis chung bar byas te /
T02TD2625E:268a-12: de bzhin du rtsibs rten kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:268a-13: des na rtsibs rten dang rtsibs dag la /
T02TD2625E:268a-14: cha chung gsum gsum gtang zhing /
T02TD2625E:268a-15: lte ba la cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:268a-16: 'dir slob dpon kha cig na re lugs gzhan du /
T02TD2625E:268a-17: dkyil 'khor nyis rim sum rim mam //
T02TD2625E:268a-18: bzhi'am mang por bya ba la //
T02TD2625E:268a-19: phyi rim gang yin de la ni //
T02TD2625E:268a-20: sgo gcig pa dang rgya cher bya //
T02TD2625E:268a-21: gzhan gyi phyogs kyi cha bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:268a-22: sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bya //
T02TD2625E:268a-23: yang na thams cad dogs med par //
T02TD2625E:268a-24: sgo re re zhig bya ba yin //
T02TD2625E:268a-25: snying po'i dkyil 'khor nges par ni //
T02TD2625E:268a-26: rab tu bzang por sgo bzhir bya //
T02TD2625E:268a-27: zhes bya ba gsungs pa la brten pas /
T02TD2625E:268a-28: rim pa gsum pa lung tha ma 'dod do //
T02TD2625E:268a-29: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni //
T02TD2625E:268a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:268a-31: ma lus par brjod zin mod kyi /
T02TD2625E:268a-32: rdul tshon gyi dbang du byas te yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:268a-34: rdul tshon ji srid du dgye bar 'dod pa'i sa'i cha la phyogs thams cad du cha chen po'i nyi shu rtsa gnyis gnas par re zhig de snyed kyi mtshan ma tsam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:268a-35: de rnams re re la yang cha bar ma re re'i ri mo bya'o //
T02TD2625E:268a-36: de rnams re re la yang cha chung re re'i ri mo bya ste /
T02TD2625E:268a-37: de ltar phyogs re re la yang cha chen po nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2625E:268a-38: cha bar ma bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:268a-39: cha chung brgyang cu rtsa brgyang du yang 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:268a-40: de yang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni cha chen po dgu'o //
T02TD2625E:268b-0: ri mo'i @268b sa nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:268b-2: cha chen po lnga dang cha chung gcig go //
T02TD2625E:268b-3: phyi'i dkyil 'khor khor yug chen po dang bcas pa la ni /
T02TD2625E:268b-4: cha chung bzhi dang yang cha chung gcig go //
T02TD2625E:268b-5: de la snying po la ni cha chung nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste /
T02TD2625E:268b-6: de nas cha chung gsum rtsibs rten du bskor zhing /
T02TD2625E:268b-7: cha chung gsum la rtsibs bya'o //
T02TD2625E:268b-9: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02TD2625E:268b-11: lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2625E:268b-12: rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya //
T02TD2625E:268b-13: zhes gsungs te sngar bzhin du dpyad do //
T02TD2625E:268b-14: de nas cha chung gcig la rdo rje phreng bas khor yug chung du ltar bskor ro //
T02TD2625E:268b-15: de'i ri mo phyi ma la gru chad byas la /
T02TD2625E:268b-16: dbus su sgo dang phyi rol gyi sgo khyud bcas pa la zheng du cha chen po gsum spyin te /
T02TD2625E:268b-18: dgu yi char ni bgos pa la //
T02TD2625E:268b-19: sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya //
T02TD2625E:268b-21: sngar zhib tu dpyad de de de yang ri mo'i sa cha chung gcig go //
T02TD2625E:268b-22: de nas khyams la cha bar ma gcig ste /
T02TD2625E:268b-23: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
T02TD2625E:268b-24: byams pa la sogs mchog chen rnams //
T02TD2625E:268b-26: de nas rin po che'i rtsig pa la cha chung gcig go //
T02TD2625E:268b-27: de'i phyi rol du dra ba dang /
T02TD2625E:268b-28: dra ba phyed pa la cha bar ma gcig go //
T02TD2625E:268b-29: de'i phyi rol du mda' yab la cha chung gcig go //
T02TD2625E:268b-30: de nas cha chung dor ba'i cha chen po gcig la rta babs te /
T02TD2625E:268b-31: bang rim tha ma la cha chen po gsum las lhag ma la re re bri'o //
T02TD2625E:268b-32: de nas cha chung bzhi la 'khor lo dang gdugs dag go //
T02TD2625E:268b-33: de nas de'i phyi rol du shin tu nye bar ma yin par me 'od dang padma dang rdo rje cha gsum mo //
T02TD2625E:268b-34: de nas cha chung bzhi po rim pa re re'o //
T02TD2625E:268b-35: des na cha chung gcig la khor yug chen po'o //
T02TD2625E:268b-36: ka ba yang dbus dang mthar cha chung re re la'o //
T02TD2625E:268b-37: sgo'i zheng du cha chung drug go //
T02TD2625E:268b-38: phyi'i sgo khyud kyi cha chung drug go //
T02TD2625E:268b-39: dbu ma'i dbu mar cha chung brgyang do //
T02TD2625E:268b-40: de ltar mtshan ma la zhi par dpyad de /
T02TD2625E:268b-41: ma 'khrul ba ltar na tshangs thig dang /
T02TD2625E:269a-2: de nas ma lus bar dbus nas gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:269a-3: de ltar thig btab nas rdul tshon dgye ba ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:269a-4: dbus kyi phyogs su zhes bya ba nas yang na ming yang rung zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:269a-5: khro bo ni gshin rje gshed do //
T02TD2625E:269a-6: mngags pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //
T02TD2625E:269a-7: pho nya ni rta mgrin no //
T02TD2625E:269a-8: sogs zhes bya ba ni bran zhes bya ba 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'o //
T02TD2625E:269a-9: de las gzhan gyi tshig gi don ni sngar bshad zin te //
T02TD2625E:269a-10: de la dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rdul tshon dgye ba ji lta bu yin pa 'dir lung la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:269a-11: dkyil 'khor bdag gi cho ga ni //
T02TD2625E:269a-12: rnam pa gsum po ma lus pa //
T02TD2625E:269a-13: lha rnams thams cad dgod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:269a-14: rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste //
T02TD2625E:269a-15: dang bo gzugs su bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:269a-16: gnyis pa phyag rgya'i gzugs su bri //
T02TD2625E:269a-17: gsum pa gnas dang rten dag tu //
T02TD2625E:269a-18: bri ba'i cho ga yongs su bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:269a-19: mi mkhas pa ni phyag rgya'i gzugs //
T02TD2625E:269a-20: cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02TD2625E:269a-21: mkhas pas kyang ni phye ma yis //
T02TD2625E:269a-22: yan lag rdzogs pa rab tu dga' //
T02TD2625E:269a-23: yan lag rdzogs shing rgyas byas nas //
T02TD2625E:269a-24: cho ga'i las la ring du thogs //
T02TD2625E:269a-25: gzugs rnams legs par bsgrubs na ni //
T02TD2625E:269a-26: mang po rnams ni zin mi 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:269a-27: yan lag nyams na byin mi rlob //
T02TD2625E:269a-28: dngos mi 'grub par rab tu bshad //
T02TD2625E:269a-29: de lta bas na mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:269a-30: phyag rgya'i gzugs su lha rnams dgod //
T02TD2625E:269a-33: gang du lha rnams gzugs dag tu //
T02TD2625E:269a-34: dgod par bshad pa de yang ni //
T02TD2625E:269a-35: phyag rgya'ang gnas su nges par bya //
T02TD2625E:269a-36: de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2625E:269a-37: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2625E:269a-38: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma smos kyang //
T02TD2625E:269a-39: cho ga bzhin du bri bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:269a-40: de ltar phyag rgya dgod pa 'di ;
T02TD2625E:269a-41: / dgod pa gnyis par bshad pa yin //
T02TD2625E:269a-42: stan du dgong ba'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2625E:269a-43: 'di las gzhan pa gsum par bshad //
T02TD2625E:269a-44: dkyil 'khor dag gi nang du ni /
T02TD2625E:269a-45: tshon rtsi phye mas thig le bri //
T02TD2625E:269a-46: dkyil 'khor dag ni tshad las ni //
T02TD2625E:269a-47: kho ra khor yug rgya cher bskor //
T02TD2625E:269b-0: @269b rigs kyi bdag po lha rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:269b-1: go rims bzhin du de ltar bya //
T02TD2625E:269b-2: lha rnams gzhan gyi gdan rnams kyi //
T02TD2625E:269b-3: phyi yi cho ga bshad pa ni //
T02TD2625E:269b-4: zlum po'am yang na gru bzhi ru //
T02TD2625E:269b-5: thog mar stan ni dgod par bya //
T02TD2625E:269b-6: de la de yi sngags bzlas shing //
T02TD2625E:269b-7: de yi steng du mkhas pas dgod ;
T02TD2625E:269b-8: / phyi rol du ni thig le la //
T02TD2625E:269b-9: lha rnams ming gis smos te dgod //
T02TD2625E:269b-10: thams cad thig ler gnas byas nas //
T02TD2625E:269b-11: spyan drangs pa ni brtsam par bya //
T02TD2625E:269b-12: 'di ni stan du dgod pa ste //
T02TD2625E:269b-13: gsum par yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2625E:269b-14: rings sam yang na mi nus na //
T02TD2625E:269b-15: stan du dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor bya //
T02TD2625E:269b-16: rigs kyi bdag po gsum rnams kyi //
T02TD2625E:269b-17: gsang sngags thog mar bkod nas su //
T02TD2625E:269b-18: dkyil 'khor nang du mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:269b-19: lhag ma rnams ni phyag rgya bri //
T02TD2625E:269b-20: phyi rol tu ni stan rnams bri //
T02TD2625E:269b-21: 'di ni spyi bo'i cho ga yin //
T02TD2625E:269b-22: gzugs rnams legs par ma lcogs na //
T02TD2625E:269b-23: nyes pa sngar ni bshad ba yin //
T02TD2625E:269b-24: lha rnams bstod par 'gyur bas na //
T02TD2625E:269b-25: cho ga tha ma 'ang mi shes so //
T02TD2625E:269b-26: phyag rgya rnams su gang bkod pa //
T02TD2625E:269b-27: bar ma rab tu bsgrags pa ni //
T02TD2625E:269b-28: khyad par du ni de sngags te //
T02TD2625E:269b-29: de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ;
T02TD2625E:269b-30: / phyag rgya bris na 'ang bde bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:269b-31: phyag rgya yang na de nyid lta //
T02TD2625E:269b-32: de bas mkhas pas nan tan du //
T02TD2625E:269b-33: dkyil 'khor du ni phyag rgya bri //
T02TD2625E:269b-36: tshogs pa bsrung bar byas pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:269b-37: phyogs gcig tu ni bkod nas su //
T02TD2625E:269b-38: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bklag / gus par yang ni phyag byas nas //
T02TD2625E:269b-39: 'phags pa'i tshogs kun bsams nas ni //
T02TD2625E:269b-40: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni //
T02TD2625E:269b-41: lcags ni sna lnga'i phye ma ste //
T02TD2625E:269b-42: mkhas pas dkar po la sogs pa la'o //
T02TD2625E:269b-43: dad cing yon tan ldan pa yis //
T02TD2625E:269b-44: slob mas rin chen phye ma bri //
T02TD2625E:269b-45: rin chen lcags rnams ma 'byor na //
T02TD2625E:269b-46: s'a lu btags pa'i 'bras phyes bya //
T02TD2625E:269b-47: tshon rtsi zhib mo sngar bshad pas //
T02TD2625E:269b-49: rdo yi khams ni sna tshogs kyang //
T02TD2625E:269b-50: phye ma'i gor ni spyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:270a-0: de ltar rnam pa bzhi po @270a * //
T02TD2625E:270a-2: / phye ma'i gor ni bsgres pa yin //
T02TD2625E:270a-3: lcags rnams kun dang rin chen dang //
T02TD2625E:270a-5: dkyil 'khor kun gyi las rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:270a-6: phyi ma'i don du spyar bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-7: dam tshig la ni lcags kyis shes //
T02TD2625E:270a-8: rin chen las byung dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2625E:270a-9: s'a lu'i phye ma zhib pa la //
T02TD2625E:270a-10: khams las byung ba rgyas pa la //
T02TD2625E:270a-11: drag shul spyod pa khyad par du //
T02TD2625E:270a-12: thal ba la sogs bya bar shis //
T02TD2625E:270a-13: phye ma rnams kyi bye brag gis //
T02TD2625E:270a-14: cho ga'i rim par ba stan pa 'di //
T02TD2625E:270a-15: byang shar mtshams nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2625E:270a-16: phye ma dag ni dgye bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-17: rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba'am //
T02TD2625E:270a-18: yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'am //
T02TD2625E:270a-19: lhung bzed phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'am //
T02TD2625E:270a-20: yang na rig byed lag pas bri //
T02TD2625E:270a-21: dkar po dang ni dgye bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-22: de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye //
T02TD2625E:270a-23: de nas ser po dgye bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-24: de yi 'og tu ljang gu dgye //
T02TD2625E:270a-25: sngags pas kun gyi phyi rol du //
T02TD2625E:270a-26: tshon rtsi nag po dgye bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-27: g-yas su bskor zhing rgyun mi 'chad //
T02TD2625E:270a-28: thams cad mnyam zhing bar chad med //
T02TD2625E:270a-29: ngan pa dang ni nyams pa dang //
T02TD2625E:270a-30: ma snyoms pa dang bar chad na //
T02TD2625E:270a-32: de bas nan tan bskyed de bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-33: mkhas pas phye ma dgye bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-34: phyogs rnams kun du [*kun tu?] mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:270a-35: dbus su sgo ni gdod par bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-36: ngos gnyis su ni cha dag kyang //
T02TD2625E:270a-37: bzhi bzhi dag ni dor bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-38: cha bsgo chen po stegs bur bcas //
T02TD2625E:270a-39: cung zad cig ni lhag par bya ;
T02TD2625E:270a-40: / chab sgo gzhan rnams gcad pa ni //
T02TD2625E:270a-41: phye ma dkar po dag gis su //
T02TD2625E:270a-42: sgo yi dbus kyi cha dag tu //
T02TD2625E:270a-43: ri mo phra mo bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270a-44: dang por tshon rtsi sna lngas bri //
T02TD2625E:270a-45: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa sna gsum gyis //
T02TD2625E:270a-46: gsum pa phye ma dkar po yis //
T02TD2625E:270a-47: chig rkyang du ni bri bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:270a-48: gzhan yang gang dag kha cig tu //
T02TD2625E:270a-49: ri mo gcig pa'ang de bzhin te //
T02TD2625E:270a-50: phal cher gang dag bshad pa ni //
T02TD2625E:270a-51: de dag thams cad ri mo gcig / ces gsungs pa la /
T02TD2625E:270a-53: sems can khams ni zhen byed cing //
T02TD2625E:270a-54: 'di ni chos dbyings ro yin par //
T02TD2625E:270b-0: @270b sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te //
T02TD2625E:270b-1: de phyir 'di ni tshon zhes bya //
T02TD2625E:270b-2: tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270b-3: phyi rol nas ni tshon mi dgye //
T02TD2625E:270b-4: dkar po thog mar gtang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270b-5: de yi 'og tu dmar bo ste //
T02TD2625E:270b-6: de nas ser po gtang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:270b-7: de yi 'og tu ljang gu btang //
T02TD2625E:270b-8: kun gyi nang rol nag po ste //
T02TD2625E:270b-9: tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad //
T02TD2625E:270b-11: de la tshon byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa ni /
T02TD2625E:270b-12: thig skud byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa lta bu las /
T02TD2625E:270b-13: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcas te /
T02TD2625E:270b-15: spyar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab cing //
T02TD2625E:270b-17: tshon gyi cha lhag ma yang aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:270b-18: de la 'dir lung dang rjes su mthun par phyag rgya dgod par 'dod pa na /
T02TD2625E:270b-19: snying po'i dbus su sna tshogs padma la 'khor lo dkar po'o //
T02TD2625E:270b-20: de bzhin du nang gi dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma la /
T02TD2625E:270b-21: sngar bshad pa'i mdog dang mthun pa'i rang rang gi mtshan ma bri ste /
T02TD2625E:270b-22: shar gyi re'u mig la rdo rje'am ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:270b-23: lhor rin po che ma rgad cha dgu pa'o //
T02TD2625E:270b-25: byang du sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD2625E:270b-26: grva bzhir ni mig gi 'bras bu dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-27: rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-30: shar nas brtsams te rtsibs bcu drug la /
T02TD2625E:270b-31: rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang ;
T02TD2625E:270b-32: / rin chen rgyal mtshan nyi ma 'dzum //
T02TD2625E:270b-34: las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas //
T02TD2625E:270b-36: rtsibs mchan gyi grva bzhi la rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-37: rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-39: gar gyi lag pa dag go //
T02TD2625E:270b-40: phyi rol gyi grva bzhir dri'i dung phor dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-41: me tog gi gzhong bu dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-43: mar me'i mchod sdong dag go //
T02TD2625E:270b-44: sgo bzhir ni lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2625E:270b-46: lcags sgrog dang dril bu dag go //
T02TD2625E:270b-47: de nas khyams la dgod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:271a-0: shar sgo dang 'brel pas sna tshogs padma @271a * //
T02TD2625E:271a-2: de'i rjes su sna tshogs padma bzhi la /
T02TD2625E:271a-4: ngos gcig tu padma'i 'dab ma drug la lhung bzed drug go //
T02TD2625E:271a-10: sna tshogs rdo rje dang bye brag go //
T02TD2625E:271a-11: de dag gi bar bar du mchod pas lag pa brel ba'i lha mo rnams so //
T02TD2625E:271a-12: kha cig na re dkyil 'khor 'di sgo gsum lha'i snam bu dang bcas par bya ba las /
T02TD2625E:271a-13: 'di rnams sgo gnyis pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:271a-14: de nyid du rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dgod do zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:271a-15: de nas phyi rol du rim ba dang po'i phyogs bzhir /
T02TD2625E:271a-16: gling ri rab kyi mdog dang mthun pa bzhir /
T02TD2625E:271a-17: rdo rje dang padma dang rtse gsum pa dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-19: rim pa gnyis pa la dbang ldan du //
T02TD2625E:271a-20: rtse gsum dkar po gnyis so //
T02TD2625E:271a-21: shar stod du pi wang ngam /
T02TD2625E:271a-23: de dang 'brel par cang te'u dkar po dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-28: lho stod du dbyug to sngon po ste /
T02TD2625E:271a-29: de nam mkha'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-30: dra ba rdo rje can no //
T02TD2625E:271a-31: de nas pe con sngon po ste /
T02TD2625E:271a-32: de'i rjes su thod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-42: yang na sor mo bcu bsnol ba 'ba' zhig bri'o //
T02TD2625E:271a-43: de'i rjes nyid du dbyug to dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-50: 'di dag ni dbang phyug chen po'am /
T02TD2625E:271a-51: chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i 'khor du yang rung bar bri'o //
T02TD2625E:271a-52: de nas lho nub tu ral gri'o //
T02TD2625E:271a-53: de nyid du yang ral gri dang lce'o //
T02TD2625E:271a-54: nub stod du rdo rje'am zhags pa ste /
T02TD2625E:271a-60: nub byang du ba dan dkar po dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-61: rtse mo can gyi ri dud ka'o //
T02TD2625E:271a-62: byang stod du dbyug to ste /
T02TD2625E:271a-63: de nas mche ba rdo rje can dang /
T02TD2625E:271a-65: de nas rim pa gsum pa la /
T02TD2625E:271b-1: mtshams bzhir dbyug pa brgyang dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-2: phyogs bzhir yon chab kyi phyag rgya bdun bdun phyogs kyi dbyug pa re re'i rjes su bri'o //
T02TD2625E:271b-3: rim pa bzhi pa la sngar ba stan pa rnams ming du bri zhing //
T02TD2625E:271b-4: sngar gzugs dngos su smras pa rnams ni gzugs nyid du'o //
T02TD2625E:271b-5: 'dir ba stan pa dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshad kyi man ngag kyang ba stan zin to //
T02TD2625E:271b-6: phyi rol gyi grva rnams padma'i tshal dang shing dang mtsho dang bya bkra shis pa rnams bri'o //
T02TD2625E:271b-7: phyi rol gyi cha chung la ni khor yug chen po ltar rdo rje phreng ba bri'o //
T02TD2625E:271b-8: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po dgod pa byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad rnams nye bar dgod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:271b-9: de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2625E:271b-10: bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang //
T02TD2625E:271b-11: gdugs dang rda yab lnga ldi dang //
T02TD2625E:271b-12: 'phan dang sna tshogs na bza' mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:271b-13: gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:271b-14: brgyang dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:271b-15: dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i //
T02TD2625E:271b-16: bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:271b-19: rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus //
T02TD2625E:271b-20: rab tu bkang ste gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:271b-21: zhes bya ba smos pa ni rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-24: sems dpa' bcu drug gi bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-25: sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'i gcig dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-26: bdug pa la sogs pa'i bzhi'i gcig sgo skyong rnams kyi gcig ste /
T02TD2625E:271b-27: de ltar bum pa bcu drug gam /
T02TD2625E:271b-28: de ma 'byor na rnam par rgyal ba dang rigs bzhi lha mo dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-29: sems dpa' rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-30: mchod pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02TD2625E:271b-31: sgo skyong rnams kyi gcig dang brgyang do //
T02TD2625E:271b-33: spyir rigs re re la re re ste lnga'o //
T02TD2625E:271b-34: de yang gal te ma 'byor na ;
T02TD2625E:271b-35: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gcig pus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2625E:271b-36: las kyi bum pa ni thams cad du bzhag ste des na bum pa gnyis ni med par nam yang mi rung ngo //
T02TD2625E:271b-37: mar me me tog bum pa dang //
T02TD2625E:271b-38: zhes bya ba'i bum pa 'di ni bkang ba'i bum pa ste /
T02TD2625E:272a-2: / de la dbang bskur ba'i bum pa rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:272a-3: dang po stong pa nyid las yi ge pam dkar po las zhabs gdub sor re ba /
T02TD2625E:272a-4: ltor chu yul ma ga dh'a'i bre gang shong ba /
T02TD2625E:272a-5: mgrin pa sor bzhi pa la phra rab pa /
T02TD2625E:272a-7: sor gcig gdong la yod ba ;
T02TD2625E:272a-8: dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga can /
T02TD2625E:272a-9: sngar smos pa'i rin po che dang /
T02TD2625E:272a-11: ras dkar pos mgul ba bcings pa /
T02TD2625E:272a-12: spos kyi chu nyung zad dang ldan pa las /
T02TD2625E:272a-13: chu la sogs pa stong par byed pa la yang der sa bon lha ji snyed pa bskyed de /
T02TD2625E:272a-14: ye shes kyi lha rnams bstims la /
T02TD2625E:272a-16: de ji ltar nus pas bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:272a-17: mjug tu dri'i chu blugs pas reg pa las chur gyur par byas la /
T02TD2625E:272a-18: bya ba la bab kyi bar du thun mtshams gsum du bzlas so //
T02TD2625E:272a-19: mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:272a-21: bza' dang btung ba spyar legs dang //
T02TD2625E:272a-22: bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:272a-24: gnod spyin srin po kha zas su //
T02TD2625E:272a-25: gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /'byung po pa dang klu dang lha //
T02TD2625E:272a-26: mi dang mi min de bzhin te //
T02TD2625E:272a-27: me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:272a-28: 'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas //
T02TD2625E:272a-31: rgyu sna tshogs las byas te /
T02TD2625E:272a-32: rang rang gi 'dod pa dang mthun par byas la /
T02TD2625E:272a-33: 'byung po la zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:272a-34: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma cig car spyin pa ste /
T02TD2625E:272a-35: de bas na 'og nas de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma zhes bya ba dang spyar te /
T02TD2625E:272a-36: de yang 'byung po pa'i gtor ma ni /
T02TD2625E:272a-39: sran chan til gyi pis ta ga //
T02TD2625E:272a-41: cung zad sngon las cung zad dang //
T02TD2625E:272a-42: me tog 'bras yos chur bcas ba ;
T02TD2625E:272a-43: /'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma ste //
T02TD2625E:272a-44: phyi rol 'byung po thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:272a-46: zhes 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las gsungs pa'i gtor ma'o //
T02TD2625E:272a-47: sems can bkres shing skom la btung ba dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-0: 'di'i ming @272b dang zhes bya ba smos pa dang spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:272b-1: phyogs la gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag / de yi gtor ma rjes su mthun par bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-3: 'di yi gnod spyin srin po'i kha zas su //
T02TD2625E:272b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lhag ma rnams spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:272b-5: de la rjes su mthun pa'i gtor ma ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2625E:272b-6: shar du me tog phrang dmar de bzhin spos //
T02TD2625E:272b-7: 'bras chan dmar po 'ang de bzhin te //
T02TD2625E:272b-8: ba dan dmar po 'ang spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-9: tsan dan dmar po nyid dag dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-10: skud pa dmar po dag dang ni //
T02TD2625E:272b-11: de dag thams cad spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-14: me tog dri dang me tog phreng //
T02TD2625E:272b-15: mar me yang ni de la spyin //
T02TD2625E:272b-17: chang dang 'bras chan spyin du gzhug / gdugs dkar bsang bye srad bu dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-18: de bzhin me tog phreng dkar rnams //
T02TD2625E:272b-20: lhor ni kri sa ra dang byugs pa'i zas ;
T02TD2625E:272b-21: / sha btsos de bzhin rjen pa dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-22: me tog spos dang gtor ma dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-23: me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2625E:272b-24: gtor ma de dag bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2625E:272b-25: lho phyogs su yang spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-28: khur ba zas dang de bzhin spos //
T02TD2625E:272b-29: de bzhin sha btsos rjen pa dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-30: zas dang sgom dang kri sar //
T02TD2625E:272b-31: sdig med khrag gi gtor ma bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-32: dri zhim po yi me tog rnams //
T02TD2625E:272b-33: kha dog sna tshogs rnams kyis bsres //
T02TD2625E:272b-36: bkra shis 'bras yos bur ma dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-37: sa nag kyang ni de bzhin te //
T02TD2625E:272b-38: me tog phreng ba bdug pa dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-39: n'a ga pushpa spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-40: dri dmar dang ni de bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:272b-41: skud pa dmar po spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:272b-42: gu gul dang ni thang shing gi //
T02TD2625E:272b-43: bdug pa de la spyin par bya /
T02TD2625E:272b-45: 'og tu ni de dag nyid dang /
T02TD2625E:272b-46: me tog kun dang spos kun dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-47: me tog phreng ba sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-50: sha btsos dang ni rje na pa'i sha //
T02TD2625E:272b-53: zas kun dang ni spos kun dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-54: de bzhin me tog thams cad dang //
T02TD2625E:272b-55: shing thog kun dang kri sa ra //
T02TD2625E:273a-2: sha btsos dang ni rje pa dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-3: til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas //
T02TD2625E:273a-4: gdugs ser dang ni mchod phyir thogs //
T02TD2625E:273a-5: de bzhin skud pa ser po dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-6: 'gron bu dag dang gser dag dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-7: rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD2625E:273a-8: tshul bzhin du ni spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:273a-11: rdzas rnams dang ni 'bras yos dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-12: bum pa ba dan sngon po dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-13: sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-14: de bzhin khur ba zas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-15: dri dang me tog dkar po dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-20: sva ti ka dang au lo ba'i //
T02TD2625E:273a-21: bza' ba ci 'byor bu ram can //
T02TD2625E:273a-22: lag pan rtsa ba 'bras bu dang //
T02TD2625E:273a-24: de ni thams cad 'dod ces bya //
T02TD2625E:273a-25: zhes pa thams cad 'dod pa'i gtor ma bya ste /
T02TD2625E:273a-26: 'di gnyis la nges pa'i kha zas ma gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:273a-27: gtor ma 'di nyid snga ma thams cad kyi go spyar du yang rung ngo //
T02TD2625E:273a-28: 'byung ba 'di nyid las snga ma rnams lhag par bya'o zhes kha cig rtogs /
T02TD2625E:273a-29: gal te sgrub pa po gtor ma rab tu rgyas par spyin par 'dod pa na //
T02TD2625E:273a-30: rig pa mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa ltar ;
T02TD2625E:273a-31: gdon chen po bco brgyang la yang gtor ma ma 'dres par spyin par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:273a-32: de yang dang po ni gnod spyin gyi gtor ma bya ste /
T02TD2625E:273a-33: bar chad drag po spang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:273a-34: de nas 'byung po thams cad la ste /
T02TD2625E:273a-36: de dag gi brnab sems dgag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:273a-37: de nas ni phyogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma ste /
T02TD2625E:273a-38: tshogs rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:273a-40: de nas zhes bya ba ni don gyi dbang gis na rdul tshon bkye ste /
T02TD2625E:273a-41: nye 'khor ba'i rnam pa ldas byugs nas mchod pa dang yo byad bkod ma thag tu'o //
T02TD2625E:273a-42: khrus sogs bya la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:273a-43: ji skad du 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:273a-44: lus la dril phyis byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:273a-45: chu chen rnyog pa med par zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:273a-46: ji tsam 'dod pa'i bar du khrus byas te //
T02TD2625E:273a-47: byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas te //
T02TD2625E:273b-0: chu yis lag pa @273b brkyang pa bkrus nas ni //
T02TD2625E:273b-1: pus mo phyi rol du ni ba stan byas te //
T02TD2625E:273b-2: bar du lag gzhag tsog tsog por 'dug nas //
T02TD2625E:273b-3: sgra med dbu ba med par nye reg bya //
T02TD2625E:273b-4: lan gsum bar du chu ni 'thungs nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:273b-5: mchu la lan gnyis yongs su phyi bar bya //
T02TD2625E:273b-6: so la chags pa lce yis reg pa dang //
T02TD2625E:273b-7: sbrid par gyur nas kha yang bkru bar bya //
T02TD2625E:273b-10: sa phung bshad sgo lnga ste mtshan ma gsum //
T02TD2625E:273b-11: g-yon pa gsum ste lag pa gnyis pa bdun //
T02TD2625E:273b-12: yang nas dang chu yi ji srid du //
T02TD2625E:273b-13: dri ma dri bral de srid bar du bya //
T02TD2625E:273b-15: gal te rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par mos pa zhig yin na ni //
T02TD2625E:273b-17: 'jig rten pa dang mthun bar bya ba'am /
T02TD2625E:273b-18: lus la phan pa'i ched ma yin bar /
T02TD2625E:273b-19: phyi rol gyi khrus la ched du mi bya ste /
T02TD2625E:273b-20: ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:273b-21: 'byung ba che las thams cad byung //
T02TD2625E:273b-22: mi gtsang zhes ni gang las bya //
T02TD2625E:273b-23: thams cad grub par byed pa'i mchog / ces gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:273b-24: sogs pa byas la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:273b-25: ci nas kyang phyis bar chad du mi 'gyur bar /
T02TD2625E:273b-26: bza' ba dang btung ba longs spyad pa'am /
T02TD2625E:273b-27: gtam gyi bsgo ba la sogs pa bya ba ma lus pa rdzogs par byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:273b-28: dri dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:273b-29: lus tsandan dkar po'i 'de gus ci rigs su byug cing /
T02TD2625E:273b-30: ma 'byor pas kyang bzhin tsam byug par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:273b-31: phreng mchog phreng ba can zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:273b-32: autpala sogs pa'i phreng ba bzang po mgo bo la bcings shing mgul du yang 'phyang bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:273b-33: dri zhim kha bkang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:273b-34: gla rtsi bzang po ci rigs cig khar bzung ngam /
T02TD2625E:273b-35: zhal kha bsgo ba'i byug pa'i sbyor ba byas pas kha bsgo ba'o //
T02TD2625E:273b-36: mchog mdzes pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:273b-37: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dar dmar po gyon pa /
T02TD2625E:273b-41: mu tig gi do shal la sogs pas mdzes par byas shing /
T02TD2625E:274a-0: @274a * // gal te rab tu byung ba zhig na yang /
T02TD2625E:274a-1: chos gos snam spyar la sogs pa rab tu mdzes pa /
T02TD2625E:274a-2: rang gi 'dul ba'i cho ga dang mi 'gal bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:274a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' yol ba chen pos bskor la /
T02TD2625E:274a-4: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi shar du stan nad tshangs can la 'dug ste /
T02TD2625E:274a-5: sngon bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2625E:274a-6: bris pa'i dkyil 'khor de yang yid kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bar bskyed de /
T02TD2625E:274a-7: bdag nyid dbus su gnas pas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya //
T02TD2625E:274a-8: rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par bsdams shing /
T02TD2625E:274a-9: bsnyams la bkan te aom badzrod gha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes brjod cing rab tu khros la /
T02TD2625E:274a-10: g-yas brkyang ba la sogs pa'i 'dug stangs la brten te /
T02TD2625E:274a-11: sgo thams cad dam shar gyi sgo dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:274a-12: de nas badzra badzra h'um zhes brjod cing phyir 'byung bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:274a-13: yid dang phyag rgyas ri mo dang //
T02TD2625E:274a-14: rdo rje thig kyang gdab bya ste /
T02TD2625E:274a-15: sangs rgyas ri mo dri med pa //
T02TD2625E:274a-16: ldan pa 'gongs kyang nyes pa med //
T02TD2625E:274a-18: 'dir yang ri mos bskor ma thag tu sbyor ba 'di byas la /
T02TD2625E:274a-19: yang na phyag rgya ma bkod par bya yang rung ngo //
T02TD2625E:274a-20: de nas rang rang gi sngags brjod pas /
T02TD2625E:274a-21: lha'i tshogs sum cu rtsa bdun 'grub par blta ste /
T02TD2625E:274a-22: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:274a-23: ched du bskyed pa dang spyan drang mi dgos kyi /
T02TD2625E:274a-24: gang du dkyil 'khor chen po gnas pa der /
T02TD2625E:274a-25: rang bzhin kho nas byon no //
T02TD2625E:274a-27: gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor //
T02TD2625E:274a-28: mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te //
T02TD2625E:274a-30: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rje btsun rnams so //
T02TD2625E:274a-31: rgyal ba'i sras zhes bya ba la byang chub sems dpa' dang lha mo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:274a-32: 'khor mang po rnams ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:274a-34: spyan drangs te zhes bya ba ni bod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:274a-35: ji ltar spyan drangs she na /
T02TD2625E:274a-37: phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing //
T02TD2625E:274a-38: lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2625E:274a-40: de la phyag rgya ni 'og nyid nas /
T02TD2625E:274b-0: @274b gsang ba'i bcing bas bcings nas ni //
T02TD2625E:274b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
T02TD2625E:274b-2: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:274b-3: phyag rgya bcings pa de nyid rab tu gsang zhing sba bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:274b-4: ji skad du 'phags ba de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:274b-5: slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni //
T02TD2625E:274b-6: slob ma ma yin bu yin pa'i //
T02TD2625E:274b-7: mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de //
T02TD2625E:274b-8: de dag gsang ba phyag rgyas 'grub //
T02TD2625E:274b-10: zla ba gsang ba'i thig le las kyang //
T02TD2625E:274b-11: dam tshig ma yin mi shes la //
T02TD2625E:274b-12: sngags rig pas ni ba stan mi bya //
T02TD2625E:274b-13: phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba ste //
T02TD2625E:274b-14: dam tshig phyag rgya gsang ba yin //
T02TD2625E:274b-16: bcings pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'o //
T02TD2625E:274b-17: bcings nas ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste /
T02TD2625E:274b-18: ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:274b-19: dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni //
T02TD2625E:274b-20: rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na //
T02TD2625E:274b-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:274b-23: mdzub gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:274b-24: sngags ni ae hyi hi bha ga b'an ma h'a ka ru ni ka a'atam ko& ham dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:274b-25: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni yud tsam gyis bdag nyid der mos pa'o //
T02TD2625E:274b-26: 'dir don ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed cing sgo phye nas bdag shar sgo la phyogs bar gnas te /
T02TD2625E:274b-27: sngags snga ma brjod pas lha rnams khang pa brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor du byon par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:274b-28: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud du /
T02TD2625E:274b-29: rdo rje bsdu ba'i tshul lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:274b-30: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen por bdag nyid yid la byed cing de dag gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2625E:274b-31: aom sarba na ra ka ga tya ka sha ni h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:274b-32: aom sarba na ra g'a bh'ud da ra ni h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:274b-33: aom sarbab aa pa' ya bandha na so tsa ni h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:274b-34: aom sarba aa p'a ya ga ti bha ga w'a an bi n'a sha ni h'um phat ces brjod la nang du byon ba dang /
T02TD2625E:274b-35: gnyis su med par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:274b-36: bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2625E:274b-37: de nas mtshan ma skyes te zhes bya ba ni 'od zer dang //
T02TD2625E:274b-38: mi las 'das pa'i dri la sogs pa mthong nas so //
T02TD2625E:274b-39: mgu nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:275a-1: gis nges bar slob ma smin par byed nus so zhes bsams te yid spro ba byas nas so //
T02TD2625E:275a-2: thog ma tha ma med par zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:275a-3: dang po dang bar ma dang tha mar bye brag med par ro //
T02TD2625E:275a-4: mngon sum mthong zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:275a-5: dbang po'i mngon sum dang 'dra bar lha rnams gsal bar bltas te /
T02TD2625E:275a-6: sems rtse gcig tu bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:275a-7: slob dpon kha cig na re /
T02TD2625E:275a-8: thog ma bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa nas /
T02TD2625E:275a-9: tha ma shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams kyi bar du byon pa'i tshe bye brag med par mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:275a-10: 'di nyid mtshan ma skyes zhes bya ba yin la /
T02TD2625E:275a-11: de ltar mthong bas mgu nas ni mchod pa bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:275a-12: de ltar yang lha chen po dgu'i dkyil 'khor las /
T02TD2625E:275a-13: de nas byon pa mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:275a-14: dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya //
T02TD2625E:275a-16: de ltar sngon bzhin du phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste mchod pa bya'o ;
T02TD2625E:275a-17: /'dis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la 'og min nas spyan drang ba bstim zhing /
T02TD2625E:275a-18: des bris pa la thim par bya ba ni man ngag go// da ni mchod pa ston par bzhed nas aargham mchog phul zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02TD2625E:275a-19: 'dir mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:275a-20: gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang //
T02TD2625E:275a-21: rdo ba dang ni shing gi'am //
T02TD2625E:275a-22: kham sa'am dung ngam nya phyis sam //
T02TD2625E:275a-23: de bzhin lo ma'i snod kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:275a-24: zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang //
T02TD2625E:275a-25: rab dang 'bri nag dang tha ma yi //
T02TD2625E:275a-26: las dang dngos grub dag la ni //
T02TD2625E:275a-27: rigs pa'i snod rnams spyar bar bya //
T02TD2625E:275a-28: kha dog yon tan bshad pa las //
T02TD2625E:275a-29: gzhan dang gzhan yang ci rigs pa'i //
T02TD2625E:275a-30: snod rnams ji ltar 'dod pa ru //
T02TD2625E:275a-31: mchod yon phyir ni rab tu spyar //
T02TD2625E:275a-32: zhi ba'i mchod yon nas dang bcas //
T02TD2625E:275a-33: til dang bcas ba rgyas pa la //
T02TD2625E:275a-34: thams cad dang ni 'gal ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:275a-35: ko tra bar bcas drag spyod la //
T02TD2625E:275a-36: zhi ba'i mchod yon 'o ma can //
T02TD2625E:275a-37: rgyas pa la ni zho can no //
T02TD2625E:275a-38: ba yi gcin nam yang na khrag / drag shul spyod pa'i don du shis //
T02TD2625E:275a-39: rab dang 'bri nag dang tha ma dang //
T02TD2625E:275a-40: las rnams kun la 'bras yos shis //
T02TD2625E:275b-0: @275b spos dang me tog ku sha til //
T02TD2625E:275b-1: chu rnams bye brag med par bshad //
T02TD2625E:275b-2: zangs kyi snod ni mchod yon phyir //
T02TD2625E:275b-3: las rnams kun la rab tu shis //
T02TD2625E:275b-5: bdag la bzod par mdzod ces nas //
T02TD2625E:275b-6: yang na ci 'byor pas kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:275b-7: zhes pa las zhi ba la bsngags pa'i mchod yon ni /
T02TD2625E:275b-8: 'dir aargham mchog ste de phul bas mchod pa lhag ma rnams bya /
T02TD2625E:275b-9: glegs bam la la las aargham mchog brtags zhes 'od na te /
T02TD2625E:275b-10: de yang snga ma lta bu zhi ba'i mchod yon ni mchog tu brtag par bya ba'am rung ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:275b-11: gsang ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:275b-12: gsang ba'i mchod pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2625E:275b-13: 'di dag gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba mchod par bya ba'i phyir rol gyi lha rnams ma yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:275b-14: sogs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me tog la sogs pa bzhi bsdu ba'o //
T02TD2625E:275b-15: de ltar mchod pa gus mchod nas //
T02TD2625E:275b-16: mnyam med mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:275b-17: dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i bstod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:275b-19: rol mo'i cha byad dam pa dang spyar ba drug ldan la sogs pa'i ros bstod par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:275b-20: ji skad du zla ba gsang ba'i thig le'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:275b-21: pi wang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyi //
T02TD2625E:275b-22: glu blangs dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed //
T02TD2625E:275b-23: ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni //
T02TD2625E:275b-24: 'jig rten grags pa'i bden pa'i bde ba dag / bden pa'i sgra yis bskyed pa rnams bsgyur ba //
T02TD2625E:275b-25: de dag mthun ba'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed //
T02TD2625E:275b-26: sha ta pa dang sha dza'i dbyangs //
T02TD2625E:275b-27: glu ru blangs pas padmo gnas //
T02TD2625E:275b-28: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:275b-29: yid kyis byin rlabs dag pa dang //
T02TD2625E:275b-30: 'di yis byin rlabs bde ba rnams //
T02TD2625E:275b-31: sbyor ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2625E:275b-35: lha yi gtso bo thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:275b-36: ras ni zung re dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:275b-37: sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la //
T02TD2625E:275b-38: ya re phul bar rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:276a-0: yang na lha thams cad la ras zung 'bul @276a * //
T02TD2625E:276a-3: de yang ma 'byor na thams cad la zung gcig gam /
T02TD2625E:276a-4: rab tu 'byor ba dman na thams cad la gcig dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-5: 'byor pa yod na ba lang dang rta dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-6: rda mo dang ra lug la sogs pa'i khyu rab tu brtags pa dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-8: bza' ba dang bca' ba dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-10: btung ba gya nom pa mang po dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-11: dril bu g-yer ka btags pa'i rta babs dri zhim po dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-13: nye ba'i rin po cha bdun dang /
T02TD2625E:276a-14: bkra shis kyi rdzas bcu drug dag kyang rab tu yid du 'thad pa 'bul bar ston pa ni /
T02TD2625E:276a-15: lha rdzas dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod //
T02TD2625E:276a-17: de la mchod pa'i cho ga ni bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzad de /
T02TD2625E:276a-18: 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las /
T02TD2625E:276a-19: thal spyar mchod yon blos mchod dang //
T02TD2625E:276a-20: cho ga'i yan lag nyid dang bzhi //
T02TD2625E:276a-21: ji ltar rigs pa nye bar spyar //
T02TD2625E:276a-23: spyod pa'i rgyud kyi dbang du mdzad de /
T02TD2625E:276a-24: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las /
T02TD2625E:276a-25: mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste //
T02TD2625E:276a-26: phyag 'tshal ba yi thal spyar dang //
T02TD2625E:276a-27: de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang //
T02TD2625E:276a-28: me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i //
T02TD2625E:276a-29: sor mo las byung me tog rnams //
T02TD2625E:276a-30: skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:276a-32: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dag tu ni /
T02TD2625E:276a-33: mchod pa rab tu mang po dag ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:276a-34: lha mo ku ru kulle 'byung ba las ni /
T02TD2625E:276a-35: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa bco brgyang gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:276a-36: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus par ni /
T02TD2625E:276a-37: mchod pa phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang rab tu gsang ba rnams ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:276a-38: de bas na mchod pa rnams ni sgrub pa po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis rab tu mang mod kyi /
T02TD2625E:276a-39: 'dir ni mchod pa dgu yan chad dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:276a-40: de yang ji skad bshad pa'i yon chab thogs te /
T02TD2625E:276a-41: ae hye hi bha ga w'an ni ha wa kte na sa ya me tsa ma aargham pushpam dh'u pam pra t'itstsha mam p'u dza nir dza tye pra siddhi me /
T02TD2625E:276a-42: a'a ha ra a'a ha ra sarba bidhya dha ra p'u dze te sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'am /
T02TD2625E:276b-0: aom badzra aargham pra t'i tstsha @276b a'a: h'um zhes pas dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:276b-1: mchod yon ni sgrub pa po'i spyi bor bzung ste dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:276b-2: me tog la sogs pa yang snying ga'am lte ba'i thad kar bzung ste dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:276b-3: de yang dang po phyug bzhi byas la /
T02TD2625E:276b-4: de nas mchod yon dbul te /
T02TD2625E:276b-5: de nas bdug pa dang me tog dang mar me dang dri rnams sarba dharma sva bh'a wa shuddha zhes bya ba rab tu dag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2625E:276b-6: rab tu mang zhing mchog tu bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:276b-7: ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin du 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:276b-8: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dharma t'a dh'u pa ya de h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:276b-9: aom sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni pushpa bi lo ka ni h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:276b-10: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dzny'a n'a lo ka ka ri h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:276b-11: aom sarba aa p'a ya ga ti gandha a'a sha ni gandha ba ti h'um phat ces bya ba rnams snyim pa zed pa las gyen du 'thor ba dang /
T02TD2625E:276b-12: de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams nas mdun du 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2625E:276b-13: de nyid las dung dang 'dra bar byas pa'i phyag rgya rnams bcings te phul bas /
T02TD2625E:276b-14: rab tu rgyas par tshim par bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:276b-15: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2625E:276b-16: rang gi dam tsheg sems dpa'i rnal 'byor du rab tu gsal bar byas la /
T02TD2625E:276b-17: rdo rje'i gar gyi bya ba rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis dku g-yas g-yon gnyis su sgeg pa'i tshul gyis bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:276b-18: byang chub kyi sems yid la byed cing de la rab tu dga' bas spyi bos g-yon du cung zad btud de /
T02TD2625E:276b-20: aom badzra satva su sang+gra ha /
T02TD2625E:276b-21: aom badzra ratna ma nutta ram /
T02TD2625E:276b-22: aom badzra dharma g'a ya ne /
T02TD2625E:276b-23: aom badzra karma ka rongbha be zhes glur blang ngo //
T02TD2625E:276b-24: de nas rdo rje khu chur gnyis kyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor phreng ba 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2625E:276b-25: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'byung bar smon pas //
T02TD2625E:276b-26: aom badzra m'a le zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T02TD2625E:276b-27: de nas 'gro ba thams cad la mdo sde zab mo la sogs pa bshad pa 'byung ba yid la smon pas /
T02TD2625E:276b-28: rdo rje khu chur gnyis rang gi kha nas tshig 'thon pa ltar byas te /
T02TD2625E:276b-29: aom badzra g'i ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do //
T02TD2625E:276b-30: de nas yang rdo rje gang gyi tshul gyis thal mo spyi bor spyar te /
T02TD2625E:277a-0: 'gro ba la nges pa'i tshig tu chos ston pa @277a * //
T02TD2625E:277a-2: spyod lam sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don la mkhas par gyur cig ces smos pas /
T02TD2625E:277a-3: aom badzra nri ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:277a-4: yang na de dag gi phyag rgya ba stan pas de dag nyid kyis de dag nyid la rang rang gi mchod par mos par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:277a-5: yang na dang po yon chab phul la /
T02TD2625E:277a-6: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod de /
T02TD2625E:277a-7: gsang ba'i mchod pa de dag gi yon tan yang /
T02TD2625E:277a-8: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02TD2625E:277a-10: rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing //
T02TD2625E:277a-11: de nas rdo rje glur blangs la //
T02TD2625E:277a-12: rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas nas //
T02TD2625E:277a-13: 'dod pa'i dga' ba dbang bskur mchod //
T02TD2625E:277a-14: glu dang gar gyi bde ba las //
T02TD2625E:277a-15: bde ba gzhan ni yod min te //
T02TD2625E:277a-16: de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med //
T02TD2625E:277a-18: de nas bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa yang rung ngo //
T02TD2625E:277a-19: de nas aom badzra ba ta h'um zhes brjod pas ras phul la snyim pa mdzes pa rab tu brkyang ba'i phyag rgyas bshos rnams /
T02TD2625E:277a-20: aom aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:277a-21: sngar bshad pa'i yon chab ni rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pas dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:277a-22: aom sarba bid pu ra pu ra aa brta ya ho zhes 'don cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2625E:277a-23: rta babs la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:277a-24: gal te mchod pa rnams dngos su ma 'byor na /
T02TD2625E:277a-25: de'i tshe mchod pa'i gzugs brnyan rnams gro ga la sogs pa la bris te /
T02TD2625E:277a-26: dngos yin par lhag par mos bar mchod yon tsam du dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:277a-27: de ltar ni 'phags pa rab tu grub par byed pa las /
T02TD2625E:277a-28: che ge mo 'de bzhes shig ces //
T02TD2625E:277a-29: rdzas kyi ming nas phyung ste dbul //
T02TD2625E:277a-30: ma 'byor na yang gzugs brnyan rnams //
T02TD2625E:277a-31: byas nas mchod yon dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:277a-32: sngags dang mchod pa phul ba yi //
T02TD2625E:277a-33: cho ga thams cad tshogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:277a-35: de bzhin du mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pa tsam yid kyis mchod pa dang bcas nas mchod pa yang /
T02TD2625E:277a-37: rnam pa kun la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:277a-38: rtag tu ci 'byor pas kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:277a-39: yid kyi mchod pa khyad par can //
T02TD2625E:277b-0: yang dag @277b nyid du brtsam par bya //
T02TD2625E:277b-1: chos kyi thog mar yid 'gro zhes //
T02TD2625E:277b-2: thub pa chen pos bka' stsal to //
T02TD2625E:277b-3: yid ni rab tu mnyam gzhag nas //
T02TD2625E:277b-4: cho ga lhag ma bya bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:277b-6: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin cing /
T02TD2625E:277b-7: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can //
T02TD2625E:277b-8: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
T02TD2625E:277b-9: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad spyin mdzad pa //
T02TD2625E:277b-10: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med dag pa'i chos nyid can //
T02TD2625E:277b-11: yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la 'ang tshad med de //
T02TD2625E:277b-12: dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bsgrun du yod ma yin //
T02TD2625E:277b-13: dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams //
T02TD2625E:277b-14: sems can khams la dngos grub nges par stsol mdzad pa //
T02TD2625E:277b-15: rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02TD2625E:277b-16: smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
T02TD2625E:277b-17: 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pas //
T02TD2625E:277b-18: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
T02TD2625E:277b-19: tshad med tshad dang bral bar shin tu yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02TD2625E:277b-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes 'gyur dang //
T02TD2625E:277b-21: khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi //
T02TD2625E:277b-22: thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g-yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:277b-23: ae ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan //
T02TD2625E:277b-24: mchog spyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa //
T02TD2625E:277b-25: khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad //
T02TD2625E:277b-26: mgon po dus gsum sgrib ba med par rab mkhyen pa //
T02TD2625E:277b-27: dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol //
T02TD2625E:277b-29: nus na 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa'i rtsa ba dang /
T02TD2625E:277b-30: phyi ma phyi ma'i rgyud nas gsungs pa'i rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyang pa dbyangs su blangs pas bstod cing mnyes par bya /
T02TD2625E:277b-31: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje yin na /
T02TD2625E:277b-32: rgyud 'di nyid las gsungs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyang pas bstod do //
T02TD2625E:277b-33: de nas yi ge brgya pa brjod de //
T02TD2625E:277b-34: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:278a-1: ma rab tu rgyas pa 'chad par byed pas spyin no //
T02TD2625E:278a-2: de nas nang du 'ongs pa bdag nyid 'jug pa ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:278a-3: rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni //
T02TD2625E:278a-4: me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug / ces gsungs pa yang 'dir drangs te /
T02TD2625E:278a-5: sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba bzung bar bya ba mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:278a-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'ak tsitta pra na me na badzra banda nam ka ro mi zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2625E:278a-7: dkyil 'khor la yan lag brgyang dang ldan pa'i phyag lan gsum byas la phreng ba de blangs te /
T02TD2625E:278a-8: dkyil 'khor la bor la lan bdun bskor bas /
T02TD2625E:278a-9: yang phyag snga ma ltar byas la /
T02TD2625E:278a-10: me tog de bdag po la phul te blangs la rang gi spyi bor gdags so //
T02TD2625E:278a-11: de nas phusti'i phyag rgya dang aa zhes pa stong gis bdag gam gzhan la phab la /
T02TD2625E:278a-12: rdo rje ye shes thob byed ba'i //
T02TD2625E:278a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2625E:278a-15: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2625E:278a-17: bdag dang gzhan des smin par mdzad par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:278a-18: slob dpon du bdag por gyur pa las /
T02TD2625E:278a-19: sngom pa dang dbang ma lus pa blo yis blangs te /
T02TD2625E:278a-21: chags chen las byung de kho na //
T02TD2625E:278a-22: 'khor lo 'ang gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs //
T02TD2625E:278a-23: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD2625E:278a-24: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD2625E:278a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' rab grub mdzod //
T02TD2625E:278a-26: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD2625E:278a-27: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD2625E:278a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD2625E:278a-29: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2625E:278a-30: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod //
T02TD2625E:278a-31: 'dod chags kun gyis rjes su mnyes //
T02TD2625E:278a-32: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD2625E:278a-33: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02TD2625E:278a-34: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2625E:278a-35: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2625E:278a-36: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2625E:278a-37: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2625E:278a-38: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas /
T02TD2625E:278b-0: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig / sems can kun gyi yid @278b khyab cing //
T02TD2625E:278b-1: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD2625E:278b-2: sems can kun gyi pha yin te //
T02TD2625E:278b-3: chags pa'i mchog ste dam tshig mchog / thabs shes bdag nyid dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD2625E:278b-4: ye shes yin pa'i bden gang gis //
T02TD2625E:278b-6: gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i slob ma yis //
T02TD2625E:278b-7: skyon dang bral bar kun mthong shog / ces bya ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid bden pa dang /
T02TD2625E:278b-8: dam tshig gsum gyi glu dang /
T02TD2625E:278b-9: yang de kho na dang bden pa bsgrags so //
T02TD2625E:278b-10: gal te zhag du mar dkyil 'khor gyi las byed pa'i tshe na /
T02TD2625E:278b-11: gnas skabs der dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol ba dang /
T02TD2625E:278b-12: chos smra bar mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:278b-13: ji skad du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:278b-14: slob ma de bos bsgo ba ni //
T02TD2625E:278b-15: 'di ni bsod nams zhing yin zhes //
T02TD2625E:278b-16: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2625E:278b-17: skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis gsungs ;
T02TD2625E:278b-18: / rnam dag yon tan rgyas pa yi //
T02TD2625E:278b-19: dge 'dun la ni kun gyis phul //
T02TD2625E:278b-21: skyes bu mkhas pa gang zhig gis //
T02TD2625E:278b-22: dge 'dun la ni yon phul na /
T02TD2625E:278b-23: longs spyod chen po mi zad pa //
T02TD2625E:278b-25: de bas thams cad mthun par ni //
T02TD2625E:278b-26: sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su //
T02TD2625E:278b-27: sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la //
T02TD2625E:278b-28: ci nus pas ni mchod ston bya //
T02TD2625E:278b-29: zhes gsungs la bya ba'i rgyud gzhan dag las kyang //
T02TD2625E:278b-30: de nas bla ma'i ci 'byor pas //
T02TD2625E:278b-32: yang na slob ma byed du gzhug / gal te mi 'byor par gyur na //
T02TD2625E:278b-33: dge 'dun gyis ni bskos pa yin //
T02TD2625E:278b-34: dge slong dag la mchod ston gsol //
T02TD2625E:278b-35: yang na sangs rgyas mchod pa'am //
T02TD2625E:278b-36: dge 'dun dag la yon yang dbul //
T02TD2625E:278b-38: phyogs bzhir chos klog bzhi bzhag nas //
T02TD2625E:278b-39: de la shar gyi phyogs su ni //
T02TD2625E:278b-40: shes rab pha rol phyin pa gzhag / byang gi phyogs su gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2625E:278b-41: gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde yin //
T02TD2625E:278b-42: nub kyi phyogs su gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2625E:278b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa'i mdo //
T02TD2625E:279a-2: lho yi phyogs su bzhag nas su //
T02TD2625E:279a-3: gus par de dag mchod par bya //
T02TD2625E:279a-5: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi dus tha ma zhag gsum du byed na de dag 'jug pa'i nyi ma snga dro bya'o //
T02TD2625E:279a-6: yang na chos bsgrags pas bsrung ba ni /
T02TD2625E:279a-7: phyi'i sa spyang ba nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:279a-8: dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02TD2625E:279a-9: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba ltar slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:279a-10: de ltar slob dpon dkyil 'khor bsgrub par byas nas gtor ma spyin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:279a-11: de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya //
T02TD2625E:279a-12: sems can bkres shing skom la gdung ba dang //
T02TD2625E:279a-13: phyogs la gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtag / de yi gtor ma rje su mthun par bya //
T02TD2625E:279a-15: de yang dang po ni bza' ba dang btung ba mang pos mi'i 'gro ba ji ltar nus pa tshim par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:279a-16: khyad par du ni khye'u dang bu mo gzhon nu 'khrig pa ba sten mi nus pa rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:279a-17: de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD2625E:279a-18: gtor ma'i tshul ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2625E:279a-19: da ni gtor ma rgyas pa'i cho ga bdag gis 'dir brjod bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:279a-20: ji skad du bshad pa'i gtor ma shing rta gang la 'ang nyung zad kyang rung ste /
T02TD2625E:279a-21: ji ltar 'byor pa phyi rol du khyer la bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:279a-22: slob dpon bdag nyid kyis spyin no //
T02TD2625E:279a-23: dang por sgrub pa pos 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags lan bdun gyis bsrungs te /
T02TD2625E:279a-24: de nas gtor ma der mar me dang me tog dang /
T02TD2625E:279a-25: bdug pa dang byug pa dang bshos rnams btsal la lag tu spos thogs te /
T02TD2625E:279a-26: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la /
T02TD2625E:279a-27: yid don la bsdus te tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do //
T02TD2625E:279a-28: lha dang lha min gnod spyin lto 'phye grul //
T02TD2625E:279a-29: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02TD2625E:279a-30: dri bra srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:279a-31: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02TD2625E:279a-32: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas rnams la //
T02TD2625E:279a-33: bdag ni pus mos la btsugs nas su //
T02TD2625E:279a-34: thal mo spyar nas khyed la gsol 'de bas kyis //
T02TD2625E:279b-0: gsan nas phan @279b gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-1: dga' ba'i chal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-2: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-3: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-4: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-5: rin chen gnas na lhag pa gang gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-6: mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu dogs dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-7: g-ya' chu gsil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-8: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-9: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-10: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-11: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02TD2625E:279b-12: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-13: lam srang mdun khang dang ni bzhi mdo dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-14: gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung //
T02TD2625E:279b-15: dur khrod chen po nags chal chen po dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-16: seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-17: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-18: gang dag gling mchog rnams la gnas pa dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-19: lhun po dur khred dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:279b-20: rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2625E:279b-21: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba //
T02TD2625E:279b-22: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams su gsol //
T02TD2625E:279b-23: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2625E:279b-25: de phyogs kyi gtor ma bya'o //
T02TD2625E:279b-27: de ltar gdon la mchod ba byas nas su //
T02TD2625E:279b-28: de dag phyogs skyong rnams la mchod par bya //
T02TD2625E:279b-30: snga ma ltar pus mo btsugs te /
T02TD2625E:279b-32: dbang po 'byung po'i gdon dang bcas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:279b-33: gtor ma 'phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2625E:279b-34: me dang gshin rje srin po chu bdag dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-35: rlung dang lus ngag 'byung po gdon dang bcas //
T02TD2625E:279b-36: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-37: lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-38: ri yi lha dang gnod spyin tshogs rnams la //
T02TD2625E:279b-39: rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:279b-40: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su //
T02TD2625E:279b-41: rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
T02TD2625E:279b-42: nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu //
T02TD2625E:280a-0: @280a * // me tog dri dang byug pa gtor ma bcas //
T02TD2625E:280a-1: 'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang /
T02TD2625E:280a-2: bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2625E:280a-4: de nas bstod pa yang bya ste /
T02TD2625E:280a-5: dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-6: lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280a-7: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-8: me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-9: 'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280a-10: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal /
T02TD2625E:280a-11: gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-12: lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / bdag gis gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280a-13: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-14: bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-15: srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la ;
T02TD2625E:280a-16: / mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-17: zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-18: bden pa bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag / nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2625E:280a-19: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-20: rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-21: tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste //
T02TD2625E:280a-22: rlung gi gdon gyi tshogs bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280a-23: mchod pa bgyid de phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-24: gnod spyin lag na dbyug to thogs //
T02TD2625E:280a-25: nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste //
T02TD2625E:280a-26: byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2625E:280a-27: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-28: dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha //
T02TD2625E:280a-29: bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag / dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280a-30: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-32: sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste //
T02TD2625E:280a-33: dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280a-34: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-35: steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang //
T02TD2625E:280a-36: zla ba nyi ma gza' chen po //
T02TD2625E:280a-37: gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la //
T02TD2625E:280a-38: mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:280a-40: de ltar gtor ma phul ba'i yon tan ni 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:280b-0: @280b de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la //
T02TD2625E:280b-1: gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa de //
T02TD2625E:280b-2: dngos grub shin tu myur zhing gegs kyang med //
T02TD2625E:280b-3: yid du 'ong pa'i 'dod pa 'ang thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:280b-5: de nas gtor ma de dag rang rang gi phyogs su gtor te /
T02TD2625E:280b-6: spos chu lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du blugs la mig gis bltas te /
T02TD2625E:280b-7: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba lan bdun bzlas pas rang gi spyi bor blugs pas bsangs te /
T02TD2625E:280b-9: yang na tshul 'dis gtor ma spyin te /
T02TD2625E:280b-10: de nas phyi rol byung nas su //
T02TD2625E:280b-11: mnyam par gzhag pas gtor ma spyin //
T02TD2625E:280b-12: 'bras yos til dang chur bcas shing //
T02TD2625E:280b-13: 'bras chan dang ni me tog bcas //
T02TD2625E:280b-14: sran chen dag kyang mang du blugs //
T02TD2625E:280b-15: snum dang lo ma dag dang bcas //
T02TD2625E:280b-16: de ltar slob ma slob dpon gyi //
T02TD2625E:280b-17: lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas su //
T02TD2625E:280b-18: dga' zhing phyogs rnams kun du [*kun tu?] gtor //
T02TD2625E:280b-19: bdug spos mchod yon bcas pa spyin //
T02TD2625E:280b-20: dang po dbang ldan phyogs song nas //
T02TD2625E:280b-21: cho ga bzhin du gtor ma bya //
T02TD2625E:280b-22: dbang dang ldan pa gzhu can ni //
T02TD2625E:280b-23: tshogs dang bcas la spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:280b-24: de nas dbang po'i tshogs bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280b-25: gsang sngags zhes pas spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:280b-26: sngags pa gtor ma la mkhas pas //
T02TD2625E:280b-27: me yi phyogs su gtor ma spyin //
T02TD2625E:280b-28: de nas gshin rje'i phyogs dag tu //
T02TD2625E:280b-29: sngags pa mkhas pas spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:280b-30: de nas bden bral tshogs bcas la //
T02TD2625E:280b-31: gsang sngags zhes pas spyin par bya ;
T02TD2625E:280b-32: / chu yi phyogs su klu rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:280b-33: bdag por bcas la de bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:280b-34: cundi gnas la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2625E:280b-35: sngags rigs pa ni tshul bzhin spyin //
T02TD2625E:280b-36: de nas rlung gi phyogs song nas //
T02TD2625E:280b-37: rlung gi phyogs dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2625E:280b-38: rang gi ming nas smos nas su //
T02TD2625E:280b-39: sngags pas gtor ma spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:280b-40: byang gi phyogs su song nas ni //
T02TD2625E:280b-41: dngos grub dam pa 'dod byas la //
T02TD2625E:280b-42: yid ni rab tu dang bcas nas //
T02TD2625E:280b-43: gnod spyin rnams la gtor ma spyin //
T02TD2625E:280b-44: srin po rnams dang sha za dang //
T02TD2625E:280b-45: 'byung po sha rjen za ba dang //
