T02TD2625E:281a-0: sems can rnam pa sna tshogs @281a * //
T02TD2625E:281a-2: / mkhas pas gtor ma gtong bar bya //
T02TD2625E:281a-3: blo las gang dang gang dran pa //
T02TD2625E:281a-4: de na gnas pa'i sems can ni //
T02TD2625E:281a-5: ljon shing gel ba la gnas pa //
T02TD2625E:281a-6: de dang de la rab tu spyin //
T02TD2625E:281a-7: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ru dra ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-8: dbang po'i phyogs su sha kra ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-9: me'i phyogs su aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-10: gshin rje'i phyogs su ba ya bee ya sva ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-11: srin po'i phyogs su r'aksha sa aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-12: chu'i phyogs su me ka da sha na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-13: rlung gi phyogs su ba ya be sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-14: lus ngan gyi phyogs su yaksha bidya dha ra ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-15: srin po rnams la kram ka re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-16: sha za rnams la pi tsi pi tsi sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-17: 'byung po rnams la gung gung sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281a-18: kun du [*kun tu?] gtor ma byin nas ni //
T02TD2625E:281a-19: lag pa legs par bkrus nas su //
T02TD2625E:281a-20: nye reg tshul bzhin byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:281a-21: de nas nang du 'jug par bya //
T02TD2625E:281a-23: yang na 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma phyi rol du khyer la /
T02TD2625E:281a-24: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am aadya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes sgra chen po lan gsum brjod la /
T02TD2625E:281a-25: 'gro ba thams cad la bsngos te gtor ro //
T02TD2625E:281a-26: yang na lugs 'dis gtor ma spyin te /
T02TD2625E:281a-27: dang por mandala zlum po khru gang yan chad bcu phyogs brgyang du byed du bcug la /
T02TD2625E:281a-28: mandala re re'i steng du gtor ma sngar bshad pa bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:281a-29: de nas dang por spyan drangs ste /
T02TD2625E:281a-30: de nas dam tshig ba stan cing mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2625E:281a-31: dri dang me tog dang bdug pa dang /
T02TD2625E:281a-32: mar me dang byug pa phul la aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs par shar phyogs nas brtsams te gsum gtor la /
T02TD2625E:281a-33: yang mchod yon la sogs pa phul te slar gtang ngo //
T02TD2625E:281a-34: de la sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams yin te /
T02TD2625E:281a-35: shar phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02TD2625E:281a-36: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug nas ;
T02TD2625E:281a-37: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya la /
T02TD2625E:281a-38: g-yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur logs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:281a-39: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281a-40: de la mdzub mo lcags kyur ma byas pa ni /
T02TD2625E:281a-41: brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-0: rgang pa g-yon @281b brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:281b-1: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2625E:281b-2: mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-3: de nas 'di'i sngags ni na mo badzra sa tsa di shi badzra p'a ni raksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281b-4: me'i phyogs su kha bltas nas /
T02TD2625E:281b-5: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste /
T02TD2625E:281b-6: gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la /
T02TD2625E:281b-7: mthe bo lag mthil du gzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-8: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mthe bong ngos la mdzub mo btsugs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:281b-9: me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-10: phyag rgya de nyid la mdzub mo mthe bo'i ngos la btsugs te myir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-11: de'i sngags ni aagne aa ha ka pa li dzva la dzva la /
T02TD2625E:281b-12: da ha ni khi tho li bi r'u p'a ksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281b-13: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:281b-14: sor mo phan tshun bsnol la khu tshur ba cangs nas /
T02TD2625E:281b-15: srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te gshibs la g-yabs te /
T02TD2625E:281b-16: nang du gzhug pa ni gshin rje dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-17: srin lag gnyis phyi rol du shin tu gshibs te bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-18: 'di nyid las srin lag spyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-19: sngags ni sa ma ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281b-20: bden bral gyi phyogs su rkang ba mnyam par 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:281b-21: lag pa g-yas kyi khu tshur ba cangs pa las /
T02TD2625E:281b-22: mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs la bsgreng ste gzhag / lag pa g-yon pa 'ang de ltar byas te sta zur phyogs su bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste g-yab pa ni bden bral dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-23: phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g-yon pa sta zur phyogs su ral gri 'dra bar gzhag pa ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-24: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:281b-25: sngags ni sarba bhuddha ba ya ka ya ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:281b-26: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang pa mnyam par 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:281b-27: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur ba cangs la mthe bo dang /
T02TD2625E:281b-28: mdzub mo gcig tu spyar la /
T02TD2625E:282a-1: ltar byas te g-yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas la snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:282a-2: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra bar byas pa ni dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-3: phyag rgya de nyid la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-4: g-yon pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo slar btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-5: sngags ni ti ti ba ti ti ti shi khi tu li bi r'u p'aksha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282a-6: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:282a-7: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur ba cangs te /
T02TD2625E:282a-8: gung mo bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to btsugs la lag pa g-yas pa de bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2625E:282a-9: sta zur logs su gzhag cing mthe bong bsgul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-10: de nyid las mthe bo snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-11: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-12: sngags ni aom sva sa kha kha kha khu khu khu sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282a-13: lus ngan la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis thal mo spyar la rdo rje bcing pa nang du bzlog ste /
T02TD2625E:282a-14: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang ;
T02TD2625E:282a-15: de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo gnyis de ltar bkug ste g-yab pa ni lus ngan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-16: phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcing pa'i tshul du gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2625E:282a-17: lus ngan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-18: 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282a-19: sngags ni ku bi r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282a-20: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:282a-21: lag pa thal mo gcig tu spyar ba byas la /
T02TD2625E:282a-22: srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste bsnol /
T02TD2625E:282a-23: gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya /
T02TD2625E:282a-24: mthe bong gnyis bar du gshibs te bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:282a-25: de nyid la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprad nas nang du g-yab pa ni dbang ldan dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-0: de nyid las snga ma ltar mdzub mo rdo rje'i @282b tshul du gzhag pa ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-1: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-2: sngags ni dzrum dzrum shi ba sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282b-3: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug pas /
T02TD2625E:282b-4: lag pa thal mo khong stong du spyar te bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:282b-5: steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus tshangs pa la sogs pa dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-6: de nyid las snga ma ltar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-7: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-8: sngags ni 'di yin te aa dar ya pra ha ma ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282b-9: s'ur+ya gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282b-10: tsandra ya na ksha tra aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282b-11: rkang pa mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2625E:282b-12: lag pa gnyis gcig tu spyar te sor mo rnams bar mtshams med par rtse mor phan tshun spyar te /
T02TD2625E:282b-13: mthe bo zlum por byas la 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bkug pa ni 'og gi lha dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-14: dgug pa'i phyag rgya las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-15: mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:282b-16: sngags ni aa dhi pa ti bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282b-17: aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:282b-19: de nas rang rang gi sngags de nyid kyis 'thor 'thung phul la /
T02TD2625E:282b-20: bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig / las dang dngos grub rnams bdag cag la stsol cig ces brjod cing slar gtang ngo //
T02TD2625E:282b-21: de ltar bdag gis rgya cher bkod pa'i gtor ma 'di dag ni gang dga' bas slob ma dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2625E:282b-22: ro yongs su spyang ba la sogs pa'i tshe spyin no //
T02TD2625E:282b-23: de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi gnas su slob ma yongs su smin par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la slob ma sta gon la gnas pa ston te /
T02TD2625E:282b-24: de nas zhes bya ba ni don gyis na bum pa sta gon la gnas ma thag tu'am slob ma smin par bya ba'i dbang du byas pa zhes so //
T02TD2625E:282b-25: sngags pas zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis so //
T02TD2625E:282b-26: bla med byang chub ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:283a-0: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das @283a * //
T02TD2625E:283a-2: de nyid 'khor ba ji srid du gnas par bya bas na gnas su'o //
T02TD2625E:283a-3: slob ma zhes bya ba ni bla ma la gus pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:283a-4: smin par bya zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi myu gu 'byin nus par byas zhes pa'o //
T02TD2625E:283a-6: 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par //
T02TD2625E:283a-7: de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug / ces smos so //
T02TD2625E:283a-8: slob ma sta gon la gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:283a-9: 'phags pa dkyil 'khor spyi'i bya ba las kyang /
T02TD2625E:283a-10: de nas slob ma legs brtags nas //
T02TD2625E:283a-11: sta gon gnas la tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:283a-12: de yi nub mo ci nus par ;
T02TD2625E:283a-13: / de bzhin sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug / gtsang ma'i gos dkar bgos pa yis //
T02TD2625E:283a-14: slob ma de lta bu dag ni //
T02TD2625E:283a-15: shar phyogs kha bltas 'khod pa la //
T02TD2625E:283a-16: sta gon gnas pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD2625E:283a-17: dang por gsum la skyabs su btang //
T02TD2625E:283a-18: de nas bla mas byang chub sems //
T02TD2625E:283a-19: ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD2625E:283a-20: bskyed pa dag kyang dran par bya //
T02TD2625E:283a-22: de la 'di slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'i rim pa rgyas pa 'di yin te /
T02TD2625E:283a-23: dang por slob ma legs par brtags pa smyung ba la gnas pa /
T02TD2625E:283a-24: rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su shar du blta bar rgan pa'i rim gyis dgod de /
T02TD2625E:283a-25: lag na me tog thogs pa rnams la slob dpon gyis chos ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:283a-27: yid dga' spro chen byas pa gzo //
T02TD2625E:283a-29: yon tan dang ldan dad dang bcas //
T02TD2625E:283a-30: gzugs dang kha dog lang tshor ldan //
T02TD2625E:283a-31: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni //
T02TD2625E:283a-32: sgrub pa don gnyer mngon brtson pa'am //
T02TD2625E:283a-33: gzugs ngan yon tan med pa'am //
T02TD2625E:283a-34: dman pa'am ni lhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:283a-35: rang gi bslab dang legs ldan zhing //
T02TD2625E:283a-36: theg chen la dga'i bdag nyid can ;
T02TD2625E:283a-37: /'khor ni rnam pa bzhi char la'ang //
T02TD2625E:283a-38: dkyil 'khor cho ga rjes su ngang //
T02TD2625E:283a-39: kha cig gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:283a-41: bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan //
T02TD2625E:283a-42: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer gzhan //
T02TD2625E:283b-0: 'jig rten @283b pha rol gnyer ba yi //
T02TD2625E:283b-1: dad pa mang du byed pa 'di //
T02TD2625E:283b-6: 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer pa'i //
T02TD2625E:283b-7: skyes bu de yi 'bras bu rgyas //
T02TD2625E:283b-9: de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci nus kyis bshad do //
T02TD2625E:283b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slob ma la dbang bcu gsum bskur la /
T02TD2625E:283b-11: de dag slob ma'i lus la bsdu'o //
T02TD2625E:283b-12: de nas slob ma rnams kyis bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2625E:283b-13: dga' chen khyod bdag ston ba bas //
T02TD2625E:283b-14: slob dpon khyod ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2625E:283b-15: byang chub chen po'i tshul ba stan pa //
T02TD2625E:283b-16: mgon po chen bo bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:283b-17: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2625E:283b-18: byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2625E:283b-19: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2625E:283b-20: skyabs gsum de ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2625E:283b-21: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2625E:283b-23: zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:283b-24: de nas slob ma gcig tsog tsog por byas te /
T02TD2625E:283b-25: de'i ming nas brjod la thams cad gzengs bstod par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:283b-26: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02TD2625E:283b-27: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2625E:283b-28: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD2625E:283b-29: khyod la yang dag de ba stan bya //
T02TD2625E:283b-30: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2625E:283b-31: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2625E:283b-32: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams ;
T02TD2625E:283b-33: /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag / de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2625E:283b-34: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD2625E:283b-35: dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD2625E:283b-36: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02TD2625E:283b-37: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02TD2625E:283b-38: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2625E:283b-39: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD2625E:283b-40: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2625E:283b-43: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:284a-0: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces pa dang gzhan rab tu rgya @284a * //
T02TD2625E:284a-2: snying rje ra gyur pa'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:284a-3: de ltar lan mang gzengs bstod de //
T02TD2625E:284a-5: de nas slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun byas la /
T02TD2625E:284a-6: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2625E:284a-7: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2625E:284a-8: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02TD2625E:284a-9: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2625E:284a-10: ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2625E:284a-11: ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi //
T02TD2625E:284a-12: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2625E:284a-13: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2625E:284a-16: 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par //
T02TD2625E:284a-17: de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug / ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:284a-19: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2625E:284a-20: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2625E:284a-21: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang ;
T02TD2625E:284a-22: / sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD2625E:284a-24: 'di ni byang chub smon lam gdab //
T02TD2625E:284a-28: mgrin pa dang snying gar thal mo spyar bas /
T02TD2625E:284a-29: slob ma'i gnas de gsum du bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:284a-30: aom bhri ta bhri ta sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:284a-31: aom tra ta trat sarba a'a ba r'a n'a ni h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:284a-32: aom tshinda tshinda sarba a'a ba r'a n'a ni h'am phat ces bya ba'i rim pa spyar te lan bdun brjod la /
T02TD2625E:284a-33: rdo rjes kyang reg par byas la me tog dang /
T02TD2625E:284a-36: mar me dang spyi bo dang mdun du rang re'i sngags kyis spyin /
T02TD2625E:284a-37: de nas byin gyis brlab ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:284a-38: de nas so shing dor ba dang dri chu spyin te //
T02TD2625E:284a-40: so shing au dumw'a ra dang //
T02TD2625E:284a-41: aa shvad tha ni rma med pa //
T02TD2625E:284a-42: ha cang mi phra mi sbom zhing //
T02TD2625E:284a-43: sor grangs bcu gnyis tshad du byas //
T02TD2625E:284a-44: sbos kyi chus ni legs bar bkru //
T02TD2625E:284a-45: skud pa dag gis rnam par bkris //
T02TD2625E:284a-46: sbos kyis bkru zhing bdug pas bdugs //
T02TD2625E:284a-47: lag pas bran zhing bzlas pa ni //
T02TD2625E:284a-48: rigs kyi snying po mang du bzlas //
T02TD2625E:284a-49: yang na lan bdun bzlas par bya //
T02TD2625E:284a-50: slob ma rnams kyi grangs las ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-0: so shing la sogs bsags @284b par bya //
T02TD2625E:284b-1: so shing mgo zhabs gcig byas nas //
T02TD2625E:284b-2: rtse mo nas ni bca' bar bya //
T02TD2625E:284b-3: de nas bdag dang slob ma dang //
T02TD2625E:284b-4: gnas bsrung ba yang brtan byas nas //
T02TD2625E:284b-5: lha rnams thams cad legs mchod de //
T02TD2625E:284b-6: zhes pa dang yang gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:284b-7: slob ma mthun zhing tshogs pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:284b-8: byang phyogs su ni khab ltas shing //
T02TD2625E:284b-9: thal mo spyar te 'khod pa la //
T02TD2625E:284b-10: so shing go rims bzhin du spyin //
T02TD2625E:284b-11: slob ma shar du kha bltas te //
T02TD2625E:284b-12: mi smra bar ni so shing bca' //
T02TD2625E:284b-13: bca' ba zin nas mi dga' shing //
T02TD2625E:284b-14: phan tshun du yang mi dor ro //
T02TD2625E:284b-15: so shing mdun du drang ngo ra dor //
T02TD2625E:284b-16: de tshe bdag la lta ba dang //
T02TD2625E:284b-17: rtse mo gyen du bsgreng gyur na //
T02TD2625E:284b-18: des ni dngos grub mchog ces bya //
T02TD2625E:284b-19: de bzhin shar du bltas na ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-20: de yi dngos grub 'bri nag du bshad //
T02TD2625E:284b-21: mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na //
T02TD2625E:284b-23: so shing bor ba brgya zhig la //
T02TD2625E:284b-24: gal te thur du kha bltas na //
T02TD2625E:284b-25: des ni nges par sa 'og gi //
T02TD2625E:284b-26: dngos grub thob par gdon mi za //
T02TD2625E:284b-28: gal te ba lang ko ba tsam du lan gsum ma babs na /
T02TD2625E:284b-29: de la dbang ni mi bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:284b-30: slob ma nye reg byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-31: snga ma bzhin du 'khod pa la //
T02TD2625E:284b-32: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:284b-33: spos chu bla mas blud pa ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-34: re re la yang btung ba yi //
T02TD2625E:284b-35: khyor bar blugs la lan gsum blud //
T02TD2625E:284b-36: der ni 'thungs nas langs nas ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-37: phyi rol du ni kha bkru bya //
T02TD2625E:284b-39: 'dir ni aom hr'i:su bi shuddha dharma sarba p'a pam ni bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:284b-40: sarba bi k'a lpa ni ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2625E:284b-41: de nas bdung rtsi 'khyil ba bzlas pa'i ku sha stan dang sngas su byin la /
T02TD2625E:284b-42: de bzlas pa'i srad bu mdud pa bdun bor ba //
T02TD2625E:284b-43: dpung pa g-yas par gdags so //
T02TD2625E:284b-46: ku sha lag tu gtad nas su //
T02TD2625E:284b-47: g-yas su skud pa bcings nas ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-49: dor ba bca' ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:284b-51: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yi ge brgya pa lan mang du bzlas nas de dag brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:285a-2: zab cing rgya che'i chos bsgrags la //
T02TD2625E:285a-5: kun mkhyen rnams ni 'jig rten du //
T02TD2625E:285a-7: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02TD2625E:285a-8: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02TD2625E:285a-9: gang gi mnyam med sems can don //
T02TD2625E:285a-10: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD2625E:285a-11: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02TD2625E:285a-12: sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang //
T02TD2625E:285a-14: mthong bas 'byung bar gyur lags na //
T02TD2625E:285a-15: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02TD2625E:285a-16: tshul la gnas na smos ci 'tshal //
T02TD2625E:285a-17: skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni //
T02TD2625E:285a-19: gang dag spyad pa mchog 'di la //
T02TD2625E:285a-20: blo gros shin tu mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2625E:285a-22: sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu gcad //
T02TD2625E:285a-23: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD2625E:285a-24: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD2625E:285a-25: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02TD2625E:285a-26: bdag nyid chen po kun gyi ni //
T02TD2625E:285a-27: ba stan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD2625E:285a-28: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02TD2625E:285a-29: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02TD2625E:285a-30: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:285a-31: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD2625E:285a-32: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD2625E:285a-33: khyed rnams der ni dong bas na //
T02TD2625E:285a-34: rang 'byung skal ba chen po pa //
T02TD2625E:285a-35: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD2625E:285a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:285a-37: yod dang med las rnam par 'das //
T02TD2625E:285a-38: nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02TD2625E:285a-39: zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis //
T02TD2625E:285a-40: rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa //
T02TD2625E:285a-41: spros pa kun dang bral ba ste //
T02TD2625E:285a-42: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02TD2625E:285a-43: las dang bya ba la sogs bral //
T02TD2625E:285a-44: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2625E:285a-45: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02TD2625E:285a-46: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:285a-48: de nas slob ma slob dpon du 'os pas /
T02TD2625E:285a-49: bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2625E:285a-50: gtso bo bdag la sngom pa stsol //
T02TD2625E:285a-51: zhes bya ba'i bar du khyad par gyi sdom pa gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2625E:285b-0: slob dpon gyis de rnams la rmi lam ji ltar @285b mthong ba nga la nang par zlos shig ces brjod do //
T02TD2625E:285b-1: de nas rmi lam gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD2625E:285b-2: 'dod chags bral dang ldan pa'i chos //
T02TD2625E:285b-3: slob ma rnams la bshad nas ni //
T02TD2625E:285b-4: ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni //
T02TD2625E:285b-5: shar phyogs kha bltas nyal du gzhug / de nas nang par nam langs nas ;
T02TD2625E:285b-6: / rmi lam ci mthong dri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:285b-7: mthong na bzang ngam mi bzang ngam //
T02TD2625E:285b-8: the tshom med par bshad par bya //
T02TD2625E:285b-9: rmi lam rgyas pa mthong na ni //
T02TD2625E:285b-10: yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin //
T02TD2625E:285b-11: mchod rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong //
T02TD2625E:285b-12: de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-13: dge slong dag la chos nyan tam //
T02TD2625E:285b-14: yang na gzhan la nyan kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:285b-15: chos ni ram par dpyod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-16: de bzhin glegs bam klog pa dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-17: rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-18: yang na dge slong gcig bu mthong //
T02TD2625E:285b-19: de dang 'grogs shing gtam zer dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-20: yang na dge slong dngos por gyur //
T02TD2625E:285b-21: gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-22: de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong //
T02TD2625E:285b-23: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-24: de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-25: mdza' bo rnams ni sna tshogs rnams //
T02TD2625E:285b-26: rmi lam dag tu mthong na ni //
T02TD2625E:285b-27: rigs rnams dang ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD2625E:285b-28: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-29: kan dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-30: 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-31: ri dang glang po che dag kyang //
T02TD2625E:285b-32: mthong na yang ni bzang bar bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:285b-33: rgyal mdog dang ni mthong na yang //
T02TD2625E:285b-34: bde gshegs spyod dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD2625E:285b-35: dka' thub dang ni bram ze dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-36: phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-37: ba lang rta dang glang po dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-38: seng ge dang ni ri dvags kyang //
T02TD2625E:285b-39: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
T02TD2625E:285b-40: bkra shis ba yi bya rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-41: gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-42: rin po che dang dngul rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-43: nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-44: mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-45: mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-46: 'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-47: rgyan ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-48: kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:285b-49: byis pa dang ni gzhon nu dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-1: ni bzang po dag / rmi lam du ni mthong ba bzang //
T02TD2625E:286a-2: yang na thob cing reg pa smra //
T02TD2625E:286a-3: rmi lam na ni dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-4: rgyal por gyur cing 'byor pa dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-5: dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-6: g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-7: gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-8: lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-9: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
T02TD2625E:286a-10: de bzhin ri dang khang thog 'dzeg / ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
T02TD2625E:286a-11: rmi lam du ni mthong na dge //
T02TD2625E:286a-12: yam shing me la spyin sreg byed //
T02TD2625E:286a-13: bya ba bzang po dag la 'bad //
T02TD2625E:286a-14: chu la rkyal zhing pha rol brgal //
T02TD2625E:286a-15: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-16: stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-17: gyad stangs rngo ba cing 'gying ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-18: rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-19: de bzhin mthu rtsal gzi byin che //
T02TD2625E:286a-20: bkra shis rnams ni thams cad kyang //
T02TD2625E:286a-21: mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:286a-22: gsang sngags cho ga nyan ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-23: dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-24: sgrub la brtson zhing bsngags pa dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-25: sgrub pa bo rnams mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286a-26: de la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:286a-27: dge ba rnams pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad nas ni //
T02TD2625E:286a-28: de nas bzlog pa spang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:286a-29: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:286a-30: rab dang 'bri nag dang tham la //
T02TD2625E:286a-32: mi dge ba ni mi 'grub bo //
T02TD2625E:286a-33: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
T02TD2625E:286a-34: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:286a-35: gsang sngags dngos grub gsum 'grub pa ;
T02TD2625E:286a-36: / rab dang 'bri nag dang tha ma'o //
T02TD2625E:286a-37: mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
T02TD2625E:286a-38: spyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:286a-39: ba yi mar las brgya rtsa brgyang //
T02TD2625E:286a-40: cho ga bzhin du zhi bar bya //
T02TD2625E:286a-42: de ltar rmi lam bshad nas de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyang kyis de dag bsrung ste /
T02TD2625E:286a-43: dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thams cad nyal bar bya ba ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la mi bya bar glo g-yas pa phab ste'o //
T02TD2625E:286a-44: de nas nang par rmi lam gyi tshul shes par byas te /
T02TD2625E:286b-0: 'dod pa'i rgyal pos dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su phyogs skyong ba rnams bkug @286b ste ;
T02TD2625E:286b-1: aom badzra k'i li zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyi bur phas gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:286b-2: 'dis don gyis drangs pa'i sta gon la gnas pa gzhan ni re zhig dang po nyi ma shar ba'i dus su //
T02TD2625E:286b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dri zhim pos mandala khru gang yan chad byas la /
T02TD2625E:286b-4: sngon bzhin du sa'i lha la mchod pa dang tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gsol ba btab la sa'i lha de nyid du yang thim par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:286b-5: de nas rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du dri zhim pa'i thig le byas la der lha rnams bstims te /
T02TD2625E:286b-6: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bskor ba byas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:286b-8: sa gzhi steng du byug spos kyis //
T02TD2625E:286b-9: dkyil 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya //
T02TD2625E:286b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi ni rig sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:286b-11: lag pas brab cing lan bdun bzlas //
T02TD2625E:286b-12: de nas gtso bo'i lha rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:286b-13: ming gis yid la bsams nas su ;
T02TD2625E:286b-14: / byug spos me tog la sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:286b-15: snying po ci rigs mchod par bya //
T02TD2625E:286b-16: lha bshos dag kyang dbu la bar bya //
T02TD2625E:286b-17: bdug spos mngon par bsngags pa'ang dbul //
T02TD2625E:286b-18: der ni mchod pa yang byas nas //
T02TD2625E:286b-19: bdug spos lag tu thogs nas ni //
T02TD2625E:286b-20: blo gros can gyis lha rnams la ;
T02TD2625E:286b-21: / gus par gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2625E:286b-22: gang gi dkyil 'khor yin pa'i sngags //
T02TD2625E:286b-23: de la thog mar gdags par gsol //
T02TD2625E:286b-24: de yi go rims spyar ba yi //
T02TD2625E:286b-25: lha rnams kun la gdags par gsol //
T02TD2625E:286b-27: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:286b-28: bdag ni brtse bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2625E:286b-29: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02TD2625E:286b-30: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:286b-32: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02TD2625E:286b-33: de nas ngang ba mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD2625E:286b-34: sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan pa //
T02TD2625E:286b-35: byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //
T02TD2625E:286b-36: gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:286b-37: 'jig rten skyob pa'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:286b-38: gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang //
T02TD2625E:286b-39: gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i //
T02TD2625E:286b-40: sems can ba stan la dga' ba rnams //
T02TD2625E:287a-2: bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya //
T02TD2625E:287a-3: sang ni gdugs la dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2625E:287a-4: bzang po ming ni 'di zhes bgyi //
T02TD2625E:287a-5: yo byad ci yod pas 'dri na //
T02TD2625E:287a-6: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02TD2625E:287a-7: thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su //
T02TD2625E:287a-8: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2625E:287a-9: byin gyis rlob ba mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2625E:287a-10: de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni //
T02TD2625E:287a-11: bsam pa thag pas phyag byas te //
T02TD2625E:287a-12: ba stong pa'i tshig kyang brjod nas su //
T02TD2625E:287a-13: de nas slar ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2625E:287a-14: zhes gsungs pa lta bur bya'o //
T02TD2625E:287a-15: de nas bum pa rnams sngon du ba stan pa ltar ram //
T02TD2625E:287a-16: yang na 'di dag ni rang gi sems snang ba tsam mo zhes mos pas /
T02TD2625E:287a-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang rang gi yi ge las mtshan ma dang de las skur grub cing /
T02TD2625E:287a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs nas bum par gyur par byas la /
T02TD2625E:287a-19: grangs dang po'i mtshan ma dang 'brel par gzhag pa'ang rung ste /
T02TD2625E:287a-20: bum pa ni rab tu ma rnyed na rnam par rgyal ba dang las thams cad pa gnyis kyis byas la /
T02TD2625E:287a-21: rnam par rgyal ba yang 'dir lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin la rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su gzhag go //
T02TD2625E:287a-22: de la kha cig na re /
T02TD2625E:287a-24: sa'i lha sta gon la gnas pa med do zer te /
T02TD2625E:287a-25: 'di ni bla ma'i lung tha dad pas nges pa med do //
T02TD2625E:287a-26: sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2625E:287a-27: da ni sdom gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob ma 'jug pa ston te /
T02TD2625E:287a-28: sdom ni 'dir thun mong gi sngom pa la gnas pa ste /
T02TD2625E:287a-29: khyad par gyi sdom pa ni gdong dbog par bya ba yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:287a-30: de yang legs par sta gon la gnas pa'i slob ma de dag dkyil 'khor chen por gzug pa'i tshul ni /
T02TD2625E:287a-31: sta gon la gnas pa'i phyi de nang bar dri'i thig le'i lha rnams la mchod pa dgus mchod nas nam mkha' la bteg la ;
T02TD2625E:287a-32: sngar bshad pa ltar nang dang phyi'i thig gdab la /
T02TD2625E:287a-33: tshon bkye ste khrus byas la dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad bkod nas bum par bcug ste /
T02TD2625E:287a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa byas la /
T02TD2625E:287a-35: sngon bzhin du phyi rol du gtor ma spyin te nang du bdag nyid zhugs la /
T02TD2625E:287b-0: de nas yo la bas @287b bcad pas slob ma re re nas bos la /
T02TD2625E:287b-2: bla mas slob ma gcig bu ni //
T02TD2625E:287b-3: dkyil 'khor dag tu dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2625E:287b-4: mkhas pas cig car slob ma gnyis //
T02TD2625E:287b-5: dbang bskur bar ni yongs mi bya //
T02TD2625E:287b-6: gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi yang rung //
T02TD2625E:287b-7: thams cad so sor bya ba ni //
T02TD2625E:287b-8: yo byad sar pa gzhan rnams kyis //
T02TD2625E:287b-9: dbang bskur ba yi bla mas bya //
T02TD2625E:287b-10: rig sngags dbang ni thob pa la //
T02TD2625E:287b-11: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2625E:287b-12: dbang bskur ba yi cho ga dang //
T02TD2625E:287b-13: bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'ang de bzhin spyar //
T02TD2625E:287b-14: zhes gsungs pas 'jug pa ni dbang bskur ba'i dang po nyid du gyur pas so //
T02TD2625E:287b-16: las kyi bum ba'i chu mchod yon gyi snod du blugs pa ku sha'i bam pos bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bsrung ngo //
T02TD2625E:287b-17: de ltar yang slob ma re re nas bkug ste /
T02TD2625E:287b-18: bsang gtor snga ma bzhin byas nas //
T02TD2625E:287b-19: byug spos la sogs byin nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:287b-20: snying pos mngon par bsngags nas ni //
T02TD2625E:287b-22: dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g-yogs nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:287b-23: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:287b-24: btab pa'i gos kyis gdong g-yogs te //
T02TD2625E:287b-26: rdo rje 'dzin mas dpal gyi padmor lag gnyis bya //
T02TD2625E:287b-27: me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan la //
T02TD2625E:287b-28: zhes bya ba ni de nyid las sngar ba stan pa'i phyag rgya la /
T02TD2625E:287b-29: me tog dag ni bzhag nas su //
T02TD2625E:287b-30: de nas dkyil 'khor bdag pos sngags //
T02TD2625E:287b-31: phyag rgyar bcas pas spyi bor gzhag / gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya //
T02TD2625E:287b-33: de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD2625E:287b-34: aom badzr'a dhi tishtha h'um zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:287b-35: de nas slob dpon gyis bu khyod su yin khyod gang la dga' zhes dri'o //
T02TD2625E:287b-37: bdag ni skal ba bzang po ste //
T02TD2625E:287b-38: sangs rgyas nyid du gyur la dga'o //
T02TD2625E:287b-40: de nas sa ma ye h'um zhes lan gsum bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:287b-41: yan lag bdun sngon du byas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
T02TD2625E:288a-0: de nas deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs par gyur gyis khyod kyis de @288a * //
T02TD2625E:288a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba chen po 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba su la 'ang ma smra shig ces brjod la /
T02TD2625E:288a-2: aom badzra pra be sha h'um badzra h'um zhes brjod la yol ba bsal te /
T02TD2625E:288a-4: rab zhi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya ;
T02TD2625E:288a-6: rab zhi zhes bya ba ni slob ma nges pa'o //
T02TD2625E:288a-8: nga yis di ring de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2625E:288a-9: kun gyi rigs su khyod bcug gis //
T02TD2625E:288a-10: gang gis shes na de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2625E:288a-11: kun gyi dngos grub thob byed na //
T02TD2625E:288a-12: dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos te //
T02TD2625E:288a-13: de phyir rdo rje ye shes bskyed //
T02TD2625E:288a-14: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i //
T02TD2625E:288a-15: mdun du brjod par mi bya ste //
T02TD2625E:288a-16: brjod ba tsam gyis dam tshig nyams par byas par 'gyur ro zhes brjod la rdo rje spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:288a-17: 'di khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD2625E:288a-18: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2625E:288a-19: rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni //
T02TD2625E:288a-20: bdun rgyud rigs rnams brlog par mdzad //
T02TD2625E:288a-21: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um phat ces brjod do //
T02TD2625E:288a-22: de nas rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgyas slob ma'i snying ga'i bu ga phye la slob mas /
T02TD2625E:288a-23: aom badzra sa ma ya hri da ya me pra be sha dri dha ti shtha h'um zhes lan gsum brjod la /
T02TD2625E:288a-24: slob dpon gyi snying ga'i ye shes kyi sku dang ye shes sems dpa' las de dang 'dra ba'i tshul 'thon te /
T02TD2625E:288a-25: slob ma'i snying gar gnas par bsams la bu ga med par bsams te /
T02TD2625E:288a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2625E:288a-27: snying la kun du [*kun tu?] gnas par mdzad //
T02TD2625E:288a-28: ci ste dam tshig 'das nas ni //
T02TD2625E:288a-29: de ma thag tu ba kas nas bzhud //
T02TD2625E:288a-31: de nas dri zhim po'i chu la aom badzrod da ka tha: zhes lan mang du bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:288a-32: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD2625E:288a-33: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD2625E:288a-34: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD2625E:288a-38: de nas gsang sngags mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:288a-39: sngags 'dis dam tshig spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:288a-41: de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:288a-42: de nas der phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis /
T02TD2625E:288b-0: gang ngas smras pa'i bya ba de khyod @288b kyis byos shig gal te ma byas na khyod yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:288b-2: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2625E:288b-3: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD2625E:288b-4: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi //
T02TD2625E:288b-6: zhes rigs thams cad la bsgrags la //
T02TD2625E:288b-7: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2625E:288b-8: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD2625E:288b-9: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02TD2625E:288b-10: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD2625E:288b-11: de nas de bas rtag tu zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:288b-12: bdag nyid de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:288b-13: zhes bya ba'i bar du khyad par gyi sdom pa thun mong pa phog la /
T02TD2625E:288b-14: de nas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yan lag dang bcas pa'i slob dpon du 'os pa la spyin te dbab pa'i cho gas gdab bo //
T02TD2625E:288b-15: de la dbab pa'i cho ga ni rang dang slob ma'i snying ga sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas phye la rang gi snying ga nas yi ge aa byung ste /
T02TD2625E:288b-16: slob ma'i snying ga la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i sgong skyes la yid kyis bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:288b-17: de'i 'od kyis lus thams cad kun du gang bar bsams te /
T02TD2625E:288b-18: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhashthi ne na tvam /
T02TD2625E:288b-19: badzra satva me aa bi sha du zhes brjod do //
T02TD2625E:288b-20: de nas slob dpon gyis ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya myur du bcings la /
T02TD2625E:288b-21: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2625E:288b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang yin par grags //
T02TD2625E:288b-23: rdo rje ye shes bla med na //
T02TD2625E:288b-24: de ring nyid du 'bab bar shog / ces slob mas brjod do //
T02TD2625E:288b-25: de nas aom badzra a'a be sha aa aa: zhes bcu nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:288b-34: brgya rtsa brgyang kyi bar du bzlas nas rdo rje h'um mdzad dmar po kun du [*kun tu?] 'khrugs pas yongs su gang bar bsams na nges par 'bebs so //
T02TD2625E:288b-36: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02TD2625E:288b-37: rkang ba g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan nas de nyid la dbab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:289a-0: steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi steng na khros pa'i yig h'um gi 'od zer @289a * //
T02TD2625E:289a-1: gyis gnon par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2625E:289a-2: 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor yi ge h'um las 'degs par gyur pa /
T02TD2625E:289a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs par bzhugs pas /
T02TD2625E:289a-4: h'um tr'am hr'i: aa zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing /
T02TD2625E:289a-5: h'um a'a be sha aa: zhes lan brgya zlos shing de la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289a-6: gal te shin tu sdig pa chen pos 'bab par ma gyur na sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289a-8: yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me //
T02TD2625E:289a-9: ram sbar rdo rje khro bo'i me //
T02TD2625E:289a-10: mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la //
T02TD2625E:289a-11: til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing //
T02TD2625E:289a-12: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:289a-13: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du til nag bo las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la dbus su h'um bsam pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289a-14: de nas spyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du [*kun tu?] 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje'i lus la babs pas sdig pa rnams bsreg par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289a-15: de nas yang rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya de bzhin du bcings pa /
T02TD2625E:289a-16: dbab pa byas na nges par 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:289a-17: de lta bus kyang ma phebs na /
T02TD2625E:289a-18: de la dbang mi bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:289a-19: babs na skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:289a-20: gal te babs pa de 'bar bar 'gyur la de mi 'dong na /
T02TD2625E:289a-21: de'i spyi bor ri rab dang dbang chen dang rdo rje dang yi ge aa dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang yadzad rnams kha dog ser por bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:289a-22: de nas nges par babs pas na /
T02TD2625E:289a-23: aom badzra satva su sam gra ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa glur blangs la /
T02TD2625E:289a-24: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289a-25: de nas brtan par byas la lce la rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD2625E:289a-26: bhr'um hi badzra zhes brjod na /
T02TD2625E:289a-27: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dngos po rnams don dang ldan par ma lus par smra'o //
T02TD2625E:289a-28: dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas ni bzhud par gyur te /
T02TD2625E:289a-30: de nas dkyil 'khor la dmigs te /
T02TD2625E:289b-0: slob mas yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i @289b cho ga byas la /
T02TD2625E:289b-1: aa sa me tri sa me ma h'a sa ma ye sv'a h'a zhes pa phyag rgya dang ldan par byas la bdag dam tshig can du mos par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289b-2: rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes ba nas gzhug par bya zhes bya ba'i bar te /
T02TD2625E:289b-3: de nas slob dpon gyis bden pa bsgrags te /
T02TD2625E:289b-4: bdag la bden pa'i byin brlabs pa //
T02TD2625E:289b-5: bdag gis slob ma dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2625E:289b-6: legs par btsud par gyur pas ni //
T02TD2625E:289b-7: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las //
T02TD2625E:289b-10: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:289b-11: bsod nams mthu ni ci yod pa //
T02TD2625E:289b-13: de skad brjod nas do 'og tu //
T02TD2625E:289b-14: sgo yi phyogs su de bzhag nas //
T02TD2625E:289b-15: de nas me tog 'thor du gzhug / ces gsungs pas so //
T02TD2625E:289b-16: de nas sngags 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:289b-17: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir ;
T02TD2625E:289b-18: / bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni //
T02TD2625E:289b-19: 'gro la phan pa'i gtso mchog gis //
T02TD2625E:289b-20: sman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2625E:289b-21: aom pra ti gri hna h'um zhes pas dor ro //
T02TD2625E:289b-22: me tog rin chen la sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:289b-23: gang la bab pa rigs kyi lha //
T02TD2625E:289b-24: gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni /
T02TD2625E:289b-25: dngos grub myur du the tshom med //
T02TD2625E:289b-26: ces bya ba ni ji skad du /
T02TD2625E:289b-27: gang du me tog babs 'gyur ba //
T02TD2625E:289b-28: de ni de yi rigs kyi lha //
T02TD2625E:289b-30: de la me tog dor ba'i tshul rgyas pa la ni /
T02TD2625E:289b-32: dngos grub rab 'bri nag rnam gsum ni //
T02TD2625E:289b-33: me tog bab pa rnams la brtag / lha rnams kyi ni khyad par ni //
T02TD2625E:289b-34: gnas kyi khyad par las kyang brtag / gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi //
T02TD2625E:289b-35: dbu la me tog babs gyur na //
T02TD2625E:289b-36: de tshe gtsug tor mdzod sbu dag / grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02TD2625E:289b-37: spyan la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02TD2625E:289b-39: stod du babs na mchog rnams 'grub //
T02TD2625E:289b-40: rked par babs na 'bri nag rnams 'grub //
T02TD2625E:289b-41: ro smad phyogs su bab pa ni //
T02TD2625E:289b-43: bar gyi dku la babs na ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-3: rim pa de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-5: go rims bzhin du shes byas la //
T02TD2625E:290a-6: de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang //
T02TD2625E:290a-7: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD2625E:290a-8: gal te lha yi gzugs dag las //
T02TD2625E:290a-9: ring du me tog lhung gyur na //
T02TD2625E:290a-10: de yis dngos grub yun ring grub //
T02TD2625E:290a-11: nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD2625E:290a-12: gsang sngags rnams ni mchod pa dag / gang du bkram pa tshun chad ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-13: de yi nye 'khor de yin te //
T02TD2625E:290a-14: me tog der lhung de yi rigs //
T02TD2625E:290a-15: lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu //
T02TD2625E:290a-16: gal te me tog lhung gyur na //
T02TD2625E:290a-17: gal te nye bar gyur pa ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-18: de ni de yi yin par bshad //
T02TD2625E:290a-20: la la'i me tog lhung gyur na //
T02TD2625E:290a-21: de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing //
T02TD2625E:290a-22: 'di ni dad pa'ang rab tu chud //
T02TD2625E:290a-23: gal te me tog dor ba dag ; ra ba'i ri mo la babs na //
T02TD2625E:290a-24: zhi ba byas nas de nas gdod //
T02TD2625E:290a-25: nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug / de tshe the tshom gyur na ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-26: mkhas pas bzlas te dor mi bya //
T02TD2625E:290a-27: der ni gar yang nges med pas //
T02TD2625E:290a-28: des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:290a-29: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang //
T02TD2625E:290a-30: don med phyi rol ltung na ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-31: zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-32: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / snying por me tog babs na ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-33: rtag tu don med mi 'gyur na //
T02TD2625E:290a-34: srad bu dag gis cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2625E:290a-35: de yi nye 'khor shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:290a-36: rigs gsum la yang cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2625E:290a-37: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtag / ji ltar grags pa'i tshul dag las //
T02TD2625E:290a-38: gtso bo rnams kyi rigs kyi bskyed //
T02TD2625E:290a-39: gal te me tog dor ba dag / mchod pa'i steng du bab gyur na //
T02TD2625E:290a-40: de ni rgyas pa'i sgrub pa dag / khyad par du ni shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:290a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po la //
T02TD2625E:290a-42: gang gi me tog bab gyur na //
T02TD2625E:290a-43: de ni de yi las rnams kun //
T02TD2625E:290a-44: myur du 'grub cing mchog tu gyur //
T02TD2625E:290a-45: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-46: gang gi me tog babs na ni //
T02TD2625E:290a-47: de la rigs gsum gsang sngags kun //
T02TD2625E:290b-1: / rdo rje 'dzin la rang rig nyid //
T02TD2625E:290b-2: gal te gnyis las 'das nas su //
T02TD2625E:290b-3: gang gi gsum pa la babs na //
T02TD2625E:290b-4: dkyil 'khor de nas dbyung bar bya //
T02TD2625E:290b-5: yang na dkyil 'khor gzhan du gzhug / de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD2625E:290b-6: me tog rnams ni dor ba las //
T02TD2625E:290b-7: bdag gi mdun du mang lhung ba //
T02TD2625E:290b-8: de la zhi ba brtsam par bya //
T02TD2625E:290b-9: spyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas //
T02TD2625E:290b-10: der ni slar yang 'dor du gzhug / lan gsum spogs te bor na yang //
T02TD2625E:290b-11: gal te legs par ma babs na //
T02TD2625E:290b-12: re thag bcad de slar btang ngo //
T02TD2625E:290b-14: de nas sngar yon gyis lag ba bkang ste zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:290b-15: yon bla ma la dbul te /
T02TD2625E:290b-16: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:290b-17: lhag pa'i lha'i dbang gi ngo bo me tog de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:290b-21: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
T02TD2625E:290b-22: mig 'byed par ni brtson pa ste //
T02TD2625E:290b-23: mig ni thams cad 'byed par mdzad //
T02TD2625E:290b-24: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2625E:290b-25: aom badzra tsa kshu autka ta ya ti zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2625E:290b-27: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol nas ni //
T02TD2625E:290b-28: slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo //
T02TD2625E:290b-30: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD2625E:290b-31: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD2625E:290b-32: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2625E:290b-34: rten dang dngos grub thams cad kyang //
T02TD2625E:290b-35: khyod la mngon du phyogs gyur gyis //
T02TD2625E:290b-36: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02TD2625E:290b-37: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02TD2625E:290b-39: de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor la phyag gsum byas la bskor ba gsum byas te /
T02TD2625E:290b-40: rang gi lha la me tog snyim pa gsum dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:290b-41: de nas slob dpon gyis de'i sngags lan bdun me tog la bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:290b-42: slob ma'i lag tu byin la slob mas kyang lan bdun de'i sngags bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:290b-43: lha khyod bdag gis mnos so zhes lan gsum bzlas so //
T02TD2625E:290b-44: de nas zhi ba'i spyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2625E:290b-45: mtha' ma nas brtsams la dkyil 'khor ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:290b-46: de nas de la dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2625E:290b-47: rab tu rgyas pa ba stan par bya //
T02TD2625E:291a-0: @291a * // phyag rgya chen po dag kyang ba stan //
T02TD2625E:291a-2: de lta bu'i slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga ste /
T02TD2625E:291a-3: the tshom la sogs mi bya ste //
T02TD2625E:291a-4: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi dam tshig rnams ni go sla bas ma phye'o //
T02TD2625E:291a-5: bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:291a-7: bdag gi de kho na nyid ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te de tsam la 'dir bdag tu gdags par zad do //
T02TD2625E:291a-8: sngags zhes bya ba ni de kho na zhes tshig lhag ma can du byas te /
T02TD2625E:291a-9: 'dod pa'i lha rang bzhin gyis grub pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:291a-10: sogs zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'am /
T02TD2625E:291a-11: sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rim pas bdag nyid lhar byas pa lha'i de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2625E:291a-12: de bas na 'dir ye shes dbab pa dang /
T02TD2625E:291a-13: mngon par byang chub pa dag ni bdag gi de kho na nyid yin la /
T02TD2625E:291a-14: mngon par byang chub ba bzhin yan lag dang bcas pa ni lha'i de kho na nyid yin no //
T02TD2625E:291a-15: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:291a-16: de kho na nyid gsum po 'di la yang yid gnyis la sogs pa dang smad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:291a-17: mos ba brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas //
T02TD2625E:291a-19: mos pa dang ldan pa nyid brtan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:291a-20: mos pa ni mi 'phrogs pa'i las can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:291a-21: de yang dam bcas nas dbang bskur na mos pa med pa dad ba tsam gyis 'jug pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2625E:291a-22: de bas 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:291a-23: de nas gsang ba thob pa yin pas //
T02TD2625E:291a-24: de las dang por mna' 'di'i snying po brjod par bya ste zhes gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:291a-25: de nyid kyi rgya cher bshad pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:291a-26: gsang ba thub pa yin par zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:291a-27: gsang bar bya ba'i don gang yin pa srog gi phyir yang su la'ang mi smra ba ste /
T02TD2625E:291a-28: de lta bu'i brtan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can ni gsang ba thub pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:291a-29: de la dang bor mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ston te /
T02TD2625E:291a-30: de lta bu'i sems can la yang gya tshom du ba stan par mi bya'i /
T02TD2625E:291a-31: mna' yang bsgrags te ba stan par bya'o zhes bshad do //
T02TD2625E:291a-32: de bas na gsang ba bla na med pa'i lam 'di ni rab tu yang 'bad pas brtags shing ba stan par byas la spyin no //
T02TD2625E:291a-34: gsang ba zla ba'i thig le las //
T02TD2625E:291b-0: de bzhin @291b gshegs pa thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:291b-2: ci ste rmongs pas smras byas na //
T02TD2625E:291b-3: slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2625E:291b-4: myur du zla ba phyed tshun chad //
T02TD2625E:291b-5: ba stan pas rnam par 'jog par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:291b-6: dang bor dam tshig gzhag bya ste //
T02TD2625E:291b-7: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ba stan par bya //
T02TD2625E:291b-8: gzhan du byas na dpa' bo rnams //
T02TD2625E:291b-9: dmyal bar bskal pa grangs med smin //
T02TD2625E:291b-11: de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:291b-12: dkyil 'khor chen po'i nub tu bar du khru dos chod par dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i phyed kyi tshad la lte ba'i lha'i mtshan ma bkod pa /
T02TD2625E:291b-13: me'i 'od kyi bar du rdzogs par byas pa der /
T02TD2625E:291b-14: khri'am khri'u la stan bzang po bting bar slob ma rgyan ma lus pas brgyan la bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:291b-15: rgyal ba dang bkri shis pa byas la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:291b-17: slob ma la la brtags pa dag / gal te dbang bskur 'dod pa la //
T02TD2625E:291b-18: dbang bskur ba yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2625E:291b-19: phye ma dkar pos bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:291b-20: dkyil 'khor dag dang rjes mthun par //
T02TD2625E:291b-21: stegs bu gru bzhir byas nas su //
T02TD2625E:291b-22: de yi dbus su tshon sna lngas //
T02TD2625E:291b-23: padma yongs su rdzogs par bri //
T02TD2625E:291b-24: bkra shis la sogs mtshan ma rnams //
T02TD2625E:291b-25: der ni ji ltar 'dod pa bri //
T02TD2625E:291b-26: bkra shis phyir ni gang ba stan pa //
T02TD2625E:291b-27: yang na dngos su dgod par bya //
T02TD2625E:291b-30: slob ma dbang bskur 'os rigs nas //
T02TD2625E:291b-31: cho ga 'dis ni nan tan du //
T02TD2625E:291b-32: dbang bskur ba yi cho ga bya //
T02TD2625E:291b-33: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:291b-34: btab pa'i stan ni gsar gzhag ste //
T02TD2625E:291b-35: bkra shis la sogs kun byas nas //
T02TD2625E:291b-36: bsrung ba nan tan cher bya ste //
T02TD2625E:291b-37: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags zlos shing //
T02TD2625E:291b-38: gdugs ni dkar po bzang po la //
T02TD2625E:291b-39: me tog phreng ba bzang pos brgyan //
T02TD2625E:291b-40: ras phran dkar po 'phyangs pa gcig / spyi bo'i steng du gzung par bya //
T02TD2625E:291b-41: slob mas yon ni cher 'bul zhing //
T02TD2625E:291b-42: bla ma bsnyen bkur byas pa dag / stan de la ni bzhag nas su //
T02TD2625E:291b-43: sngags kyis skyon bas la bkra shis bya //
T02TD2625E:291b-44: bdug spos legs par spyar ba yis //
T02TD2625E:291b-45: bdug pa khro bo'i rgyal pos bdug / rnga yab la sogs dag kyang gzung //
T02TD2625E:292a-3: 'di rnams kun kyang bshams te dgod //
T02TD2625E:292a-4: de bzhin bum pa bzhi rnams dgod //
T02TD2625E:292a-5: glu dang sil snyan rnga sgra bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:292a-6: shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcas bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:292a-7: de bzhin bkra shis ched du brjod //
T02TD2625E:292a-8: cho ga rgyas pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:292a-9: de la sogs par 'dod byas nas //
T02TD2625E:292a-10: yid kyis dkyil 'khor lha kun la //
T02TD2625E:292a-11: mkhas pas gsol ba btab nas ni //
T02TD2625E:292a-12: bum pa bzlas brjod brgya byas pa //
T02TD2625E:292a-13: de ni legs par blangs nas su //
T02TD2625E:292a-14: dkyil 'khor dal bus lan gsum bskor //
T02TD2625E:292a-15: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kun 'don cing //
T02TD2625E:292a-16: blo dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2625E:292a-17: de nas phyag rgya bcings nas su //
T02TD2625E:292a-18: gsang sngags zlos shing spyi bos gtugs //
T02TD2625E:292a-20: 'dir sdom pa gang yang mi 'dzin pa de ni /
T02TD2625E:292a-21: 'jug ba tsam bya'i dbang gang yang mi bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:292a-22: thun mong gi sdom pa 'dzin pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar thug pa bskur la khyad par gyi sdom pa 'dzin pa la ni thabs dang shes rab kyi dbang gi bar du bskur zhing /
T02TD2625E:292a-23: dbang dam pa de thob pa'i bya ba yang lung de nyid las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:292a-24: de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:292a-25: de ltar sar pa'i gos rnams bskon /
T02TD2625E:292a-26: me tog dri la sogs pas mchod //
T02TD2625E:292a-27: mchod phyir thogs dang gdu bur bcas //
T02TD2625E:292a-28: de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2625E:292a-29: de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang bzung //
T02TD2625E:292a-30: thal mo spyar ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:292a-31: dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug / gdugs dang bcas par sgo phyogs su //
T02TD2625E:292a-32: spyi bos btud de phyag 'tshal gzhug / slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02TD2625E:292a-34: mkhan pos de skad smras nas su //
T02TD2625E:292a-35: gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de //
T02TD2625E:292a-36: lag pas legs par blang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:292a-37: de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya //
T02TD2625E:292a-38: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2625E:292a-39: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2625E:292a-40: lha rnams kyang ni kun gyis bkur //
T02TD2625E:292a-41: sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:292a-42: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2625E:292a-43: nan tan bskyed de bri bar byos //
T02TD2625E:292a-44: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor /
T02TD2625E:292a-46: de nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs spyin te /
T02TD2625E:292b-0: h'um las byung ba rdo rje @292b 'dod pa'i rgyal pos lha rnams bstims pa 'di spyin te /
T02TD2625E:292b-1: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2625E:292b-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas //
T02TD2625E:292b-3: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu ba cang //
T02TD2625E:292b-4: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2625E:292b-5: de slob mas lag tu bzung la /
T02TD2625E:292b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dhar ya mi hi hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD2625E:292b-7: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2625E:292b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2625E:292b-9: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2625E:292b-10: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / ces brjod do //
T02TD2625E:292b-11: de nas a'a: las byung ba'i dril bu 'dod pa'i rgyal bos sangs rgyas thams cad bstims pa 'di spyin no /
T02TD2625E:292b-12: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2625E:292b-13: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD2625E:292b-14: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu ba cang //
T02TD2625E:292b-15: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02TD2625E:292b-18: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral byas ;
T02TD2625E:292b-19: / rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin //
T02TD2625E:292b-22: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD2625E:292b-23: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:292b-24: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2625E:292b-25: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bsrungs //
T02TD2625E:292b-26: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02TD2625E:292b-27: ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:292b-28: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2625E:292b-29: rang dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD2625E:292b-30: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2625E:292b-32: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD2625E:292b-33: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus ;
T02TD2625E:292b-34: / shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
T02TD2625E:292b-35: bsod nams byin rlabs kyis bsgrubs pa //
T02TD2625E:292b-36: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub //
T02TD2625E:292b-37: sems can don rnams brtan par byed //
T02TD2625E:292b-38: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:292b-39: phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2625E:292b-40: gang phyir gzugs kun brtan gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:292b-41: de nas phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:292b-42: zhes pas phyag rgya'i dam tshig spyin no //
T02TD2625E:292b-43: de nas tshul ji lta ba dang ldan pas /
T02TD2625E:292b-44: aom 'dir ni ngas khyod lung ba stan te //
T02TD2625E:292b-45: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2625E:292b-46: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:293a-2: / kye rdo rje zhes bya de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2625E:293a-3: grub pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag /
T02TD2625E:293a-4: 'di yis lung ba stan byas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:293a-5: sngags pa 'gro ba kun bdag yin //
T02TD2625E:293a-6: zhes pas lung ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:293a-7: yan lag de dag ni gsang ba'i dbang gi bar du thob pa la bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:293a-8: de nas dbang dam pa thob pa'am ma yin yang rab tu snod du rung ba la dbugs 'byung ste /
T02TD2625E:293a-9: mchog gsang dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02TD2625E:293a-10: mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas //
T02TD2625E:293a-11: sdig pa kun las nges grol bar //
T02TD2625E:293a-12: khyed rnams deng nyid legs par gnas //
T02TD2625E:293a-13: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD2625E:293a-14: slar khyed 'chi ba yod min te //
T02TD2625E:293a-15: mi tshugs pa dang mi gsod pas //
T02TD2625E:293a-16: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD2625E:293a-17: srid ba shin tu dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:293a-18: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyed 'das //
T02TD2625E:293a-19: srid ba shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:293a-20: ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin //
T02TD2625E:293a-21: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di ;
T02TD2625E:293a-22: / rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2625E:293a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis ma thun par gsungs //
T02TD2625E:293a-24: dam pa rtag pa'i dka' yin no //
T02TD2625E:293a-25: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD2625E:293a-26: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i //
T02TD2625E:293a-27: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya gang //
T02TD2625E:293a-28: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02TD2625E:293a-29: dam pa'i chos ni nam du yang //
T02TD2625E:293a-30: dor ba dag tu mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:293a-31: mi shes pa'am rmongs ba yis //
T02TD2625E:293a-32: rnam par dbye ba bya ba min //
T02TD2625E:293a-33: bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su //
T02TD2625E:293a-34: dka' thub kyis ni mi gdungs shing //
T02TD2625E:293a-35: ci bde bar ni rab tu gzung //
T02TD2625E:293a-36: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2625E:293a-37: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2625E:293a-38: nam yang yongs su mi 'dor zhing //
T02TD2625E:293a-39: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
T02TD2625E:293a-41: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma ni //
T02TD2625E:293a-42: slob pa'i dpon la gong smad pa //
T02TD2625E:293a-43: de ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
T02TD2625E:293a-45: / rims dang gdon dang yams nad dang //
T02TD2625E:293a-46: nyer 'tshe chom rkun la sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:293a-47: bla ma'i zhabs la smod pa yi //
T02TD2625E:293a-48: rmongs chen de ni gsod par byed //
T02TD2625E:293a-49: rgyal po'i gyod dang me dang sprul //
T02TD2625E:293a-50: rkun po chu dang mkha' 'gro dang //
T02TD2625E:293a-51: bgegs dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
T02TD2625E:293b-0: bsad @293b nas sems dmyal ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:293b-1: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02TD2625E:293b-2: rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che //
T02TD2625E:293b-3: dge ba rab tu mi spyoms par //
T02TD2625E:293b-4: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:293b-5: bla ma de la gus pas yon //
T02TD2625E:293b-6: rjes su mthun par dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:293b-7: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:293b-9: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsgrubs //
T02TD2625E:293b-10: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod //
T02TD2625E:293b-11: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
T02TD2625E:293b-13: de phul bsod nams tshogs yin pas //
T02TD2625E:293b-14: tshogs las byang chub bla med pa'o //
T02TD2625E:293b-15: de phul sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:293b-16: rtag tu phul ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:293b-17: gang phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas //
T02TD2625E:293b-18: ded khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2625E:293b-19: dam tshig lha rnams kun mnyam par //
T02TD2625E:293b-20: gnas par gyur par the tshom med //
T02TD2625E:293b-21: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
T02TD2625E:293b-22: kun gyis tshe ldan dbang bskur te //
T02TD2625E:293b-23: khams gsum rgyal po'i srid che yis //
T02TD2625E:293b-24: rgyal po bdag po brtan pa yin //
T02TD2625E:293b-25: de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02TD2625E:293b-26: grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02TD2625E:293b-27: khyad rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2625E:293b-28: deng nyid thob par the tshom med //
T02TD2625E:293b-29: de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02TD2625E:293b-30: rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde skyid ba sten par gyis //
T02TD2625E:293b-31: 'gro ba myur du bde ba 'dod pa thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:293b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs rtag par rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:293b-34: de nas chos ba stan par bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:293b-35: snying po bsnyen pa sogs grags pas //
T02TD2625E:293b-36: phyag rgya che la gnas bya zhing //
T02TD2625E:293b-37: dam tshig 'dod chags gzugs sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:293b-38: gsang sngags bzang po bzlas par bya //
T02TD2625E:293b-39: rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2625E:293b-40: rang rig de yi rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD2625E:293b-41: phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa yis //
T02TD2625E:293b-42: gzhan dang rang la 'ang mchod par bya //
T02TD2625E:293b-43: dka' thub smyung ba bud med rnams //
T02TD2625E:293b-44: ba sten pas grub par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:293b-45: mi snang mngon shes mkha' spyod kyi //
T02TD2625E:293b-46: dngos grub lus sems dag las byung //
T02TD2625E:293b-47: de bas sangs rgyas byang chub sems //
T02TD2625E:293b-48: sngags kyi spyad mchog spyod pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:293b-49: 'dod pa kun la nyer ba sten cing //
T02TD2625E:293b-50: chos kyi yi ge mchog brnyes yin //
T02TD2625E:293b-52: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ni /
T02TD2625E:294a-2: / gru bzhi byams sogs bzhi thig ni //
T02TD2625E:294a-3: chos rjes dran pa lta ngan spangs //
T02TD2625E:294a-4: ngo tsha khrel yod dang dbang sogs //
T02TD2625E:294a-5: ra bar bshad de rnam thar sgo //
T02TD2625E:294a-6: yang dag spong bzhi rta babs te //
T02TD2625E:294a-7: dran bzhi khyams ta rdzu 'phrul rkang //
T02TD2625E:294a-8: bzhi po sgo khyud byang chub lam //
T02TD2625E:294a-9: me tog phreng ba lam gnyis ni ;
T02TD2625E:294a-10: / dra ba dra ba phyed bshad cing //
T02TD2625E:294a-11: de bzhin gshegs lam rnga mo gos //
T02TD2625E:294a-12: rtse dril gsung rab yan lag ston //
T02TD2625E:294a-13: ka ba 'phags lam bum pa tshogs //
T02TD2625E:294a-14: gdung sel smin byed nyi zla ste //
T02TD2625E:294a-17: gdug pa srung ba yin par shes //
T02TD2625E:294a-19: lha'i de kho na ni bdag bsgrub pa la 'jug par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:294a-20: phyi rol dang ni shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams la ni /
T02TD2625E:294a-21: de kho na phye ste ma gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:294a-22: de ltar gzhung gzhan la brten pas dbang gi bya ba spyir ba stan nas /
T02TD2625E:294a-23: da ni rang gi gzhung gi dbang ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:294a-24: sarba bid kyis ji ltar dbang bskur te //
T02TD2625E:294a-26: sarba bid bcus yungs kar dkar po gser gyi snod du gnas pa la mang du bzlas te slob ma'i spyi bor byin pas /
T02TD2625E:294a-27: de'i 'od zer gyis lus khyab pas ma rig pa dang bral te /
T02TD2625E:294a-28: ye shes bzhi thob par bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:294a-29: 'di ni thams cad rig pa'i dbang ma rig pa 'joms pa ste dang po'o //
T02TD2625E:294a-30: bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs par //
T02TD2625E:294a-31: bcu po rnams kyis ci dgar dbang bcu bskur //
T02TD2625E:294a-32: zhes bya ba ni brdungs pa'am brkos pa'am /
T02TD2625E:294a-34: zla ba'i steng du sa bon lnga bo br'um h'um a'am dzr'im kham zhes pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po ji ltar dga' ba'i mdog dang dbyibs can rang rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma las byung ba rnams la /
T02TD2625E:294a-35: de dang 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstims la /
T02TD2625E:294a-36: ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags lngas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2625E:294a-37: dbu rgyan du gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:294a-38: slob ma'i mgo la bcing ngo //
T02TD2625E:294a-39: de nas sngar ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa la sogs ba rnams las brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:294a-40: rang rang gi sngags brjod pa'am /
T02TD2625E:294a-41: bum pa lnga'am gcig las med na ji ltar ba stan pa'i sngags kyis bya ste /
T02TD2625E:294a-42: dbu rgyan gyi gnas lngar bum pa'i chu cung zad blugs shing btung ba yang bya'o //
T02TD2625E:294b-0: bum @294b pas kyang reg par bya sta /
T02TD2625E:294b-1: kha cig na re bum pa ji snyed yod kyang bum pa rnams mi bteg gi //
T02TD2625E:294b-2: mchod yon gyi snod du chu bsdus la des sngags lnga zlos shing dbang bskur ro zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:294b-3: 'di la yang bla ma'i lung gis ma ngang ba med do //
T02TD2625E:294b-4: de nas rin po che'am me tog gi phreng ba zla ba dang /
T02TD2625E:294b-5: tr'am las byung ba'i rin po che de la /
T02TD2625E:294b-6: de dang 'dra ba mang po bstims te mthar phreng bar byas la rang gi sngags bzlas pas spyin no //
T02TD2625E:294b-7: de yang dbus kyi cha bas dma' ba tsam du bcing ngo //
T02TD2625E:294b-8: de nas dar dkar po sngon ba stan pa lta bu zla ba dang tr'am las las rin chen tog tu bskyed la /
T02TD2625E:294b-9: de dang 'dra ba rnams bstims te /
T02TD2625E:294b-10: mjug tu dar nyid du gyur pas dbu rgyan gyi rtsa ba nas lan mang du sngags zlos shing bcings la /
T02TD2625E:294b-11: rna ltag gnyis su mdud pa sor bzhi bzhi tsam gyen du drangs la /
T02TD2625E:294b-12: rtse mo 'phyang bas sta zur gnyis nas byin par slebs ba tsam du 'phyang du gzhug go //
T02TD2625E:294b-13: de nas rigs lnga'i las kyi phyag rgya slob ma'i spyi gtsug dang /
T02TD2625E:294b-14: mtshogs ma dang rna ltag g-yas ba dang ltag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:294b-15: rna ltag g-yon bdag tu reg cing rang rang gi sngags bzlas so //
T02TD2625E:294b-16: de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje dril bu slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:294b-17: lha gang la me tog babs pa de'i mtshan ma dang kye rdo rje zhes bya bas drangs la rang gi sngags rjes su bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2625E:294b-18: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba dang kham las byung ba'i don yod grub pa la de dang 'dra ba rnams bstims te /
T02TD2625E:294b-19: mjug tu gyur pa las byung ba rang gi sngags kyis slob ma'i lag tu spyin no //
T02TD2625E:294b-20: de nas rin po che sna bdun thogs la pha rol phyin pa rtags 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog / ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags med 'gro ba shes rab nor bu dam pa yin //
T02TD2625E:294b-21: spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o //
T02TD2625E:294b-22: thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin ta mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD2625E:294b-23: zhes 'phags pa sdong pos bkod pa las gsungs pa'i yon tan rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:294b-24: slob ma'i lag tu rang rang gi sngags kyis spyin par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:294b-25: de nas 'khor lo rkang ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD2625E:295a-0: dril bu dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am rgyud 'di nyid kyi @295a * //
T02TD2625E:295a-1: glegs bam lag pa g-yon du byin la rang gi sngags brjod do //
T02TD2625E:295a-2: de nas rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa'i lha mo lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te slob ma'i snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang mtshogs ma dang spyi gtsug tu rig pa la rang rang gi sngags brjod do //
T02TD2625E:295a-3: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya slob ma'i gnas ldar bcings la /
T02TD2625E:295a-4: rang rang gi sngags brjod do //
T02TD2625E:295a-5: de la dbang bcu gcig nyid la /
T02TD2625E:295a-6: ji ltar na dbang bcu bskur zhes gsungs she na /
T02TD2625E:295a-7: bden mod kyi 'on kyang 'khor los sgyur ba gnyis so so yin du zin kyang 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya bar gcig pas bsdus te gcig tu ba stan pas bcu'o //
T02TD2625E:295a-8: kha cig na re 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags gong ma ni /
T02TD2625E:295a-9: rgyal po dbang bskur ba rin po che bdun po phal ba'i sngags yin te gnas ma yin par sngags ba stan pa'i skabs su zhar las ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:295a-10: de ltar na dbang bcu zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:295a-11: kha cig na re bcu la sogs pa ni bcu'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:295a-12: de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje spyin //
T02TD2625E:295a-13: zhes bya ba ni h'um dang a'a: las byung ba'i rdo rje dang dril bu rang rang gi sngags bzlas pa slob ma'i lag tu byin la /
T02TD2625E:295a-14: tshigs su bcad pa ldas rjes su ngang ba spyin te /
T02TD2625E:295a-15: rang rang gi sngags bzlas so //
T02TD2625E:295a-16: 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ste /
T02TD2625E:295a-17: dbang 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2625E:295a-18: byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bla ma'i lung gis /
T02TD2625E:295a-19: dbang por byas la ngang ba spyin pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2625E:295a-20: kha cig na re tshig 'di ni rdo rje brtul zhugs ston pa'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:295a-21: ci dngos grub 'dod pa'i sngags 'ba' zhig dbang bskur ram snyam pa la /
T02TD2625E:295a-22: 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs te //
T02TD2625E:295a-23: mi yi dbang phyug 'khor lo thogs pa dang //
T02TD2625E:295a-24: sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD2625E:295a-26: khams kyi rgyal pos 'khor los sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yang slong dpon gyis rin chen sna bdun gyi gzugs brnyan thogs la /
T02TD2625E:295a-27: dang po rnam rgyal bum pa thogs pa dang bkra shis brjod do //
T02TD2625E:295a-28: de nas bum pa bzang pos dbang bskur ba'i khrus bya la /
T02TD2625E:295a-29: de yi 'og tu rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2625E:295a-30: nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun ni lham dang /
T02TD2625E:295b-0: ral gri dang pags pa dang khyim @295b dang ;
T02TD2625E:295b-17: shing bil ba'i 'bras bu dang gi wang dag kyang spyin te 'jig rten na bkra shis par grags pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:295b-18: der yang bkra shis brgyang pa 'don zhing /
T02TD2625E:295b-19: 'dir gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i yan lag bdun dang /
T02TD2625E:295b-20: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byas nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang 'di dag bskur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin pas na 'di la yang sdig pa gzhom phyir zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:295b-21: kha cig na re tshig 'di ni dbang bcu bskur zhes pa'i rjes su sbyor ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:295b-22: 'dis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang gi skabs su //
T02TD2625E:295b-23: kha cig na re 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las /
T02TD2625E:295b-24: de'i 'og tu dbang bcu gnyis rnams spyin no zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:295b-25: 'di las ni sgrub par byed pa med de 'di ni lugs gzhan kho na yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:295b-26: rgyud rnams las rang rang gi lugs kyi dbang bskur ba mi 'dra ba rab tu mang ba 'byung ba yang gcig tu ma thun par bya dgos par 'gyur la /
T02TD2625E:295b-27: rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang phyi ma'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i dbang rab tu mang po bsnan pa yin par yang gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:295b-28: 'dir dbang dang po ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'i chos yid la byed pa'i rgyu dang /
T02TD2625E:295b-29: de'i rgyu rgyud la yod par mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-30: gnyis pa ni de thob ba'i rgyu tshogs gnyis la sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-31: gsum pa ni tshogs sogs pa ni 'gro ba'i spyi bos bkur ba'o zhes bsngags pa'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-32: bzhi pa ni tshogs sogs pa rnams mi zhum bar bya ba dbugs dbyung ba'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-33: lnga pa ni ma zhum pa de rgyal ba'i phrin las byed par ston pa'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-34: drug pa ni yan lag de dag gis bdag nges par mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes yid ches par byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-35: bdun pas ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis gdul bya gdul bar mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:295b-36: brgyang pas ni rjes su ba stan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar byed pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-0: dgu pas ni bla na med @296a * //
T02TD2625E:296a-1: pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ni de nyid yin no zhes 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid la sred pa chad par byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-2: bcu pas ni mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas bar ston pa'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-3: bcu gcig pas ni de'i tshe gsang ba gsum bsam gyis mi khyab par shes par byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-4: bcu gnyis pas ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dus kun du [*kun tu?] thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel par ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:296a-5: des na 'di dag tsam gyis don yongs su rdzogs ba yin pas lugs gzhan gyis 'di gang du yang drang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-6: dbang ji snyed pa de dag yongs su mi nyams pa ni lhag pa'i lha yin pas na /
T02TD2625E:296a-7: rgyud gang du yang dbang lhag ma rnams kyi rten du gyur pa dang lhag pa'i lha'i dbang me tog gi phreng ba'i dbang ni dang po nyid du spyin no zhes bya ba 'di ni re zhig thun mong ba'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-8: de'i phyir dbang ni 'di rnams go rims dang grangs rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa kho na ltar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:296a-9: rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang tsam gyis lung gi don zab mo gud du drang bar mi bya ste /
T02TD2625E:296a-10: yid ches lung dang mi ldan par //
T02TD2625E:296a-11: chos rnams ston par byed pa na //
T02TD2625E:296a-12: mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis //
T02TD2625E:296a-13: bdag kyang chud gson gzhan chud gson //
T02TD2625E:296a-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang gi skabs su rin po che dang nye ba'i rin po che dang /
T02TD2625E:296a-16: bkra shis dang nye ba'i bkra shis rnams mthar spyin no zhes slob dpon kha cig smra ste /
T02TD2625E:296a-17: gdul bya spros pa spyod pa dag gi ngor ni /
T02TD2625E:296a-18: de dag mi dgag cing thams cad du nges par spyin pa yang ma yin te ci rigs su spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:296a-19: sngags grub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la //
T02TD2625E:296a-20: zhes bya ba la mos ldan zhes bya ba ni yon tan ma lus pa'i mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2625E:296a-22: slob ma yang bdag nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'am gzhan dag gis dbang bskur ba gcig yin na yang /
T02TD2625E:296a-23: ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul gyis dad pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD2625E:296a-24: theg pa chen po'i chos la mngon par brtson pa /
T02TD2625E:296a-25: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul la the tshom med pa /
T02TD2625E:296a-26: glags kyi skabs mi tshol ba slob mar khas len pa /
T02TD2625E:296a-27: cang shes pa'i tshul gyis nga rgyal spangs pa /
T02TD2625E:296b-0: bsam pa la @296b g-yo sgyu med pas gus pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:296b-1: slob ma de yang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa zhig yin na /
T02TD2625E:296b-2: de'i mdun du phyag rgya ba stan par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes rnam par gnas so zhes bshad de phyag rgya ni 'dir mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:296b-3: mos pa la sogs pa'i yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la /
T02TD2625E:296b-4: yon blangs na dad pa med par 'gyur bas na mos ldan zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:296b-5: sngags pas bka' yi rab tu bsgo bar bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-6: zhes bya ba ni yon bslang ba ste /
T02TD2625E:296b-7: ji ltar rigs par de dag ni re re la yang yon bslang ngo //
T02TD2625E:296b-8: yang na yid la gang 'dod pa //
T02TD2625E:296b-9: de ni bde bar dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-11: ngas kyang mos pa'i spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2625E:296b-12: ci ste nor yod bla mar dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-13: zhes bya ba la ci ste nor yod ces bya ba ni med na bsnyen bkur bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:296b-14: slob ma dbul pos bla ma la //
T02TD2625E:296b-15: bkur sti dag gis mnyes par bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-16: slob dpon dag ni thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:296b-17: bkur sti bya ba yon du bshad //
T02TD2625E:296b-19: yon ni dad pa'i bye brag yon las shes par bya'i gzhan du ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:296b-20: nor dang gter dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yon dbul pa phan yon dang bcas nas ba stan pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:296b-21: slob dpon des yon rnyed pa dag ji ltar bya zhen /
T02TD2625E:296b-22: de ni bya ba'i rgyud kha cig las gsungs pa ltar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:296b-23: bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams //
T02TD2625E:296b-24: phongs pa rnams la spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-25: khyi dang bya rog la sogs la //
T02TD2625E:296b-26: cung zad tsam yang mi spyin no //
T02TD2625E:296b-27: yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD2625E:296b-28: slob dpon dag gis bsdu par bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-29: bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-30: slob ma dag la bgor mi rung //
T02TD2625E:296b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun //
T02TD2625E:296b-32: slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:296b-33: gal te slob mas spyad na ni //
T02TD2625E:296b-35: gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na //
T02TD2625E:296b-37: dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du //
T02TD2625E:296b-38: de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul //
T02TD2625E:296b-39: gdugs dang rnga yab dril la sogs //
T02TD2625E:296b-40: sangs rgyas nyid la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-41: gdan dang bdug spos dri la sogs //
T02TD2625E:296b-42: dam pa'i chos la dbul par bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-43: gos dang yo byad snod la sogs //
T02TD2625E:296b-44: dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:296b-45: de dag las ni slob ma yis //
