T02TD2625E:297a-0: @297a * // cung zad tsam yang mi bkur ro //
T02TD2625E:297a-1: dge 'dun med na dge slong spyin //
T02TD2625E:297a-2: yang na dge slong ma la spyin //
T02TD2625E:297a-3: gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na //
T02TD2625E:297a-4: dge bsnyen dag la spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:297a-7: rig sngags yon gyi rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:297a-8: dkon mchog gsum la dbul ba ste /
T02TD2625E:297a-9: rang gis zos na dngos grub mchog / de yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:297a-11: bdag la mi dgos bdag zheng dam pa la dbul gyi /
T02TD2625E:297a-12: mchog las rnyed pa mchog ma yin pa la mi spyin zhing bdag gis kyang rab tu lhag par mi spyod do //
T02TD2625E:297a-13: sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam //
T02TD2625E:297a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:297a-15: yon gyi mtha'i dam tshig bsgrags pas te /
T02TD2625E:297a-16: de nas bla mas slob ma rnams //
T02TD2625E:297a-17: ma yengs legs par bkod nas su //
T02TD2625E:297a-18: shes rab pha rol phyin bklags nas //
T02TD2625E:297a-19: dam tshig 'di dag bsgo par bya //
T02TD2625E:297a-21: sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam //
T02TD2625E:297a-22: rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni //
T02TD2625E:297a-24: slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya //
T02TD2625E:297a-25: zhes bya ba la 'dir rdo rje'i rang bzhin nam rdo rjes mtshon pa'i bla ma ni rdo rje'i slob dpon te /
T02TD2625E:297a-27: gang zhig dam chos klog pa dang //
T02TD2625E:297a-28: 'chad dang man ngag ston pa dang //
T02TD2625E:297a-29: dbang bskur ba dang las byed dang //
T02TD2625E:297a-30: slob dpon zhes ni bya ba yin //
T02TD2625E:297a-31: zhes pa ste 'di dag kyang bsdu ba dang nges par rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2625E:297a-33: slob dpon yang gang gis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2625E:297a-35: gang gi thad nas las kyi man ngag mnos pa de yang /
T02TD2625E:297a-38: phrag dog med cing phan par 'dod pa ni /
T02TD2625E:297a-39: slob dpon yin te zhes bshad do //
T02TD2625E:297a-40: yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i slob dpon ni bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os pas na bla ma ste /
T02TD2625E:297a-41: sangs rgyas rnams dang phan 'dogs par mtshungs pas na /
T02TD2625E:297a-42: sangs rgyas dus gsum du bzhugs pa kun dang mnyam zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:297a-43: de dag las kyang gtsor gyur pa ni gang las dbang thob pa ste /
T02TD2625E:297a-44: de ltar yang rdo rje slob dpon ni gang gis dbang bskur pa'o //
T02TD2625E:297a-45: de la bsti stang med pa ni drod 'dzin cing brnyas thabs byed pa'o zhes bshad la /
T02TD2625E:297b-0: 'phags pa rab tu @297b grub par byed pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:297b-1: bla ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa ste //
T02TD2625E:297b-2: spyod pa ngan par gyur pa la 'ang //
T02TD2625E:297b-3: lus sam yang na yid kyis kyang //
T02TD2625E:297b-4: shes nas nam yang smad mi bya //
T02TD2625E:297b-5: zhes gsungs la gzhan las kyang bla ma gang las gdams ngag la sogs pa mnos nas /
T02TD2625E:297b-6: da ni gdams ngag thob pas 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni /
T02TD2625E:297b-7: snying nas slob dpon smod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:297b-8: zhes bshad do zhes ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:297b-9: rdo rje ma rnams nyed la ni //
T02TD2625E:297b-11: bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma dang ral pa gcig ma dang /
T02TD2625E:297b-13: sgrol ma la sogs pa ye shes rdo rje lta bur mi byed pas rnal 'byor ma nyid du ba stan pa rnams la'o //
T02TD2625E:297b-14: rnal 'byor can gyi zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
T02TD2625E:297b-15: brnyas ma yin zhes bya ba ni bud med du gnas pas smod pa srid pas dgag pa ste /
T02TD2625E:297b-16: bud med shes rab rang bzhin pas //
T02TD2625E:297b-17: de la brnyas pa bcu bzhi pa //
T02TD2625E:297b-18: zhes rtsa ba'i ltung bar yang 'di dag la brnyas pa nyid gzhag go //
T02TD2625E:297b-19: brnyas na ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:297b-20: brnyas mi bya zhes 'dir spyar te /
T02TD2625E:297b-21: sdug bsngal ni sngar ba stan pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:297b-22: lhag ma ni go sla ste slob ma dag gis kyang phyag 'tshal te gus pas spyi bos nod do //
T02TD2625E:297b-23: de nas kha lag bkrus nas ni //
T02TD2625E:297b-24: lha la mchod yon phul nas su //
T02TD2625E:297b-25: go rims bzhin du thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:297b-26: bdug spos cho ga bzhin du 'bul //
T02TD2625E:297b-27: de nas dkyil 'khor rig sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:297b-28: spyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyang du bya //
T02TD2625E:297b-29: zhi ba'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyang //
T02TD2625E:297b-30: snying pos kyang ni nyi shu gcig / ji skad ba stan pa'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:297b-31: mar gyi spyin sreg so sor bya //
T02TD2625E:297b-32: de yi 'og tu rang sngags kyis //
T02TD2625E:297b-33: spyin sreg ji tsam 'dod pa bya //
T02TD2625E:297b-34: de nas phyogs kyi gtor ma spyin //
T02TD2625E:297b-35: bsdams shing kha lag yang bkrus nas //
T02TD2625E:297b-36: slob ma dang ni bcas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:297b-37: me tog dri la sogs pas mchod //
T02TD2625E:297b-38: slob ma dang bcas ma yengs par //
T02TD2625E:297b-39: mgo bos gus par phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2625E:297b-40: so so'i sngags kyis ci rigs par //
T02TD2625E:297b-41: de nas slar ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2625E:297b-42: dman pa rnams ni phyags nas su //
T02TD2625E:297b-43: mtsho chen rnams su dor bar bya //
T02TD2625E:298a-1: kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bris sku'i cho ga ston te /
T02TD2625E:298a-2: de la 'dir nus pas ni bris sku'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bya ste rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD2625E:298a-3: yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la zhes gsungs pa de ni /
T02TD2625E:298a-4: thun mong du drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:298a-5: 'on kyang de ni dbul po la sogs pas 'byor pa yang dag la sba ba yang dag ste /
T02TD2625E:298a-6: glegs bam dang ni bris sku rnams //
T02TD2625E:298a-7: rmongs pa rnams la ba stan byas ni //
T02TD2625E:298a-8: skye ba 'di la dngos grub med //
T02TD2625E:298a-10: zhes gsungs pas rab tu yang sba bar bya ba yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:298a-11: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor las gzhan du ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:298a-12: bris sku'i skabs 'dir lha mtshungs par bya ba'i 'thad pa de lta bu yin du chug na /
T02TD2625E:298a-13: ci'i phyir lha'i rnam pa gzhan du ba stan //
T02TD2625E:298a-14: gco bo lnga la sogs pa bri bar rigs so zhe na //
T02TD2625E:298a-15: mchog tu thugs rje che bas sgo sna tshogs nas sgrub pa po la dngos grub spyin par brtson par ba stan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:298a-16: 'o na sangs rgyas sman gyi bla 'dir ci'i phyir bri zhe na /
T02TD2625E:298a-17: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mchog tu thugs rje chen pos sems can la mnyes gshin cing /
T02TD2625E:298a-18: khyad par du sngon gyi sngon lam gyi dbang gis bcud kyis len la sogs pa'i sman sna tshogs byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02TD2625E:298a-20: gang zhig sangs rgyas sman gyi bla 'di yi //
T02TD2625E:298a-21: mtshan rnams dran nam mchod dang bsnyen bkur byed //
T02TD2625E:298a-22: de yi nad rnams 'byang zhing sman rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:298a-23: lhag par mthu dang ldan par 'dis nges 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:298a-25: 'dir ni bris sku'i spyan sdar rdzas bsgrub par rab tu gsal la /
T02TD2625E:298a-26: rdzas kyi bsgrub pa las kyang bcud len ni mchog yin par gsungs pas /
T02TD2625E:298a-27: bcud len rab tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 'di bri'o //
T02TD2625E:298a-28: 'dir bcud len gyi bsgrub par gang las gsal zhe na /
T02TD2625E:298a-29: phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang //
T02TD2625E:298a-30: bla ma dkon mchog gsum dag la //
T02TD2625E:298a-31: skal ba cha re phul nas su //
T02TD2625E:298a-32: de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cig / ces pas dngos grub bgo ba gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:298b-0: bgo ba'i cho ga ni rdzas rnams la yin @298b bas so //
T02TD2625E:298b-1: rgyud phyi ma las pa dmar ser gyi mar zhes smos pa dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-2: mar de'am mar sar pa'am til mar ram chu'am /
T02TD2625E:298b-3: 'o ma'am zho'am chang ngam khrag gam /
T02TD2625E:298b-5: sha'am gang yang rung ba lon pa smos pa'i bcud len gyi rdzas rnams ni 'dir yang spyar bar rigs pas so //
T02TD2625E:298b-6: tshig gi don rnams ni go sla bas ma phye'o //
T02TD2625E:298b-7: sgrub pa po bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:298b-8: bdag nyid dbyibs dang sha tshugs dang //
T02TD2625E:298b-9: kha dog dang cha lugs ci 'dra ba de ltar bri'o zhes gsungs pa lung gi man ngag go //
T02TD2625E:298b-10: de nas rim pa'i sku gzugs de mchod de zhes bya ba ni rab gnas kyi dus so //
T02TD2625E:298b-11: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni nus na ste /
T02TD2625E:298b-12: mi nus na slob dpon gzhan bzang po 'ga' zhig gis so //
T02TD2625E:298b-13: spyan dbye zhing zhes bya ba ni rgyal po dbang bskur ba'i lugs ltar go 'phang brtan po la bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:298b-14: de la 'dir spyan dbye ba'i cho ga ji lta bu bya zhe na /
T02TD2625E:298b-15: de'i phyir nges pa'i tshig dang rnam par dbye ba dang cho ga rim pas phye ste rab gnas bshad /
T02TD2625E:298b-16: de la nges pa'i tshig ni pra ka ra na sha ne na tishtha pra tishtha zhes pa ste /
T02TD2625E:298b-17: mchog tu gnas pas na rab gnas so //
T02TD2625E:298b-18: de yang yun ring bas mchog dang khyad par du gyur pas mchog go //
T02TD2625E:298b-19: de la yun ring ba ni thams cad do //
T02TD2625E:298b-20: khyad par du gyur pa ni mchod pa'i gnas rnams te /
T02TD2625E:298b-21: ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:298b-22: rnam par dbye ba ni gnyis te gzhi rnam par dbye ba dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-23: cho ga rnam par dbye ba'o ;
T02TD2625E:298b-24: / de la gzhi rnam par dbye ba la gsum ste /
T02TD2625E:298b-25: sku'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-26: gsung gi bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-27: rigs so so'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:298b-28: de la sku'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:298b-29: mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang dang rdo rings dang shing ljon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-30: khron pa dang chu mig dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-31: lteng ka dang rta babs dang /
T02TD2625E:298b-33: gsung gi bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba ni phreng ba dang 'jig rten pa'i glegs bam dang /
T02TD2625E:299a-2: rigs so so'i bdag nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba ni sku gzugs rnams rang gi sku gang yin pa de nyid du rab tu gnas par bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:299a-3: cho ga rnam par dbye ba ni cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang mdor bsdus pa gnyis so //
T02TD2625E:299a-4: da ni cho ga rim par phye ste bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:299a-5: de la rab gnas byed phar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2625E:299a-8: gza' dang rgyu skar shis pa la bya ste //
T02TD2625E:299a-10: zla ba drug dang gza' bzhi dang //
T02TD2625E:299a-11: rgyu skar bcu bzhi gang yin dang //
T02TD2625E:299a-12: tshes grangs bdun gyi grangs nyid la //
T02TD2625E:299a-13: rgyal ba'i rab gnas la sogs nyid //
T02TD2625E:299a-15: dus de dag la gnas yid du 'ong bar /
T02TD2625E:299a-16: mda' dar dang bla re dang 'phan la sogs pas brgyan cing me tog bkram ste dri zhim por byas la /
T02TD2625E:299a-17: gnas der stegs bu dpangs su khru do yod pa /
T02TD2625E:299a-27: pha gu las byas la rdo thal gyis dkar por byug go //
T02TD2625E:299a-28: stegs bu de'i khar rab gnas bya ba'i lha la /
T02TD2625E:299a-29: sku khrus gsol ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2625E:299a-30: de la cho ga'i rim pa ni dang po stegs bu'i khar sku gzugs shar du mngon par phyogs par bzhugs la /
T02TD2625E:299a-31: ras ser po sku la gsol te /
T02TD2625E:299a-32: aom badzra ba star h'um zhes bzlas pas so //
T02TD2625E:299a-34: chu mer dor ba gsum gyis nges par spyang ngo //
T02TD2625E:299a-35: de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa kham phor du gzhag pa d'u rwa'i pir gyis blangs shing sngags 'di zlos pas bkru'o //
T02TD2625E:299a-36: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha na sv'ah'a /
T02TD2625E:299a-37: de nas dag par gyur na ni til mar dri zhim pos bsgos pa khar ba'i snod du bzhag pa d'u rwa'i pir gyis blangs shing /
T02TD2625E:299a-38: sngags 'di zlos pas legs par khyab par byugs te /
T02TD2625E:299a-40: de nas yang til mar bsal ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:299a-41: shun lpags lnga po'i phye ma dang spyar ba'i chus bkru ste /
T02TD2625E:299a-46: bar ka ta'i shun pa dag gis so //
T02TD2625E:299b-0: de nas yang skyu ru ra la sogs pa 'dag @299b chal gyi 'de gus byugs la /
T02TD2625E:299b-1: bum pa chu gtsang ma dri zhim pa bdud rtsi lnga dang spyar bas dbang bskur ba'i khrus gsol te /
T02TD2625E:299b-2: rgyal ba dang bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'don cing /
T02TD2625E:299b-3: dril bu gsil la glu dang gar dang sil snyan du ma sgrogs shing chu bum par blugs so //
T02TD2625E:299b-4: de'i tshe slob dpon gyis nam mkha' la sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2625E:299b-7: lha dang lha mo mang pos kyang bdud rtsi'i chu blugs par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:299b-8: tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags 'di zlos shing dbang bskur ba'i khrus bya'o //
T02TD2625E:299b-9: ji ltar bltams pa tsam nyid ni //
T02TD2625E:299b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD2625E:299b-11: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD2625E:299b-12: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02TD2625E:299b-13: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um a'a:sv'ah'a /
T02TD2625E:299b-14: da nas ras 'jam pos sku la chags pa'i chu legs par phyis te 'di ni khrus kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2625E:299b-15: de nas tsandan gnyis dang gur gum dang /
T02TD2625E:299b-16: la gu dang gandha ka ste dri lnga'i lde gu lha'i thugs kar byugs te /
T02TD2625E:299b-18: aom badzra gandhe a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:299b-23: lha bshos rnams rang rang gi sngags kyis phul la /
T02TD2625E:299b-25: spyi bo dang 'phrag [*'phrog?] ka rnams su rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pas lan gsum reg ste /
T02TD2625E:299b-26: lag par spos me thogs nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD2625E:299b-27: lce h'um las rdo rje ra byas nas sta gon la gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2625E:299b-28: bcom ldan 'das che ge mo rdo rje padma rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:299b-29: slob ma la ni brtse ba dang //
T02TD2625E:299b-30: khyed rnams la yad mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:299b-31: mgon po thugs rje chen po bdag / sang ni rab gnas bgyid lags na //
T02TD2625E:299b-32: gus pas bdag dang de la ni //
T02TD2625E:299b-33: bcom ldan bka' drin mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02TD2625E:299b-35: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2625E:299b-36: dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2625E:299b-37: gang yang sngags kyi lha gzhan dang //
T02TD2625E:299b-38: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:299b-39: ba stan pa la ni mngon dga' zhing //
T02TD2625E:299b-40: byang chub la brten 'byung po dang //
T02TD2625E:300a-2: rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag //
T02TD2625E:300a-3: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yi ni //
T02TD2625E:300a-4: ji ltar nus pa'i mchod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:300a-6: slob ma mchog dang bdag la ni //
T02TD2625E:300a-7: khyad kyis thugs brtse nyer bzung nas //
T02TD2625E:300a-8: rab gnas 'di la thams cad kyis //
T02TD2625E:300a-9: thugs brtser ldan par gnas par mdzod //
T02TD2625E:300a-11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad rab gnas kyi gnas de'i nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:300a-12: de nas gang la rab gnas bya ba'i gzhi de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2625E:300a-13: padma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis sam yang na yig 'bru las yud tsam gyis lhar ba skyed do //
T02TD2625E:300a-14: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer byung bas ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste /
T02TD2625E:300a-15: mdun du byon par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:300a-16: aom pra t'itstsha argham h'um zhes pas yon chab phul te /
T02TD2625E:300a-17: aom n'i r'i kham h'um zhes pas zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:300a-18: aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat ces pas zhal bsil dpul lo //
T02TD2625E:300a-19: yang me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang bshos dang /
T02TD2625E:300a-20: dril bu'i sgra dag phul la /
T02TD2625E:300a-22: zhes brjod pas dam tshig sems dpa' la bstims te /
T02TD2625E:300a-23: dbang bskur pa la rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2625E:300a-24: yang me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang bshos dang sil snyan rnams phul la /
T02TD2625E:300a-25: lha de'i sngags mang du bzlas ste /
T02TD2625E:300a-26: de nas yi ge brgya pa mu:'i mtha' can gyis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2625E:300a-27: 'di ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2625E:300a-28: de nas nang par stegs bu'i gnas der /
T02TD2625E:300a-30: gser gyi thur ma aanydza na dang bcas pa bshams la rab gnas bya ste /
T02TD2625E:300a-31: de yang dang por slob dpon gyis lag tu spos snod thogs la /
T02TD2625E:300a-32: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD2625E:300a-33: lce h'um las rdo rjer byas pa /
T02TD2625E:300a-34: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:300a-35: thugs pa rtser ldan pas ngang bar mdzod //
T02TD2625E:300a-36: ces pa'i bar du brjod pas lha rnams bstsal te /
T02TD2625E:300a-38: sang ni rab gnas bgyid lags na //
T02TD2625E:300b-0: zhes bya ba la rab gnas bgyid par @300b 'tshal lags na //
T02TD2625E:300b-2: de nas ye shes sems dpa' yang spyan drangs la /
T02TD2625E:300b-3: yon chab dang zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang /
T02TD2625E:300b-4: mchod pa'i tshogs phul la lha thams cad sku gzugs la bstims te /
T02TD2625E:300b-6: aom badzra aa ba ra na bi bhu sha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:300b-7: zhes pas rgyan ci 'byor pa dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:300b-8: de nas yang bstod pa byas la gser gyi thur ma aanydza na byugs pas spyan dbye ste /
T02TD2625E:300b-10: aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha na badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:300b-12: de nas di bya baa ka ne sa m'a dhi bhya ne na pra na ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:300b-13: zhes brjod cing bza' ba bzang po cung zhig nal zer sku la dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:300b-14: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas shing sku'i zhabs dang sked pa dang /
T02TD2625E:300b-15: dbu la lag pa g-yas pas gcus la rdo rje bzung la lan gsum bskor te brtan par byas la /
T02TD2625E:300b-16: stegs bu'i steng du sku'i cha gsum pa'i khril /
T02TD2625E:300b-17: ha cang ma dud pa dang ma dgye ba dang ma yo bar ci mdzes su bzhugs par bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:300b-18: su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:300b-20: de nas slob ma la brjod pa ni /
T02TD2625E:300b-21: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
T02TD2625E:300b-22: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02TD2625E:300b-23: ji skad gsungs bzhin spyan dbye ba //
T02TD2625E:300b-24: de ni ngas kyang byas gyur te /
T02TD2625E:300b-25: khyod kyis de ni kun rdzogs pas //
T02TD2625E:300b-26: ci bde bar ni mchod pa byos //
T02TD2625E:300b-28: de nas slo ba mas kyang sku la mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul la bstod pa yang bya ste /
T02TD2625E:300b-29: lan du mar bskor ba yang bya'o //
T02TD2625E:300b-30: de nas slob dpon gyis phyogs kyi gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2625E:300b-31: sku gzugs byin che zhing bkra shis pa dang /
T02TD2625E:300b-32: yun ring du bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:300b-33: 'byor pa yod na nal zer zas phul ba'i rjes la rgyas pa'i spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2625E:300b-35: mdor bsdus pa ni sta gon la gnas pa mi bya bar nyi ma gcig nyid la khrus la sogs pa'i bya ba kun rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:300b-36: de la glegs bam dang bris sku dang lder so la sogs pa ni me long la khrus bya'o //
T02TD2625E:300b-37: lugs ma la sogs pa ni dngos su bkru'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-0: lha khang ni lha'i sku ji snyed pa de snyed la rab @301a * //
T02TD2625E:301a-1: gnas bya'i spyir dril te ni ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:301a-2: mchod rten dang rdo rings dang rta babs dang shing ljon pa dang //
T02TD2625E:301a-3: gtsug lag khang dag ni rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub po //
T02TD2625E:301a-4: chu mig dang khron pa la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:301a-5: rnam par snad mdzad du rab gnas su byas pa las ;
T02TD2625E:301a-6: mjug tu de gyur pas chu mig la sogs par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-8: glegs bam dag ni 'od dpag med du'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-9: rab gnas kyi ched du dkyil 'khor brin rab gnas gang la bya ba'i lha de gtso bor bya'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-10: lha khang zhig sku mang du bzhugs pa de la ni rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-11: gal te de ltar spyan dbye ba ma byas na ci nyes par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2625E:301a-12: sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas par //
T02TD2625E:301a-13: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byed pa //
T02TD2625E:301a-14: sngags med pas ni thal ba la //
T02TD2625E:301a-15: spyin sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med //
T02TD2625E:301a-17: rnal 'byor kha cig gi dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:301a-18: rab gnas rab tu rgya chen po sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya ba rab tu rgyas pa dag ni 'dir ma brjod de //
T02TD2625E:301a-19: gzhung mangs pa la mi sred pa dang /
T02TD2625E:301a-20: phyi rol gyi bya ba ha cang mang ba ni rab tu g-yeng ba nyid yin pas rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir mi 'dod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:301a-21: nang gi bya ba gtsor byas te brjod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-22: bden pa'i byin rlabs dmigs par bya //
T02TD2625E:301a-23: zhes bya ba ni rab gnas byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun yon tan mtha' yas pa yin pa'i bden pa'i phyin gyi rlabs des /
T02TD2625E:301a-24: bdag gi ri mo 'di spyan dbye ba'i dus 'di nyid du /
T02TD2625E:301a-25: dngos grub myur du thob pa la lta na mchan ma 'ga' snang bar gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-26: de nas ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-27: gal te mtshan ma 'byung na de shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:301a-28: bzhad pa dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:301a-29: bzhad pa dang ni rda sgra dang //
T02TD2625E:301a-30: dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug bzhin te //
T02TD2625E:301a-31: zhes pa ni dngos grub rab gyi mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2625E:301a-32: dge slong bram ze'i bu mo dang //
T02TD2625E:301a-33: zhes pa ni dngos grub 'bri nag gi mchan ma'o //
T02TD2625E:301b-0: 'bras @301b bu zhes pa ni dngos grub tha ma'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2625E:301b-1: mthong na zhes bya ba ni ma 'khrul pa'i shes pas so //
T02TD2625E:301b-2: myur du zhes pa ni mtshan ma'i dbang gis dus myur ba nyid du'o //
T02TD2625E:301b-3: kha cig na re spyan 'byed pa na mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:301b-4: myur du zhes gsungs pas dang po'o gnas [*'og gnas?] 'chad pa ltar bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2625E:301b-5: bsnyen pa khel ba na bris sku bri zhing de nas bsnyen pa khyad par can de'i spyan sngar bya'i zhes ro //
T02TD2625E:301b-6: mtshan ma 'di dag ni mdor ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:301b-7: rgyas par ni ji skad du //
T02TD2625E:301b-8: de nas gzhan yang cho ga las //
T02TD2625E:301b-9: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga bshad //
T02TD2625E:301b-10: ngal ba'i nyes par gyur na yang //
T02TD2625E:301b-11: smyung bar bya ba mi shes so //
T02TD2625E:301b-12: de yi bar du sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2625E:301b-13: bsnyen pa dang ni mchod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:301b-14: spyin sreg cho ga bstod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:301b-15: dge ba dag la brtson par bya //
T02TD2625E:301b-17: bsnyen pa la yang dus mtshams su //
T02TD2625E:301b-18: mig sman lag brgyar bsngags pa yis //
T02TD2625E:301b-19: thog mar gnyid ni bsal ba dang //
T02TD2625E:301b-20: bsgrub pa'i tshe yang mig sman des //
T02TD2625E:301b-21: legs par bkru bar rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:301b-22: lig bu mig dang sug smel dang //
T02TD2625E:301b-23: ga pur shing tsha pi pi ling //
T02TD2625E:301b-24: ta ga ra dang spyar ba dag / rta yi kha chung dang spyar na //
T02TD2625E:301b-25: gnyid dang snyom pa'i 'jigs pa sel //
T02TD2625E:301b-27: kha gdong bkrus nas mig bsku'o //
T02TD2625E:301b-28: mig sman bskus pa'i mig de ni //
T02TD2625E:301b-29: bsgrubs pa'i tshe na bgegs kyang mthong //
T02TD2625E:301b-30: aom dza la loo tsa ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:301b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
T02TD2625E:301b-32: aom bi lo ki ni sv'a h'a ;
T02TD2625E:301b-34: aom bandu ri dvi bhe sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:301b-36: rigs gsum la yang rim bzhin mig sman bsku ba'i rig sngags so //
T02TD2625E:301b-37: ngal dang rmya ba bsang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:301b-38: spos kyi chu ni khyor ba gag / rab tu dri zhim lan bdun bzlas //
T02TD2625E:301b-39: khyor ba nyid kyis btung bar bya //
T02TD2625E:301b-40: nye reg byas blo can gyis //
T02TD2625E:301b-41: de nas mtshan ma brtag par bya //
T02TD2625E:301b-42: mtshan ma bzang po mthong nas ni //
T02TD2625E:301b-43: bsgrub pa gus par brtsam par bya //
T02TD2625E:301b-44: lcags kyi dung dang 'khor lo nya //
T02TD2625E:301b-45: g-yung drung padma rgyal mtshan dang //
T02TD2625E:301b-46: bkra shis bum pa gang ba dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-0: @302a * // dpal be'u rdo rje phreng ba dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-1: bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-2: sbrum mo pang na bu thogs pa //
T02TD2625E:302a-3: gzhon nu dga' zhing rgyas pa ste //
T02TD2625E:302a-4: de dag rab tu 'grub par ston //
T02TD2625E:302a-5: bram ze gos dkar gon pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-6: shing rta glang po rta rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-7: rtsi thog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-8: ngo mtshar dag kyang mthong ba dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-9: 'brug gi sgra ni grag pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-10: rig byed dbyangs dang rgyal ba'i sgra //
T02TD2625E:302a-11: dung dang rda dang rdza rnga dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-12: sgra rnams grub phyir rab tu shis //
T02TD2625E:302a-13: rma bya khrung khrung ngag mo dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-14: ne tsol sogs bya rnams kyi //
T02TD2625E:302a-15: sgra snyan rnams ni kun thob nas //
T02TD2625E:302a-16: dngos grub phyir ni las brtsam mo //
T02TD2625E:302a-17: smon pa bkra shis thams cad dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-18: bsod nams dang ni bde legs tshig / thos nas 'grub par shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:302a-19: yid du 'ang ba'i tshig rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-21: ser bu me tog 'bab pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302a-22: 'ja' dang dri ni zhim po ste //
T02TD2625E:302a-24: bar snang las byung mtshan ma ni //
T02TD2625E:302a-25: thams cad 'bri nag du shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:302a-26: sa las byung ba'i mtshan ma gang //
T02TD2625E:302a-27: de dag sa pa'i yin par bshad //
T02TD2625E:302a-28: lha yi dag gis dngos grub mchog /
T02TD2625E:302a-29: bar snang dag gis 'bri nag du 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:302a-30: sa pa dag gis dngos grub phul //
T02TD2625E:302a-31: gsum pa'ang gsum gsum dag tu dbye //
T02TD2625E:302a-32: de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams //
T02TD2625E:302a-33: dngos grub phyir ni bsgrags pa'o //
T02TD2625E:302a-34: mdor na gsang sngags thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:302a-35: de las bzlog na mi 'grub bo //
T02TD2625E:302a-36: dang por mtshan ma bzung nas ni //
T02TD2625E:302a-37: sems ni rab tu dga' gyur nas /
T02TD2625E:302a-38: yongs su mgu ba'i bsam pa yis //
T02TD2625E:302a-39: de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD2625E:302a-43: dngos grub rab dang 'bri nag dang tha ma'i ba bye ba ni /
T02TD2625E:302a-45: gang dag steng du 'gro ba'i las //
T02TD2625E:302a-46: de kun mchog tu shes bar bya //
T02TD2625E:302a-47: gang yang cung zad mi snang ba //
T02TD2625E:302a-48: de ni 'bri nag gi cho gar ba stan //
T02TD2625E:302a-50: de dag thams cad tha mar bshad //
T02TD2625E:302a-51: de bas rab 'bri nag tha ma yi //
T02TD2625E:302a-52: las rnams kyi ni bye brag las //
T02TD2625E:302b-0: @302b steng dang bar snang ba dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-1: gnas ni rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD2625E:302b-3: sna tshogs gzugs ni grub pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-4: mngon par shes pa 'thob pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-5: zhi ba'i blo dang ye shes 'thob //
T02TD2625E:302b-6: ba stan bcos thams cad shes pa'i blo //
T02TD2625E:302b-7: smra mkhas thos pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-8: yid bzhin nor bu rgyal srid dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-9: gter chen dag ni rnyed pa dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-10: de la sogs pa ba stan pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:302b-11: rig sngags dngos grub dam pa yin //
T02TD2625E:302b-12: mi snang stobs dang dngos grub dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-13: phug gi dngos grub bcud len dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-14: mang du thos dang shes thob dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-15: rkang mgyogs pa yi dngos grub dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-16: de la sogs pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD2625E:302b-17: 'bri nag gi rab tu bshad pa yin //
T02TD2625E:302b-18: 'gro ba thams cad dga' ba dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-19: drag shul spyod pa'i cho ga dang //
T02TD2625E:302b-20: gzhan yang cung zad phal gyi rnams //
T02TD2625E:302b-21: mkhas pas tha mar rig par bya //
T02TD2625E:302b-23: du ba nyid las 'bri nag du 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:302b-24: dro las dngos grub tha mang 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:302b-25: de ltar dngos grub rnam gsum mo //
T02TD2625E:302b-26: 'phags pa'i gsang sngags mthu chen gyis //
T02TD2625E:302b-27: dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:302b-28: sa blas ma tha ma grub par gsungs //
T02TD2625E:302b-29: lha yi sngags kyis 'bri nag po 'grub //
T02TD2625E:302b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs gsungs pa'i //
T02TD2625E:302b-31: sngags kyi dngos grub chen po 'thob //
T02TD2625E:302b-33: dngos grub 'bri nag po thob par bshad //
T02TD2625E:302b-34: rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yis //
T02TD2625E:302b-35: dngos grub tha ma 'grub par bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:302b-36: rab kyi tha ma gang yin ba //
T02TD2625E:302b-37: tha ming rab tu de mi mnyam //
T02TD2625E:302b-38: dngos grub lhag ma gnyis la yang //
T02TD2625E:302b-39: cho ga'i rim pa de nyid do //
T02TD2625E:302b-40: 'bras bu yon tan ba stan pa yi //
T02TD2625E:302b-41: che ba'i bye brag rnam gsum las //
T02TD2625E:302b-42: rab dang 'bri nag dang tha ma yin //
T02TD2625E:302b-43: bye brag de dag rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:302b-44: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2625E:302b-45: gsungs pa'i gsang sngags gang yin pa //
T02TD2625E:302b-46: de las dngos grub rab 'byung ba //
T02TD2625E:302b-47: tha ma dag la'ang yod par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:302b-48: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gsang sngags gang //
T02TD2625E:302b-49: kha cig las gcig pa yang yod //
T02TD2625E:302b-50: de nyid de yi las bshad pa //
T02TD2625E:303a-4: kha cig de ltar ris med par //
T02TD2625E:303a-6: lus kyi dngos grub par yin no //
T02TD2625E:303a-7: rdzas las byung ba 'bri nag yin no //
T02TD2625E:303a-8: longs spyod dngos grub tha ma yin ;
T02TD2625E:303a-9: / rab dang 'bri nag dang tha ma la //
T02TD2625E:303a-10: tha ma'i gsang sngags bzlas pa ni //
T02TD2625E:303a-11: la las rab tu brnyes byas nas //
T02TD2625E:303a-12: dngos grub gzhan las blangs na ni //
T02TD2625E:303a-13: mchog kyang rab tu ster bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:303a-14: rab la'ang la la zhig gis ni //
T02TD2625E:303a-15: ma bsgribs par ni bsnyen byas nas //
T02TD2625E:303a-16: sngags kyang dngos grub tha ma ster //
T02TD2625E:303a-17: de bas bsnyen pa rab tu gces //
T02TD2625E:303a-18: lha rnams la yang dbul po yod //
T02TD2625E:303a-19: yi dvags la yang mthu chen yod //
T02TD2625E:303a-20: dngos grub la yang de bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:303a-21: rnam pa sna tshogs yod par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:303a-22: rab 'bri nag tha ma re re la'ang //
T02TD2625E:303a-23: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du dbye //
T02TD2625E:303a-24: gsang sngags rnams kyi mthu shes nas //
T02TD2625E:303a-25: bsnyen pa las ni dngos grub btsal //
T02TD2625E:303a-28: de dag 'bras bu'ang rab 'bri nag dang //
T02TD2625E:303a-29: tha mar dbye bas rnam pa gsum du brtag //
T02TD2625E:303a-30: dpal dang phug tu 'gro dang mkha' la 'gro //
T02TD2625E:303a-31: bsam pa bzhin grub mi snang rnam pa dang ;
T02TD2625E:303a-32: / gnod spyin mo yi khyo dang bcud kyis len //
T02TD2625E:303a-33: mig 'phrul sgyu ma mtshan mo rgyu ba ste //
T02TD2625E:303a-34: da dag rab yin 'bri nag ni sa bdag po //
T02TD2625E:303a-35: grong dang nor dang dbye dang dgug pa dang //
T02TD2625E:303a-36: dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni gsad pa dang //
T02TD2625E:303a-37: klu yi gdon gyis zin pa gos ba dang //
T02TD2625E:303a-38: gang yang 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i las //
T02TD2625E:303a-39: de ni mkhas pas phran tshegs yin par ba stan //
T02TD2625E:303a-40: bye brag tu ni klu dang gnod spyin dang //
T02TD2625E:303a-41: byis pa gdon gyis zin dang gang dag tu //
T02TD2625E:303a-42: lus can rnams la ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag //
T02TD2625E:303a-43: ston par byed ba phra mo'i phran tshegs yin //
T02TD2625E:303a-45: de nyid las grub pa chen po brgyang dbye ba la yang gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:303a-46: bcud kyis len dang gter dang phug 'gro dang /
T02TD2625E:303a-47: nor bsgyur 'byung khungs sngags dang gser 'gyur rtsi //
T02TD2625E:303a-48: rin thang med pa'i rin chen nor spyin te //
T02TD2625E:303a-49: brgyang po ba stan pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2625E:303b-0: sngags dang phug tu 'gro dang bcud @303b kyis len //
T02TD2625E:303b-1: sdig pa spong bar byed pas mchog tu ba stan //
T02TD2625E:303b-2: rin chen dang ni gter dang 'byung khungs 'bri nag /
T02TD2625E:303b-3: gser 'gyur rtsi dang nor bsgyur rba ma'o //
T02TD2625E:303b-4: mi ni sems ba stobs ldan zhing chos la brtson //
T02TD2625E:303b-5: dka' thub kyis phyug dang bor ba stan pa'i sngon //
T02TD2625E:303b-6: rdul shas che ba la ni 'bri nag por gsungs //
T02TD2625E:303b-7: tha ma la ni mun pa can gyis brten //
T02TD2625E:303b-8: gang zhig mchog tu ba stan pa ba sten 'dod pa //
T02TD2625E:303b-9: de ni tha mar ba stan pa rnam par spang //
T02TD2625E:303b-10: gal te nor la sred cing sdug bsngal gyis //
T02TD2625E:303b-11: gdungs na 'bri nag po la ni brten par bya //
T02TD2625E:303b-13: yang kha cig las dngos grub chen po brgyang //
T02TD2625E:303b-14: mig sman dang ni rkang mgyogs dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-15: ral gyi sa 'og bsgrub pa dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-16: ri lu mkha' la spyod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-17: mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len //
T02TD2625E:303b-20: ri lu mig sman sa 'og dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-21: ral gyi mkha' 'gro mi snang dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-23: 'di dag grub pa chen po brgyang //
T02TD2625E:303b-25: de bzhin du dngos grub rnam par dbye ba gzhan du gsungs pa //
T02TD2625E:303b-27: de bzhin du ni mi slu ba //
T02TD2625E:303b-28: ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa //
T02TD2625E:303b-29: de bzhin gang sngon ngas mthong ba'i ;
T02TD2625E:303b-30: / byang chub sems mthong gang yin de //
T02TD2625E:303b-31: dngos grub de las gzhan ci dgos //
T02TD2625E:303b-32: de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni //
T02TD2625E:303b-33: rnam pa dag ni lnga bkod de //
T02TD2625E:303b-34: spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-35: de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-37: sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no //
T02TD2625E:303b-39: 'di dag la sogs pa lung rab tu gsal ba dang //
T02TD2625E:303b-41: rang gi blo dri ma med pas dngos grub rnam par dbye ste /
T02TD2625E:303b-42: 'di ni sngags spyod pa rnams kyi ngal ba byas pa'i 'bras bu yin pas //
T02TD2625E:303b-43: bdag gis rab tu spros par zad do //
T02TD2625E:303b-44: de nas gzugs de byin brlabs la //
T02TD2625E:303b-46: ji ltar byin gyis brlab ce na //
T02TD2625E:303b-47: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas //
T02TD2625E:304a-0: rab gnas byas nas yang lha de nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgya lan mang du rang gis de'i spyan sngar bzlas pa nyid kyis de byin gyis brlabs @304a * //
T02TD2625E:304a-2: ci bdog pas ni mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-4: dus rtag tu thun mtshams dag la bdag nyid la 'byor pa ci yod pas mchod bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:304a-5: rnam pa kun la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:304a-6: rtag tu ci nus pas kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:304a-8: rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:304a-9: zhes bya ba ni bris sku'i spyan snga kho nar bsnyen pa bya ba ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-10: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis //
T02TD2625E:304a-11: bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:304a-12: zhes bya ba ni sngar bsrung ba ba stan pa ste //
T02TD2625E:304a-13: kha cig na re 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sngags kyis bsrung ba bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:304a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni de shes pas so zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:304a-15: bdag gi de nyid dran byed cing //
T02TD2625E:304a-17: mngon par byang chub pa'am sems dpa' 'byung ba'i rim pas /
T02TD2625E:304a-18: bdag gi rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:304a-19: 'dir bdag gi de kho na nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-20: 'phags pa rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud dag las bdag gi de kho na nyid ston pa lhur len pa de dag las 'dir blangs te ci rigs su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-21: de ltar na 'dir dang po ni bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-22: de nas bris sku'i spyan sngar 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-23: de nas gzugs byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-24: de nas bdag gi rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2625E:304a-26: de nas bsnyen pa bzla ba bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:304a-27: 'bum phrag gsum mam zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:304a-28: sngags pa mchog gi dbang du byas nas 'bum phrag gsum ste /
T02TD2625E:304a-30: bzlas brjod grangs ni sum 'bum du //
T02TD2625E:304a-31: phal cher ngas ni ba stan pa dag //
T02TD2625E:304a-32: lus can sdig dang bral ba yi //
T02TD2625E:304a-33: sngags pa rnam par dag pa las //
T02TD2625E:304a-34: bzlas pa'i grangs ni ba stan pa ste //
T02TD2625E:304a-35: gzhan du bya ba ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:304a-37: sngags pa 'bri nag gi dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:304a-38: yang na drug ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD2625E:304a-39: 'bum phrag ces pa tshig lhag ma'o //
T02TD2625E:304a-40: sngags pa sman pa dag gis ni //
T02TD2625E:304a-41: dus yun ring por bzlas pa bya dgos te /
T02TD2625E:304a-43: lo grangs bcu gnyis dag bsnyen pas //
T02TD2625E:304a-44: las rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:304b-0: @304b nyes pa chen po byed pa yang //
T02TD2625E:304b-4: bye brag sum 'bum bzhi khri rtsod dus spyar //
T02TD2625E:304b-7: dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du //
T02TD2625E:304b-9: 'di'i tshad ni 'di las gzhan ci yang bya bar mi nus pas so //
T02TD2625E:304b-10: de la dngos grub kyi mtshan ma mngon sum pa ni //
T02TD2625E:304b-11: sngar rgyas par ba stan par zad do //
T02TD2625E:304b-12: rmi lam gyi mtshan ma phra ba ni //
T02TD2625E:304b-13: ji skad du 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las /
T02TD2625E:304b-14: de ltar bzlog pa'i gsangs sngags nyer 'gyur na //
T02TD2625E:304b-15: mtshan mo nyal na rmi lam 'di dag mthong //
T02TD2625E:304b-16: khang bzangs ljon shing bram ze seng ge rta //
T02TD2625E:304b-17: ri bo shing rta sgra ldan sprin dang ni //
T02TD2625E:304b-18: stag dang bse dang glang chen khyu mchog la //
T02TD2625E:304b-19: rmi lam na ni dga' bas zhon pa dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-20: me tog phreng ba dri dang gos dang ni //
T02TD2625E:304b-21: sha chang nya dang 'bras bu glegs bam dang ;
T02TD2625E:304b-22: / lha yi gzugs dang autpala dmar po dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-23: shing rta gang la'am ba bzhon be'u phrug can //
T02TD2625E:304b-24: gdugs dkar bsil yab lham dang ral gyi dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-25: rnga yab gser yu can dang phreng ba dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-26: nor bu mu tig nya phyis dung dang dngul //
T02TD2625E:304b-27: bud med gzugs bzang ba dang bu mo dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-28: rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis spas pa'i rgyan //
T02TD2625E:304b-29: mal stan dkar po bting ba rnyed pa dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-30: tho rangs khar ni chu bo chu klung dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-31: 'bab chu'am rgya mtsho mtsho dang rdzing bu dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-32: lu ma la ni 'thung ngam rkyal rmi dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-33: yang na khrag gis lus ni khrus byed dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-34: mchod rten lha khang gnas dang rgyal ba'am //
T02TD2625E:304b-35: byang chub sems dpa' mchog dang rang rgyal dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-36: zag med dge 'dun dang ni dge slong ma //
T02TD2625E:304b-37: dge bsnyen rnams dang lha dang sa bdag dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-38: lha min bram ze yid 'ong skyes pa dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-39: me dang mi mchog phyug cing 'byor dang gnyen //
T02TD2625E:304b-40: tha ma mdza' bshes bu dang gnod spyin dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-41: grub pa'i lha dang chung tshogs bdag dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-42: ci ste nyi ma zla ba za ba dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-43: sa yi nang 'gro sa bon 'thung ba dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-44: me la rdzi zhing sha ni za ba dang //
T02TD2625E:304b-45: lus kyi nang du bud med zhugs par mthong //
T02TD2625E:304b-46: rmi lam bzang po 'di dag mthang ba gang //
T02TD2625E:304b-47: de ni ring por mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:305a-0: @305a * // zla ba gcig dang zla phyed nyin zhag dang //
T02TD2625E:305a-1: skad cig gis kyang phyi phyir nye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:305a-3: gzhan yang nad med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:305a-4: de ltar bas na bsnyen pa phal pa byas kyang //
T02TD2625E:305a-5: dngos grub chen po 'dod na ni //
T02TD2625E:305a-6: bsnyen pa khyad par can brtsams te //
T02TD2625E:305a-7: shin tu mchog gi las de ni //
T02TD2625E:305a-8: bsnyen pa khyad par can gyis 'grub //
T02TD2625E:305a-10: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02TD2625E:305a-11: de nas 'di yi brtul zhugs brtsam //
T02TD2625E:305a-13: de la bsnyen pa khyad par can yang //
T02TD2625E:305a-15: de dang 'dra ba'i dka' thub bo //
T02TD2625E:305a-16: de las 'dir ni de dang 'dra ba'i dka' thub kyi bsnyen pa khyad par can ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:305a-17: de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2625E:305a-18: brgyang brgya nyid du tshang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:305a-22: sems kyi gnas ngan len bkag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:305a-23: lus dang ngag gi gnas ngan len gang yang med pa dang /
T02TD2625E:305a-24: zas dang gos dang gnas la sogs pa la chags pa med pa dang //
T02TD2625E:305a-25: rab tu yang rtog pas dben pa ste /
T02TD2625E:305a-26: des na 'dir bar chad kyi chos kyis dben par gnas pa ni /
T02TD2625E:305a-27: dben pa'i gnas su ni zhes tshig gzhan du yang gsungs pa ni //
T02TD2625E:305a-29: de'i phyir 'di brtul zhugs las spyod lam dang cha lugs kyis dman par zad do //
T02TD2625E:305a-30: bsnyen pa las ni dngos grub bcal //
T02TD2625E:305a-32: bsnyen pa rdzogs nas da ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du slob ma dbang bskur ba'i ched du sngar ba stan pa ltar bri bar gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:305a-33: de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni //
T02TD2625E:305a-34: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la //
T02TD2625E:305a-35: mchod pa rgya cher byas nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:305a-37: 'dir cung zad du ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das lugs ma la sogs par byas pa /
T02TD2625E:305a-38: rin po che'i gdan khri la bzhugs pa de dag tu rung bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:305a-39: de nas nus na bdag nyid kyis mchod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:305a-40: sngom pa bzung ba dang dbang blang ba rnams rang gis bya'o //
T02TD2625E:305b-0: gal te 'gro mi nus na gang las dam tshig la sogs pa thob pa'i bla ma @305b la sogs pa gang zhig don du gnyer ba de mnyes par byas te /
T02TD2625E:305b-1: des bdag dbang bskur la gtor ma rgya cher byin te //
T02TD2625E:305b-2: de nas dpa' bo bzhi dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gam /
T02TD2625E:305b-3: yang na sgrub pa'i grogs mchog 'ba' zhig dang sgrub pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:305b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por gsal la //
T02TD2625E:305b-6: ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub btsal lo //
T02TD2625E:305b-7: mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas pa brtsam //
T02TD2625E:305b-8: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub chen po'i dbang du byas pa ste //
T02TD2625E:305b-11: 'bri nag po rnams ni nam phyed na //
T02TD2625E:305b-12: rab ni nyi ma 'char ba'i bar //
T02TD2625E:305b-13: 'di ni dngos grub gsum gyi dus //
T02TD2625E:305b-15: ci ste gtso'am de yi sras //
T02TD2625E:305b-16: yang na lha rnams mthong 'gyur na //
T02TD2625E:305b-17: bsod nams mthu las ci dga' bar //
T02TD2625E:305b-18: dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya //
T02TD2625E:305b-19: lha yis dngos grub 'bras bu ni //
T02TD2625E:305b-20: de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol //
T02TD2625E:305b-21: phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang //
T02TD2625E:305b-22: zhes bya ba ni 'di'i don ni //
T02TD2625E:305b-23: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:305b-24: seng ge'i gdan gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i gdan //
T02TD2625E:305b-25: de ni dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:305b-26: bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ste der 'dug nas //
T02TD2625E:305b-27: rdzas blangs myur du bzlas brjod byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:305b-28: spyin blugs brgya phrag gcig kyang bsregs par bya //
T02TD2625E:305b-29: de nas de ni dri chus bkrus nas su //
T02TD2625E:305b-30: bgegs mang rnams kyang rab tu bsal byas nas //
T02TD2625E:305b-31: byang chub shing lo gsum gyi steng du gzhag //
T02TD2625E:305b-32: bzhi yis bkab nas ji srid bsgrub pa ni //
T02TD2625E:305b-33: rnam gsum mthong gi bar du gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2625E:305b-34: dro dang dud 'thul me bzhin 'bar ba'am //
T02TD2625E:305b-35: rim bzhin bzlog nas byung na 'ang 'grub par gsungs //
T02TD2625E:305b-36: dro bas 'gro ba thams cad dbang 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:305b-37: dud pa 'thul bas mi ni mi snang 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:305b-38: 'bar bas mkha' la shin tu 'gro 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:305b-39: mi yi lus ni lha ltar gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:305b-40: ji ltar lus la grang ba 'jug pa dang //
T02TD2625E:305b-41: ji ltar mngal du dri za 'jug pa dang //
T02TD2625E:305b-42: nyi zer me shel zhugs nas me 'byung ltar //
T02TD2625E:305b-43: de ltar dngos grub lus la 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:306a-2: snum zhing dkyus rings gser gyi mdog ltar gang //
T02TD2625E:306a-3: 'bru mar zad kyang 'bar bar gyur na ni //
T02TD2625E:306a-4: de tshe sngags pas dngos grub thob 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:306a-5: de dag rdzas las byung ba'i dngos grub bo //
T02TD2625E:306a-6: mis ni ri mo'i sku gzugs 'bar ba'am //
T02TD2625E:306a-7: phreng ba smin ma mig dang rnga yab bam //
T02TD2625E:306a-8: gal te rgyan rnams g-yo bar gyur pa'am //
T02TD2625E:306a-9: mkha' las me tog char pa rdzi char 'bab //
T02TD2625E:306a-10: sa ni myur du ga yo bar gyur ba'am //
T02TD2625E:306a-11: lus ni snang ba'am mkha' las tshig tu ni //
T02TD2625E:306a-12: bu gcig dam pa ci 'dod slongs shig ce'am //
T02TD2625E:306a-13: lha yi rnga sgra'am skyi bung ba spu ldang //
T02TD2625E:306a-14: rgyan gyi char chen rab tu 'bab pa'am //
T02TD2625E:306a-15: 'jig rten mkha' la lha dang lha min dang //
T02TD2625E:306a-16: gsang sngags gzugs ni mngon du mthong na 'grub //
T02TD2625E:306a-17: ma nyams me tog dbyig dang chu bsres shing //
T02TD2625E:306a-18: bstod dang bcas nas mchod yon rgyun sbrengs na //
T02TD2625E:306a-19: rtse gcig sems kyis gdong btud phyag byas te //
T02TD2625E:306a-20: dad dang 'bad pa'i rjes mthun dam pa blang //
T02TD2625E:306a-21: dam pa thob nas dga' bas phyag byas te //
T02TD2625E:306a-22: dad pas bstod cing mchod yon phul nas su //
T02TD2625E:306a-23: gsang sngags brjod cing slar yang gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2625E:306a-25: de ltar blangs nas ma bgos na //
T02TD2625E:306a-27: de ltar ma byas grub na yang //
T02TD2625E:306a-29: zhes bgo ba'i rdzas la ba stan pas so //
T02TD2625E:306a-30: de bas ni 'dir rdzas bgo ba'i cho ga ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:306a-31: bla ma dkon mchog gsum dag la //
T02TD2625E:306a-32: skal ba cha re phul nas ni //
T02TD2625E:306a-33: de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cig //
T02TD2625E:306a-34: med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2625E:306a-35: blangs nas yongs su spyad par bya //
T02TD2625E:306a-37: 'di yi don yang rgyas pa che //
T02TD2625E:306a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skal du //
T02TD2625E:306a-39: rdzas kyi cha gcig thog mar dbul //
T02TD2625E:306a-40: blo dang ldan pas bla ma la //
T02TD2625E:306a-41: phyag byas nas ni gnyis pa dbul //
T02TD2625E:306a-42: gsum pa sngags grub pa rnams la //
T02TD2625E:306a-43: dkyil 'khor phyi rol dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:306a-44: bzhi pa grogs po rnams la spyin //
T02TD2625E:306a-45: lnga pa bdag nyid spyad par bya //
T02TD2625E:306a-46: brtag par bya ba'i rdzas kun la //
T02TD2625E:306a-47: cho ga 'di dag bshad pa yin //
T02TD2625E:306a-48: de la'ang skal ba phyed phyed du //
T02TD2625E:306b-0: bgos nas @306b bdag gis phyed bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:306b-1: mchod yon phul nas bcom ldan skal //
T02TD2625E:306b-2: bdag nyid kyis ni bskur bar bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-3: sangs rgyas rnams la blu ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:306b-4: mchod pa la sogs cho ga bshad //
T02TD2625E:306b-5: bla ma med par gyur na ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-6: bla ma'i skal ba bdag gis blang //
T02TD2625E:306b-7: de la gus pas lhag par bya /
T02TD2625E:306b-8: de ni de yi blu ba yin //
T02TD2625E:306b-9: grub pa khyed rnams bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2625E:306b-10: rdzas kyi skal ba 'di bzhes shig //
T02TD2625E:306b-11: de skad tshig gis lan gsum brjod //
T02TD2625E:306b-12: sgrub pas mchod yon lan gsum dbul //
T02TD2625E:306b-13: sngags grub pa rnams med na ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-14: de yi skal ba sngags zlos pas //
T02TD2625E:306b-15: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-16: grogs po rnams la spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-17: gsang sngags zlos pa'i grogs po rnams //
T02TD2625E:306b-18: rtag par gus shing don du gnyer //
T02TD2625E:306b-19: dka' thub dang ni grogs byed pas //
T02TD2625E:306b-20: thog ma nyid nas grub pa yin //
T02TD2625E:306b-21: de yis byin pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-22: de bas blang bar rigs pa yin //
T02TD2625E:306b-23: bdag cag snga nas grub pa'o //
T02TD2625E:306b-25: mthun par smra zhing blang bar bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-26: bdag rang nyid kyis de rnams la //
T02TD2625E:306b-27: rdzas ni rnam par bgo bar bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-28: grub pa'i rdzas ni de lta bur //
T02TD2625E:306b-29: bgo bar rab tu bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2625E:306b-30: grub pa'i rdzas rnams kha cig ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-31: bgo ba'i skal ba ci 'drar bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-32: aanydza na ni thams cad dang //
T02TD2625E:306b-33: gi wang la sogs gzhon nu bshad //
T02TD2625E:306b-34: cho ga shes pas la la ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-35: yid kyis bgo ba yongs su brtag //
T02TD2625E:306b-36: de la phan gdags 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2625E:306b-37: ral gri la sogs mthong ba bzhin //
T02TD2625E:306b-38: grub pa'i rdzas rnams kha cig ni //
T02TD2625E:306b-39: gcig pu nyid kyis dpyad par bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-40: de la phan gdags 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2625E:306b-41: ras la sogs pa mthong ba bzhin //
T02TD2625E:306b-42: sgrub pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag las //
T02TD2625E:306b-43: kha cig mnyam pa nyid du bgo //
T02TD2625E:306b-44: ri lu la sogs mthong ba bzhin //
T02TD2625E:306b-45: de la phyed du bgo ba med //
T02TD2625E:306b-46: rdzas rnams la ni phal cher yang //
T02TD2625E:306b-47: gcig pus mang du bskur bar bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-48: man ngag ba stan tam nor spyin nam //
T02TD2625E:306b-49: rgyud las bshad pas yid ches bya //
T02TD2625E:306b-50: 'di dag khyod kyis byos shig ce'am //
T02TD2625E:306b-51: 'di yang khyod kyi don no zhes //
T02TD2625E:306b-52: bzlas brjod byed pas grogs po la //
T02TD2625E:306b-53: bgo ba dag ni de ltar bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-2: mkhas pa dag gis phan gdags pa //
T02TD2625E:307a-3: grub par gyur na cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2625E:307a-4: gang yang rung bas rab tu bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-5: dngos grub rnam pa mang po dag //
T02TD2625E:307a-6: grub pas rnam par go ba ni //
T02TD2625E:307a-7: bye brag tu ni bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2625E:307a-8: dri med blos ni shes par bya ;
T02TD2625E:307a-9: / skal ba dbang ba mnos nas su //
T02TD2625E:307a-10: zlos pas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-11: bka' lung grub par shes nas ni //
T02TD2625E:307a-12: de yi 'og tu bgo bar bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-13: thams cad la yang ci rigs par //
T02TD2625E:307a-14: legs par bgo ba bya bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:307a-15: dngos grub dang ni phal pa yang //
T02TD2625E:307a-16: mdor na cho ga de ltar bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-17: gus shing nor dang mchod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:307a-18: bka' bzhin byed cing phan 'dogs par //
T02TD2625E:307a-19: rdzas grub bla ma'i skal la sogs //
T02TD2625E:307a-20: blu ba dag ni de ltar bshad //
T02TD2625E:307a-21: bdag gis mchod yon phul nas ni //
T02TD2625E:307a-22: rdzas rnams lung bzhin bgo bar bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-23: gsang sngags lha la gus par ni //
T02TD2625E:307a-24: blo yis bsams la dpyad par bya //
T02TD2625E:307a-25: rig sngags rgyal la phyag byas nas //
T02TD2625E:307a-26: rig sngags rgyal po la yang gus par ro //
T02TD2625E:307a-27: zhes gsungs pa rnams spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:307a-28: sems can kun la phan brtson par //
T02TD2625E:307a-29: bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:307a-32: sngar rgyas par ba stan la //
T02TD2625E:307a-34: der ni nam gyi phyed dus sam //
T02TD2625E:307a-35: yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe //
T02TD2625E:307a-36: rdzas de yongs su gyur pa ni //
T02TD2625E:307a-37: 'bar phreng can gyi gzi brjid bzhin //
T02TD2625E:307a-38: sngags pa rang gis de blangs nas //
T02TD2625E:307a-40: bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che //
T02TD2625E:307a-43: gtso bo sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba //
T02TD2625E:307a-44: rdzas las byung ba'i sngags grub pas //
T02TD2625E:307a-45: dpal ldan mchod pa rab tu byed //
T02TD2625E:307a-47: rdzas kyi dngos grub yin par bshad //
T02TD2625E:307a-49: gsang ba zla ba'i thig le las kyang //
T02TD2625E:307a-50: 'jig rten thams cad kun du [*kun tu?] bkur sti byed //
T02TD2625E:307a-51: rig pa stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing //
T02TD2625E:307a-52: rig 'dzin dmu sman bud med rnams kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:307b-0: g-yag rda dkar po'i tshogs kyis @307b g-yob pa yis //
T02TD2625E:307b-1: 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel pa thob //
T02TD2625E:307b-2: blo ldan nam mkha'i ngos ni thams cad du //
T02TD2625E:307b-3: rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD2625E:307b-4: yid du 'ong ba'i spyan gyis rgyas pa dang //
T02TD2625E:307b-5: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde ba rtogs pa yi //
T02TD2625E:307b-6: mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rol pas rtse bar byed //
T02TD2625E:307b-7: ces gsungs shing yang gzhan las //
T02TD2625E:307b-8: sngags pa de yang stobs ni rlung dang mnyam //
T02TD2625E:307b-9: de nyid de la bcud len mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:307b-10: de yi tshe yang nye bar lo stong thub //
T02TD2625E:307b-11: lha yi byad gzugs lha yi gzugs dang ldan //
T02TD2625E:307b-12: grub pa de ni skra gnag nad kyang med /
T02TD2625E:307b-13: ces bshad de lo stong ni tha ma'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:307b-14: ci'i phyir rgyud dag las rdzas bsgrub pa 'di gtsor ba stan zhe na /
T02TD2625E:307b-15: 'jig rten gyi dngos grub la brten nas /
T02TD2625E:307b-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyang rim gyis sdug bsngal med par 'thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2625E:307b-17: gcig tu dpa' bo grub pa las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:307b-18: gzhan las kyang gsang ba'i bdag po //
T02TD2625E:307b-19: de la rtag pa 'di rgyu mtshan du mdzad nas /
T02TD2625E:307b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa rnams kyis rtag pa de nyid rang bzhin gyis stod par mkhyen kyang /
T02TD2625E:307b-21: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs kyis /
T02TD2625E:307b-22: 'dus ma byas gdags par brtags te yongs su bsgrub ba'i tshul du //
T02TD2625E:307b-23: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs sems can rnams la nges par ston te /
T02TD2625E:307b-24: des de rnams yid rab tu dga' zhing tshe ring po yang thob nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa /
T02TD2625E:307b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par byed cing /
T02TD2625E:307b-26: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i lam 'di grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:307b-28: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas /
T02TD2625E:307b-29: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi cho ga thugs dgyes bzhin du 'chad do //
T02TD2625E:308a-1: pa du mar brtson zhing 'bad de bya dka' ba rnams brtsams kyang thob par mi 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas /
T02TD2625E:308a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis tshe gcig po 'di kho na la thob bar 'gyur bas so zhes gsungs so ;
T02TD2625E:308a-3: / de ltar rdzas las rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i skabs 'dir dang por dam tshig blang ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-4: dbang thob par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-5: lha yang dag par gzung ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-7: sta gon la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-9: bsgrub pa'i phyir sta gon la gnas pa dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-11: lha tshim par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-12: lha gzi brjid bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-13: lha nye bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-14: bsnyen pa khyad par can dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-16: rdzas yongs su bzung ba dang //
T02TD2625E:308a-18: rdzas gzi brjid bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-23: rdzas kyi dngos grub bdag gis bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-25: rdzas mnan ba dang rdzas ma grub pa spogs pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-27: rig 'dzin gyi tshul dag gis rgya cher shes par bya ba yin mod kyi /
T02TD2625E:308a-28: 'phags pa rab tu grub pa las rab tu gsal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:308a-29: 'dir gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas nye bar gyur pa tsam las ma brjod do //
T02TD2625E:308a-30: bsgrub par bya ba'i rdzas rnams kyang //
T02TD2625E:308a-35: rgyud rnams las rab tu gsal lo //
T02TD2625E:308a-36: ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na //
T02TD2625E:308a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:308a-38: de ltar 'tsho ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la phan pa'i thabs rgyas par ba stan nas /
T02TD2625E:308a-39: shi ba rnams kyis ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs la spyad par 'gyur zhes /
T02TD2625E:308a-40: phyogs snga ma rnam par rtog pa la /
T02TD2625E:308a-41: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:308a-42: shi ba la phan pa'i thabs rgyas par ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:308a-43: nyon cig ces bya ba'i bar ni zhus pa dang lan te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:308a-44: de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02TD2625E:308a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:308b-0: sngar slob ma dbang bskur @308b ba'i tshul du ma lus par 'dir bya ste /
T02TD2625E:308b-1: cung zad du na 'chad par byed pa ltar ro //
T02TD2625E:308b-2: legs par brgyan te rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ro'i rnam par shes pa bkug la /
T02TD2625E:308b-3: de nas sta gon la gnas pa byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:308b-4: de la rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni ;
T02TD2625E:308b-5: lag pa gnyis gcig tu spyar te khu tshur ba cangs la mdzub mo bsgreng ste tshigs gsum pa bkug la lhag ma rnams ni gdu bu'i tshul du gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:308b-6: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2625E:308b-7: lcags kyu zhes ni 'dir bshad de //
T02TD2625E:308b-8: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
T02TD2625E:308b-9: sa btsud [*bcu dag?] ga la gnas pa dang //
T02TD2625E:308b-10: spang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang //
T02TD2625E:308b-11: thams cad rab tu 'gugs par byed //
T02TD2625E:308b-12: ces bya ba ni 'di'i mthu ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:308b-14: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a n'am aa /
T02TD2625E:308b-15: sarba tra aa pra ti ha ta ta th'a ga ta aam ku sha bo dhi tsa ra ya pa ri p'u ri ka sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:308b-16: zhes pa ste lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:308b-17: de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba'am //
T02TD2625E:308b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:308b-19: gal te ro med na gzugs brnyan la sogs pa gris la //
T02TD2625E:308b-20: de nyid yin par bsams la /
T02TD2625E:308b-21: tshul snga ma lngar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:308b-23: lha yi gzugs su ba stan nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:308b-25: ro'am gzugs sam ming bris ba de bsnyen pa'am /
T02TD2625E:308b-27: dbang bskur ba'i dus su lhar bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:308b-28: mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:308b-29: zhes bya ba ni ro'am gzugs sam ming bris pa ji lta bar mchod rten gyi dbus su gzhag ste 'di ni lha nyid du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:308b-30: skye bo dmigs ba can dag ni 'di mchod par bya ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa bzlog pa dang /
T02TD2625E:308b-31: bsod nams khyad par du 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:308b-32: rang gi lha'am lha gzhan gyi //
T02TD2625E:308b-33: snying po snying gar bris nas ni //
T02TD2625E:308b-35: rang gi lha zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:308b-36: gal te shi ba de la lhag pa'i lha zhig yod la /
T02TD2625E:308b-37: de yang slob dpon la sogs pas shes par nus na'o //
T02TD2625E:308b-38: lha gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:308b-39: gal te shi ba de la lhag pa'i lha med na dang /
T02TD2625E:308b-40: yod du zin kyang slob dpon la sogs pas shes par mi nus na /
T02TD2625E:309a-1: bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyi tshogs bri'o //
T02TD2625E:309a-2: yang na ro la tshim par bya ba'i spyin sreg byas la /
T02TD2625E:309a-3: rus pa rnams mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can chen po'i rus pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:309a-4: lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de //
T02TD2625E:309a-5: zhes bya ba ni mchod rten nam /
T02TD2625E:309a-6: lha'i gzugs kyi nang na gnas pa'i ro la sogs pa de la tha mal pa'i rnam par mi lha'i //
T02TD2625E:309a-7: lha'i rnam pa dang 'dra bar bsams la /
T02TD2625E:309a-8: khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya //
T02TD2625E:309a-10: 'di rtag tu phyag byas pa la sogs pas bsod nams bsags pa'i gnas su bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:309a-11: khyim mam kun dga'i ra ba la sogs pa mi mang po 'du pa'i gnas su mchod rten la sogs pa de gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:309a-12: de ltar yang 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:309a-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am /
T02TD2625E:309a-14: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi rnams gnas pa'i phyogs su //
T02TD2625E:309a-15: mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam /
T02TD2625E:309a-16: srog shing ni kha ba tsam /
T02TD2625E:309a-17: gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la /
T02TD2625E:309a-18: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na tshangs pa'i bsod nams skye bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:309a-19: 'di nas shi 'phos shing shi ba'i dus byas nas /
T02TD2625E:309a-20: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:309a-21: de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
T02TD2625E:309a-22: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:309a-23: de bzhin du rgyud phyi ma las /
T02TD2625E:309a-27: gnyen du gyur pa la dbang bskur bar gsungs pa rnams /
T02TD2625E:309a-29: de yi ming nas smos nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:309a-30: zhes bya ba ni mchod rten gyis phan par bya ba ston te /
T02TD2625E:309a-31: gro ga'am shog shog la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags /
T02TD2625E:309a-32: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha w'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba data /
T02TD2625E:309a-33: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a 'di ma h'a shra man: zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:309a-35: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
T02TD2625E:309b-0: sarba durga @309b ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD2625E:309b-6: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne /
T02TD2625E:309b-8: sarba karma a'a wa ra na bi sho dha ne che ge mo'i sarba karma a'a wa ra na bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:309b-10: mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2625E:309b-11: srog shing dang gdugs dang bcas pa'i mchod rten slob dpon gyi khru gang yan chad pa'am /
T02TD2625E:309b-12: ji ltar nus pa'i tshad can bye ba'i bar du bya'o //
T02TD2625E:309b-13: de nas mjug tu rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga sngon bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2625E:309b-14: 'di lta bu'i mchod rten gyi las 'di ni bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan te ;
T02TD2625E:309b-15: de yang 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:309b-16: ji skad du gsungs pa ni ba stan zin la /
T02TD2625E:309b-17: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:309b-18: gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs rnams su ni //
T02TD2625E:309b-19: 'jim pa'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i //
T02TD2625E:309b-20: bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can //
T02TD2625E:309b-21: sdig pa spyang phyir rtag tu gdab par bya //
T02TD2625E:309b-24: ji ltar spyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis //
T02TD2625E:309b-25: gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na //
T02TD2625E:309b-26: 'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'am //
T02TD2625E:309b-27: yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab //
T02TD2625E:309b-28: de ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la //
T02TD2625E:309b-29: byas pa gang yin de ni zad 'gyur la //
T02TD2625E:309b-30: de ni gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid du //
T02TD2625E:309b-31: mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu 'thob //
T02TD2625E:309b-33: tshig gi don rnams ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T02TD2625E:309b-34: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni //
T02TD2625E:309b-35: ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzlas shing //
T02TD2625E:309b-36: 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni //
T02TD2625E:309b-37: brgya phrag stong du tshang bar ni //
T02TD2625E:309b-38: bye ba snyed du rab bzlas na //
T02TD2625E:309b-39: lha yi gnas su nges par skye //
T02TD2625E:309b-40: zhes bya bas ni bzlas pa'i phan gdags pa ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:309b-41: bzlas pa'i grangs mi 'dra ba gsum ba stan pa ni /
T02TD2625E:309b-42: shi ba de'i sdig pa che ba dang /
T02TD2625E:309b-44: chung ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:309b-46: dkyil 'khor chen po'am bris sku'i spyan sngar /
T02TD2625E:309b-47: bdag gi rnal 'byor ji ltar ba stan pa las /
T02TD2625E:310a-1: pa ltar rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:310a-2: de nas mjug tu smon lam rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2625E:310a-4: dge 'dun mnyes par bya ba ste sngar gsungs pa ltar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:310a-5: des ni lha'i gnas su nges par skye ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob ste /
T02TD2625E:310a-6: gsangs sngags kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:310a-8: gsang sngags yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab //
T02TD2625E:310a-10: de bzhin du 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:310a-11: sog nags me mched pa'i me lce yis //
T02TD2625E:310a-12: ma bsgribs bzhin du cheng [?] tshing kun bsregs ltar //
T02TD2625E:310a-13: bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar //
T02TD2625E:310a-14: brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa bsreg //
T02TD2625E:310a-15: ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2625E:310a-16: gdungs na gzi brjid mi bzod 'jug ba bzhin //
T02TD2625E:310a-17: tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas brjod kyis //
T02TD2625E:310a-18: gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang 'ju bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:310a-19: mun nag smag la mar me byung ba yis //
T02TD2625E:310a-20: mun nag ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar //
T02TD2625E:310a-21: tshe rabs stong na gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun //
T02TD2625E:310a-22: bzlas brjod mar mes rab tu sel bar byed //
T02TD2625E:310a-24: de bas na gsang sngags kyi mthu'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab la /
T02TD2625E:310a-25: yid ches par bya ba med pa rnams la ni //
T02TD2625E:310a-26: bde ba gang yang med do zhes gzhan las gsungs pas //
T02TD2625E:310a-27: yid gnyis dang bral bas rtag tu gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor la brtson par byas te /
T02TD2625E:310a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:310a-29: de ltar dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2625E:310a-31: bzlas pas phan gdags pa rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:310a-32: rab tu gsal bar ba stan zin na /
T02TD2625E:310a-33: spyin sreg gis phan gdags pa ni ji lta bu zhig / spyin sreg ni 'dir rnam pa du zhig ces phyogs snga ma rnam par rtog pa rnams la /
T02TD2625E:310a-34: de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:310a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2625E:310a-38: sngon bzhin du ji ltar rigs pa'i cho gas sa'i tshul gtan la phab ste /
T02TD2625E:310b-0: dkyil 'khor lha'i sta gon du gnas pa yang @310b sngon bzhin du byas la //
T02TD2625E:310b-1: nang dang phyi'i thig kyang sngon bzhin btab pa las /
T02TD2625E:310b-2: snying po'i tshad las sor brgyang phyi rol pa'i nang du thab khung bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:310b-3: khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni //
T02TD2625E:310b-4: cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la //
T02TD2625E:310b-6: rgyar gru bzhi pa zabs su khru do pa'am /
T02TD2625E:310b-7: khor yug tu khru bzhi pa zabs su khru gang pa'i thab khung bya'o //
T02TD2625E:310b-8: rdo rjes tha ma bskor ba yi //
T02TD2625E:310b-10: mu rang gyi phyi rol phyi ma la rdo rje rtse lnga pas bskor ba la nang ma ma la pa'am phred bas bskor ba /
T02TD2625E:310b-11: 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:310b-13: thab kyi nang na lhung bzed kyi zhabs lta bur byas pa der ;
T02TD2625E:310b-14: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyang pa'i lte bar zla ba'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyang bri sa la /
T02TD2625E:310b-15: sdig pa 'joms pa'i spyin sreg byed na /
T02TD2625E:310b-16: rdo rje dang ldan par yang bya ba ste //
T02TD2625E:310b-18: rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //
T02TD2625E:310b-19: khung bu'i nang du gzhug par bya //
T02TD2625E:310b-20: zhes bya ba ni thab kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams nas phyogs bzhir ka ba bzhi mu rang phyi rol ma las khru gang gis mtho bar btsugs la /
T02TD2625E:310b-21: de'i steng du shing rlob pa bzhis re'u char byas la /
T02TD2625E:310b-22: de'i dbus su yang shing rlon pas bla gab byas te /
T02TD2625E:310b-23: de'i steng du 'jim pa bzang pos stug por bdal la /
T02TD2625E:310b-24: dbus su 'dzag pa'i bu ga dbus nas mtho gang khor yug tu bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:310b-25: de'i 'og tu kham pa'i snod bzed par 'dzag pa rnams slar bsreg go //
T02TD2625E:310b-26: de'i steng du shing rnams legs par brtsig ste /
T02TD2625E:310b-28: ha cang phra ba dang sbom pa dang /
T02TD2625E:310b-29: mtho ba dang dma' ba dag ma yin pa /
T02TD2625E:310b-31: shing de dag kyang skya bo med pa dri zhim pha ma rul ba /
T02TD2625E:310b-32: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsngags pa'i spos chus bsangs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:310b-33: de nas thab khung gi ngos dang ka ba dang /
T02TD2625E:310b-34: shing rnams kha dog dkar por byug go //
T02TD2625E:310b-35: rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2625E:310b-36: ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri ;
T02TD2625E:310b-38: snying po mu ran dang bcas pa thab tu byas pa ma gtogs pa /
T02TD2625E:310b-39: lhag pa thams cad slob ma dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:310b-40: cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:310b-42: rdul tshon bkye ba khrus byas te'o //
T02TD2625E:311a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yo byad dgod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:311a-3: de la bya ba rnams ni rang rang gi mtshan ma dang po dang po'i rtsar gzhag cing /
T02TD2625E:311a-4: rnam par rgyal ba'i bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:311a-5: lho'i sgo 'gram gang yang rung bar ro //
T02TD2625E:311a-6: las kyi bum pa ni shar sgo'i g-yas 'gram du ste /
T02TD2625E:311a-7: 'di ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i dus su yang po //
T02TD2625E:311a-8: bkang ba'i bum pa ni phyi rol nas sbreng ngo //
T02TD2625E:311a-10: ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:311a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ste /
T02TD2625E:311a-12: sngags ni 'dir rtsa ba'i sngags nyid do //
T02TD2625E:311a-13: gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin te //
T02TD2625E:311a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:311a-32: gnas bcu bdun po de dag tu ni /
T02TD2625E:311a-33: dang po sarba bid bcu bris la /
T02TD2625E:311a-34: de'i rjes su rigs lnga'i sngags bri zhing /
T02TD2625E:311a-35: de'i rjes su rtsa ba'i sngags bris pa'i shog bu bcu bdun gdags so //
T02TD2625E:311a-36: de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:311a-37: lte bar shog bu cig la /
T02TD2625E:311a-38: aom bhri ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum dang /
T02TD2625E:311a-39: aom ha na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum yi ge go bzlog pa sprad pa bris la gdags shing /
T02TD2625E:311a-45: long bu g-yon pa rnams su /
T02TD2625E:311a-46: aom kam ka ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bris pa'i shog bu gdags so //
T02TD2625E:311a-47: de nas shog bu gcig la /
T02TD2625E:311a-49: tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2625E:311a-50: dang po'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags ma lus pa bris la mgul du btags te /
T02TD2625E:311a-51: de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i yan lag yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:311a-52: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ro'i rnam par shes pa bkug la bstims te /
T02TD2625E:311a-53: de nas slob dpon la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD2625E:311a-54: me tog dor ba spyin pa dang /
T02TD2625E:311b-0: @311b dbang ma lus pa bskur ba ste /
T02TD2625E:311b-1: 'dir me tog kyang slob dpon la dor la /
T02TD2625E:311b-2: sngar sta gon la gnas pa'i dus su byin gyis brlabs ba'i bum pas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2625E:311b-3: de na ro spyang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni mchod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor yin gyi dbang bskur ba gtso bor gyur pa ma yin no ;
T02TD2625E:311b-4: / de nas ngan song sbyong pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:311b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:311b-6: ga pur gur gum la sogs pas //
T02TD2625E:311b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsreg bya dgod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:311b-8: 'dir til ni las grub pa'i rdzas te gtsor bya'o //
T02TD2625E:311b-9: yungs kar ni thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas so //
T02TD2625E:311b-10: lhag ma rnams ni tshim par bya ba'i rdzas so //
T02TD2625E:311b-11: tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:311b-12: de nas byin zas dge ba rab spar la //
T02TD2625E:311b-13: zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi yog pa'am /
T02TD2625E:311b-14: shing dkar po gtsubs pa las byung ba'i me rlung yab kyis sbar ba /
T02TD2625E:311b-15: aom badzra dzva la h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2625E:311b-16: rtsva skam po'i phye ma dang lci skam gyi phye mas cher spar la yam shing til mar gyis byugs pa la spar te /
T02TD2625E:311b-17: bud shing brtsigs pa'i dbus su gzhag go //
T02TD2625E:311b-18: lha yi sbyor ba rab gnas la //
T02TD2625E:311b-20: me sbar ma thag tu lhag pa'i lha'i lus su gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:311b-21: blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs sogs gzhag / ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:311b-22: dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams bris pa'am /
T02TD2625E:311b-23: lugs ma la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:311b-25: ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:311b-26: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus //
T02TD2625E:311b-27: zla dkar kunda'i bzhin la zhi ba'i lus //
T02TD2625E:311b-28: mtha' yas gzugs kyis me bkug la //
T02TD2625E:311b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni me lha spyan drang pa dang mchod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:311b-30: de la mtha' yas pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:311b-31: re zhig rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las /
T02TD2625E:311b-32: me lha 'di snyed cig gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:311b-33: lag na rdo rje gzhan yang dus gcig gi tshe na yang /
T02TD2625E:311b-34: nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te /
T02TD2625E:311b-35: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug pa dang /
T02TD2625E:311b-37: kye tshangs pa chen po me lha rnam pa du yod par shes par bya zhes dris pa dang /
T02TD2625E:312a-2: me nga rgyal can gang yin pa de ni rang byung ba'o //
T02TD2625E:312a-3: de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i bu ste /
T02TD2625E:312a-4: de la sras skyes pa yin no //
T02TD2625E:312a-5: 'jig rten pa'i me pa ba ka / tshangs pa'i bu ni dang po yin //
T02TD2625E:312a-6: de'i bu tshangs pa'i zas de'i yang //
T02TD2625E:312a-7: ba ra dva zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:312a-8: de'i bu bi shva na ra dang //
T02TD2625E:312a-9: ha ban dang bsreg bya len //
T02TD2625E:312a-10: ngos srungs aa thar ba ni yi //
T02TD2625E:312a-11: bu yin par ni rgya mtshor grags //
T02TD2625E:312a-12: rlung zhes bya ba'i me de ni //
T02TD2625E:312a-13: mngal du 'jug pa'i cho gar bshad //
T02TD2625E:312a-14: de nas me khrus bya ba la //
T02TD2625E:312a-15: de bzhin ba ba ma nar shes //
T02TD2625E:312a-16: bkra shis zhes bya mtshams kyi mtshams //
T02TD2625E:312a-17: bcas pa'i las la phra gal bha'o //
T02TD2625E:312a-19: de bzhin dkan dbab pa la gtsang //
T02TD2625E:312a-20: shad pa'i zhes bya gtsug phud la //
T02TD2625E:312a-21: brtul zhugs spyin la kun 'byung ngo //
T02TD2625E:312a-22: nyi ma zhes bya phyug byi ba la //
T02TD2625E:312a-23: bag ma len pa sbyor byed bshad //
T02TD2625E:312a-24: aa ni yas ni 'khyil ka bsri //
T02TD2625E:312a-25: nye bar 'bral la me nyid do //
T02TD2625E:312a-26: ba ba ka zhes bya ba'i me //
T02TD2625E:312a-27: sna tshogs lha la spyar bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:312a-28: khyim bdag la ni tshangs pa'i me //
T02TD2625E:312a-29: de bzhin yon dbul ba la shing //
T02TD2625E:312a-30: de bzhin phyugs ni bcing ba la //
T02TD2625E:312a-31: aa ba ni ka zhes pa'i me //
T02TD2625E:312a-32: lhung bal ni bi bi rtsi //
T02TD2625E:312a-33: btsas byin la ni sa ha sa //
T02TD2625E:312a-34: dus kyi mtshams la ha bir shes //
T02TD2625E:312a-35: de bzhin zla ba gnas la gter //
T02TD2625E:312a-36: mri da zhes bya dgang blugs la //
T02TD2625E:312a-37: zhi la da ru nar 'dod do //
T02TD2625E:312a-38: byas mtha' me ni gshin rje'o //
T02TD2625E:312a-39: de bzhin rgyal po stobs spyin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:312a-40: drag shul spyad pa thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:312a-41: khro bo'i me ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:312a-42: 'dod las skyed ces bya ba'i me //
T02TD2625E:312a-43: de ni dbang po'i don du bshad //
T02TD2625E:312a-44: nags tshal ba sregs la pho nya'i me //
T02TD2625E:312a-45: khong pa'i me ni dza ta ra //
T02TD2625E:312a-46: bzang bar bya ba sha thar bshad //
T02TD2625E:312a-47: rgod pa'i kha ni rgya mtsho na'o //
T02TD2625E:312a-48: zad tshe 'jigs pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD2625E:312a-49: dus mtha'i me ni yang dag bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:312a-51: nges pa khyod la bshad pa ste //
T02TD2625E:312a-52: rig byed thos pa spyod rnams kyis //
T02TD2625E:312a-53: tshangs pa'i bu dag brjod pa yin //
T02TD2625E:312a-54: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02TD2625E:312a-55: de yi tshe na ngas ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:312b-0: gsang @312b pa'i bdag po de la ni //
T02TD2625E:312b-1: me rnams mtshan nyid mi shes par //
T02TD2625E:312b-2: gang dag spyin sreg byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:312b-3: spyin sreg ma yin legs byas min //
T02TD2625E:312b-5: ngas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T02TD2625E:312b-6: me bcu gnyis ba stan te /
T02TD2625E:312b-7: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD2625E:312b-8: ye shes me ni dang po ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-9: de ni dbang chen zhes su bsgrags //
T02TD2625E:312b-10: kha dog ser po'i mdog can la //
T02TD2625E:312b-11: mdog dang rgyas dang stobs rab ster //
T02TD2625E:312b-13: ye shes rdzogs byed yin zhes bya //
T02TD2625E:312b-14: gnyis pa 'dzin byed ces bya ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-16: dpal ldan gos ni dmar po gos //
T02TD2625E:312b-17: bgrad phreng ril ba spyi blugs thogs //
T02TD2625E:312b-18: gsum pa rlung zhes bya ba ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-19: mdog ni gang la rtsub pa'o //
T02TD2625E:312b-20: bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-21: nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmar thag 'dra //
T02TD2625E:312b-22: lnga pa mi ta zhes bya ba //
T02TD2625E:312b-23: spun la kha dog kham pa ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-24: mgrin pa ring zhing gzi brjid che //
T02TD2625E:312b-25: kun la phan ni 'dogs par byed //
T02TD2625E:312b-26: drug pa khro bo zhes bya ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-27: mig yon dud pa'i kha dog 'dra //
T02TD2625E:312b-28: gyen du skra brdzes sgra cher 'byin //
T02TD2625E:312b-29: mche ba bzhi po stobs po che //
T02TD2625E:312b-30: bdun pa lto ba zhes bya ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-31: rnal 'byor kha dog kun dang ldan //
T02TD2625E:312b-32: brgyang pa zad pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD2625E:312b-34: dgu pa yid las skyes zhes bya //
T02TD2625E:312b-35: sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che //
T02TD2625E:312b-37: sha za me ni de las gzhan //
T02TD2625E:312b-38: rmugs byed ces bya bcu gnyis te //
T02TD2625E:312b-39: sems can thams cad rmugs byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:312b-40: gsang ba'i bdag po las ni de ltar /
T02TD2625E:312b-41: mi yi gzugs ni byin rlabs te //
T02TD2625E:312b-42: bdag gi sa yi gzugs dang ni //
T02TD2625E:312b-43: rdzas kyang de yi ngo bor bya //
T02TD2625E:312b-44: 'di ni phyi yi spyin sreg ste //
T02TD2625E:312b-45: dngos grub 'dod pas spyin sreg bya //
T02TD2625E:312b-47: de dag re re yang sna tshogs par snang bskyed nus pas na //
T02TD2625E:312b-48: mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi ma //
T02TD2625E:312b-50: 'dir ni ye shes kyi me'am mri ta'i me de bkug la /
T02TD2625E:312b-51: mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2625E:312b-52: til dang yungs kar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:312b-53: me la sreg rdzas ci rigs dbul ba dang /
T02TD2625E:313a-2: me lha la mchod pa sreg rdzas cung zad cig phul nas /
T02TD2625E:313a-3: lha rnams spyan drang zhing mchod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:313a-4: sreg rdzas gsol bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:313a-5: lha rnams mang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:313a-6: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la //
T02TD2625E:313a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /
T02TD2625E:313a-8: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:313a-10: phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD2625E:313a-11: spyin sreg bya ba'i ched ni ji tsam zhe na /
T02TD2625E:313a-12: ji srid mchen [*mtshan?] ma shin tu ni //
T02TD2625E:313a-15: shin tu 'bar ba'i gnas ni me'i dbus so //
T02TD2625E:313a-17: de nas 'di ni nges par yang //
T02TD2625E:313a-19: skyes pa yin par shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:313a-20: zhes bya ba'i bar du ga sungs so //
T02TD2625E:313a-21: me'i mchen [*mtshan?] ma de dag ni mdor ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:313a-22: rgyas pa ni 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las /
T02TD2625E:313a-23: me yi mtshan ma nye bar brtag pa ni //
T02TD2625E:313a-24: me stag dub me lce sgra rnams las //
T02TD2625E:313a-25: grub pa dang ni ma grub thams cad kyang //
