T02TD2625E:313a-26: sngags kyis byin rlabs me ni ston par byed //
T02TD2625E:313a-27: du ba med cing gser gyi mdog ltar dangs //
T02TD2625E:313a-28: rab tu che la me lce g-yas su 'khyil //
T02TD2625E:313a-29: kha dog 'ja' 'dra yang na dkar yang rung ;
T02TD2625E:313a-30: / yang na byi ru bcag pa'i kha dog 'dra //
T02TD2625E:313a-31: shin tu zlum pa me lce bkab nas 'phro //
T02TD2625E:313a-32: rab tu 'bar ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra //
T02TD2625E:313a-33: dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs kyang 'dra //
T02TD2625E:313a-34: dpal be'u dung dang padma blugs gzar 'dra //
T02TD2625E:313a-35: yang na shing rta mchog dang rnga yab 'dra //
T02TD2625E:313a-36: me ri dang 'dra rdza rnga gling bu'i sgra //
T02TD2625E:313a-37: du ba me lce dri zhim me stag bzang //
T02TD2625E:313a-38: yang na me spar bar yang 'bar 'gyur na //
T02TD2625E:313a-39: de tshe dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:313a-40: du ba mang zhing me stag rgod pa dang //
T02TD2625E:313a-41: 'bar bar dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar //
T02TD2625E:313a-42: me lce rnam par chad cing gzi mdangs med //
T02TD2625E:313a-43: rtsub nag sprin dang p'a la sha'i mdog / gsal shing 'dra zhing zhib ma'i gzugs kyang 'dra //
T02TD2625E:313a-44: phyugs kyi mgo 'dra sgra yang rab tu rtsub //
T02TD2625E:313a-45: me lce 'phro bas spyin sreg byed pa tshig / mi ro'i dri nga dngos grub med par ston //
T02TD2625E:313a-46: me yi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong nas ni //
T02TD2625E:313a-47: stobs po che yi mar gyi spyin sreg bya //
T02TD2625E:313b-1: / spyin sreg dbul ba'i rim pa ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:313b-2: de nas byin za la ni brtag bya ba //
T02TD2625E:313b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:313b-4: dang por me'i lha la ci bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams las ci rigs cig go //
T02TD2625E:313b-5: de nas dbus kyi gtso bo nas bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:313b-6: rdo rje dril bu'i bar la'o //
T02TD2625E:313b-7: de nas lhag pa'i lha la'o //
T02TD2625E:313b-8: de nas byams pa la sogs pa la'o //
T02TD2625E:313b-9: de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams la'o //
T02TD2625E:313b-10: de nas yang mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2625E:313b-11: lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:313b-12: de nas me'i lha la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02TD2625E:313b-13: bsreg bya lhag ma phul la bzod par gsol ba dang /
T02TD2625E:313b-14: gsol ba gdab par byas la /
T02TD2625E:313b-15: de yang gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2625E:313b-16: 'di ni tshim par bya ba'i spyin sreg go //
T02TD2625E:313b-17: de lta bu'i spyin sreg gis ni /
T02TD2625E:313b-18: srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa thams cad tshim par byas par 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:313b-19: ji skad du dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:313b-20: 'di yis rdo rje can mnyes shing //
T02TD2625E:313b-21: ye shes me yang rab mnyes so //
T02TD2625E:313b-22: rgyal ba rtag pa mnyes pa dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-25: rta mchog bdag po mnyes par 'gyur ;
T02TD2625E:313b-26: / tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02TD2625E:313b-27: khyab 'jug rlung dang chu chen dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-29: zla ba nyi ma gza' gzhan dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-30: sa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-31: lus ngan dang ni ro zan dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-32: chos rgyal dang ni klu nyid dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-33: dri za lha min mi min dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-34: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas lha dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-35: 'og min na ni gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-36: rgyal chen ris na gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-37: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-38: 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-39: gtsang ma'i gnas na gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-41: khams na gnas pa rnams nyid de ;
T02TD2625E:313b-42: / khams can po na gnas nyid dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-43: sems can gling bzhir gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-44: khams gsum na ni gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-45: snod dang sems can 'jig rten dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-46: lcug ma sdong po sbur ma sogs //
T02TD2625E:313b-47: sa ga ba la gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:313b-48: dri med pha rol son pa dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-2: mi g-yo ba la gnas byas dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-3: chos kyi sprin du rjes zhugs dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-4: spyang dka' bar ni song ba dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-5: ring du song ba thob pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:314a-6: 'od byed pa la nges gnas dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-7: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi //
T02TD2625E:314a-9: 'phags pa'i gang zag chen po brgyang //
T02TD2625E:314a-10: bse ru lta bu rnams dang ni //
T02TD2625E:314a-11: dmyal ba yi dvags byol song dang //
T02TD2625E:314a-12: lha dang lha min mi min rnams //
T02TD2625E:314a-13: spyin sreg cho gas mgu 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:314a-15: de bas na ji ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po srid pa dang zhi ba'i ngo bo de /
T02TD2625E:314a-16: slob dpon gyis me lha'i snying gar bkod de spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2625E:314a-17: de ltar lha rnams tshim par byas nas /
T02TD2625E:314a-18: de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i spyin sreg bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:314a-19: de nas spyan drangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:314a-20: snga ma'i me lha ni ye shes kyi me lha yin la /
T02TD2625E:314a-21: 'dir ni rlung gi me yin pas //
T02TD2625E:314a-22: mngon spyod kyi bsreg bya rnams bsdus te /
T02TD2625E:314a-23: me'i dbus su rlung gi me spyan drangs te /
T02TD2625E:314a-24: sngar bshad pa'i drag po'i yon chab phul la /
T02TD2625E:314a-25: drag po'i bsreg bya rgyud 'di nyid kyi mngon spyod kyi spyin sreg las gsungs pa rnams la /
T02TD2625E:314a-26: ci rigs re re bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:314a-27: 'dir padma dkar zhal zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:314a-28: rlung gi me nyid la ma rungs pa grub par 'dod pa dag gi yid du 'ong bas na padma dkar zhal zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:314a-30: phyag na rdo rje padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD2625E:314a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams smos te /
T02TD2625E:314a-32: me lha'i snying gar spyan drangs pa la snga ma ltar mchod pa dang spyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2625E:314a-33: 'dir sdig mnan cing zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:314a-34: shi ba'i ro sdig pa'i gzugs can bsreg par bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:314a-35: zhabs kyis mnan te sreg par mdzad la /
T02TD2625E:314a-36: de bsreg pa nyid kyis shi ba'i sdig pa bsregs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:314a-37: 'dir man ngag ni til nag po btags pa las /
T02TD2625E:314a-38: sha za lta bu'i sdig pa byas la de gtub cing spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2625E:314a-39: de'i snying pos zhes bya ba ni khro bo me'i sngags bskul ba smos pa nyed kyis so //
T02TD2625E:314a-40: ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung //
T02TD2625E:314a-41: de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya //
T02TD2625E:314a-44: sdig pa zad par shes par byas la /
T02TD2625E:314b-0: @314b mtshan ma ngan pa byung na ni /
T02TD2625E:314b-1: sdig can du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:314b-2: ci ste sdig can gcig yin na ni //
T02TD2625E:314b-3: de nas thal bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:314b-4: las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:314b-5: zhes bya ba'i bar du spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:314b-6: sdig pa med par gyur na rus pa rnams sa stegs la sogs pa byas pa tsam gyis chog go //
T02TD2625E:314b-7: de ltar na bdag gis spyin sreg gi skabs 'dir go rims nges par gtsor byas te brjod pa tsam mo //
T02TD2625E:314b-8: da ni spyin sreg gi cho ga nges pa cung zad brjod de /
T02TD2625E:314b-9: thab khung dang bud shing brjod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-10: dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-13: ro byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-15: mig gi rten gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-19: me lha dgug cing rdzas dbul ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-20: lhag pa'i lha bskyed cing spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-21: mchod cing sreg rdzas dbul ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-23: lha rnams gshegs par bskul ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-24: ji lta ba bzhin sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-25: me lha gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2625E:314b-26: sdig pa 'joms pa'i spyin sreg bya ba rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:314b-27: 'dir cho ga'i rim pa mdor ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:314b-28: de la thab khud rnams kyang mdor bsdus na gnyis te /
T02TD2625E:314b-31: de la 'phags pa dpung bzangs la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs te las thams cad pa'i thab khung nyid sna tshogs pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:314b-32: rgyud phal cher ni zhi ba'i thab khung nyid las thams cad pa'i thab khung du gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:314b-33: re zhig rgyud 'dir ni las thams cad pa'i thab khung zhes gsungs pa med kyi /
T02TD2625E:314b-34: las bzhi pa'i thab khung so sor gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:314b-35: de la ro yongs su spyang ba'i thab khung ni zhi ba'i thab khung gsum la sngar ba stan pa ltar chen po'i tshad du bya'o //
T02TD2625E:314b-36: de nas ba stan pa ltar bud shing brtsigs te /
T02TD2625E:314b-37: dkyil 'khor chen po sngon bzhin bris la /
T02TD2625E:314b-39: de nas g-yas su dgang blugs kyi mar khu dang /
T02TD2625E:315a-6: me tog dri zhim po dang /
T02TD2625E:315a-9: aa shva ttha la sogs pa'i yam shing dam pa zung re dang bcas pa dag thab khung las dpags te /
T02TD2625E:315a-10: sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi man chad sor bcu drug man chad dam /
T02TD2625E:315a-11: sor brgyang yan chad pa'i lcug ma ma gas shing mi 'khyog pa /
T02TD2625E:315a-13: rtse mo'i cha las byung ba /
T02TD2625E:315a-16: btung ba rab tu bkang ba /
T02TD2625E:315a-17: yungs kar dkar po rnams g-yas su gzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:315a-18: ji skad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02TD2625E:315a-19: spyin sreg la dgos g-yas su gzhag / ces gsungs pas so //
T02TD2625E:315a-25: bzed rdo rje sor bzhi pa /
T02TD2625E:315a-26: de'i nyid las g-yon du chu'i snod gzhag go zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:315a-27: chu'i snod ni yon chab yin pas /
T02TD2625E:315a-28: mchod pa'i tshogs gzhan gyis nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:315a-29: dgang gzar khru re ba dngul lam mchod spyin gyi shing kha dog dkar po las byas pa yu ba'i rtse mo na rdo rje dang rin po che ser drug pa can rtse mo na rdo rje sor bzhi pa /
T02TD2625E:315a-30: de'i rtse mo na sor bzhi gru bzhi ba sor gnyis gting du brkos pa /
T02TD2625E:315a-31: dbus na rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje sor gcig pa'i srid la zheng dang rngams ci rigs su byas pas mtshon pa /
T02TD2625E:315a-32: gdong nyid na bcud 'bab pa'i lam mthe'u chung gi zabs kyi srid pa /
T02TD2625E:315a-33: mtheb tshigs nub pa'i kha wa can no //
T02TD2625E:315a-34: blugs gzar yu ba sngon bzhin las //
T02TD2625E:315a-35: rtse mo'i dkyus sor gnyis pa'i rgya la /
T02TD2625E:315a-36: sor gcig pa'i zabs yod pa padma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs can /
T02TD2625E:315a-37: rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig gis dbus nas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:315a-38: de dag dang rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02TD2625E:315a-40: de nas sngon bzhin phyogs kyi rgyan dang /
T02TD2625E:315a-42: 'og tu yang me tog dang 'bru kha dog dkar pos gtor ma dag kyang byas la /
T02TD2625E:315a-43: stan bzang po dgod pas ci nas kyang yid nyams dga' ba de ltar byas te /
T02TD2625E:315a-44: de nas sngar bshad pa ltar ro byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2625E:315b-0: ras dkar po la padma 'dab ma brgyang pa dkar po gur kum gyis bris @315b la ;
T02TD2625E:315b-1: de bting ba'i lte bar ro legs par kha shar ram nub bam lhag pa'i lha'i gnas su bltas par gzhag / steng nas kyang ras dkar po la /
T02TD2625E:315b-2: padma dab ma brgyang ba bris pa'i 'dab ma la /
T02TD2625E:315b-3: dpal be'u la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi mtshan ma bris pas g-yogs la gzhag go //
T02TD2625E:315b-4: de nas yang khrus byas la /
T02TD2625E:315b-5: rje btsun thams cad rig pa'i bris sku'am /
T02TD2625E:315b-6: lugs ma'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs dang bcas par /
T02TD2625E:315b-7: me dang du bas mi gnod par sgrub pa po'i mig gis ltar rung ba'i phyogs su gzhag go //
T02TD2625E:315b-8: de nas sngar bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2625E:315b-9: gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me //
T02TD2625E:315b-10: dge ba'i las la rab tu shis //
T02TD2625E:315b-12: yang na sngar smos pa lta bu'i snga ma ltar spyar te /
T02TD2625E:315b-14: me snod gzhan zhig spros te /
T02TD2625E:315b-15: sngar ba stan pa'i bya ba la spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:315b-16: de nas h'um bdun zlos shing /
T02TD2625E:315b-17: mar khu gzar bu chen po gang ba bdun blugs te /
T02TD2625E:315b-18: sngar gsungs pa'i mchen [*mtshan?] ma brtag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2625E:315b-19: de la slob dpon yid rab tu bsdams pas rang gi dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod pa'i bar du byas la /
T02TD2625E:315b-20: aom badzra sa tva h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2625E:315b-21: ku sha ma nyams pas me'i steng ngam thab khung nyid g-yogs par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:315b-22: ji ltar ku sha'i tshogs tshig pa las /
T02TD2625E:315b-23: sdig pa'i tshogs tshig pa'o zhes bram zer rnams rtog pa'i lugs nyid dang mthun par byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:315b-24: kha cig na re ro yongs su spyang ba'i spyin sreg la ni /
T02TD2625E:315b-25: ku sha dgram mi dgos so zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:315b-27: thab khung gi ni g-yas phyogs nas //
T02TD2625E:315b-28: ku sha'i rtsva ni rlon pa dgram //
T02TD2625E:315b-29: rtse mo dag kyang rtsa bas dkri //
T02TD2625E:315b-30: rtsa ba dag kyang rtse mos dkri //
T02TD2625E:315b-31: zhes bye brag med par gsungs pas /
T02TD2625E:315b-32: dgram pa 'dir yang bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:315b-33: de'i rjes la sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
T02TD2625E:315b-34: me yi phyogs nas bod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:315b-35: gsus po che la mig gsum pa //
T02TD2625E:315b-36: gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan //
T02TD2625E:315b-37: 'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
T02TD2625E:316a-2: las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2625E:316a-3: lag pa dang po mchog spyin la //
T02TD2625E:316a-4: gnyis pa la ni sngags nor phreng //
T02TD2625E:316a-5: g-yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te //
T02TD2625E:316a-6: gnyis pa na ni bo con nyid //
T02TD2625E:316a-7: mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la //
T02TD2625E:316a-8: drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2625E:316a-9: 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:316a-10: thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2625E:316a-13: padma dkar po'i zhal 'dra dge / padma nor bu'i ril ba thogs //
T02TD2625E:316a-14: lag na ldan dkar mchog thogs pa //
T02TD2625E:316a-15: padma dkar po'i stan stengs 'dug / ces pa'i me lha'i lha thams cad kyi dbus su /
T02TD2625E:316a-16: yi ge ram dkar po las byung bar bsams pa la /
T02TD2625E:316a-17: zhi ba'i mchod yon snying gar bzung ste /
T02TD2625E:316a-18: de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:316a-19: g-yas pa mi 'jigs mthe bskyod cing //
T02TD2625E:316a-20: gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2625E:316a-21: me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2625E:316a-22: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02TD2625E:316a-23: lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du //
T02TD2625E:316a-24: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2625E:316a-25: aom aagan ye a'a di py'a di bya aa bi sha ma h'a shri ye ha bya ka bya ba ha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316a-27: de nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes brjod pas ji ltar bskyed ba dang /
T02TD2625E:316a-28: gnyis su med par byas la /
T02TD2625E:316a-30: lag g-yon rdo rje bzang gtor te //
T02TD2625E:316a-31: mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga da bul //
T02TD2625E:316a-34: de la spyin sreg la dgos pa //
T02TD2625E:316a-35: kun la lan gsum sreg blugs dbul //
T02TD2625E:316a-38: zhes gsungs pa dang spyar te /
T02TD2625E:316a-39: de nas me 'bar ba'i rnam par gnas pa'am /
T02TD2625E:316a-40: de'i dbyibs ma bor ba'i de'i snying gar dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed la /
T02TD2625E:316a-41: mchod pa'i cho ga las ba stan pa ltar spyan drang zhing bstims te /
T02TD2625E:316a-42: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2625E:316a-43: yon chab dang bsang gtor bya ste /
T02TD2625E:316a-44: mchod pa brgyang yan lag dang bcas pas mchod la /
T02TD2625E:316a-45: sreg rdzas rnams las cung zad cig ma lus par bsregs shing /
T02TD2625E:316a-46: de nas bstod pa brjod la /
T02TD2625E:316b-0: yang @316b yon chab la sogs pa phul te /
T02TD2625E:316b-1: aom kri to ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol la bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid la bsdu'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-2: 'dis dbus kyi bdag po ni ro de nyid yin par 'dod do //
T02TD2625E:316b-3: de la mchod pa'i sngags rnams ni ba stan zin la /
T02TD2625E:316b-4: bsreg bya rnams kyi sngags ni /
T02TD2625E:316b-7: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-9: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-11: aom badzra bi dza ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-13: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-15: aom badzra gha sma ri ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-17: aom ma h'a ba la ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-19: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-21: aom aa bra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-23: aom badzra ya dzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-25: aom bodhi briksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-27: aom badzra la da ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-29: aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2625E:316b-31: yungs kar la ni rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2625E:316b-32: ngan 'gro gsum bcas pa'i sngags dang /
T02TD2625E:316b-33: til gyi sngags rnams bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:316b-34: mjug rnams su gsol ba gdab cing bsreg go //
T02TD2625E:316b-35: rdzas gang la rang gi sngags med pa der ni /
T02TD2625E:316b-36: til gyi sngags sam bdag po'i sngags kyis bsreg go //
T02TD2625E:316b-37: rdzas rnams kyi rim pa yang /
T02TD2625E:316b-38: sngar rdzas nyid ji ltar smos pa nas rim pas so //
T02TD2625E:316b-39: de la yon chab ni mdun du'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-43: zho la sogs pa ni zhal cung zad gdangs par te /
T02TD2625E:316b-44: drag shul spyad pa la ni /
T02TD2625E:316b-46: mar me dang bdug pa mdun du'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-48: yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-49: 'bras la sogs pa ni phyag tu dbul lo //
T02TD2625E:316b-50: de dag kyang dang po ni me'i lha la'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-51: de nas khro bo'i rdo rje la ste /
T02TD2625E:316b-52: gang gis me la sogs pa srung ba'i las byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i byang na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-53: de gnyis la ni gsum gsum mo //
T02TD2625E:316b-54: de nas dkon mchog gsum la'o //
T02TD2625E:316b-56: de nas rje btsun ngan song spyong ba la brgya rtsa brgyang do //
T02TD2625E:316b-57: de nas ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:317a-0: sngags rnams ni sngar ba stan pa rnams @317a * //
T02TD2625E:317a-2: kha cig na re sngags rnams ni rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:317a-3: 'dir me'i lhas blangs pa thams cad tshim par 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:317a-4: me ni lha thams cad kyi zhal nas /
T02TD2625E:317a-5: 'byung po thams cad kyi kha'i sgo'o zhes grags la /
T02TD2625E:317a-7: spyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i //
T02TD2625E:317a-8: me ni lha rnams zhal yin pas //
T02TD2625E:317a-9: sna tshogs las ni grub byed pa'i //
T02TD2625E:317a-10: spyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2625E:317a-11: spyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim //
T02TD2625E:317a-12: tshim par 'gyur na dngos grub ster //
T02TD2625E:317a-13: gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin dang ;
T02TD2625E:317a-14: / thams cad spyin sreg dag gis bskangs //
T02TD2625E:317a-15: de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis //
T02TD2625E:317a-16: spyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad //
T02TD2625E:317a-18: spyin sreg thams cad la yang pus mo gnyis cung zad bgrad pa'i bar las ma 'das par rdzas bsreg cing /
T02TD2625E:317a-19: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar med na /
T02TD2625E:317a-20: dgang blugs ni khyor bas byas la /
T02TD2625E:317a-21: rdza sa lhag ma rnams ni pho tshums kyis dbul zhing /
T02TD2625E:317a-22: mjug tu me'i las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chus zhi bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:317a-23: de nas mjug tu me lha slar lha'i dbyibs thob pa la mchod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:317a-24: bsreg bya cung zad lhag pa rnams phul te /
T02TD2625E:317a-25: mnyam med mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am /
T02TD2625E:317a-27: me lha'i rgyal po bram ze rdo rje che //
T02TD2625E:317a-28: 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrug drang srong tshogs kyis bskor //
T02TD2625E:317a-29: sna tshogs gzugs mnga' las kun sbyong bar mdzad //
T02TD2625E:317a-30: thub mchog mthu chen drang srong mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2625E:317a-31: gsus che spyan gsum tshad med bzhi yi zhal //
T02TD2625E:317a-32: 'od dmar 'bar ba'i me tshogs dbus na bzhugs //
T02TD2625E:317a-33: ral pa'i thor tshugs che bsgyings bka' thub drag / lus kyi rgyan yang dga' byed srang bu thogs //
T02TD2625E:317a-34: bum pa bgrang phreng dam pa spyin pa dang //
T02TD2625E:317a-35: dbyi gu gsum thogs me yi dngos grub spyin //
T02TD2625E:317a-36: 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang na lha khyod 'phags //
T02TD2625E:317a-37: khyod ni 'phags dang 'byung po mang tshim byed //
T02TD2625E:317a-38: phyi rol lus kyi gtsug lag don ldan pa //
T02TD2625E:317a-39: drang srong mchog khyed der ni mngon sum ste /
T02TD2625E:317a-40: de'i phyir de dag rnams la 'ang 'bras bu stsol //
T02TD2625E:317b-0: dngos grub kun spyin khyod 'dir bdag @317b gis bstod //
T02TD2625E:317b-2: snga ma ltar gshegs su gsol te /
T02TD2625E:317b-3: ji ltar bskyed pa ni rang gi byang chub sems su bsdu'o //
T02TD2625E:317b-4: de nas de ma thag tu g-yas su dgod par bya ba rnams ni g-yon du yin la /
T02TD2625E:317b-5: g-yon du dgong par bya ba rnams ni g-yas su dgod pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2625E:317b-6: drag po spyad pa'i yon chab dang /
T02TD2625E:317b-8: bsreg bya rnams rgyud 'di las grags pa sngags snga ma rnams nyid las thams cad pa la che ge mo'i p'a pa gra ha na sha ya phat ces bskul bas bsregs te /
T02TD2625E:317b-9: 'dir ni dngos por rlung gi ma la bsreg bya phul la /
T02TD2625E:317b-10: de'i snying gar phyag na rdo rje khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba drag po sngon bshad pa las /
T02TD2625E:317b-11: phyag bzhi pa g-yas g-yon dang po ni h'um gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD2625E:317b-12: tha ma gnyis na padma dmar po dang /
T02TD2625E:317b-13: zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can /
T02TD2625E:317b-15: khro bo'i rgyan ma lus pas brgyan pa'i yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD2625E:317b-16: rdo rje rtse lnga pa las bskyed pa sngon bzhin du de dang 'dra ba spyan drang ba la sogs pa byas la mchod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:317b-17: spyin sreg drag por spyad pa bya ste /
T02TD2625E:317b-18: bdag nyid kyang de dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis bskyed pas so //
T02TD2625E:317b-19: kha cig na re 'dir mchod yon la sogs pas padma dkar zhal mchod ces gsungs pas /
T02TD2625E:317b-20: 'dir yang zhi ba'i spyin sreg nyid bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:317b-21: de nas mtho ris thob par shes nas 'chad par byed pa ltar las rnam pa bzhi'i spyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2625E:317b-22: rgyud las rab tu gsal bar ma phye'o //
T02TD2625E:317b-23: phyi rol gyi spyin sreg la mi mos pa'am /
T02TD2625E:317b-24: mi nus pa dag la nang gi spyin sreg kyang gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:317b-25: gzhan yang nang gi spyin sreg ni //
T02TD2625E:317b-26: las dang tshe dag dgag pa ste //
T02TD2625E:317b-27: de ni yid kyis shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:317b-28: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa spangs //
T02TD2625E:317b-29: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce dang lus rnams ni //
T02TD2625E:317b-30: yid las skyes pa sems kyi rgyal po la gnas te //
T02TD2625E:317b-31: kun du [*kun tu?] rtog pas skyes pa 'di dag kyang //
T02TD2625E:317b-32: byang chub sems dang yul dang mig la sogs pa dang //
T02TD2625E:317b-33: rlung gi me yang 'phro ba med pa yi //
T02TD2625E:317b-34: shes rab kyis ni de bkag ste //
T02TD2625E:317b-35: yid kyis me la spyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2625E:317b-36: de ni nang gi spyin sreg ces //
T02TD2625E:317b-37: nges pas khyod la ba stan pa yin //
T02TD2625E:318a-1: yang na med par gyur kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:318a-2: zlos shing bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2625E:318a-3: ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:318a-4: mchod rten phreng bar bya ba dang //
T02TD2625E:318a-5: zhes bya ba ni ro med par gyur kyang /
T02TD2625E:318a-6: bzlas pa dang mchod rten gyi bya ba sngon bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:318a-7: yang na gzugs su bris nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:318a-8: spyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na //
T02TD2625E:318a-12: spyin sreg rnam pa drug ni bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:318a-13: de yang ming tsam bri ba ma yin gyi /
T02TD2625E:318a-15: de dag 'bras bu chen por ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:318a-16: gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye //
T02TD2625E:318a-18: cho ga bzhi char gyi yon tan du spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:318a-19: thal ba yungs kar phye ma sogs //
T02TD2625E:318a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzlas pa'i rdzas chur dor ba'i cho ga ston te /
T02TD2625E:318a-21: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ni /
T02TD2625E:318a-22: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu klung stong phrag phyed dang gsum yod de zhes 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:318a-23: de dag ni klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:318a-24: klung gang dag rgyu mtshor mi 'bab cing /
T02TD2625E:318a-26: char pa'i chu las byung ba rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
T02TD2625E:318a-27: 'gro ba mang po'i don du gyur pa'i phyir de kho na bsngags so //
T02TD2625E:318a-29: de ltar na ni sdig can yang //
T02TD2625E:318a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:318a-31: de'i 'bras bu ba stan te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:318a-32: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la //
T02TD2625E:318a-34: cung zad kyang dge ba'i las la mos pa ma byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:318a-35: med par lta ba gang yin dang //
T02TD2625E:318a-36: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rgyang 'phen par khas len pa rnams te /
T02TD2625E:318a-37: las med thar pa med kyang rung //
T02TD2625E:318a-38: gzhung ngan rgyang 'phen pa yi gzhung //
T02TD2625E:318a-40: byang chub lam las rnam log dang //
T02TD2625E:318a-42: gang gis byang chub sems bskyed nas ;
T02TD2625E:318a-43: / yang der slar yang btang ba ste //
T02TD2625E:318a-44: mi gang byang chub sems gtang yang //
T02TD2625E:318a-45: de dag thar bar mdzad pa ni //
T02TD2625E:318a-46: las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab phyir //
T02TD2625E:318a-47: thams cad mkhyen pa kho nas mkhyen //
T02TD2625E:318a-49: sems bskyed de ni phas pham pas kyang shin tu lci //
T02TD2625E:318b-0: zhes ji skad @318b gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:318b-1: ba stan la zhe sdang gnod byed dang //
T02TD2625E:318b-3: dam pa'i chos kyi stegs 'jig pa ste /
T02TD2625E:318b-4: glegs bam chud gson pa dang /
T02TD2625E:318b-5: chos smra ba la gnod par byed cing 'gal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:318b-6: chos kyi bar chad byed pa ste /
T02TD2625E:318b-8: mi gang chos kyi stegs 'jig cing ;
T02TD2625E:318b-9: / yang dag ma yin lam smra pa //
T02TD2625E:318b-10: mi de dag ni spu gri'i so //
T02TD2625E:318b-11: gtams pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin //
T02TD2625E:318b-13: sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong ba //
T02TD2625E:318b-15: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T02TD2625E:318b-16: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa la yang 'jigs par mi lta ba'i rjes su dpyad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:318b-17: pha dang ma la snying ring zhing //
T02TD2625E:318b-19: pha ma la sems byams pas brlan par ma gyur cing /
T02TD2625E:318b-20: brlang ba'i sems yod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:318b-21: 'di dag ni phan 'dogs pas zhing dam pa mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byin pa ste /
T02TD2625E:318b-22: khye'u bu mo mdza' bo'i gtam las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:318b-23: gzhan yang 'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
T02TD2625E:318b-24: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:318b-25: de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bde 'gyur la //
T02TD2625E:318b-26: 'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang //
T02TD2625E:318b-27: de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:318b-28: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:318b-29: de dag song nas phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2625E:318b-30: rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ongs te //
T02TD2625E:318b-31: de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin //
T02TD2625E:318b-32: gang dag pha ma rgan rgon gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:318b-33: tshong pa de dag yon tan kun gyi gtsor 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2625E:318b-34: de bzhin zhing las 'bras mchog rnams 'byung ste //
T02TD2625E:318b-35: bsod nams bgrang don brjod par mi nus so //
T02TD2625E:318b-36: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:318b-37: de dag khur rnams khyer bar byed pa'i rnga mo rnams dang yang //
T02TD2625E:318b-38: yang na glang dang bong bu dag tu'ang mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:318b-39: mi rnams de dag spu gris so la brdzi mi 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:318b-40: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:318b-41: de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang //
T02TD2625E:318b-42: spu gri'i so dang ldan pa las kyang mi rgal te //
T02TD2625E:319a-2: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:319a-3: de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung ba dag dang //
T02TD2625E:319a-4: chung ma bu dang bu mo dam pa dag dang yang //
T02TD2625E:319a-5: bee d'urya dang rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed //
T02TD2625E:319a-6: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02TD2625E:319a-7: de dag rab 'phrul lha yi po brang dag dang ni //
T02TD2625E:319a-8: rtsub 'gyur dang ni 'dras pa'i tshal yang mthong 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:319a-9: lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:319a-10: mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa //
T02TD2625E:319a-11: thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos 'gyur na //
T02TD2625E:319a-12: rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyam chung 'gyur ba yi ;
T02TD2625E:319a-13: / pha ma spyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed //
T02TD2625E:319a-15: 'di dag ni 'bras bu 'di lta bu 'byin pa la snying ring bar gyur na rab tu 'jigs su rung bas so //
T02TD2625E:319a-16: byang chub sems la brten pa dang //
T02TD2625E:319a-17: 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:319a-19: mtshams med pa dang nye bar mchod rten 'jig pa dang /
T02TD2625E:319a-20: dgra bcom pa sun par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:319a-21: dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog par byed pa rnams mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:319a-22: de lta bu dag thabs 'di rnams med na mi thar ro zhes ston par bzhed nas /
T02TD2625E:319a-23: ci ste lha rnams med 'gyur tam //
T02TD2625E:319a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:319a-25: lha rnams 'jig rten pa dbang po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:319a-26: de dag kyang yongs su 'dren pa yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:319a-27: sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin //
T02TD2625E:319a-28: zhes bya ba ni skyabs dam pa'o //
T02TD2625E:319a-29: sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs //
T02TD2625E:319a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni /
T02TD2625E:319a-31: gtor ma dang spyin sreg dang /
T02TD2625E:319a-33: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02TD2625E:319a-34: shes rab thabs rnams med na ni //
T02TD2625E:319a-36: stong pa nyid snying rje'i snying po can gyis bsdus pa /
T02TD2625E:319a-37: byang chub kyi sems spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2625E:319a-41: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2625E:319a-42: shes rab ces bya dngos po med //
T02TD2625E:319a-44: de dag la tshig rkang dang po gnyis kyis ni /
T02TD2625E:319a-45: rten gyi stobs kyis sdig pa 'byang bar ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:319a-46: chig rkang tha ma gnyis kyis ni /
T02TD2625E:319a-47: gnyen po kun du [*kun tu?] spyod pas sdig pa 'byang bar ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:319b-0: @319b rnam par sun 'byin pa kun du [*kun tu?] spyod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:319b-1: sngom pa'i stobs dag kyang 'dir sogs /
T02TD2625E:319b-2: zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa'am /
T02TD2625E:319b-3: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyis bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2625E:319b-4: yang na 'dir gsang sngags kyis bdag nyid che ba ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:319b-5: rdo rje slob dpon gyi thabs mkhas pa'i che ba'i stobs nyid kyis thar pa thob par ston pas na yan lag gnyis smos te /
T02TD2625E:319b-6: lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa nyid lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:319b-7: de ltar dge slong dag las byas pa ni chud mi za la /
T02TD2625E:319b-8: ma byas pa ni phrad pa med do zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:319b-9: 'gro ba rnams ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu'i bgo skal la spyod pa'o zhes gsungs pa 'di ji ltar drang zhe na /
T02TD2625E:319b-11: ji ltar padma kha bye ba ni /
T02TD2625E:319b-12: nyi ma'i 'od kyis phye ba na rang bye ba ma yin pa ltar kha cig gzhan gyi rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba yang yod la /
T02TD2625E:319b-13: gal te rang gis byas pa kho na la rag las na /
T02TD2625E:319b-14: sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar phan pa mdzad par 'gyur /
T02TD2625E:319b-16: chos kun tha dad rjes su 'jug / chos kun phan tshun rjes su 'jug / chos kun rjes su zhugs pa ste //
T02TD2625E:319b-19: ji ltar lcags g-yo ba rang gi byed pa ma yin gyis //
T02TD2625E:319b-20: khab len gyis byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:319b-21: shing tshig pa me yis byed pa lta bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid de /
T02TD2625E:319b-22: chos nyid ces bya ba yang /
T02TD2625E:319b-23: dngos po rnams kyi mthu dang /
T02TD2625E:319b-24: rang bzhin rang dang po nas grub pa med /
T02TD2625E:319b-25: rgyu dang rkyen gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:319b-26: dngos po rnams ni 'di ltar nges la /
T02TD2625E:319b-27: de la yang dpyad na snying po'i bag phra rab tsam yang med pas /
T02TD2625E:319b-28: kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyi gar /
T02TD2625E:319b-29: ji ltar yang dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid la dpyad du med na /
T02TD2625E:319b-30: byis pa rnams log par dpyod pa tsam sel ba dpyod pa mkhas pa dag byed par zad do //
T02TD2625E:319b-31: 'on kyang byis pa dag rang gis ri mo bris pas rang skrag pa ltar rang gis byas pa la rang spyod par 'dod pas de ltar grub pa phal che bas /
T02TD2625E:319b-32: las bdag gis bya ba gtsor gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:319b-33: rigs par na rkyen nyid mthu can yin gyi /
T02TD2625E:319b-34: las ma yin te de na brten par gnas pa'i las 'ga' yang med de mun pa la snang ba dang /
T02TD2625E:320a-0: mar me la chu'i thigs pa @320a * //
T02TD2625E:320a-2: thub pa'i dbang po rnams kyang chos nyid thob pa la byin gyis rlabs 'jug cing gzhan du ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:320a-3: khab len gyi mthu'i chos nyid lcags kyis thob kyi nor bu dang /
T02TD2625E:320a-4: zangs la sogs pas mi thob pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:320a-5: de'i phyir 'di chos nyid kyis snod du 'gyur ba kha cig la gzhan gyis byas pa gzhan la 'byor pa 'di ni chos nyid kho na yin pas gzhan du drang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:320a-6: de nas brgya byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:320a-7: bder gshegs 'dra bar skyes zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:320a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i rim par gnas pas byang chub chen po las phyir mi ldog par 'dra ba ste /
T02TD2625E:320a-9: nges par drod la sogs pa thob par ston pa mthong ba las rjes su dpag par nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:320a-10: ci skal ba du ma la sogs pas sam zhe na ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:320a-11: tshe 'di nyid la zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:320a-12: lha dang mi'i tshe gcig po de nyid ma zad par zhes bya ba'am ngan 'gro dang de dang 'dra ba'i tshe mang zhig myong bar byas pa las tshe 'di nyid la grol ba ste /
T02TD2625E:320a-13: gsang sngags rnams kyi 'bras bu ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod kyi /
T02TD2625E:320a-14: lan grangs gzhan la sogs pa ni rab tu dman pa'i sgrub pa por zad do //
T02TD2625E:320a-15: ji skad du 'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba /
T02TD2625E:320a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:320a-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa /
T02TD2625E:320a-23: thugs rje mchog tu che ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:320a-25: gsang sngags lta bu'i 'dren pa med //
T02TD2625E:320a-27: de nas dbang por bcas pa yis //
T02TD2625E:320a-28: grags chen lha rnams gang byed cing //
T02TD2625E:320a-30: brgya byin ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang bcas pas /
T02TD2625E:320a-31: lha'i bu de thar bar shes nas /
T02TD2625E:320a-32: sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'ongs par ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:320a-33: tshe 'di nyid la zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:320a-34: nor bu dri ma med pa mchod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:320b-0: go sla bas rnam par ma @320b phye'o ;
T02TD2625E:320b-1: / gang dag bsdus pa'i don dang mi 'dra bar bshad pa 'am 'chad par byed pa ni gang yang rung ba'i nye bar ba stan par shes par gyis shig / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi snying po rgya cher bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2625E:320b-3: // / de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud ba stan nas /
T02TD2625E:320b-4: nga ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud phyi ma ston te /
T02TD2625E:320b-5: 'dir 'chad pa po ni phyag na rdo rje yin la /
T02TD2625E:320b-6: ston pa dang rgyud kyi bdag po ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:320b-7: kha cig na re rgyud phyi ma dang de'i phyi ma'i bdag po ni phyag na rdo rje'o zhe zer zhing /
T02TD2625E:320b-8: de nyid kyis na rgyud yongs su rdzogs par nye ba na /
T02TD2625E:320b-9: phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod pa'o zhes kyang zer ro //
T02TD2625E:320b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams ni gsal bar zad do //
T02TD2625E:320b-11: de la de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:320b-12: rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad ma thag tu'o //
T02TD2625E:320b-13: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:320b-14: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:320b-15: bdud rtsi thob phyir lam ni 'di ma yin //
T02TD2625E:320b-16: lam ngan 'ongs la lam la mnos shig ces //
T02TD2625E:320b-17: lta ngan sems can mthong nas go 'byed de //
T02TD2625E:320b-18: rgyu des byang chub sems dpa' zhes bshad do //
T02TD2625E:320b-19: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2625E:320b-20: de dag nyid nyan thos la sogs pas dmigs pa la sogs pa che bas na /
T02TD2625E:320b-21: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:320b-22: 'di'i phyag na rdo rje mnga' bas phyag na rdo rje ste /
T02TD2625E:320b-23: des rtsa ba'i rgyud las ltos pa'i brtag pa'i phyi ma 'di ba stan te bshad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:320b-24: de yang rang gi mthus ma yin pas na /
T02TD2625E:320b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu zhes smos te /
T02TD2625E:320b-27: de ltar yang tshul gcig tu ba stan pa'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:320b-28: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:320b-29: gang ci smra ci sems rjes su ci 'dra yang /
T02TD2625E:320b-30: de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:320b-31: de 'dir brtag pa phyi ma zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa dang /
T02TD2625E:320b-32: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rtog pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:320b-33: de gnyi ga'i lha rnams kyi dbyibs dang /
T02TD2625E:320b-39: spyin sreg la sogs pa rnams ni bdag gis dus gcig tu bshad zin la /
T02TD2625E:321a-0: gzhung rnam par dbye ba yang bdag gis bsdu @321a * //
T02TD2625E:321a-1: ba'i don gyi skabs nyid du dpyad zin te /
T02TD2625E:321a-2: da ni tshig gi don tsam las ma lus la /
T02TD2625E:321a-3: tshig gi don yang go sla bas mi brjod de /
T02TD2625E:321a-4: de bas man ngag gi gnas 'ga' zhig las brjod du med do //
T02TD2625E:321a-5: de phyir blo'i nor can rnams kyis sngar ba stan pa'i don nyid drangs te cho ga zhib mo phyi ma gnyis su spyar la /
T02TD2625E:321a-6: blo dang mi ldan pa dag la ni ji tsam du ngag la sogs pa spyar kyang de dag gi blo'i padma rgyas par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:321a-8: 'phags pa n'a g'a rdzun na'i zhal snga nas //
T02TD2625E:321a-9: gang la rang gi shes rab mad //
T02TD2625E:321a-10: de la ba stan bcos kyis ci bya //
T02TD2625E:321a-11: mig gnyis med par gyur pa las //
T02TD2625E:321a-12: me long dgos pa ci zhig yod //
T02TD2625E:321a-14: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na h'um phat /
T02TD2625E:321a-15: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:321a-16: sngags dang po dgu ni rje btsun sha'kya tog la sogs pa dgu'i rim bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:321a-17: da nas gsum ni sku la sogs pa'i gsum gyi sngags so ;
T02TD2625E:321a-18: / de nas gsum ni ro'i ngan 'gro dgag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:321a-19: slob ma sdig pa can ma phebs pa'i sdig pa gzhig pa'o //
T02TD2625E:321a-20: de nas ni mchod pa dang sgo skyong gi sngags so //
T02TD2625E:321a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:321a-22: mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba'i bar du yang go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:321a-24: dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la ltos par ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:321a-25: ngan song thams cad rnam grol te /
T02TD2625E:321a-27: zhes bya ba ni go sla ste /
T02TD2625E:321a-28: skye bar 'gyur ro zhes spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:321a-29: gong nas gong du sa rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:321a-30: dngos grub phra mo la brten nas ni /
T02TD2625E:321a-31: dngos grub chen po thob cing /
T02TD2625E:321a-32: de nas ni sa rab tu dga' ba nas bcu gcig pa'i bar du rim gyis 'thob ste /
T02TD2625E:321a-34: gcig pu dpa' bo grub pa las //
T02TD2625E:321a-35: gang tshe dngos grub phra grub pas //
T02TD2625E:321a-36: sngags pa'i lus ni dag pa ni //
T02TD2625E:321a-37: snod du 'gyur ba'i lus la ni //
T02TD2625E:321a-38: dngos grub chen po rab tu skye //
T02TD2625E:321a-39: 'di yis ya sa la sogs 'thob pa //
T02TD2625E:321a-40: rim pa 'di yis skyed byed de //
T02TD2625E:321a-41: sngags pas yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02TD2625E:321a-42: rtag tu sems can don byed do //
T02TD2625E:321b-0: brtag pa gzhan gyi tshogs kyang thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes @321b bya ba ni rgyud 'dir ma gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:321b-1: bya ba dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa'i las rab 'byams de dag kyang rang gi lha'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:321b-3: gang zhig du ni rang nyid kyis //
T02TD2625E:321b-4: las kyi cho ga rnam med pa //
T02TD2625E:321b-5: der ni spyi rgyud las grags pa'i //
T02TD2625E:321b-6: cho ga mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02TD2625E:321b-8: lha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-9: byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni gdul bya 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams la gdams pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:321b-10: mnyam par bzhag pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:321b-11: 'dir phyag rgya dang po gsum ni /
T02TD2625E:321b-12: sngar skul sogs pa'i sngags gsungs pa dang spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:321b-13: de nas ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-14: de nas ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i ste 'jug pa'i'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-15: de nas ni sh'kya'i tog gi'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-16: de nas ni sha'kya thub pa dang phyag na rdo rje'i 'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-17: de nas ni rgyud kyi bdag po'i 'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-18: de nas ni rin chen dpal gyi'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-19: de nas ni dkyil 'khor gnyis par bzhugs pa'i sha'kya thub pa'i ste /
T02TD2625E:321b-20: 'di nyid ngan 'gro dgag pa'i sdig pa gzhom pa la spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:321b-21: de nas ni bsrung ma la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i ste /
T02TD2625E:321b-22: kha cig ni 'di nyid me tog rgyas pa'i yin no zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:321b-23: de nas bzhi ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad do ;
T02TD2625E:321b-24: / de nas dgu ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2625E:321b-25: de nas me tog rgyas pa'i ste /
T02TD2625E:321b-26: kha cig na re de nyid sh'akya thub pa'i zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:321b-27: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-28: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o zhes bya ba ni 'ga' zhig de la mos pa la dgongs te /
T02TD2625E:321b-29: de bas na bdag nyid gang la dad cing me tog lhung ba de nyid bri ba'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-30: dbus kyi bdag po la me tog lhung ba'am /
T02TD2625E:321b-31: dkyil 'khor la mos pa'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:321b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:321b-33: lhag ma ni go bar sla'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-36: // / da ni de nas brgya byin dang //
T02TD2625E:321b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshe dpag du med pa'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:321b-38: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:321b-48: ai ti zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:321b-49: tshig 'di dag gi don ci zhe na /
T02TD2625E:322a-2: mi rnams kyis rab tu rig pa dka' ste /
T02TD2625E:322a-3: ji skad du rgyal ba skyed ma las /
T02TD2625E:322a-4: kye ma gnod spyin rnams kyis brjod pa dang /
T02TD2625E:322a-5: skad dang sgra ni shes par rung gi /'phags pa rab 'byor 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni shes par mi rung ngo zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:322a-6: ci'i phyir lha de dag rang skad legs par spyar ba bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:322a-7: gnod spyin gyi ngag gis stod par byed ce na /
T02TD2625E:322a-8: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni lcang lo can du gnod spyin gyi nang du 'khrungs pas de dag gi de nyid las de nyid gyi gsung du bstod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:322a-10: gnod spyin bdag po nyi ma stong gi gzi //
T02TD2625E:322a-12: de la tshig 'di dag gis ni /
T02TD2625E:322a-13: bcom ldan 'das de sa bcu la shin tu sbyangs pas /
T02TD2625E:322a-15: sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po brnyes par ston la /
T02TD2625E:322a-16: de nyid kyis spyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su spyang zhing /
T02TD2625E:322a-17: rdzogs pa'i rkyen yang re re la spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:322a-18: de bas na ko zhes bya ba ni tva ma zhes bya ba yin la /
T02TD2625E:322a-19: t'a la sogs pa ni rang rang gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2625E:322a-21: ai ti zhes bya ba ni sad dzva ta zhes ston pa'o //
T02TD2625E:322a-22: kha cig na re tshig 'di dag ni dpal bde mchog las gsungs pa dang 'dra bas /
T02TD2625E:322a-23: bcom ldan 'das 'dis gru la sogs pa'i rlung la mnga' thob par ston pa'o zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:322a-24: bde mchog gi rgyud 'di nyid du yang tshul 'di ltar drang ba la gnod pa ci zhig yod la /
T02TD2625E:322a-25: 'dir ni rlung gi gnas skabs ci yang ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:322a-26: mtshar du ma 'brel pa smra par zang ngon //
T02TD2625E:322a-27: mdo dang bsres pa las ni /
T02TD2625E:322a-28: bla ma'i man ngag las rag lus par cher ston pa dang /
T02TD2625E:322a-29: der yang rlung gi tshul 'byung du rung bas /
T02TD2625E:322a-30: de ltar dgongs par zad do zhes bya ba nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:322a-31: legs par sgrubs shig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:322a-32: legs par nyon la gus nyon te //
T02TD2625E:322a-34: thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa khyab pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:322a-35: gsang sngags gtsor gyur pa'i thabs rnams so //
T02TD2625E:322a-36: de ltar 'byung pa'i rgyu ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa nyid yin te /
T02TD2625E:322a-37: de la snyoms par zhugs nas ni /
T02TD2625E:322b-0: mngon sum du mdzad pa @322b las rang gi thugs ka nas yi ge'i phreng pa /
T02TD2625E:322b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ming gi khyad par tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes dpag tu med pa 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba 'di phyung zhing /
T02TD2625E:322b-2: de phyung bas ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste zhes bya ba la sogs par spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:322b-3: de nas aom pu n+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gsang sngags rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:322b-8: don yod grub pa rnams dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-10: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:322b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mdzad pa ni dpag tu med pa yin mod kyi /
T02TD2625E:322b-12: 'on kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa'i skus byang chub tu gyur pa'i mdzad pa chen po ni bcu gnyis te /
T02TD2625E:322b-13: de ni ji skad du 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las /
T02TD2625E:322b-14: dus gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du /
T02TD2625E:322b-15: dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-19: dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-20: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-22: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-23: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-24: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /
T02TD2625E:322b-26: chos nub par ston pa la mkhas pa dang zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:322b-27: 'di rnams kyang stobs bcu rnam par gzhag pa las /
T02TD2625E:322b-28: de lta bur mchog rnams ba stan par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:322b-29: de'i phyir na 'dir tshig gi don ni bcu gnyis kyis grangs su byas pa'i mdzad pa rnams ni /
T02TD2625E:322b-30: mdzad pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la gnyis pa'i bsdus pa yin no //
T02TD2625E:322b-31: lhag ma rnams ni go bar sla'o //
T02TD2625E:322b-32: rmad kyi ya mtshan 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni lhas chen po bco brgyang tshang bar 'byung bar ston pa'o //
T02TD2625E:322b-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor ston te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:322b-34: khros ba las zhes bya ba ni nang ngo //
T02TD2625E:322b-35: khros pa'i dbang du gyur par bri //
T02TD2625E:322b-37: phyi rol rab tu mi sdug cing gtum pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:323a-0: yang na khros pa'i dbang du ma rungs pa @323a * //
T02TD2625E:323a-2: skrag nas thal mo sbyor bar bri ste /
T02TD2625E:323a-3: sum cu pa'i lha rnams lhung pa dang /
T02TD2625E:323a-4: bgegs rnams bred nas thal mo sbyor //
T02TD2625E:323a-5: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:323a-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:323a-7: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa la sogs pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2625E:323a-8: 'chi bdag nyid ma rungs pas na sprul lta bu ste /
T02TD2625E:323a-9: des 'jigs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni shi bas 'jigs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:323a-10: 'chi bdag ste gshin rje de dag gzhom pas te /
T02TD2625E:323a-11: re zhig dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang rnam par smin pa las byung ba yang /
T02TD2625E:323a-12: rig pa 'dzin pa'i mthu'i khyad par gyis gzhom par bya ba'i phyir gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2625E:323a-13: de bas na dkyil 'khor 'dir ni tshe ring po don du gnyer ba'i slob ma gzhug go //
T02TD2625E:323a-15: de'i phyir aom badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis khro bo rdo rje ti r'i nti ri zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje bsdams pa mthe bo dag ni gshibs pas mnan pa 'di nyid /
T02TD2625E:323a-16: phyag rgya gang yin ba de nyid lha zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis rdo rje ti r'inti ri ste de bcing bar byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:323a-20: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:323a-21: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las /
T02TD2625E:323a-22: 'jig skyong tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dang //
T02TD2625E:323a-23: drag po'am rlung sogs lha la phyag mi bya //
T02TD2625E:323a-24: de yis bshad pa'i chos la mi brten zhing //
T02TD2625E:323a-25: de dag dka' thub mi spyad rtags mi mchod //
T02TD2625E:323a-26: de rnams chos la ngan sems mi bya zhing //
T02TD2625E:323a-27: de spyod rnams la rnams kyang dga' mi bya //
T02TD2625E:323a-28: de dag bstod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas //
T02TD2625E:323a-29: sngags kyang mi bzlas de dag mdo mi bklag / ces gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:323a-30: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo las kyang /
T02TD2625E:323a-32: 'jig rten lha ni yongs mi ba sten //
T02TD2625E:323a-33: zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam /
T02TD2625E:323a-34: 'dir de dag ji ltar sgrub par rigs she na /
T02TD2625E:323a-35: 'di la lan ni bdag gis sngon du mang du brjod zin na /
T02TD2625E:323a-36: gzhan yang der ni lha mo tri pu ra dang tsa munda la sogs pa nyi tshe ba bkag la /
T02TD2625E:323a-37: 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pas cung zad dman par brjod pa'am /
T02TD2625E:323b-0: @323b yang na 'di dag ni gdul bya'i dbang las 'jig rten par snang yang /
T02TD2625E:323b-2: ji skad du 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:323b-3: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2625E:323b-4: thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de //
T02TD2625E:323b-5: gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na //
T02TD2625E:323b-6: lha rnams su yang 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2625E:323b-7: zhes gsungs la gzhan las kyang /
T02TD2625E:323b-8: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD2625E:323b-10: thugs rjes non pa de dang der //
T02TD2625E:323b-11: brtse ba'i bdag nyid ston par mdzad //
T02TD2625E:323b-13: rgya cher ni sngar brjod zin to //
T02TD2625E:323b-14: de bas na 'di la nyes pa med do //
T02TD2625E:323b-15: de la 'dir thun mong du bdag po la mchod pa dgu'am lngas mchod cing /
T02TD2625E:323b-16: 'jig rten pa rnams la ni mchod pa lnga kho nas mchod do //
T02TD2625E:323b-17: dbang bskur ba yang ji ltar smos pa bdag po bcas pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
T02TD2625E:323b-18: dam tshig sems dpa' yang bdag po kho nas bya'i /
T02TD2625E:323b-20: gang la me tog bab pa de la yang khyad par du bdag po kho na bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:323b-21: rgyal po chen po bzhis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:323b-22: gzhung nye bar gzhag pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:323b-23: bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:323b-24: aom ae hye hi zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02TD2625E:323b-25: de nyid kyi mthar ming gi zhi ba gsal te /
T02TD2625E:323b-26: dhri ta r'asht'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pas rim pa bzhin du de nas rgyal po rnams des spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2625E:323b-28: de nas grva gzhag pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:323b-29: padma 'dab ma brgyang pa'i phyogs bzhir ni rgyal po bzhi'o //
T02TD2625E:323b-30: mtshams bzhir bkod pa'i bum pa legs par byin gyis brlabs pa bzhis ni slob ma de gnas bsrung ba'i bum pa nas brtsams te chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:323b-31: de nas de dag rab tu brtan zhing nges par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:323b-32: dbang lnga pa bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'i phyag rgya ras sngon pos g-yogs pa slob mas mchod la /
T02TD2625E:323b-33: de nas de yis slob ma'i spyi bo dang /
T02TD2625E:323b-36: snying gar bzhag pas slob ma de dbang ni legs par bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:323b-37: rab tu grub par byed pa ni phyag rgya'i dbang 'di nyid yin no //
T02TD2625E:323b-38: bdag po'i phyag rgya'i dbang de nyid dang por byas te /
T02TD2625E:324a-1: phyag rgya gnas bzhir gzhag pa'i go rims kyis dbang bskur pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du de ltar dbang bskur na /
T02TD2625E:324a-2: mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rgyal po ma yin pa rgyal por 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob ste /
T02TD2625E:324a-4: nye ba'i rin po che bdun dang /
T02TD2625E:324a-5: bkra shis kyi rdzas bcu drug nges par spyin no //
T02TD2625E:324a-7: lan bzhir zhes gnyis smos pa ni dkyil 'khor lan bzhir bris la /
T02TD2625E:324a-8: der lan bzhir 'jug cing dbang bskur gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:324a-9: 'bad pa'i mthu las 'bras bu khyad par can 'byung bas so //
T02TD2625E:324a-10: re dang bsam pa zhes bya ba la re ba ni 'grub par re ba yin la /
T02TD2625E:324a-11: bsam pa ni dgos pa dang bcas pa'am /
T02TD2625E:324a-12: nges pa gang yang ma byas par bsams pa'o //
T02TD2625E:324a-13: dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i 'grel pa bshad pa'o /
T02TD2625E:324a-15: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2625E:324a-16: phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2625E:324a-17: phyogs skyong ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:324a-18: aom aam zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan te /
T02TD2625E:324a-19: lhag ma ni rang gi ming dang 'brel pa yin pas go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:324a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:324a-21: 'dir 'khor lo rtsibs brgyang pa la shar gyi rtsibs la lha gsum bkod pa'am /
T02TD2625E:324a-23: yang na lha'i snam bu dang ldan par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:324a-25: bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba na bum pa bcu ste /
T02TD2625E:324a-26: phyag rgya yang thams cad du snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:324a-27: de nas phan par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2625E:324a-28: bsgrub phyir snying po spyin par bya //
T02TD2625E:324a-30: sngon bzhin du lha yongs su bzung ba ste /
T02TD2625E:324a-31: 'dir ni bdag po dang gang la me tog bab pa de spyin la /
T02TD2625E:324a-32: bdag po la me tog bab na ni 'jig rten pa'i lha gang 'dod pa zhig bzung ngo //
T02TD2625E:324a-34: dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyang po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:324a-35: nad par rim gro pa dang mi ldan pa'am /
T02TD2625E:324a-36: sman pas log par brtsal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:324a-38: mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog pa dang mes tshig pa dang /
T02TD2625E:324a-40: dud 'gro ma rungs pas brtsal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:324b-1: ro langs kyis brtsal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:324b-2: bkres pa dang skom pas 'chi ba dag ni /
T02TD2625E:324b-3: dus ma yin par 'chi ba chen po dgu yin la /
T02TD2625E:324b-4: dus ma yin par 'chi ba phra mo dpag tu med do zhes 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo las gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:324b-5: de las 'dir ni drug pa dang brgyang pa gcig tu byas te brgyang du bzhag ste /
T02TD2625E:324b-6: gdug pa can nyid du 'di dag rab tu 'dra bas so //
T02TD2625E:324b-8: yi dvags dang 'dres ma 'jigs par bgyi zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:324b-9: yi dvags ni yi dvags kyi rigs sum cu rtsa drug la bsams la 'dre ni gang sha za rnams te /
T02TD2625E:324b-11: de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:324b-12: sngags bsgrub pa dag la ni lha'i bu'i bdud dang /
T02TD2625E:324b-13: log 'dren dag phal cher bar du gcod la /
T02TD2625E:324b-14: 'di ni de gnyi ga'i bdag por gyur pas na /
T02TD2625E:324b-15: 'dir bsrung ba las bya bar dam bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-16: tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-19: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas gza' chen po'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:324b-20: gza' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-21: srin po byang stong sgra gcan bri //
T02TD2625E:324b-24: yang na byang gi stong de nub byang gi mtshams su gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan zhes bya ba 'di bri ste /
T02TD2625E:324b-25: de ni phyogs de gnyis la brten //
T02TD2625E:324b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim lha'i snam bu nyid khor yug tu dgongs la /
T02TD2625E:324b-28: der smin drug la sogs pa'i rgyu skad thams cad sngon bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-30: ae badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2625E:324b-31: sngags dang po ni slob ma la gsang ba bsgo ba'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-32: gnyis pa ni yol ba'i nang du drang ba'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-33: gsum pa ni me tog dor ba'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-34: rgyu skar dang zhes bya ba ni smin drug la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-35: skad cig dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:324b-36: de la brten pa'i lha ste /
T02TD2625E:324b-37: yud tsam dang thang cig kyang de bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:324b-38: kar na zhes bya ba ni zhag gdags pa'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-39: zla tshigs zhes bya ba ni zla ba ril po'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-40: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni dus mtshams sbyor ba bzhi po gang du khams rab tu 'khrug pa skye ba'o //
T02TD2625E:324b-41: khyim zhes bya ba ni srang la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-0: nyi tshod ces bya ba ni nyi ma ldog @325a * //
T02TD2625E:325a-1: pa'i nyin mtshan ring po gnyis so //
T02TD2625E:325a-2: 'jug phod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-5: 'jig rten pa rnams ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal phal cher 'di dag gis byas par 'dod de /
T02TD2625E:325a-6: 'di dag kyang rang gi mid smos pa'i dngos po la srog gi dbang po gzhan ltar brten pas na /
T02TD2625E:325a-7: rten gyi ming brten pa la spyod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:325a-8: de'i phyir 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas dang rang bzhin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
T02TD2625E:325a-10: dge slong dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i sems can ni ches nyung gi / ngas shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la lha'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can ni rab tu mang ngo zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:325a-11: 'di dag ni byed pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:325a-13: gang la yang byed pa po gzhan med de /
T02TD2625E:325a-14: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las //
T02TD2625E:325a-15: dge dang mi dge rang byas gang //
T02TD2625E:325a-18: 'on kyang byis pa dag la de dag byed pa por khas blangs te /
T02TD2625E:325a-19: ngan 'gro'i dkyil 'khor las bzlog pa'i phyir grong dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-20: gang na 'khrig pa ma spangs pa gnas pa'i khyim mo //
T02TD2625E:325a-21: grong khyer dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-22: gang la rig pa'i gnas mchog bco brgyang spyod pa'i sgrong gi tshogs so //
T02TD2625E:325a-23: grong rdal dang zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD2625E:325a-24: grong khyer rab tu mang po can sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi tshang bar spyod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-25: ljongs dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-26: chos lugs gcig gis bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-27: rgyal po'i pho brang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-28: gang na rtag tu rgyal po bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-29: pho brang 'khor zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-30: gang na btsun mo gnas pa'i khang pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-31: rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas glang po che'i ra ba dang /
T02TD2625E:325a-34: dbang po phur pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-38: than pa mu ge la sogs pa'i tshe /
T02TD2625E:325a-39: nges bdag cag mchod na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325a-40: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bris nas de la mchod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325a-43: // / da ni de nas klu chen po brgyang kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2625E:325a-44: klu chen po brgyang kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:325a-45: phu: zhes bya ba'i sga 'di ni klu rnams kyi rang gi rig pa srog ltar gces pa ste /
T02TD2625E:325b-0: @325b de bcom ldan 'das la ser sna med par phul ba nyid kyis /
T02TD2625E:325b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de mnyes pa nyid du byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325b-2: aom phu: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:325b-3: mtha' yas la sogs pa smos ba dang rim par spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:325b-4: ltos 'gro chen po sdig par bri //
T02TD2625E:325b-5: zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas la sogs pa nyid do //
T02TD2625E:325b-6: de bas na bdun pa mang po tshig can bsdus pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325b-7: kha cig na re 'dir mtha' yas la sogs pa las gzhan pa klu ma rungs pa gang yang rung ba cig brdzis par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:325b-8: chung ma yis zhes bya ba ni sprul mgo gsum gsum pa rang re dang 'dra ba yis so //
T02TD2625E:325b-9: gtor ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:325b-10: klu rnams yid dga' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs pa gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325b-11: 'byung po mar dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325b-13: strga'i mar la sogs pa dgag pa'o //
T02TD2625E:325b-14: sprul mgos zhes bya ba ni sprul mgo'i phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2625E:325b-15: sprul mgo can rnams dgug ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:325b-16: lhag ma dgu po rnams te /
T02TD2625E:325b-17: de yang aom ae dhya hi bha ga wan shri bdzra h'um ka ra ma h'a ka ru ni ka dri shya dza:h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba de nyid las mtshan gsol to //
T02TD2625E:325b-18: yam'anta zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:325b-19: phu ta dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2625E:325b-20: de nas bu ni zhe spya ba ni slob ma bzang po dang /
T02TD2625E:325b-22: kha cig na re bu zhes bya ba rang gi bu tha mal pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:325b-23: pha la ngan du smra ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:325b-24: de bas na dpal bde mchog las kyang /
T02TD2625E:325b-25: spun dang bu gcig lhan cig tu //
T02TD2625E:325b-26: bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung bya //
T02TD2625E:325b-27: ye shes der ba stan mi bya ste //
T02TD2625E:325b-28: sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:325b-29: zhes gsungs so zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:325b-30: de ni nges pa ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:325b-31: gsang ba zla ba'i thig le las //
T02TD2625E:325b-32: gsang sngags rnams dang phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2625E:325b-33: de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams //
T02TD2625E:325b-34: thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyang //
T02TD2625E:325b-35: sngags pas gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2625E:325b-36: dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:325b-37: bu dang slob ma la spyin bya //
T02TD2625E:325b-39: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:325b-40: slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni //
T02TD2625E:325b-41: slob ma ma yin bu min pa'i //
T02TD2625E:325b-42: mdun du / phyag rgya mi brjod de //
T02TD2625E:325b-43: de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub //
T02TD2625E:325b-45: de bas na rang bzhin bzang po 'ba' zhig gtsor bya'i //
T02TD2625E:326a-3: pho mo la sogs pa ni 'dir mi gzung ngo //
T02TD2625E:326a-4: de bzhin du rgyal po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan du 'dren pa rnams kyang bsal te mi dgag par byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:326a-6: de nas bslab pa bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2625E:326a-7: dug bsal ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs ston te /
T02TD2625E:326a-8: 'di mi rnams la 'tshe ba'i klu ni /
T02TD2625E:326a-13: nya dag gi rigs su gnas par gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:326a-14: de dag las kyang sprul gyi rigs ni mi rnams la rab tu 'tshe ba mang ba yin zhing /
T02TD2625E:326a-15: de yang rigs brgyang cu yod de /
T02TD2625E:326a-16: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las /
T02TD2625E:326a-17: sa yi steng ni sprul ni brgyang cu dag //
T02TD2625E:326a-18: gzhan la gnod pa byed cing rnam par 'khyam //
T02TD2625E:326a-20: de la dug med pa'i rigs ni /
T02TD2625E:326a-22: lhag ma rnams ni dug dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:326a-23: de la dug can de dag kyang rigs rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD2625E:326a-24: khro bo dang lus 'khyil pa dang /
T02TD2625E:326a-26: de la gang gi tshe sprul khro bos zin pa de'i tshe ni /
T02TD2625E:326a-27: rma'i sgo skya la skrang pa dang /
T02TD2625E:326a-28: 'byil zhing snum la khrag 'dzag pa dang /
T02TD2625E:326a-29: cung zad skam zhing bad kan rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:326a-30: gal te sprul lus 'khyil pas zin na /
T02TD2625E:326a-32: ser zhing rab tu skrang ste /
T02TD2625E:326a-33: mkhris pa rgyas par byed do //
T02TD2625E:326a-34: gal te sprul gdengs ka can gyis zin na /
T02TD2625E:326a-35: rma'i sgo gang ste rlung 'phel bar byed do //
T02TD2625E:326a-36: klu'i rigs ma lus pa'i dug dbye ba ni lta ba dang /
T02TD2625E:326a-39: so'i dug dang bzhi nyid do //
T02TD2625E:326a-40: de la reg pa ni lus dang /
T02TD2625E:326a-41: kha chu dang bshang gcis reg pas dug tu gyur te /
T02TD2625E:326a-42: lta ba ni mig gdug pa ste /
T02TD2625E:326a-43: mthong ba tsam gyis dug tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2625E:326a-44: dbugs ni kha rlangs me lta bur tsha ba'am chu ltar bsil bas reg na dug tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2625E:326a-45: so'i dug ni mche bas btab pa las gyur pa'o //
T02TD2625E:326a-46: de yang dang po gsum ni mdze nad dang /
T02TD2625E:326a-50: lto sbo ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:326a-51: so'i dug ni dbyibs lta bur lta ba ste /
T02TD2625E:326a-52: sngar ba stan pa gsum nyid do //
T02TD2625E:326a-53: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2625E:326b-0: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs @326b pa ;
T02TD2625E:326b-1: zos pa de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te //
T02TD2625E:326b-2: mche bas zin dang sos bcad gtad pa'o //
T02TD2625E:326b-3: gang gis mtshe ba gcig gis khrag byung rjes //
T02TD2625E:326b-4: de ni dug byung bas ni zin par bshad //
T02TD2625E:326b-5: gang du mche ba gnyis kyis btab nas su //
T02TD2625E:326b-6: khrag phyung bar ni 'gyur bar zos pa'o //
T02TD2625E:326b-7: gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad na //
T02TD2625E:326b-8: de ni bcad bar gyur pa yin zhes ba stan //
T02TD2625E:326b-9: gang du mche ba bzhi yis btab nas so //
T02TD2625E:326b-10: sprul gyi lus ni bzlog par 'gyur ba de //
T02TD2625E:326b-11: gtad nas zos pa yin zhes bshad pa ste //
T02TD2625E:326b-12: de ni sman rnams kyis kyang bzlog par dka' //
T02TD2625E:326b-13: me yi rang bzhin gnad du 'phen pa'i dug / mtshon dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa dag / ji ltar sngags kyis rab tu zhi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2625E:326b-14: de bzhin sman gyis zhi bar mi nus so //
T02TD2625E:326b-15: ji ltar me dpung chen po bud shing la //
T02TD2625E:326b-16: nges par bsregs la char 'bab skad cig gis //
T02TD2625E:326b-17: zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin dug dag ni //
T02TD2625E:326b-18: me dpung lta bu'ang sngags kyis zhi bar byed //
T02TD2625E:326b-19: dug gi mthu rtogs shes nas rab bsgrims te //
T02TD2625E:326b-20: gsang sngags cho ga bzhin brlabs bsgrubs na ni //
T02TD2625E:326b-21: ba lang khyu na seng ge ji lta bar //
T02TD2625E:326b-22: dug dang sprul dang dgos med lhan cig rtse //
T02TD2625E:326b-24: de dag gi dug dbyung ba'i rgyu yang de nyid las gsungs pa ;
T02TD2625E:326b-25: dug 'phrog khro bo'i dbang gyur skrag pa dang //
T02TD2625E:326b-26: de bzhin sngags pa'am bkres pa'i zas phyir ram //
T02TD2625E:326b-27: sha khon yod pa'am gshin rjes ba stan pa'am //
T02TD2625E:326b-28: lus la brdzis na de dag za par byed //
T02TD2625E:326b-30: byis pa gang dag yul gyi rang bzhin ma shes pa de dag la dug de dag gis gnod par 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:326b-31: 'di skad du dpal sangs rgyas thod pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:326b-32: tha mal yul rnams sprul yin te //
T02TD2625E:326b-33: yul rnams kyi ni nyes pa dug / lha rnams yul rnams ma shes phyir //
T02TD2625E:326b-34: thams cad dus su zin pa yin //
T02TD2625E:326b-36: byis pa de lta bu rnams la thugs brtse bas /
T02TD2625E:326b-37: rgyud kyi rgyal po rnams las dug bsal ba'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:326b-42: mche ba'i dug rnams bsal ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:326b-45: phyag rgya'i bya ba bla na med pa gsungs so /
T02TD2625E:327a-0: @327a * // de la re zhig rnal 'byor pas yid dmigs pa la gnas pa thob par byas la //
T02TD2625E:327a-1: klu'i dkyil 'khor ji skad du gsungs pa las /
T02TD2625E:327a-2: cung zad du rdo rje 'chang dbu la sprul mgo ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'od zer dkar po kha ba ltar bsil bas bskor ba bskyed la mchod pa'i bar du bya ste /
T02TD2625E:327a-3: phud ces ba ba 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te /
T02TD2625E:327a-5: de nas bong la sogs pa'i dbyig dug blangs te /
T02TD2625E:327a-6: srang tshad la legs par bcal la /
T02TD2625E:327a-7: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la /
T02TD2625E:327a-8: bdag gi lag pa g-yas ba'i mthil du yang /
T02TD2625E:327a-9: phud ces bya ba'i yi ge kha dog dkar po las ;
T02TD2625E:327a-10: padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyang pa'i 'dab ma la /
T02TD2625E:327a-11: lha rnams gnas par bskyed la /
T02TD2625E:327a-12: dkyil 'khor gnyis las 'od zer dkar po byung bas dug de dag la phog pas /
T02TD2625E:327a-13: bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid du bsam zhing /
T02TD2625E:327a-14: dug de'i steng du yi ge phu: dkar po gnas pa las /
T02TD2625E:327a-15: 'od zer dkar po byung bas kyang de ltar bsam mo //
T02TD2625E:327a-16: yang na dug gi 'og tu yi ge phu: nag po las byung ba'i rlung gi tshogs drag pos gtor bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:327a-17: yang na lag pa sprul mgo'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2625E:327a-18: phu: zhes brjod pa dang phyag rgya'i stobs kyis dug drangs te /
T02TD2625E:327a-19: sa dang chu dang me dang ka pa la sogs par spo ste /
T02TD2625E:327a-20: rnal 'byor 'di gsum gang yang rung bas dug bsal bar gyur pa ni /
T02TD2625E:327a-21: dug de srang la bcal ba nyung bar gyur pa na'o //
T02TD2625E:327a-22: de nas de mda' dug gam sprul gyi dug rnams rnal 'byor gang la goms pa de nyid kyis bsal te /
T02TD2625E:327a-23: 'di ni nang gi rnal 'byor kho nas dug bsal ba yin la /
T02TD2625E:327a-24: phyi rol gyi bya bas dug bsal ba ma gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:327a-26: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo rtse sprad pas zhags mig ltar byas te /
T02TD2625E:327a-28: cung zad dgu por byas la /
T02TD2625E:327a-29: sprul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:327a-30: pags pa sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:327a-31: rab tu zhe na pa'i dug la sogs pa rnams sel bar ston to //
T02TD2625E:327a-32: phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drang zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gsum gyi nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02TD2625E:327a-33: khu tshur gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:327a-34: phyag rgya dang bral ba'i lag pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:327b-2: // / de ni de nas lha chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2625E:327b-3: lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:327b-4: 'di ni lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po yang yin la /
T02TD2625E:327b-5: 'jigs par byed pa chen po yang yin la /
T02TD2625E:327b-6: de ni lha'i lha chen po zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:327b-7: rang gi gzugs dang lag ca dang /
T02TD2625E:327b-8: ro phyed tshig pa za bas dur khrod du lhag ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'am /
T02TD2625E:327b-9: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje khams gsum gyi bdag po rnams btul ba na /
T02TD2625E:327b-11: bcom ldan 'das la kva'i gnod spyin khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon cig smras pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:327b-12: yang na 'di snying rje nyid kyis 'jigs su rung bar sprul te /
T02TD2625E:327b-14: bud med chen po brgyang kyis bskor //
T02TD2625E:327b-16: 'di ni rtag tu dus mtshan dang /
T02TD2625E:327b-23: lus ngan ma la sogs pa'i ma mo rang gi chung ma drag mo dang bcas pa'i ma mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD2625E:327b-24: bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:327b-25: 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas //
T02TD2625E:327b-27: ha ha zhes drag tu smras nas so //
T02TD2625E:327b-28: 'di dag gi gsang sngags rnams ni sngar lha rnams ba stan pa dang spyar ro ;
T02TD2625E:327b-29: / bum pa'am mgo bo'i thod pa ni //
T02TD2625E:327b-30: de ltar brgyang kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:327b-31: zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi sngags kyi mthar aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes brjod de dbang bskur la /
T02TD2625E:327b-32: yang phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:327b-33: de nas las rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos grub ston te /
T02TD2625E:327b-36: sa rnams spyin pa ma gtogs par //
T02TD2625E:327b-38: 'di dag rab tu mthu dang ldan par ston pa ste /
T02TD2625E:327b-39: sa spyin pa ni rang gi sems rab tu spyang ba 'ba' zhig la rag las pas de ni mi nus te gzhan spyin ba ste /
T02TD2625E:327b-41: 'phags pa da kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:327b-42: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la /
T02TD2625E:327b-44: grogs rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub spyin par sgrubs shig / de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2625E:328a-0: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi @328a * //
T02TD2625E:328a-2: ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na /
T02TD2625E:328a-3: bdag cag nyid yang dag par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:328a-4: bde chen zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po la'ang drag po ste des so //
T02TD2625E:328a-5: h'um gi tshul gyis rtsol zhes bya bas nga rgyal byas la /
T02TD2625E:328a-7: h'um zhes brjod cing dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02TD2625E:328a-9: skrag na de ma thag tu gsod //
T02TD2625E:328a-10: ces bya ba ni 'jigs par mi bya ste /
T02TD2625E:328a-11: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:328a-12: 'jigs pas lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
T02TD2625E:328a-14: rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:328a-15: de la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:328a-16: sngags pas de la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
T02TD2625E:328a-17: ji ltar 'jigs pa de ltar bgegs kyi bar chad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:328a-18: bar chad du gyur na dngos grub med de /
T02TD2625E:328a-19: de'i phyir sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:328a-21: h'um h'um zhes 'brug ltar sgrogs shing /
T02TD2625E:328a-22: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dran pas zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang dpal rdo rje 'chang gis gsung ste /
T02TD2625E:328a-23: de bas na h'um gi tshul gyis gsol zhes sngar gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:328a-24: ci'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'i lha rnams sgrub pa po la skrag par byed /
T02TD2625E:328a-25: thog ma nas rab tu zhi ba'i lus kyis dngos grub mi spyin zhe na /
T02TD2625E:328a-26: lha rnams ni rab tu zhi bar gnas te /
T02TD2625E:328a-27: sgrub pa po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis las kyi bag chags dang mthun par drag po la sogs par mthong ste /
T02TD2625E:328a-28: sngon chad ser sna ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:328a-29: bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung //
T02TD2625E:328a-30: zhes tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pas so //
T02TD2625E:328a-33: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jigs byed de dag nyid zhi bar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02TD2625E:328a-34: rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams //
T02TD2625E:328a-35: zhes bya ba ni sngar ba stan pa nyid zhi bar snang bar mgul nas 'khyud pa ste /
T02TD2625E:328a-36: 'dir de dag gi don ni sngar smras zin to //
T02TD2625E:328a-37: mtho ris kyi lam zhes bya ba ni dge ba bcu'o //
T02TD2625E:328a-38: bder 'gro lam zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi'o //
T02TD2625E:328a-39: ngan song ma lags pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T02TD2625E:328a-40: sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:328b-1: / dben pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-2: rnam par dben pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:328b-3: sbyor ba'i lam dang po drod ces bya'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-4: 'byung pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni rtse mo'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2625E:328b-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni bzod par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-6: dam pa'i chos kyi lam zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mchog go //
T02TD2625E:328b-7: bde 'gro'i lam zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam dang /
T02TD2625E:328b-8: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-9: spang ba'i lam zhes pa ni /
T02TD2625E:328b-11: nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:328b-12: bar chad med pa'i lam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2625E:328b-13: ba stan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:328b-14: dngos dang brgyud pas zhes so //
T02TD2625E:328b-15: tshig de dag kyang rang rang gi lam dang ji ltar 'tsham par dgrol te /
T02TD2625E:328b-16: bdag gis ni gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bkrol lo //
T02TD2625E:328b-17: sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'grub pa'i lam ba stan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:328b-18: mdor na lam dpag tu med pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas la spyar ro zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-19: byang chub sems dpa' nyid ni 'dir bden pa mthong ba yin la /
T02TD2625E:328b-20: de'i lam nyid de 'grub par byed de /
T02TD2625E:328b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
T02TD2625E:328b-22: ba stan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:328b-23: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub pa'i las ni dbang bskur ba dang bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i lam ste /
T02TD2625E:328b-24: de snga ma ltar ba stan par bgyi'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-25: de la byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2625E:328b-26: rdo rje 'chang ba 'di gnyis kyang khyad par ci yin zhe na /
T02TD2625E:328b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa dang gsang sngags kyi sgo nas sa brgyang pa'i bar du mi 'dra bar bzhugs pa gnyis la de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2625E:328b-29: rgyal ba'i zhing rnams sa 'thob kyang //
T02TD2625E:328b-30: yid bstod par ni 'gyur min te //
T02TD2625E:328b-31: ji srid sa brgyang la gnas par //
T02TD2625E:328b-32: theg dman 'jigs pa de la yod //
T02TD2625E:328b-34: rgyal ba'i sras po rab nges na //
T02TD2625E:328b-35: yid ches par ni gyur pa na //
T02TD2625E:328b-36: theg chen po la gzhol ba yin //
T02TD2625E:328b-38: sa dgu pa la ni lam dbyer med pa'o //
T02TD2625E:328b-39: dus thams cad du zhes bya ba nyin mtshan phyed par sngar ba stan pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las tshe 'di la bsrung ba dang skyes nas bskyab pa dang /
T02TD2625E:329a-0: @329a * // lan grangs gzhan la yang sba bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2625E:329a-1: lhag ma rnams ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:329a-3: 'jig rten gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor drug rdzogs so /
T02TD2625E:329a-5: // / da ni 'di nas mar tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:329a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la kun du gzigs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:329a-7: yang 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos gsungs pa'i rtags gnyis ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:329a-9: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de der rang dbang med par sa gzhi dang bcas par g-yos shing /
T02TD2625E:329a-10: de'i dbang las lus kyang rab tu g-yos la de nyid kyis de dag gi sems kyang sngon las gyur pas yang dag par rab tu g-yos so //
T02TD2625E:329a-11: dga' ba'i tshal de yang rim pa de bzhin du chung du dang chen po dang chen po'i chen por 'gul /
T02TD2625E:329a-13: yang dag par rab tu 'gul lo //
T02TD2625E:329a-14: der gnas pa'i 'od dang zer de dag kyang rim pa gsum snga ma ltar 'bar /
T02TD2625E:329a-16: yang dag par rab tu 'bar ro //
T02TD2625E:329a-17: ngo mtshar de'i dbang gis 'khor de rim pa gsum du rim gyis dgod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:329a-18: rtse ba la sogs par byed do //
T02TD2625E:329a-19: gzhan yang ltas chen po bco brgyang 'jig rten du snang bas na /
T02TD2625E:329a-20: rmad kyi ya mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02TD2625E:329a-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:329a-22: zhus pa dang lan te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:329a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rig sngags 'di /
T02TD2625E:329a-24: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin nyid do //
T02TD2625E:329a-25: gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:329a-26: yi ge bsgyur ba'i tshul gyis gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:329a-29: stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste //
T02TD2625E:329a-30: zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa //
T02TD2625E:329a-32: yang na de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni gshegs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:329a-34: 'du shes tsam yang spangs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:329a-35: rang gi ngo bo ba stan du med //
T02TD2625E:329a-36: ye shes rang rig ces bya ba //
T02TD2625E:329a-37: de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes bya //
