T02TD2625E:329a-39: thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:329a-40: bcom ldan 'das tshe mtha' yas pa nyid de /
T02TD2625E:329a-41: tshogs dang chos kyi sku dag dang //
T02TD2625E:329a-42: 'gro ba'i don ni spyod pa yis //
T02TD2625E:329a-43: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa ste //
T02TD2625E:329b-0: @329b sku tshe rigs dang tshad kyis yin //
T02TD2625E:329b-2: sangs rgyas gcig nyid thams cad do //
T02TD2625E:329b-3: snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:329b-4: yi ge 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams snying gar bsgoms pa sa /
T02TD2625E:329b-5: yid rtogs shing yid la 'dod pa spyin pas snying po ste /
T02TD2625E:329b-6: yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2625E:329b-8: ting 'dzin sgrub ba snying la gnas //
T02TD2625E:329b-9: de bas snying po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:329b-11: snying po de nyid bsgoms pas rig pa skye ba la sogs par byed pas na de nyid rig sngags te /
T02TD2625E:329b-13: ma rig pa nyid gzhig pa dang //
T02TD2625E:329b-14: ngag gi rigs mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:329b-15: dngos grub dam pa yod pa ste //
T02TD2625E:329b-16: de bas rig sngags zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:329b-18: 'di zhes bya ba ni don nye bar gnas pa 'dren pa'i tshig gi phrad do //
T02TD2625E:329b-19: sku gsung thugs rdo rje las zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:329b-20: sku la sogs pa dag dbyer med pa ni rdo rje ste /
T02TD2625E:329b-21: sku dang gsung thugs gang dag yin //
T02TD2625E:329b-22: mi phyed stong pa'i dngos phyir na //
T02TD2625E:329b-23: rdo rje zhes ni rab tu ba stan //
T02TD2625E:329b-24: de bas dbye ba thams cad 'byung //
T02TD2625E:329b-26: phyung ngo zhes bya ba ni skyes pa ste /
T02TD2625E:329b-27: de ltar sngags 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid las 'byung bar ston te /
T02TD2625E:329b-28: gnas de ni gsang sngags rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:329b-29: de ltar yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:329b-31: thog ma'i byed pa med pa'o //
T02TD2625E:329b-34: gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD2625E:329b-35: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma byas /
T02TD2625E:329b-36: byed du ma bcug rjes su yi rang ba ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:329b-38: 'di ni chos thams cad kyi chos nyid de /
T02TD2625E:329b-39: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung /
T02TD2625E:329b-40: chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste /
T02TD2625E:329b-41: de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do //
T02TD2625E:329b-42: gsang ba'i bdag po de la gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa /
T02TD2625E:329b-43: thams cad gzigs pa 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2625E:329b-44: chos nyid tshul sna tshogs dang dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2625E:330a-0: yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu @330a * //
T02TD2625E:330a-2: dbyangs sna tshogs su go ba rnams su byin gyis brlabs te gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do zhes pa dang /
T02TD2625E:330a-4: ji ltar nam mkha' chags med spyod yul can //
T02TD2625E:330a-5: 'gro ba kun gyi gnas su gyur ba ltar //
T02TD2625E:330a-6: de bzhin rnam par dag ba'i chos nyid de //
T02TD2625E:330a-7: srid gsum ma lus 'byor ba 'byung bar byed //
T02TD2625E:330a-9: sngags phyung ba de gang zhe na /
T02TD2625E:330a-10: aom pu n+ye pu n+ye zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2625E:330a-12: phyag na rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni /
T02TD2625E:330a-13: sam ba ro pa tsa ya ka ri ni zhes gsungs ba 'dir ni sam pa ro ba tsi te zhes gsungs bas /
T02TD2625E:330a-15: mi slob ba'i bye brag go zhes rtog bas zer te de ni ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:330a-17: sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas //
T02TD2625E:330a-19: snying po'i rig pa'o zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:330a-20: nye ba'i snying po'i rigs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:330a-21: zhes bya ba ni 'dis lha dang 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang nye bar byed cing snying la gnas pas na snying po ste /
T02TD2625E:330a-22: rig pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:330a-23: snying po nye ba'i snying bo'i rig pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:330a-24: snying po snga ma lta bu nyid lha la sogs pa dang nye bar byed pa yin la de nyid snying po ste /
T02TD2625E:330a-25: snying dga' bar byed cing ma rig pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir rig pa'o //
T02TD2625E:330a-26: snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:330a-27: snying po nyid lha rnams yang dag par mngon du phyogs par bya ba'i phyir skul bar byed pa ste 'di yis bskul bas myur du 'grub cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:330a-28: de nyid rig pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:330a-29: snying po dam pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:330a-30: snying po nyid 'dod pa dam pa'i bar du bsgrubs pas na /
T02TD2625E:330a-31: dam pa'am 'di 'jig rten pa'i lha'i snying po las dam par gyur pas na snying po dam pa'o //
T02TD2625E:330a-32: gsang ba'i snying po'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:330a-33: gsang bar bya ba'i snying po yin pas na gsang ba'i snying po ste /
T02TD2625E:330a-35: kha cig gis gsang sngags rnams 'grub pa'i rgyu ni gsang ba nyid yin te zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:330a-36: 'dir snying po dang gsang sngags la tha dad pa ci yod ce na /
T02TD2625E:330a-37: snying bo ni yi ge bru'i ngo bor snying ga la sogs par bsgom par bya ba kho na yin la /
T02TD2625E:330a-38: gsang sngags ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang don de kun 'grub par srid de /
T02TD2625E:330a-39: gcig tu bsgom pa kho nar pa nges te dbye ba ni de yin no //
T02TD2625E:330b-0: de @330b bzhin du gsang sngags rnams la yang rig pa dang gzungs dang /
T02TD2625E:330b-1: gsang sngags zhes gsum du gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:330b-2: lha de 'bod pa dang rig pa bskyed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:330b-3: ngan 'go la 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir de dag la de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2625E:330b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD2625E:330b-6: mkha' 'gro btsun mo bzang mo rnams //
T02TD2625E:330b-7: 'bong cing sngon du byed pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:330b-8: gsang sngags zhes ni mngon par brjod //
T02TD2625E:330b-9: dper na mi chen 'ga' zhig gis //
T02TD2625E:330b-10: skad ni drag pos pos gyur na //
T02TD2625E:330b-11: thos pa tsam gyis 'ong ba ltar //
T02TD2625E:330b-12: de bzhin sangs rgyas mdo la byon // zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:330b-13: ma rig pa ni gzhig pa dang //
T02TD2625E:330b-14: ngag gi rigs mchog bsgrubs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:330b-15: dngos grub dam pa yod pa ste //
T02TD2625E:330b-16: de bas rig sngags zhes bya'o //
T02TD2625E:330b-18: gzung sa ni rnam gsum dag gi phyir //
T02TD2625E:330b-19: tshig dang don dang gnyi ga'i gzungs //
T02TD2625E:330b-20: legs pa las ni nyams pa na //
T02TD2625E:330b-21: 'dzin par byed pa de phyir gsungs //
T02TD2625E:330b-24: brjod par bya ba yin pa'am //
T02TD2625E:330b-25: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa dang //
T02TD2625E:330b-26: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing //
T02TD2625E:330b-27: shigs par dka' bas gsang ba nyid //
T02TD2625E:330b-28: gsang ba sgrub phyir bsngags pas na //
T02TD2625E:330b-29: de bas gsang sngags nges par brjod //
T02TD2625E:330b-30: ces bya ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas phal cher gsang sngags kyi sgrar ba stan gyi rig pa dang gzungs su ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:330b-31: 'ga' zhig tu rtags tsam la brten te /
T02TD2625E:330b-32: lha pho'i ngo bo dang 'brel pa la ni gsang sngags zhes gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:330b-33: lha mo dang 'brel pa la ni rig sngags dang gzungs sngags zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:330b-34: phal cher ni sngags gcig nyid dang lha gcig nyid dang 'brel pa las /
T02TD2625E:330b-36: 'di dag ni rang gi ngo bo yang shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin ni snying po'o //
T02TD2625E:330b-37: shes rab dang snying rje'i bdag nyid ni gsang sngags so //
T02TD2625E:330b-38: shes rab dang ye shes ni rig sngags so //
T02TD2625E:330b-39: shes rab dang dran pa ni gzungs sngags te /
T02TD2625E:330b-40: de ltar ni gzhung gzhan dag las kyang dran pa dang shes rab yang dag par ldan pa'i sems ni gzungs zhes bya ba'i sgrar bshad do zhes ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:330b-41: rang rang gi ngo bo de dag kyang rang rang gi ming kho nas khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:330b-42: de bzhin du 'di dag ni bsgrubs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2625E:331a-0: sgrub pa po dang sgrub par byed pa gsum la yang 'jug cing @331a * //
T02TD2625E:331a-1: sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa yang ci rigs su dbye ste zhar la 'ongs pas chog go //
T02TD2625E:331a-2: de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-3: bum ba lnga dang brgyang ces bya ba ni lha lnga dang mchod pa dang sgo skyong dang brgyang la thun mong du bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:331a-4: gsang ba'i bum pa dang bcu las /
T02TD2625E:331a-5: bdag po dang gsang ba'i bum pa ni smos mi dgos pas lhag ma brgyang do //
T02TD2625E:331a-6: de ma rnyed na rigs lnga dang gsang ba'i bum par bcas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-7: kha cig ni dbang bskur pa'i bum pa lnga dang bkang ba'i bum pa brgyang do zhes rtog go //
T02TD2625E:331a-8: 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag po'i sngags gtso bor byas te'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-10: aom badzra dha ra zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdag nyid rigs thams cad kyi sems par mos par byas te /
T02TD2625E:331a-12: 'di ni lugs gzhan du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-13: de nas phreng ba de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dbang bskur ba ston to //
T02TD2625E:331a-14: dang po ni lhag ma'i lha'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2625E:331a-15: gnyis pa ni bum pa'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2625E:331a-16: gsum pa ni dam tshig spyin pa'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2625E:331a-17: bzhi pa ni 'chad par rjes su ngang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02TD2625E:331a-18: lnga pa ni bsgrub par ngang ba'i dpang ste /
T02TD2625E:331a-19: lugs 'di ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dang cung zad mi 'dra ba nyid yin pas gzhan gyis mi drang ngo //
T02TD2625E:331a-20: tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-21: de nas bla ma la khyod kyis yon gyi mchog ni dbul bar bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:331a-22: de yang rnyed pas rnyed pa la sogs pa bsgrub par srid pas /
T02TD2625E:331a-24: nor dang dbyig la sogs pa dbul te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu ston te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:331a-26: de nas bu la zhes bya ba la sogs pas man ngag ba stan par ston te /
T02TD2625E:331a-27: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
T02TD2625E:331a-28: sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni //
T02TD2625E:331a-29: zhes bya ba ni ye shes dbab pa'am /
T02TD2625E:331a-30: sems so sor rtogs pa'i skabs so //
T02TD2625E:331a-31: de nas ni aa zhes bya ba ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid las thabs kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsams te /
T02TD2625E:331a-32: kha cig na re yi ge aa dkar po nyid las zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:331a-33: de nas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sa bon gyi yig 'bru zla ba de'i dbus su 'od zer dang bcas pas bsams nas /
T02TD2625E:331b-0: de las 'od zer 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i dbang las rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag @331b rgya dag tu gyur par bsam zhing /
T02TD2625E:331b-1: de nas kyang 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu bas stong pa las zla ba la sogs par gyur pa de bzhin du 'dir yang rang gi lha'i de nyid du phyag rgya de dang de las sgrub pa po bdag nyid kha ni bsgyur bar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:331b-2: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:331b-3: gzhan dun don med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:331b-4: de ltar sngags pa lha'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du bsgyur nas /
T02TD2625E:331b-5: da ni ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD2625E:331b-6: de nas de ma thag tu rang gi sa bon dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya ste rang gi lus phyag rgya chen po de brtan par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2625E:331b-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2625E:331b-9: sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas la //
T02TD2625E:331b-10: snying ga mdzod spu mgrin pa dang //
T02TD2625E:331b-11: spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob //
T02TD2625E:331b-13: ci'i de tsam du zad dam snyam pa las /
T02TD2625E:331b-14: lhag ces bya ba dam tshig sems dpa' chen por mos pa la sogs pa yang sngon du bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:331b-15: 'gro zhes bya ba sku gsung thugs gcig pu mos pa la sogs pa'i bya ba yang bya'o //
T02TD2625E:331b-16: de dag kyang rtsa ba'i rgyud las ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du ma nor bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:331b-17: cho ga de dag las gtsor gyur pa ni /
T02TD2625E:331b-18: dbang bskur ba yin pas dngos su smos te /
T02TD2625E:331b-19: sangs rgyas lnga rnams kyis dbu rgyan du dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:331b-21: rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa //
T02TD2625E:331b-22: sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni //
T02TD2625E:331b-23: brtsam par byas nas ngos bzhir yang //
T02TD2625E:331b-24: phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:331b-26: de ltar smos pa dang ma smos pa dang cho ga ma lus pa'i sgo nas bdag nyid mthu thob par bsams te /
T02TD2625E:331b-27: bsnyen pa la sogs pa byas nas 'grub po zhes ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:331b-28: de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:331b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:331b-30: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba yang go sla ba nyid do //
T02TD2625E:331b-31: de'i sha dang rus pa dang skra dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:331b-32: dkyil 'khor 'dir ro nyid legs par gtubs shing sdig pa spyang ba'i sngags kyis bsregs la /
T02TD2625E:331b-33: tha ma shi ba de'i rus pa'i thal ba yang bsregs pas na thal ba la sogs pa zhes smos te /
T02TD2625E:331b-34: dman pas mchog bsdu'i dkyil 'khor dgu pa'i 'grel pa ste rgyud phyi ma'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2625E:331b-36: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2625E:332a-0: rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i rgyang du ma gsungs pa'i @332a * //
T02TD2625E:332a-1: cho ga ma lus pa bsdus pa'i ngo bo rgyud phyi ma phyi ma ston te /
T02TD2625E:332a-2: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:332a-3: phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-4: ye shes chen po 'dzin pas so //
T02TD2625E:332a-5: sngags dang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-6: rig ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs ba ni spyan la sogs pa'i sngags te /
T02TD2625E:332a-7: de dag ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor pa yang yin du zin yang rtsa ba dang phyi mar ma ba stan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:332a-8: snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-9: nye bar gyur pa nyid do //
T02TD2625E:332a-10: aom badzra brum dum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-11: yang na sngags zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-12: rig pa zhes bya ba ni kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po dang bde ba chen po'i 'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-13: snying po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-14: thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus par ro //
T02TD2625E:332a-15: ba stan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:332a-16: nyid kyi snying po 'di bshad do //
T02TD2625E:332a-18: aom brum dum zhes pa ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-19: gal te dbus na phyag na rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa gnas nas ni ;
T02TD2625E:332a-20: aom brum zhes bya bas bskyed cing /
T02TD2625E:332a-21: gal te phyag na rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar gnas na /
T02TD2625E:332a-22: aom badzra dum zhes bya bas bskyed do //
T02TD2625E:332a-23: aom badzra p'a ni dri dha tishtha h'um zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-24: dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' 'jog na'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-25: aom h'um zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-26: gal te dbus su kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po'am /
T02TD2625E:332a-27: bde ba chen po gnas nas ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-28: de dag bskyed pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2625E:332a-30: ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'am phyag na rdo rje'i sngags so //
T02TD2625E:332a-32: ces bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen gyi sngags so //
T02TD2625E:332a-33: aom badzra hri sva zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chos dam pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2625E:332a-34: aom badzra h'um aa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje las kyi sngags so //
T02TD2625E:332a-35: dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya //
T02TD2625E:332a-36: zhes bya ba ni sngar ba stan pa gnyis kyi'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-37: spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje las //
T02TD2625E:332a-39: gal te bdag por kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po'am /
T02TD2625E:332a-40: bde ba chen po zhig bzhag na'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-41: gal te bdag por phyag na rdo rje gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig bzhag na ni /
T02TD2625E:332a-42: de'i tshe ni spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpa' 'o //
T02TD2625E:332a-43: phyag na rdo rje dang rdo rje sems dpa' la 'dir khyad par ci yod ce na /
T02TD2625E:332a-44: 'dir phyag na rdo rje gnod spyin gyi rigs su skyes pa lcang lo can na gnas pa yin la /
T02TD2625E:332a-45: rdo rje sems dpa' de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ba sems dpa'i ngo bo de nyid do //
T02TD2625E:332b-0: dang po ni ma 'ongs pa nas 'tshang rgya bar lung ba stan pa @332b yin la /
T02TD2625E:332b-1: gnyis pa ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02TD2625E:332b-2: rgyud 'dir ni khyad par 'di tsam du zad cing rgyud gzhan du lugs gzhan yin no //
T02TD2625E:332b-4: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags ma spangs pa rnams kyis chags pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa la sogs pas gsum pa yin pas na der yang me long dang pi wang dang /
T02TD2625E:332b-7: ras ka shil zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mdzes par khyams la tshon gyis dgang ngo //
T02TD2625E:332b-8: yang na 'gro ba'i don du nyan thos ltar /
T02TD2625E:332b-9: 'dod chags ma spangs pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin la /
T02TD2625E:332b-10: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni 'bras bu ste /
T02TD2625E:332b-11: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas lag pa brel pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis khyams la dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:332b-12: stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems //
T02TD2625E:332b-13: smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i //
T02TD2625E:332b-15: chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang /
T02TD2625E:332b-16: de nyid kyi rgyud med pa dang /
T02TD2625E:332b-17: de'i phyir smon pa ni log par shes pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste /
T02TD2625E:332b-19: 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:332b-20: sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin tshor ba byed med cing //
T02TD2625E:332b-21: rmi lam 'dra ba de bzhin mig yor 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2625E:332b-22: byis pa bslu ba'i smig rgyu'i rang bzhin mtshungs mnyam pa //
T02TD2625E:332b-23: de ltar bsgom pa mkhas pa stong pa nyid kyi sgo //
T02TD2625E:332b-24: rkyen rnams med pa de ni mtshan ma med pa ste //
T02TD2625E:332b-25: log par shes pas nam yang smon pa med pa yin //
T02TD2625E:332b-27: slob dpon buddha shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas kyang /
T02TD2625E:332b-28: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir log pa ste //
T02TD2625E:332b-29: de bzhin rgyu dang bral phyir mtshan ma med //
T02TD2625E:332b-30: dngos po rtog pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:332b-31: ma lus smon pa las ni nges grol ba //
T02TD2625E:332b-33: dngos grub rnams ni tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2625E:332b-34: sgo gsum po 'di las 'byung bas 'di dag par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:332b-35: aom badzra h'um dza zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:332b-36: sngags dang pos ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcing du gzhug cing /
T02TD2625E:332b-37: gnyis pas ni dkyil 'khor yol ba bsal te gzhug pa'o //
T02TD2625E:332b-38: gsum pas ni me tog dor ba'o //
T02TD2625E:332b-39: dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dir bum pa dang bkas ngang ba dang las spyin pas te dbang gsum yin la /
T02TD2625E:332b-40: de yang phyag na rdo rje gnyis dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin na ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-0: sngags dang po rnam par rgyal ba'i dum pa @333a * //
T02TD2625E:333a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'am kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po'am /
T02TD2625E:333a-3: bde ba chen po dag dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por gyur na ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-4: sngags gnyis pa rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa'o //
T02TD2625E:333a-5: lhag ma bzhi ni ci rigs su spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:333a-6: bka'i dbang nod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'chad pa'am bsgrub pa rjes su ngang ba ste /
T02TD2625E:333a-7: gal te 'chad par rjes su ngang bar 'dod na ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-8: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rjes su 'brangs te /
T02TD2625E:333a-9: tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su ngang ba spyin la /
T02TD2625E:333a-10: gal te bsgrub par rjes su ngang ba 'dod na ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-11: me tog lag tu byin te 'di grub par gyur cig / bla ma dang slob ma gnyi gas brjod de de yang 'dir gtsor gyur pa ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-13: de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang spyin no zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:333a-14: man ngag dang ngang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:333a-15: de la las dang dngos grub ni phal cher ting nge 'dzin la brten pa yin pas /
T02TD2625E:333a-16: ting nge 'dzin rnams mdor ba stan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:333a-17: bde bas bde ba bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:333a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:333a-19: bde bas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-20: gsang sngags kyi lam 'dir ni dka' thub dang sdug bsngal gtsor ma gyur gyi /
T02TD2625E:333a-21: rab tu bde bas grub pa yin te /
T02TD2625E:333a-23: lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las //
T02TD2625E:333a-24: sngags kyi theg pa skyed chen gyi //
T02TD2625E:333a-25: theg pa la ni ma mos pa //
T02TD2625E:333a-26: de dag nam yang gzung mi bya //
T02TD2625E:333a-27: de dag ba stan 'dir skal ba med //
T02TD2625E:333a-29: khyad par yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir ni bde ba bsgrub pa yin pas ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-30: dka' thub sngom pa mi zad pa //
T02TD2625E:333a-31: ba sten pas 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi //
T02TD2625E:333a-32: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02TD2625E:333a-33: ci 'dod pas ni ba sten pas 'grub //
T02TD2625E:333a-35: phyi rol pa'i lam las lam 'di rtogs pa ma lus pa yang rab tu bde ba yin te /
T02TD2625E:333a-37: gang phyir khyod kyi ba stan pa ni //
T02TD2625E:333a-38: bde bas bde ba thob bgyid pas //
T02TD2625E:333a-39: de bas smra ba'i seng ge ni //
T02TD2625E:333a-40: khyod kyi ba stan la mkhas pa dga' //
T02TD2625E:333a-42: bde ba bskyed nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:333a-43: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs par byas nas so //
T02TD2625E:333a-44: ji ltar de rnams la yang bde ba gang yin pa mnga'am zhen /
T02TD2625E:333a-45: bde ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang mi ldan pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD2625E:333a-47: 'phags pa sngom pa gsum ba stan pa las /
T02TD2625E:333b-0: gang la kun du [*kun tu?] @333b rtog pa med pa de bde ba'o //
T02TD2625E:333b-2: gzhan yang thabs la mkhas pa'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i 'byor pa la lhag par zhen pa kha cig ni de gsal ba'i phyir dmigs pa dang bral bar btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-3: gnas dang gdan la sogs pa'i bde ba gya nom pa 'di dag la mnga' ste /
T02TD2625E:333b-5: rnam bar snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i cho ga bsdus pa las /
T02TD2625E:333b-6: gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pas //
T02TD2625E:333b-7: na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing //
T02TD2625E:333b-8: g-yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su //
T02TD2625E:333b-9: g-yon gyi phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol //
T02TD2625E:333b-10: lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yis //
T02TD2625E:333b-11: dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:333b-12: gcig gi lag pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste //
T02TD2625E:333b-13: gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu //
T02TD2625E:333b-14: gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba gtor //
T02TD2625E:333b-15: bzhi pa'i bde ba yi ni mda' yang 'phen //
T02TD2625E:333b-17: gsang ba zla ba'i thig le las kyang /
T02TD2625E:333b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun du [*kun tu?] bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2625E:333b-19: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos /
T02TD2625E:333b-20: rab tu rnam par rol pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-21: spro ba chen po'i gar dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-27: reg pa'i bde ba chen po bde bar 'phags par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-28: rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i bde ba la spyod pa'i gang nye bar ston cing /
T02TD2625E:333b-29: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshul chen pos 'phags par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-30: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnon pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-31: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi spro ba dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-32: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gar byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-33: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis za bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-34: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du 'jig par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-35: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du [*kun tu?] mdzes bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-36: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zlog par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-37: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zlos par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-38: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis myong bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-39: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gyur bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-40: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrod par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-41: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brtson par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:333b-42: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du [*kun tu?] rgyas 'de bas par byed pa dang /
T02TD2625E:334a-0: rnam ba sna tshogs kyis sna tshogs chen po shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba @334a * //
T02TD2625E:334a-1: nyams par stobs shing reg pa'i ro'i bcud kyis bskal pa brgya stong mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad med par nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran las 'das pa dang /
T02TD2625E:334a-2: mnyam par 'jug pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste zhes gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:334a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bzhengs nas /
T02TD2625E:334a-5: brjod pa'i rdo rje gar gyis mchod cing glu dang /
T02TD2625E:334a-13: zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2625E:334a-14: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kun du brdung ba dang /
T02TD2625E:334a-15: sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rol pas lha'i ro dang bcud kyi zas dang /
T02TD2625E:334a-24: myang ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis /
T02TD2625E:334a-25: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la ba stabs nas zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:334a-26: 'od kyang 'di lta bu la sogs pa ni thugs rje'i dbang gis gsungs pa kho nar zad kyi sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:334a-27: gang gis nga la sgrar shes shing //
T02TD2625E:334a-28: gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong //
T02TD2625E:334a-29: log par spong la zhugs pa ste //
T02TD2625E:334a-30: skye bo de yis nga mi mthong //
T02TD2625E:334a-31: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T02TD2625E:334a-32: 'dren pa rnams ni chos nyid blta //
T02TD2625E:334a-33: chos nyid shes par bya min pas //
T02TD2625E:334a-34: de ni rnam par shes mi nus //
T02TD2625E:334a-36: rab tu spro bas chog go //
T02TD2625E:334a-37: dkyil 'khor bzhi yi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334a-39: dbus su ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334a-40: re'u cha dbus ma'i padma'i steng du'o //
T02TD2625E:334a-41: snying gar h'um zhes bya ba bsams na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334a-42: zla ba'i dbus su h'um dang mtha' mar sngon gyi sngags kyis bskor ba lha dang mthun pa'i yig 'bru'i 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:334a-43: h'um las sangs rgyas gzugs gyur nas //
T02TD2625E:334a-45: phyag na rdo rje tshe dpag tu med par ro //
T02TD2625E:334a-46: snying gar 'khor lo rab bsgoms na //
T02TD2625E:334a-48: yi ge'i 'khor lo zla ba la gnas pa ci rigs par ro //
T02TD2625E:334a-49: rdo rje khro bor rab bsgoms te //
T02TD2625E:334a-51: phyag na rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ste /
T02TD2625E:334a-52: 'og nas khro bo stobs chen zhes smos pa yang de nyid do //
T02TD2625E:334a-53: snying ga'i dbus su zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334a-54: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la'o //
T02TD2625E:334a-55: phat ces bya zhes bya ba ni nag po nyid do //
T02TD2625E:334a-56: h'um zhes bya bas bskor bsams na //
T02TD2625E:334a-58: aom badzra du h'um h'um zhes bya ba rnams kyis so //
T02TD2625E:334b-0: de @334b ltar gtso bo bzhi'i tshul ba stan nas /
T02TD2625E:334b-1: da ni me tog lhung ba'i dbang las /
T02TD2625E:334b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yang dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por gyur pa srid pas de dag gi dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:334b-3: rdo rje brtan par bdag bskur la //
T02TD2625E:334b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:334b-5: rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-6: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag gi de kho na'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-7: bsgyur la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334b-9: snying gar h'um zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2625E:334b-11: bskor ba yis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334b-12: aom h'um badzra h'um phat ces pas so //
T02TD2625E:334b-13: aom dang tram ldan par zhes bya ba 'dir tram ni dbus su yin la /
T02TD2625E:334b-15: ni sha badzra h'um phat ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334b-17: / de bzhin du dang por tshig rkang dang po drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-18: rdo rje bsgoms la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chos su bsgoms la'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-19: snying gi dbus su ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:334b-20: snying ga'i zla ba dmar po la'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-21: ham sa zhes bya ba ni dbus su'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-22: aom zhes bya bas bskor bsams na //
T02TD2625E:334b-24: aom badzra hri sa zhes mtha' skor du'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-25: rdo rje las su bdag bsgyur la //
T02TD2625E:334b-29: ci zla ba 'ba' zhig la'am zhe na /
T02TD2625E:334b-30: de'i phyir rgya gram zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2625E:334b-31: snying gar zla ba la sna tshogs rdo rje gnas pa'i lte ba la'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-32: der yi ge'i 'khor lo gang dag ce na /
T02TD2625E:334b-33: de'i phyir h'um ldan par zhes smos te dbus su'o //
T02TD2625E:334b-34: tshig dang po lhag par drangs pa de'i sa bon gang zhe na /
T02TD2625E:334b-36: aa zhes bya bas bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2625E:334b-38: aa thung du mdog sna tshogs las so //
T02TD2625E:334b-39: aom zhes bya bas bskor bar bsam //
T02TD2625E:334b-41: aom badzra h'um aa zhes bya ba kha dog sna tshogs pas so //
T02TD2625E:334b-42: 'dir yi ge rnams ni rdo leb kyi ngos 'jom [*'dzom?] po la chu'i chu bur chags pa ltar dang zhing 'bur du dod par bsgom mo //
T02TD2625E:334b-43: slob dpon kha cig na re /
T02TD2625E:334b-44: yi ge rnams ni gser gyi shog bu las bee d'urya la sogs pa brdar bas bris pa ltar bsgoms pa ni lung dang mthun pa'o zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:334b-45: 'di ni ming gi dbye bar zad do //
T02TD2625E:334b-46: de dag ni ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig gi las so //
T02TD2625E:334b-47: da ni sbyor ba gzhan bshad pa /
T02TD2625E:334b-48: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag bsgyur la //
T02TD2625E:334b-49: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2625E:334b-50: sdig can sems ni zhi byed 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:334b-51: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gsum gyis zhi ba'i las bya bar ba stan la /
T02TD2625E:334b-52: gser 'od mdzes shing zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2625E:334b-53: 'od kyis lus la rab tu dgang //
T02TD2625E:335a-1: bya ba'i bar gyis ni rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyas par bya bar ston cing /
T02TD2625E:335a-2: rnal 'byor ldan pa thab khung ni //
T02TD2625E:335a-4: dga' dang nye ba'i nyi ma'i mthar //
T02TD2625E:335a-5: sems can rnams ni dbang du bya //
T02TD2625E:335a-7: rdo rje chos kyi dbang du bya ba'i las ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:335a-8: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug gi las gang dag yin bar ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:335a-9: 'dren pa kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po yis //
T02TD2625E:335a-10: zhi ba'i las ni rab tu bya //
T02TD2625E:335a-12: rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar mdzad //
T02TD2625E:335a-13: ces bya ba'i bar du smos te /
T02TD2625E:335a-14: de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po ste /
T02TD2625E:335a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02TD2625E:335a-16: /'dis ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa gsum yang mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2625E:335a-17: 'di dag gis ni zhi ba'i las bya'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-18: yang na rdo rje lcags kyus ni dgug pa'i las bya zhing /
T02TD2625E:335a-19: rdo rje chos dang cha mthun pas des drangs la /
T02TD2625E:335a-20: rdo rje mda' ni rdo rje ral gri dang chos mthun par der drang zhing /
T02TD2625E:335a-21: rdo rje legs pa yang mgu zhing dga' ba chags pa'i ngo bo yin pas rdo rje chos kyis drangs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-22: rigs lhag ma'i sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rang rang gi las la go rims bzhin du spyar te /
T02TD2625E:335a-23: spyin sreg dang bzlas pa'i cho ga la ji ltar 'dod par spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:335a-24: tshig gi don rnams dang lhag ma rnams ni go bar zad do //
T02TD2625E:335a-25: da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtsa ba dang phyi ma'i rgyud du ma gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-26: phyag rgya rnams ston te lag pa gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2625E:335a-27: 'dir phyag rgya dang po ni bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-28: gnyis pa ni 'phags pa nam mkha' snying po ste /
T02TD2625E:335a-29: mdzub mo dang gung mo dang /
T02TD2625E:335a-30: srin lag rtse sprad pa las mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bkug pa ral gri'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-31: gsum pa ni phyag na rdo rje dang rdo rje khro bo'i ste /
T02TD2625E:335a-33: srin lag gnyis mthil du bkug pa las mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bsgreng ba'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-34: bzhi pa ni phyag na padma'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-35: de nyid gnyis su byas na las kyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:335a-36: mtshan nyid gnyis su brtag pa nyid gnyis su byas pa ste dam tshig dang las so //
T02TD2625E:335a-37: g-yon pa mgo thod thogs 'dra dang //
T02TD2625E:335a-38: zhes bya ba ni lha chen po'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-39: g-yas pa mdung rtse zhes bya ba ni smin drug gi bu'i'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-40: rtse gsum pa zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi ste yang na dgra star bya'o //
T02TD2625E:335a-41: g-yon pa padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshangs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-0: @335b g-yon pa 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni khyab 'jug gi'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-1: dbyug to zhes bya ba ni gshin rje dang lus ngan gyi ste /
T02TD2625E:335b-2: cung zad du gshin rje ni thod pas mtshan pa la lus ngan gyi rin chen mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-3: rtse gsum zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:335b-5: aa dang aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dbang po'i'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-6: h'um dang aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dod pa'i lha'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-7: 'di dag ni lha chen po dang 'jigs byed rnams thun mong du bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-8: lag pa g-yas pa 'khor lor bya ba ni nyi ma'i 'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-9: g-yon pa 'khor lor bya ba ni zla ba'i'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-10: thal mo dam spyar sor mo 'phro //
T02TD2625E:335b-11: zhes bya ba ni mig dmar gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-12: gza' lag gi ni lag pa gnyis ka se gol gtogs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-13: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni phur bu'i'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-14: pa ba sangs dang spen pa ni go sla ste /
T02TD2625E:335b-15: ban glang sna ni sgra gcan no //
T02TD2625E:335b-16: rgyu skar rnams kyi ni lag pa g-yas pa steng du phyung ba las /
T02TD2625E:335b-17: gnyi pa kan te bsnol la sor mo bcu bsdu zhing spros pas me stag 'phro ba 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-18: phyag rgya de nyid myur du yan man du bskor na lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2625E:335b-20: de nyid phral te g-yas pa slar gzhag cing g-yon pa 'og tu gzhag pa ni dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i sprin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-21: 'di dag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma ltar gcig nyid la mtshan nyid gnyis su brtag pa'o ;
T02TD2625E:335b-22: / de bas na rgyud 'dir ni dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya dag tha mi dad do zhes bdag gis sngar smras zin to //
T02TD2625E:335b-23: srin lag rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-24: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen no //
T02TD2625E:335b-25: padma las byung ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chos so //
T02TD2625E:335b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bdag por gnas pa dang sems dpa' dang po'i gnyig gzung ngo //
T02TD2625E:335b-27: bde ba chen po dang kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-28: khro bo sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya gzi can no zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gcig po de nyid kyis khro bo me nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgyar bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-29: bsdams pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sems dpa' lhag ma rnams ni phyag rgya ba stan te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:335b-30: cung zad padma'i 'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:336a-0: tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas kyi phyag rgya ni sngar padma las byung zhes bya bas ba stan zhing rigs lhag ma gsum gyi ni sngar rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'dral 'di ni sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyi phyag @336a * //
T02TD2625E:336a-2: / mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid las kyi phyag rgyar ba stan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-3: bsdus btud sprul mgor 'gyur zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa'i thal mo'i rgyab tu g-yas pa'i thal mo lto spyar la /
T02TD2625E:336a-4: sor mo rnams reg par bskyed cing rtse mo cung zad dgug par bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-6: mche ba 'dra zhes bya ba ni sor mo bsnol ba'i snyim pa las mdzub mo gnyis mche ba ltar brkyang ba'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-7: khrag 'phrog pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:336a-8: sor mo'i rtse mo bsnol ba'i snyim pas mthe bong gnyis bzung ste mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-9: lag pas bskor ba zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo tha dad par thad kar brkyang la bskyod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-10: rlung gi zhes bya ba ni rlung lha ma lus pa'i'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-11: dbyug tor ldan pa zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur ba cangs te phyar ba'am de'i yang mthe bong bsgreng ba ni gnod spyin no zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi bdag po lus ngan gyi'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-12: bum pa gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni mthe bong dang mthe'u chud [*chung?] bzhi bsnol la sor mo lhag ma drug rtse sprad de bsgreng ba'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-13: nor gyi ste zhes byang ni bdag gi ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-14: de bas na sngar mche ba'i phyag rgya smos pa'i skabs su gser gyi bum pa spyar du yang rung ngo //
T02TD2625E:336a-15: mthe bong ne'u le'i rna 'drar bya //
T02TD2625E:336a-16: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung dang mthe'u chung bsnol te sor mo lhag ma rnams gshibs la bsgreng /
T02TD2625E:336a-17: mthe bo gnyis sor mo phral te bskul ba 'di ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-18: kha cig ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis tha dad du brkyang bar rtog go //
T02TD2625E:336a-19: mgo bo thod pa zhes bya ba ni sor mo rtse mo bsnol ba'i snyim pa ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-20: nag po zhes bya ba ni dga' byed dbang phyug dang bcas pa'i'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-21: lag pa brkyang ba zhes bya ba ni dam pa spyin pa'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-22: bhri ng+gi ri ti zhes bya ba ni sngar ba stan pa'am yang na 'dis phyag rgyar bya ba ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-23: kha cig na re phyi rol du ni stobs bzangs bya ba la sogs pa'i nang du /
T02TD2625E:336a-24: bhri ng+gi ri ti bgrang zhing stobs chen ni nang du bzhag ces phyag rgya 'dir ba stan pa las dpags te smra'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-25: pi wang g-yon na thogs zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon pa bstod cing sor mo bzhi cung zad bkug pas pi wang 'dzin pa ltar bya ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-26: g-yas pas rgyud sgreng ba ltar byas pa ni /
T02TD2625E:336a-27: dri za rnams kyi rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:336a-28: lag pa gnyis 'byar ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2625E:336a-29: thal mo spyar ba bkan la mthe bo bsgreng ste /
T02TD2625E:336b-0: thal mo'i rtse @336b mo cung zad g-yabs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:336b-1: drang srong chen po me'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-2: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur ba cangs pa las /
T02TD2625E:336b-3: gung mo brkyang ba ni dbyug pa 'dra ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2625E:336b-4: chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-5: srin po'i phyag rgya ral gri rno ba la ni khro ba ste gung mo dang dbang mo ste srin lag spyar ba bsgreng ba'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-6: de yang lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur gnyis las so //
T02TD2625E:336b-7: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur ba cangs pa'i mthe'u chung bsgreng ste /
T02TD2625E:336b-8: phyar ba ni ral gri'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2625E:336b-9: grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-10: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur ba cangs pa las /
T02TD2625E:336b-11: mdzub mo brkyang ba bkug la zhags mig ltar byas pa ni //
T02TD2625E:336b-12: mdzub mo zhags pa 'dra ba ste /
T02TD2625E:336b-13: klu'i bdag po mig mi bzang dang chu lha'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-14: rgyal mtshan yin zhes bya ba ni sor mo rnams bsnol ba las /
T02TD2625E:336b-16: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba 'di ni phyogs kyi bdag po rlung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-17: ci lha 'di dag gi phyag rgya 'di kho na ltar nges sam 'on te gzhan yang yod ce na /
T02TD2625E:336b-18: de la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2625E:336b-19: phyag rgya rab 'byam dpag tu med pa rnam pa snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la sogs pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02TD2625E:336b-20: 'dir spyar yang gnod pa med cing dngos po'i rang bzhin nges par shes pas /
T02TD2625E:336b-21: ji ltar spyar ba de chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02TD2625E:336b-22: rang gi bsam pa'i mthus phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2625E:336b-23: ji skad du dpal sngom pa las /
T02TD2625E:336b-24: sems can rnams kyi ji tsam du //
T02TD2625E:336b-25: lus ni rnam par bskyod 'gyur ba //
T02TD2625E:336b-27: mdor na thams cad phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:336b-29: lha rnams kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thun mong pa ste go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:336b-30: bud med rnams zhes bya ba ni ma mo rnams so //
T02TD2625E:336b-31: sems sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:336b-32: sems rang dbang med par sgrub pa pos 'grub pa ste /
T02TD2625E:336b-34: ji ltar rgyal po nyid kyis rgyal //
T02TD2625E:336b-35: rgyal po'i khrims ni ba stan pa ltar //
T02TD2625E:336b-36: bdag chen nyid kyi phyag rgyas kyang //
T02TD2625E:336b-37: skye bo rnams la de bzhin btab //
T02TD2625E:336b-39: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:336b-40: sngar grub pa'i bud med rnams so //
T02TD2625E:336b-41: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yi //
T02TD2625E:336b-42: zhes bya ba 'di ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i h'um gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2625E:337a-0: rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba la @337a * //
T02TD2625E:337a-1: sogs pas ni bsrung ba la shis pa'i khro bo gnyis kyi phyag rgya ston to //
T02TD2625E:337a-2: spyan gyi mig dang 'dra bar bshad //
T02TD2625E:337a-3: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:337a-4: rtsa ba la sogs pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i lha mo bzhi'i phyag rgya rdzogs par byed do //
T02TD2625E:337a-5: tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:337a-6: aa sa sa sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:337a-8: badzras tva dza zhes bya ba la sogs par spyar te /
T02TD2625E:337a-9: sems dpa' bcu drug gi sngags su spyar ro //
T02TD2625E:337a-10: h'um dza zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'ba' zhig pa ni /
T02TD2625E:337a-11: de dag gi chos kyi phyag rgya'o zhes la la zer ro //
T02TD2625E:337a-12: aom buddha zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2625E:337a-13: rigs kyi lha mo bzhi'i sngags ston to //
T02TD2625E:337a-14: de ltar ni 'dir phyag rgya dang sngags ma lus par rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:337a-15: sham pa ta sham pa ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:337a-17: dri mu ka brdung ba'i nga ro'i brda dang /
T02TD2625E:337a-18: de byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags te /
T02TD2625E:337a-19: phyogs bzhir bzhi bzhi brdungs pa las //
T02TD2625E:337a-20: 'od zer rjes su mthun pa byung bas /
T02TD2625E:337a-21: des bsgrub bya'i lus la phog pas las gang 'dod pa de 'grub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2625E:337a-25: de nas lha rnams kun mgu nas //
T02TD2625E:337a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ston te /
T02TD2625E:337a-27: rang gi sku bor te zhes bya ba ni gnod spyin gyi gzugs la 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs can de'o //
T02TD2625E:337a-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs nas //
T02TD2625E:337a-29: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi khro bo'i gzugs su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2625E:337a-30: ci 'di la bor ba dang thob pa'i 'du shes mnga'am zhen /
T02TD2625E:337a-31: de'i phyir gnyis su mnyam zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:337a-32: sngon gyi smon lam dang mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis bral ba dang thob pa'i 'du shes mi mnga' zin kyang /
T02TD2625E:337a-33: ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya'i dbang las bor ba dang thob pa ston te /
T02TD2625E:337a-34: gdul bya gang rab tu drag pos gzhug par bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:337a-35: de dag la ni zhi ba'i lus bor nas rdo rje khro bor snyoms par zhugs te ba stan pa la 'dzud par ston te ;
T02TD2625E:337a-37: skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang //
T02TD2625E:337a-38: tshogs dang chos kyi mthu yis ni //
T02TD2625E:337a-40: sems can don la rab tu 'jug / ces gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:337a-41: rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:337a-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi khro bo'am /
T02TD2625E:337b-0: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' @337b yongs su gyur pa'i khro bo ste /
T02TD2625E:337b-2: ae ma'o thabs kyis 'dul ba yi //
T02TD2625E:337b-3: thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te //
T02TD2625E:337b-4: gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs bzhin //
T02TD2625E:337b-5: dri ma med pa'i khro bor 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:337b-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gzhan du ched du brjod pas so //
T02TD2625E:337b-7: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mi byed pa la dbyer med par sems dpa' chos kyi sku yin la /
T02TD2625E:337b-8: de las ma nyams pa nyid du khro bor snang bar bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2625E:337b-10: nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa'i mtsho chen ltar //
T02TD2625E:337b-11: mnyam pas snying rje chen pos khre byed cing //
T02TD2625E:337b-12: nang na kha ba ltar bsil phyi rol du //
T02TD2625E:337b-13: rtsub pa nyid kyis 'gro ba skyong bar byed //
T02TD2625E:337b-15: rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2625E:337b-16: 'dis sdig pa dang 'jigs pa rnams bsreg pa na /
T02TD2625E:337b-17: me'i khyad par yang bskal pa tha ma'i nyi ma bdun 'bar ba dang 'dra bas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2625E:337b-18: de lta bur rab tu mi zad par gnas pa yang chos kyi dbyings las dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo rje zhes pas ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:337b-21: zhes bya ba ni khang pa brtsegs pa gang las 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa yod pa de nyid lha'i rdzas te yid du 'ong ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:337b-22: yang na 'di ni rab tu drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir me to gdang dri dang /
T02TD2625E:337b-23: bdug pa la logs pa'i lha rdzas de dag kyang 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba drag po 'khrigs pa'o //
T02TD2625E:337b-24: shin tu 'bar zhing zhes bya ba la ni /
T02TD2625E:337b-25: lha rnams 'od zer drag po sku las shin tu 'bar zhing gdug pa rnams bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2625E:337b-26: cher 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni khang pa brtsegs ma de yang rab tu ma rungs pa'i 'od rgya cher 'bar ba gdug pa rnams bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2625E:337b-27: ma rungs snying gar mnan nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:337b-28: rang rang gi phyogs skyong ngam sngar ba stan pa bzhin no //
T02TD2625E:337b-29: de nas bdud rtsi gang yin zhes bya ba kha cig na re mar dang /
T02TD2625E:337b-30: 'o ma dang bu ram dang kar dang sbrang rtsi ni bdud rtsi lnga'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:337b-31: kha cig na re bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru lnga la sogs pa bum pa'i nang du bzhag pa rnams ni bdud rtsi'o zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:337b-32: kha cig na re shu kra la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa rnams nyid bdud rtsi zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:337b-33: 'dir rab tu ma zhi ba'i chang ni bdud rtsi zhes dgongs la /
T02TD2625E:337b-35: bza' dang bca' dang bdud rtsi zhes //
T02TD2625E:337b-36: mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams //
T02TD2625E:337b-37: zhes gsungs pa yang chang nyid yin te /
T02TD2625E:338a-2: sha'am yang na chang mchog gis //
T02TD2625E:338a-3: thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:338a-5: 'o ma la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga ni gtsang sbra 'dod pa dag gi dus su yin la /
T02TD2625E:338a-6: 'dir gtsang sbra'i dgos pa bya ba med pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2625E:338a-7: rdo rje khro bo la ni gtsang sbra gtsor ma gyur par 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud du yang gsungs la /
T02TD2625E:338a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni //
T02TD2625E:338a-9: gtsang sbra'i bya ba la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud la sogs par gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:338a-10: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de yang mi rigs te /
T02TD2625E:338a-11: las kyi bum pa ma yin pa rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil bas byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni nam yang ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2625E:338a-12: 'dir bum pa bcu drug ces dbang bskur ba'i bum pa nyi tshe zhig smos kyi /
T02TD2625E:338a-13: bkang ba'i bum pa ni gtsor ma smos pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:338a-14: gzhan yang bkang pa'i bum pa'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:338a-15: bkang ba'i bum pa ni thos pa kho nar bya bar rigs shing gzhan du ma yin pas so //
T02TD2625E:338a-16: gang yang shu kra la sogs pa zhes smras pa de yang rab tu rigs pa ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:338a-17: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi tshul ma lus pa brjod pa /
T02TD2625E:338a-18: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang /
T02TD2625E:338a-20: zla gsang thig le la sogs pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD2625E:338a-21: shu kra la sogs pa smos pa yang /
T02TD2625E:338a-22: sgra ji bzhin pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2625E:338a-23: bdud kyis smras pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rab tu mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2625E:338a-24: 'o na tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor las /
T02TD2625E:338a-25: sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang //
T02TD2625E:338a-26: dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2625E:338a-27: sngags mkhan gyis ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2625E:338a-28: gzhan gyi bud med ba sten par bya //
T02TD2625E:338a-30: 'dir yang bdud rtsi chen po la sogs pa ba sten par gsungs pas /
T02TD2625E:338a-31: 'di yang rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung nyid yin no zhe na /
T02TD2625E:338a-32: rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung zhes pa ci la bya /
T02TD2625E:338a-33: gal te shu kra la sogs pa dngos su ba sten pa dang /
T02TD2625E:338a-34: bud med la sogs pa dngos su ba sten pas rnal 'byor chen por 'dod na ni /
T02TD2625E:338a-36: gzhon nu ma 'khrig pas gdungs shing /
T02TD2625E:338a-37: byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rab tu chags la /
T02TD2625E:338b-0: de yang bdag pos ma @338b bsrungs shing /
T02TD2625E:338b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yang khyim pa zhig yin na /
T02TD2625E:338b-2: des bdag ni sems can dmyal par song yang sla'o //
T02TD2625E:338b-3: gzhon nu ma 'di'i gdung ba zhi bar byas la /
T02TD2625E:338b-4: der yang bdag la dga' bar byas te /
T02TD2625E:338b-5: dga' ba la sbyor ro zhes bsams te 'khrig pa spyad na /
T02TD2625E:338b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa dang /
T02TD2625E:338b-7: theg pa chen po 'dir ni gtsor gyur pa snying rje yin pas de srung pa dang /
T02TD2625E:338b-8: rgyu de gnyis nyid kyi phyir /
T02TD2625E:338b-9: sngags pa'i dngos grub kyi yan lag tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pas kyang 'grub la /
T02TD2625E:338b-10: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02TD2625E:338b-11: 'phags pa gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo la sogs pa las kyang gsungs so //
T02TD2625E:338b-13: dam tshig phyag rgya rab gsang ba //
T02TD2625E:338b-14: 'di ni bud med sgrar ba sten la //
T02TD2625E:338b-15: mchog phyir bdag gcig ma yin phyir //
T02TD2625E:338b-16: gzhan zhes bya ba yi ges brjod //
T02TD2625E:338b-18: dam tshig ni phyag rgya bcing ba nyid gzhan gyi bud med yin gyi /
T02TD2625E:338b-19: gal te bud med tha mal pa'i yul ba sten pas /
T02TD2625E:338b-20: thar pa thob par smra ba ni nges par bdud kyis smras par zad do //
T02TD2625E:338b-22: rnam dag chos nyid khu ba ste //
T02TD2625E:338b-23: yul rnams bshang ba'i sgrar gsungs la //
T02TD2625E:338b-24: dbang po rnams ni gci ba ste //
T02TD2625E:338b-25: rnam shes rten phyir khrag tu 'dod //
T02TD2625E:338b-26: de las byung ba'i sems byung sogs //
T02TD2625E:338b-27: tshogs chen phyir ni sha yin te //
T02TD2625E:338b-28: 'di dag zos pa stod byas pa'o //
T02TD2625E:338b-29: zhes bshad pas tha mal pa'i shu kra la sogs pa ci'i phyir yon tan du byed /
T02TD2625E:338b-30: gal te byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
T02TD2625E:338b-32: rdo dang chu la sogs pa la ci'i phyir byin gyis mi rlob /
T02TD2625E:338b-33: da ni de dag la rang bzhin gyis mthu yod do zhe na /
T02TD2625E:338b-34: gal te rang bzhin gyis mthu yod na /
T02TD2625E:338b-35: byin gyis brlab pa'i bya bas ci zhig bya /
T02TD2625E:338b-36: gzhan yang khyi la sogs pa dag kyang de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02TD2625E:338b-37: ci'i phyir go 'phang bzang po mi 'thob /
T02TD2625E:338b-38: de'i phyir rab tu btsog pa'i 'dam du bying nas /
T02TD2625E:338b-39: bdag ni 'dir gtsang sbra byed pa'i phyir zhugs so zhes zer pa'i byis pa ltar smras pa 'di ci zhig bya /
T02TD2625E:338b-40: de'i phyir gang du yang zab pas mi zab pa gzhom gyi /
T02TD2625E:338b-41: dman pas gya nom pa mi gzhom pas na /
T02TD2625E:338b-42: sgra ji bzhin du 'dod pas dgongs pa de gsungs pa ji ltar smad /
T02TD2625E:338b-43: de bas na lta ba ngan pa ni /
T02TD2625E:339a-0: sgra ji lta bar don 'dzin pa'o zhes @339a * //
T02TD2625E:339a-2: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba ni 'ga' yang med do //
T02TD2625E:339a-3: de ltar na sha dang chang dag kyang 'dir dgag par rigs so zhe na /
T02TD2625E:339a-4: gang myos par ma gyur pa dang /
T02TD2625E:339a-5: rnam pa gsum dag pa'i sha ni /
T02TD2625E:339a-6: de ltar su yang smod par mi byed la /
T02TD2625E:339a-7: de su la phan 'dogs pa 'jig rten dang mthun zhing rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yang ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:339a-8: de bas na gcig kho na bdag dang gzhan de dag ltar gnod pa mi byed do //
T02TD2625E:339a-9: phyag rgya de dag de yis ni //
T02TD2625E:339a-10: sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig stsol //
T02TD2625E:339a-12: phyag rgya de dang de yis ni //
T02TD2625E:339a-13: zhes zlos bur smos pa ni /
T02TD2625E:339a-14: yon chab nas bshos kyi bar du rdzas de dang de thod pa'i phyag rgyas dbul ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2625E:339a-15: kha cig na re de dang de yis ni zhes zlos bur smos pa ni /
T02TD2625E:339a-16: gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i phyag rgya ba stan pa de dang de yis zer ro //
T02TD2625E:339a-17: sha rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339a-18: ma he dang phag dang ra la sogs pa gang 'jig rten rab tu bsngags pas sdig med pa de dag gis so //
T02TD2625E:339a-19: dam tshig las stsol zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339a-20: lha bshos kyi dam tshig tu dbul zhing gsol ba'o //
T02TD2625E:339a-21: lha bshos bzang po rtag tu dbul ba de ni dam tshig gi mchog ste /
T02TD2625E:339a-22: gang zag bdag gis zas rnams la //
T02TD2625E:339a-23: thog mar de yi phud phul te //
T02TD2625E:339a-24: cho ga shes pas bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD2625E:339a-25: mchod pa'i bshos rnams smos pa las //
T02TD2625E:339a-26: zas kyi rnam pa ci 'byor pa //
T02TD2625E:339a-27: mkhas pa dag gis phul nas ni //
T02TD2625E:339a-28: nyin re rtag tu bzlas brjod tsam //
T02TD2625E:339a-29: lha bshos phul ba gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2625E:339a-30: kha zas yin par bshad pa na //
T02TD2625E:339a-31: de ni rtag par khams bzhin du //
T02TD2625E:339a-32: bzlas brjod byed pa dbul par bya //
T02TD2625E:339a-33: rtsa ba rdo gu 'bras bu yi //
T02TD2625E:339a-34: lha bshos cung zad ci 'byor pa //
T02TD2625E:339a-35: dus gsum du ni gsang sngags la //
T02TD2625E:339a-36: phul nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:339a-37: gal te zlos pas gsang sngags la //
T02TD2625E:339a-38: mchod pa bshos rnams ma phul na //
T02TD2625E:339a-39: de tshe rtsub cing mdog ngan la //
T02TD2625E:339a-40: bkres pa dag gis gdungs par 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:339a-41: lha rnams grub par mi 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2625E:339a-42: bgegs rnams kyis kyang zil gyis gnon //
T02TD2625E:339a-43: lha bshos med na de yi sems //
T02TD2625E:339a-44: rtog pa dag kyang mang du 'gyur //
T02TD2625E:339a-45: de bas nan tan cher bya ste //
T02TD2625E:339a-46: dus mtshams nyin par ci 'byor pas //
T02TD2625E:339a-47: gsang sngags 'khor dang bcas pa la //
T02TD2625E:339a-48: lha bshos legs par dbul bar bya //
T02TD2625E:339b-2: byug spos me tog bdug spos dang //
T02TD2625E:339b-3: lha bshos spyin sreg yo byad rnams //
T02TD2625E:339b-4: phongs par gyur kyang mi dbri ste //
T02TD2625E:339b-7: de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni //
T02TD2625E:339b-9: 'dod ldan ni slob dpon nyid yin te /
T02TD2625E:339b-11: rnyed nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-12: rdzas dang gnas la sogs pa 'tshogs shing rnyed nas so //
T02TD2625E:339b-13: yang na 'dod ldan zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-14: slob mas te dbang bskur bar 'dod pas so //
T02TD2625E:339b-15: rnyed nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-16: des yo byad rnyed na slob dpon gyis bsnyen par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:339b-17: ma rnyed par ni ma yin no //
T02TD2625E:339b-18: de'i phyir dang po dri ba smos ba'o //
T02TD2625E:339b-19: h'um zhes bya ba las zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-20: sa bon yi ge h'um sngon pos so //
T02TD2625E:339b-21: bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-24: de nas sngags mkhan sgor yang zhes bya ba ni shar sgo'am lho sgor ro //
T02TD2625E:339b-25: h'um zhes bya ba las bsgrub par bya zhes byab pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:339b-26: de nyid dran zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:339b-27: bdag dang lha dang sngags kyi de kho na dran par byed cing /
T02TD2625E:339b-28: dkyil 'khor de'i spyan snga kho nar slob dpon bdag nyid kyis bsnyen par bya ba'o //
T02TD2625E:339b-29: bsnyen par bya ba'i 'bras bu ni nges par zhes bya ba la sogs te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:339b-30: dkyil 'khor du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-31: slob ma smin par bya ba ston te /
T02TD2625E:339b-32: rgyud las byung ba'i dam tshig ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-33: spyi'i lha tshogs dang dkyil 'khor la slob ma gzhug pa gnyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba ltar brjod do //
T02TD2625E:339b-36: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog bzhag la /
T02TD2625E:339b-37: slob ma'i tshogs kyis lhag pa'i spyan dang 'dra ba ste /
T02TD2625E:339b-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i tshul la gnas nas /
T02TD2625E:339b-39: phyir 'byung bar byas nas gtor ma spyin no //
T02TD2625E:339b-40: aom badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
T02TD2625E:339b-44: gsum pas ni me tog dor ro //
T02TD2625E:339b-45: bzhi pas ni gdong g-yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:339b-46: lnga bas ni mna' chu blud do //
T02TD2625E:339b-47: drug pas ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:339b-48: bdun pas ni bdag po'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2625E:339b-49: kha cig na re bdun pas ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-50: bdag po'i phyag rgyas mjug tu dbang bskur ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:339b-51: de bzhin du dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2625E:339b-52: bum pa bcu drug gis te /
T02TD2625E:340a-1: dbang bcu gsum mo zhes zer ba ni mi rigs so //
T02TD2625E:340a-2: de nas de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni spro ba dang bsdu ba gtsor ba stan pa ste /
T02TD2625E:340a-3: 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:340a-4: rnal 'byor byas la gzhan du bzlas pa nyi chos 'grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2625E:340a-5: de nas h'um gis tshogs bzhag la //
T02TD2625E:340a-6: rdo rje lta bur lus bsam zhing //
T02TD2625E:340a-8: sgrub pa po'i ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa dang dbang po rnams la yi ge h'um dkar po las 'od zer 'phro ba bkod la /
T02TD2625E:340a-9: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs des de'i lus rdo rje lta bur mi shigs par bsam zhing /
T02TD2625E:340a-10: yang de'i snying gar yi ge ham dkar po las 'od zer byung ba'i 'od zer des de'i lus skyes bu ya lad gyon pa ltar g-yogs pas bsrungs pa'i /
T02TD2625E:340a-11: srung ba'i 'khor los bsrungs pa ltar //
T02TD2625E:340a-12: cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i go chas go char bya'o //
T02TD2625E:340a-17: gdags pas go cha bya'o zhes zer te /
T02TD2625E:340a-18: 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba bdag gis ni ma rig go //
T02TD2625E:340a-20: sbyor ba snga ma nyid rang gi 'khor los go char byas so zhes zer ro //
T02TD2625E:340a-24: // / da ni dkyil 'khor brgyang kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD2625E:340a-25: mchod pa dang bstod pas rgyud bshad pa la /
T02TD2625E:340a-26: lan du mchod par bsams pa dang /
T02TD2625E:340a-27: gdul bya 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams la yang bslab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2625E:340a-28: de nas brgya byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te go sla'o //
T02TD2625E:340a-29: sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas //
T02TD2625E:340a-31: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'di ni /
T02TD2625E:340a-32: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid yin la /
T02TD2625E:340a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de las 'byung ba yin pas 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab yin te /
T02TD2625E:340a-34: de ltar yang 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02TD2625E:340a-35: rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus //
T02TD2625E:340a-36: kun gzigs yab ni khyod lags te //
T02TD2625E:340a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs //
T02TD2625E:340a-40: gang phyir thog ma tha ma med //
T02TD2625E:340a-41: byang chub sems ni khyod yin te //
T02TD2625E:340a-42: khyod la brten te rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2625E:340a-43: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun //
T02TD2625E:340a-45: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu //
T02TD2625E:340a-47: de ltar ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du byas te bstod pa byas nas /
T02TD2625E:340b-0: da ni chos kyi sku'i sgo nas bstod pa @340b mi shes pa ste /
T02TD2625E:340b-1: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa shes bya'i sgrib pa dang dri ma ste /
T02TD2625E:340b-2: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa gnyis ka rab tu phra ba yang ma lus pa spangs pas na kun bcom pa'o //
T02TD2625E:340b-3: rdo rje ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'dus byas kyi grong khyer ma lus par rab tu 'jig pa ste /
T02TD2625E:340b-5: bskal pa du mar rab tu goms byas pa'i //
T02TD2625E:340b-6: rgyu dang rigs tshul dang ni sa la mkhas //
T02TD2625E:340b-7: gang gi 'dus byas grong khyer rnam 'jig pa'i //
T02TD2625E:340b-8: ye shes rdo rje ba stan te 'phags bdag stsol //
T02TD2625E:340b-10: rdo rje zhes gnyis pa smos pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02TD2625E:340b-11: chos kyi dbyings rab tu'am mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu 'dis rab tu brjod do zhes bshad pas so //
T02TD2625E:340b-12: de nas rdo rje yis rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid thob pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid du ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:340b-13: da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bstod pa /
T02TD2625E:340b-16: thugs rdo rje rnam par dbyer med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i sku ni de dag 'dzin pa ste ;
T02TD2625E:340b-17: sku snga ma gnyis kyang 'di'i thugs nyid yin la /
T02TD2625E:340b-18: sprul pa'i sku yang 'di nyid kyi snang ba skes pa las gzhan ma yin zhing /
T02TD2625E:340b-20: sku la sogs pa ji snyed pa /
T02TD2625E:340b-21: sku 'di nyid yin pa'i dbang du byas te bstod pa'o //
T02TD2625E:340b-22: da ni rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD2625E:340b-23: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na /
T02TD2625E:340b-24: zab pa'i sku'i ngo bo ste /
T02TD2625E:340b-25: sku de yang chos kyi dbyings las /
T02TD2625E:340b-26: gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2625E:340b-27: chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2625E:340b-28: gang phyir chos yod ma yin te //
T02TD2625E:340b-31: la lar me bzhin mya ngan 'da' //
T02TD2625E:340b-32: la lar rdzogs par byang chub ston //
T02TD2625E:340b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu yang rgya che bas na sku che ba zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:340b-34: de ltar sku bzhi'i bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2625E:340b-35: tshig rkang gnyis po 'di ni tshogs ma lus pa'i mthar spyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2625E:340b-36: 'di ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du phal cher byas te /
T02TD2625E:340b-38: gya nom pa gang du skyes kyang ngo bo nyid kyi sku las mi 'da' bas na /
T02TD2625E:340b-39: rdo rje'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod do //
T02TD2625E:340b-40: bcom ldan 'das 'di thugs rje chen pos bskul bas srid pa dang zhi ba thams cad du snang bas ston te /
T02TD2625E:341a-0: @341a * // rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha rnams dang //
T02TD2625E:341a-1: tshang sogs lha min gnod spyin grub pa dang //
T02TD2625E:341a-2: rig 'dzin klu dang gnod spyin dri za dang //
T02TD2625E:341a-3: gsang ba pa dang mtshung dang 'byung po rnams //
T02TD2625E:341a-4: dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2625E:341a-5: gus pas thal mo spyar nas tshig gsol ba //
T02TD2625E:341a-6: kye ma srog chags rnams la thugs rjer ldan //
T02TD2625E:341a-7: kye ma khyod kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas //
T02TD2625E:341a-8: / kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong //
T02TD2625E:341a-9: gzhan gyis dbyig to gzhan gyis 'khor lo dang //
T02TD2625E:341a-10: de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum 'bar ba can //
T02TD2625E:341a-11: gzhan gyis ral gyi gzhu dang be con can //
T02TD2625E:341a-12: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang //
T02TD2625E:341a-13: gzhan dag kun gyi zhi ba nyid du mthong //
T02TD2625E:341a-14: du ma'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar //
T02TD2625E:341a-15: lha dang gnod spyin gyis mthong de la 'dud //
T02TD2625E:341a-16: lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa //
T02TD2625E:341a-17: byang chub sems dpa' mchog rab khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2625E:341a-18: rig sngags gzhu 'gengs khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02TD2625E:341a-19: khyod la bdag cag deng ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2625E:341a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'di la bstod pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2625E:341a-22: de tsam du snang ba ston par spyod pas na /
T02TD2625E:341a-23: rdo rje can khyod ni lha rnams kyi nang na mchog nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstod pa ste /
T02TD2625E:341a-24: tshig gi don ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T02TD2625E:341a-25: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2625E:341a-26: bstod pa bris pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02TD2625E:341a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD2625E:341a-28: rjes su yi rang ba ba stan to //
T02TD2625E:341a-29: rab zab rgyud 'di'i snying po ni //
T02TD2625E:341a-30: bdag gis 'dir brjod kho nar zad //
T02TD2625E:341a-31: gang du gzhung don rnam ma phye //
T02TD2625E:341a-32: bla ma mnyes par byas la blang //
T02TD2625E:341a-34: bzod smra dge ba gang yin des //
T02TD2625E:341a-36: bdag kyang sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog /'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2625E:341a-37: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02TD2625E:341a-38: snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2625E:341a-39: dza' lndha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon /
T02TD2625E:341a-40: k'a ma deha nu pa zhes bya ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2625E:341a-42: // / a'a ts'a rya bi na ya tsandra dang /
T02TD2625E:341a-43: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis /
T02TD2625E:341a-44: 'phan yul rgyal gyi lugs lhas su bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so /
